T02n2952u_001:24: padamidaṁ taṁ janaṁ nirdiśati yenāviṣkṛtaṁ dharmavastu,
T02n2952u_001:26: ayaṁ bhāvaḥ- buddhasya śikṣaṇāni svabhāvasiddhāni satyānyantareṇa na kānicid vastūni yāni buddhena prakaṭīkṛtāni ca,
T02n2952u_001:30: athavā tena satyānā prakaṭanamabhūt na veti viṣaye teṣāṁ satyānāmapekṣā nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:42: na buddhasya athavā kasyacidvā kalpanayā kṣamatayā vā tāni jāyante |
T02n2952u_001:43: asyāḥ śikṣaṇapaddhaterayameva viśeṣo yat paddhatiriyaṁ nāvegamūlā,
T02n2952u_001:45: paravarttini samaye buddhasaṁjñayābhihitaḥ asya dharmasya pravartaka ātyantikatayā jñānasāgaraṁ mamantha,
T02n2952u_001:46: tathā ca antardṛṣṭibalena samyak sampūrṇaṁ jñānaratnaṁ lebhe |
T02n2952u_001:55: api tu navatayā samakṣaṁ prakāśitamiti phalitārthaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:57: idam udāraṁ sarveṣu jīveṣu sāmānyam ca |
T02n2952u_001:65: parantu bauddhānāṁ pakṣe taccharaṇasya kaścit viśeṣo vartate yo'nyeṣu dharmeṣu hi durāpaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:66: bauddhadharme taccharaṇaṁ ratnatrayamiti viditaṁ yatra buddha-dhamma-saṁghānāṁ samāveśaḥ parilakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:67: yataḥ buddhaḥ kadāpi īśvarapreṣito dūto nāsīt athavā nāsīt parabrahmarūpaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:68: pratyuta sa tadīyaḥ śiṣyagaṇaṁ iva sāmānyo jīva āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:69: kevalaṁ pṛthaktayā nirdiśyante tasya caritrasya mālinyamuktatā,
T02n2952u_001:73: ebhirguṇiḥ yuktā tadīyā svārthaśūnyā mānavasevā jagati dṛḍhaṁ pratiṣṭhitā idānīmapi rāñjīvanarasasamṛddhā saṁvṛttā ca |
T02n2952u_001:82: atra mahattamasya satyasya prakāśo jātaḥ avidyayā yat satyaṁ mānaveṣu aśrūtapūrvamāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:83: tasya satyasya āviṣkaraṇādanantaraṁ tadbodhakṣameṣu janeṣu pracāramārebhe |
T02n2952u_001:84: asminnarthe vartamāno dharmo hi buddhadevasya upadeśaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:85: sa pālidhammavinaye ullekhitaḥ yasyākṣariko'rthaḥ ādarśaśca ācāraśca |
T02n2952u_001:86: budddhadevasya tirobhāvāt param samyag jñānāya dammānusāribhirbuddhabhaktaiḥ samaye samaye saṁgayānābhidheyā sabhā āhūtā |
T02n2952u_001:87: tathā ca paravartini kāle buddhasyopadeśāḥ piṭakākhyavibhāgatraye vibhaktā abhavan yathā vinayapiṭakaṁ sūttapiṭakamabhidhammapiṭakaṁ ceti yatra,
T02n2952u_001:96: buddhasya upadeśānāṁ dhammābhidheyaṁ saṁkalanaṁ kevalaṁ mahattvamasya satyasya upalabdhaye mūrtimat prakāśanaṁ nāma |
T02n2952u_001:99: asmādidaṁ tattvaṁ samāyāti yat ratnatrayamiti padaṁ kasyāpi viṣayasya prasaṁgena dvistarīyamarthaṁ sūcayati- ekatra vigrahapustakaveṣabhūṣāṇāṁ darśanīyaṁ sparśanīyaṁ copasthāpanaṁ prasajyate |
T02n2952u_001:100: anyatra ca sūkṣmatarādhyātmikārthavahaṁ padamidaṁ guṇaṁ dharmaṁ sattvaṁ vā nirdiśati yatra tathākathitānāṁ trayāṇāṁ sammelanaṁ ghaṭate |
T02n2952u_001:101: yadyapi pūrvatane vyākhyāne nunatā āgatā tathā sthūlarūpatā dṛśyate,
T02n2952u_001:102: tathāpi vyākhyānamidaṁ sādhāraṇajanamānaseṣu aparihāryatāṁ vrajati yadeva adhikataramutkarṣamāpannān janān viśeṣeṇa smārayati |
T02n2952u_001:111: punaśca, saṁghādeśasyāstitvaṁ sādhāraṇe śiṣyasamāje buddhapadāṁkānusāriṇaṁ sāhasikaṁ vyaktivṛndaṁ nirdiśati yatra ca dharmagrantharūpī dhammaḥ sādhāraṇānāṁ janānāṁ sukhabodhyatayā dharmamārge sopānatvena tān sarvān paricālayati |
T02n2952u_001:120: yataḥ, yathārthataḥ hi anubuddhabodhakaḥ buddhasadṛśśca saṁgho nāma jīvatkāle samyag jñānalābhāya prayatnavatāṁ sarveṣāṁ kṛte eva unmuktaḥ yatra na janānāṁ samājasvīkṛtā vyavahārānumoditā ca sthitiḥ ca gaṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:121: evaṁ kaścid balakaḥ bālikā vā kaścit sādhāraṇo bhakto vā bhikṣurvā etadarthakaḥ saṁgho bhavitumarhati tathā ca sa janaḥ viśuddhidevarūpeṇa pratyavekṣyate
T02n2952u_001:136: śāsanavidhau abhijātānāṁ prabhāvo dṛśyate yatra śakyanaiḥ pratiṣṭhitā kācit sabhā babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:137: asyāḥ sabhāyāḥ patirāsīt śuddhodanaḥ yaḥ rājeti saṁjñayā viditaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:138: tasya mahiṣī āsīt māyā sirimahāmāyā vā |
T02n2952u_001:139: etajjanayugalamekadā vesakhākhyacāndramāsasya pūrṇimāyāṁ tithau bhārate tathā jagati viśrutatamasya tanayasya janma dadau |
T02n2952u_001:140: tasyāvirbhāvo babhūva kasmiṁścit kuñjakānane-māyādevyā devadahābhidheyasya svanagarasya ca kapilavatthunagarasya madhyavarttini sthale |
T02n2952u_001:142: sa rājatanayocitaiḥ sarvakalāvijñānarūpaiḥ mānasikaiḥ guṇaiḥ saha śārīrikaśaktisaundaryaguṇairapi upetaḥ san kṛti bhabhūva |
T02n2952u_001:150: tat tat śikṣaṇīyaṁ sarvaṁ parisamāpya yaśodharābhidhānāṁ kāñcinmanoramāṁ kanyāmupayeme yā rāhulanāmakasya putrasya janma dadau |
T02n2952u_001:152: ayameva tajjīvanasya parivarttanasya kālaḥ yadā tasya hṛdaye karuṇāyā āhvānamuttālataraṁ saṁjātam tathā ca tasya citte sarvātiśāyijñānajyotiḥ udbhāsitataraṁ saṁvṛttam |
T02n2952u_001:153: vaśuvadharūpayāgāt pāpasya vyaktyantaraprāptirūpabodhāt jātibhedaprathājātabhedābhedavicārāt ca manuṣyāṇāṁ yāni duḥkhāni kaṣṭāni ca jāyante taiḥ saha jarārogaśokamṛtyunirāśāsañjātāni kāyikāni mānasikāni ca duḥkhāni-yāni buddhicitte suptāni bhabhūvuḥ tāni prabuddhatāṁ jammuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:155: yasyottaram indriyasukhamagnajīvanayātrayā na labhyate iti bodho babhūva siddhārthasya |
T02n2952u_001:156: so'damyamanorathena yenakenāpi mahatā mūlyena taduttaraṁ jñātuṁ pravṛttaḥ san taduttaraṁ prāpa,
T02n2952u_001:157: yat svasya pareṣāṁ ca kṛte mahat sahāyakaṁ jātam |
T02n2952u_001:158: pareṣāṁ sāhāyyaṁ cikīrṣuḥ siddhārthaḥ prathamataḥ kiñcit sādhayituṁ yatnavān bhaviṣyati iti tenāvagatam |
T02n2952u_001:159: tataḥ sa indriyasukhaiḥ vṛthā kālakṣepaṁ kṛtvā duḥsāhasikena siddhāntenānupreritaḥ san jīvanarahasyasandhānāya vratī babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:175: evaṁ sa samyak jñānī athavā buddha iti viśrutaḥ sañjātaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:176: buddhatvaprāptiriyaṁ tasya janmanaḥ pañcatriṁśattame varṣ cāndramāsasya vesakhasya pūrṇimāyāṁ tithau eva saṁvṛttā babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:177: tataḥ prabhṛti sa cirakāṁṅkṣitaparamasatyasya sukhaṁ vibhajya sādhāraṇebhyaḥ janebhyaḥ samarpayitumātmānamutsasarja |
T02n2952u_001:178: buddhatvalābhāt prāk tena yādṛśī kṛcchratā svīkṛtā tādṛśīṁ kṛcchratāmaṁgīkartuṁ dhammasya māhātmyampalabdhuṁ ca samartheṣu paricitajaneṣu svecchayā dhammaṁ pracārayituṁ bhāraṁ jagrāha |
T02n2952u_001:191: svāsthyavantaḥ svāsthyahīnāśca- iti sarvairjanaiḥ saha tasya sambandha āsīt ye tasya vāṇīṁ niścitaṁ śroṣyanti athavā upalabdhuṁ yatiṣyante |
T02n2952u_001:192: tannikaṭe vahiraṁgākāraviṣayakaṁ kṛtrimacintanasaṁkrāntaṁ kimapi pārthakyaṁ nāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:193: tataḥ, bodhilābhāt paraṁ vā pūrvaṁ vā buddhadevasya jīvanakathā tadīyakāryebhyaḥ pṛthakbhūteti na gaṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:194: niḥsvārthasevāprasaṁge sahanasaṁkalpavicāraprasaṁge ca dṛṣṭāntamūlakaguṇarājitvena ubhayameva sahāyakatāṁ vrajiṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:202: arthāt bhāratasya grāmād grāmāntare bhramaṇakāle buddhadevaḥ sarvadā sādhāraṇānāṁ kṛṣijīvināṁ saṁsparśe sthitvā,
T02n2952u_001:203: tasmai pradattaṁ kamapi prakāramāhāraṁ gṛhītvā vyaktigatālāpe niratastiṣṭhati tathā ca svīyavaktavyamupasthāpayati upadeśaṁ prayacchati ca |
T02n2952u_001:211: atra vyaktigatacittaśānteḥ tātkṣaṇikaṁ lakṣyamapi nyūnatvena na vicāryam |
T02n2952u_001:218: aṁguttaranikāyasya catukkanipāte kathitebhyo buddhavacanebhyo buddhasya śikṣaṇarītiravagamyate |
T02n2952u_001:232: tataḥ vividhāsu avasthāsu vividhāāṁ narāṇāṁ prayojanasyānusāreṇa ācaraṇasya bahuvidhāṁ kramā vyavasthāpitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:233: teṣāṁ mūlabhūtā nītiśca sannyāsiṣu ca sādhāraṇeṣu ca prayujyā |
T02n2952u_001:234: aśubhecchāvṛthāhaṁkārādīnapaguṇān prati pravaṇatāṁ jetuṁ kaścid bauddho dhyānayogena dayākaruṇāsnigdhasukhitāsamavṛttitānāṁ śaktimanubhūya vyavaharet
T02n2952u_001:245: unnatataraṁ punarjanmāthavā jīvanaṁ kāmayamānānāṁ janānāṁ kṛte 'laukika' upadeśaḥ 'lokuttara'stu jāgatikaṁ sukhaṁ punarjanma vā atīva nagaṇyamiti
T02n2952u_001:254: parantu yathārthataḥ prayojanīyābhiprāyasādhanāya ubhāveva kāñcit samatāṁ vahataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:256: prathame kṣetre'śato dvitīyo ca kṣetre samagrata iti dvayo pārthakyam |
T02n2952u_001:257: arthāt prathame kṣetre duḥkhasya kiñjinmātramavaśiṣyate dvitīye tu duḥkhasya mūle dhvastataṁ gate paripūrṇā duḥkhanivṛttirjāyate |
T02n2952u_001:260: idaṁ śuddhaṁ nīvanaṁ narāṇāṁ vañcanāya neṣyate na vā teṣāṁ śraddhāyā lābhāya,
T02n2952u_001:262: navīnācāryarūpeṇa nūtanasaṁskārakarūpeṇa vā paricayaḥ asya nābhiprāyarūpeṇa iṣṭaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:264: tatsthale, viśuddhaṁ jīvanamātmasaṁyamaṁ tyāgaṁ vairāgyaṁ nirvāṇaṁ ca lakṣyīkaroti iti |
T02n2952u_001:273: tatra jātivarṇapadavayoliṁgarūpānumānānāṁ viśeṣo na gaṇyate-iti bhikṣavastathā sādhāraṇā janāḥ sarve buddhabhaktā suṣṭhu jānanti |
T02n2952u_001:287: lokāścāsan tathākathiteṣu viśvāseṣu ācaraṇeṣu ca nimagnāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:298: tatkāle sāmānyena yā dhāraṇā svīkṛtirvā pracalitā āsīt tasyāḥ sāmagrikaṁ cāmūlaṁ ca parivartanamasyābhiprāyatvena kīrttitam |
T02n2952u_001:311: ayameva niyamo yat kaścijjano gaṁgāsnānāt pāpamukto bhavitumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:313: idaṁ vacanaṁ rūpakārthena vyākhyāya buddho darśayamāsa tasya dharme kaścijjano nītinadīsnānāt pāpānmukto bhavituṁ śaknoti iti |
T02n2952u_001:321: - dharmopadeśasya pūrvoktaprakāradvayena buddhadevaḥ tatkāle svāmivivekānandādibhāratīyavidvajjanagaṇa iva hindudharmasya viśrutasaṁskārarūpeṇa paricitto'bhaviṣyat |
T02n2952u_001:322: kintu kiñcinnūtanatvavat punarvidhānārthameva bauddhadharmo yathārthataḥ nūtanadharmarūpeṇa gauravasya yaśasaśca adhikārī babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:339: tathā hi, jīvanasyāsmin kāle mānavajīvanaṁ nirvāṇalābhāya prakṛṣṭaḥ samaya iti bauddhadharmo manyate |
T02n2952u_001:342: parameśvānugrahalābhāya kalyāṇakarma kartavyamiti dhāraṇā kutrāpi nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:343: atraiva jātivarṇasampradāyanirviśeṣeṇa mānavādhikārāṇāṁ svādhīnatāyāśca pratiṣṭhā yuktidvārā samarthyate |
T02n2952u_001:344: yo jano hatyākarmāthavā cauryakarma vāparādhakarma sādhayati sa buddhena doṣīti gaṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:345: sa ātmānaṁ bauddhaṁ vadatu na veti viṣaye gaṇanā nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:346: tathā ca aparādhamūlakakarmakaraṇāt so'vaśyameva duḥkhabhāk bhaviṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:348: tadvat, yo janaḥ śubhaṁ karma karoti so'vaśyameva śubhavikākaṁ bhuṅkte |
T02n2952u_001:349: sa bauddho bhavatu na veti viṣayo nagaṇya eva |
T02n2952u_001:350: na kāpi śaktiḥ sattā vā yā sañcitaśubhaphalaprāptau bādhāṁ janayati |
T02n2952u_001:351: ātmabhāgyanirmāṇe ātmanirdhāraṇasya ca mānavīyasāmyasya ca etādṛśī mattarā bhāvanā nānyaiḥ kaiścittatvairudghoṣitā |
T02n2952u_001:361: tatra ghaṭikācatuṣṭayaṁ vyāpya kevalaṁ viśramamantareṇa avaśiṣṭaviṁśatighaṭikākālena tasya klāntivihinā niḥsvārthā ca mānavasevā abādhitā āsīt
T02n2952u_001:362: asmāt kāraṇāt tasyopadeśāḥ etādṛśaṁ vividhatvaṁ viśālatvaṁ bhajante yena keṣāñcinmate,
T02n2952u_001:363: te upadeśā nāma caturaśītiviṣayā iti kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:364: te ca śīrṣatrayeṇa vibhājyante | tathā hi -
T02n2952u_001:372: ete bhikṣūṇāṁ sādhāraṇānāṁ śiṣyāṇāṁ kṛte upayuktāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:399: ye samagraviṣayāṇāṁ pāraṁ gantuṁ na śaknuvanti teṣāṁ kṛte tu buddhopadeśānāṁ saṁkṣiptatamo niṣkarṣaḥ dṛśyate bhikṣūṇāṁ uddiśya ovadapātimokkhābhidhāne mādhīyasambodhane | tathā hi -
T02n2952u_001:415: tatra śarīraṁ nāma dṛśyaṁ spṛśyaṁ vāhyataḥ bhautikaṁ tathā ca tulanāta āpātato vā sthāyitaraṁ vastu |
T02n2952u_001:416: cittaṁ tu abhautikaṁ sūkṣmaṁ vastu tathā cādṛśyamaspṛśyaṁ ca |
T02n2952u_001:418: kintu vinayena niyamena ca idaṁ manaḥ alpataraṁ dolāyamānaṁ tathā cādhikataraṁ dṛḍhaṁ jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:419: ata eva manaḥsaṁyamasya ātmaprabhutvasya carcāpaddhatau buddhānuśāsanānāṁ prathamaḥ kramo vidhīyate |
T02n2952u_001:428: teṣu pañcakaṁ sādhāraṇānāṁ bauddhānāṁ niyatācaraṇāya sambhavaparatayā nirdiśyate |
T02n2952u_001:431: kintu saptaviṁśatyadhikadviśatasaṁkhyakāni anuśāsanāni nītvā pātimokkhābhidhāno yo buṇastiṣṭhati sa bhikṣūṇāṁ tathā bauddhasannyāsināṁ kṛte vihitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:445: madyādirūpāṇi madajanakabheṣajāni eva mohasya pradhānāni kāraṇāni |
T02n2952u_001:480: ete doṣāḥ sāmānyena sākalyena ca pañcānuśāsanānīti saṁjñayā paricitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:481: sarveṣu janeṣu maṁgalasādhanāya nirāpattāvidhānāya ca etānyanuśāsanāni sūtrarūpeṇa viracitāni |
T02n2952u_001:482: teṣāṁ pālanaṁ ca na kevalaṁ bhaktipakṣe'pi tu tatsaparkitasarvajanapakṣe sukhaśāntividhāyakam |
T02n2952u_001:490: keṣāñcinmate eteṣāṁ pālanena netivācakaṁ phalaṁ jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:492: eteṣāṁ parityāgo'pi svataḥ siddhatattvarūpeṇa deśasya pragatiṁ sādhayati |
T02n2952u_001:493: tathā hi - hatyāpratihiṁsādiprakāravyavahāraśūnyatā prakārāntareṇa deśaṁ śāntisamṛddhimantaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:501: sa dharma itivācakaṁ karmapañcakamapi ānuṣaṁgikatayā upadiśati,
T02n2952u_001:502: tathā ca sadācārāṇāṁ sampūrṇāṁ sūcīṁ sthāpayati | tathā hi -
T02n2952u_001:540: tathā hi - abhijātatantraṁ rājatantraṁ gaṇatantram ityādi |
T02n2952u_001:541: tathāpi bauddhadharme praśāsanasya prasaraḥ prāguktapraśāsanādyapekṣayā vyāpakataraṁ tātparyaṁ vahati,
T02n2952u_001:542: yataḥ sarvāḥ śāsanasya vyavasthā deśānāṁ svakīyaprayatnāya kalpante |
T02n2952u_001:544: ayaṁ viṣayaḥ svapraśāsanasya saṁketaṁ karoti yacchāsanaṁ pāpajātā lajjā kukarmaphalāśaṅkā ceti dharmadvayenāvāpyate |
T02n2952u_001:545: pariṇāmata idaṁ jagat yathārthataḥ patanād rakṣitaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:553: kintu kevalaṁ kati narāḥ lakṣyaṁ prāpnuvanti anye tu neti yathārthaṁ tathyam |
T02n2952u_001:558: bhītipradāsu vipatsu samasyāsu satīṣu api karmasādhanāya bhayahīnaḥ sāhasaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:560: eṣā nītiḥ kasyāpi kāryasya hitāhitapakṣanirṇayasya tathā bhramāpacayadūrikaraṇasya kṣamatā |
T02n2952u_001:561: ete sarve guṇā manoyogasyāgrahasya codbodhanāya prasiddhāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:562: kintu ete prāyaśaḥ avahelitā vismṛtāśca jāyante |
T02n2952u_001:563: tadarthaṁ janā abhīṣṭaṁ lakṣyaṁ yātuṁ na śaknuvanti |
T02n2952u_001:581: sambhāvanāmayasya kasyāpi janasya sambhāvanā ca bādhate |
T02n2952u_001:592: arthāt cauryakarmato hānito vā rakṣā vidhāya āpacchūnyasthāne dhanānāṁ sthāpanam |
T02n2952u_001:593: dhārmikairjanaiḥ saha saṁgatiḥ ye yathāyathaṁ sadācaraṇārthaṁ sāhāyyaṁ kariṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:594: tathā ca dhanajīvanayoḥ samṛddhau niścitatvaṁ jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:595: āyānusārato vyavavyavasthā - yatra yathāyathaṁ dīrghakālīnā arthanītisammatā yojanā sūcyate |
T02n2952u_001:596: ebhiḥ saha vartante - bhaviṣyadarthaṁ vipatkālīnavyavahārārthaṁ vā āyāṁśaviśeṣasya sañcayaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:607: yatra buddhena sampannaparivāravināśakāraṇāni vivṛtāni | tathā hi -
T02n2952u_001:655: dhanaprayogasya yathārthamupāyā buddhena saṁketitāḥ | tathā hi -
T02n2952u_001:663: padārūpaṁ sāmarthyānurūpaṁ tatra dhanaṁ vibhajya dātavyam |
T02n2952u_001:698: tadarthaṁ gārhasthyavyāpāre arthaviṣaye ca bahuvidhāḥ samasyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ vardhante dvitīyo'dhyāyaḥ dharmatvena bauddhadharmaḥ dharmatvena bauddhadharmamadhikṛtya vicārāt prāgasmābhiḥ saṁkṣepeṇa kaḥ dharmaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:700: samājajīvane bhaktijīvane ca sa kiṁ lakṣyamabhiyāti ityādayaḥ praśnāḥ samādhānīyāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:703: viśeṣataḥ mānasikasya ādhyātmikasya ca sukhasya lābhāya |
T02n2952u_001:704: kālakrameṇa vividhastarīyavikāśamatikramya yat kauśalaṁ jñānaṁ sañcite yaśca bhāvaḥ viśvāsaḥ ca sañcitau tāni sarvāṇi cintyante'tra dharme |
T02n2952u_001:706: tathāpi manastattvasammatatvāt śārīratattasammatvācca narasya madhye ādimajanasya dhārā ekādikrameṇa vahati iti yathārthaṁ vacanam |
T02n2952u_001:707: ādimapravṛttiśīlatā sādhāraṇyena tasmin manusye na tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:708: manuṣye sabhye sati sā paścāt tyajyate |
T02n2952u_001:713: kintu śiśuryathā bālapariveṣṭanavasanasya madhye lālito bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:714: tathaiva manuṣyāḥ kadāpi na ādimapravṛttitaḥ muktobhavitumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:715: ata eva, viśeṣato dharmasya vyāpāre sarvaprakāraiḥ sañcitaiḥ guṇajñānabhāvapratyayādibhiḥ saha narasya madhye ādimo naraḥ adhunāpi prativasati
T02n2952u_001:716: evaṁ sati prācīno dharmo yādṛśa āvegamūla āsīt na tādṛśo yuktinirbharaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:717: tathāpi, kālāvasāne sati adhikatarābhijñatāsañcayane kṛte ca prāguktabhāvapratyayāḥ kramaśaḥ paroktādibhiḥ parivartitā bhavanti,
T02n2952u_001:718: yāvanna samaya āyāti yadā evaṁ prakāreṇāgataṁ jñānaṁ pravṛttyādikaṁ pariśudhya saṁpūrṇīkṛtya ca vikāśasya caramatāṁ prāpnoti |
T02n2952u_001:721: ayaṁ viśvāso bhūtānāṁ tathā prākṛtikānāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ mānavīkaraṇena ajñatātmakabhayādeva sañjātaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:722: tathā hi - ādyo naraḥ sārvavidhabhautabalānāṁ kṛpāyā madhye ātmānaṁ paśyati sma |
T02n2952u_001:724: api ca, vajravidyudbhūkampajalapralayāḥ tanniyantrādhīnā na sthitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:725: teṣāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ paścāt avaśyameva kācicchaktiḥ kaścicchaktimān vā vartate iti tasya dhāraṇā ajāyata |
T02n2952u_001:726: bhayaṁkareṣu vastuṣu varttamānasya kasyacijjanasya bhāvanā paravartikāle īśvarasya dhārāṇāyāṁ rūpaṁ jagrāha |
T02n2952u_001:727: kintu pratyekaṁ vyāpāre kārakatvena kevalamekamīśvaramādimo naraḥ nācintayat,
T02n2952u_001:728: parantu vahūn īśvarān so'cintayat ye pṛthivyā ekaikaṁ vibhāgamadhikurvanti paravartikāle etaddhāraṇāta ekeśvaratattvaṁ vahvīśvaratattvaṁ ceti matadvayaṁ sṛṣṭhamabhavat |
T02n2952u_001:731: tadā sāmagrikaśaktimatā kenacit niyantrakeṇa janena prayojanamanubhūtam |
T02n2952u_001:732: śāsanavyavasthāyāṁ kramaśaḥ sampūrṇarājatantramukhi paripartanaṁ dṛṣṭam - yatra rājā vā samrāṭ vā śāsakatvena pratiṣṭho'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:738: ayaṁ rūpavān vyaktiveśeṣaḥ svargabhūmau viśvasya piteti abhihitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:739: saḥ advitīyaparamaśaktidhararūpeṇa parameśvaraḥ san sarveṣāṁ pūjitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:741: mānavīyajñānamadhikataraṁ prasāryya vyaktigatātmapratyayamūlamabhūt - tatra parameśvarasya dhāraṇa tādṛśaṁ gurutvaṁ na prāpa |
T02n2952u_001:742: mānavabhāgyamasahāyatvāt parameśvarādhīnaṁ vā tadicchāvaśam iti ekacchatrabhāvanā nūtanaṁ tātparyyaṁ jagrāha |
T02n2952u_001:743: tatra puruṣasya bhāgyaṁ divyādhīnaṁ na sthitvā mānavecchādhīnaṁ jātam |
T02n2952u_001:745: tathā hi - 1. āstikyavādaḥ - tatrāntarbhāvitau īśvaravādo vahvīśvaravādaśca |
T02n2952u_001:749: 2. nāstikyavādaḥ - kasyāpi parameśvarasaṁjñakasya pūjātra na vihitā |
T02n2952u_001:751: dharmo bāhyataḥ dharmasāpekṣaviśvāsācāraiḥ saṁśliṣyate kintu pradhānataḥ sa dharmaḥ sāmājikaḥ - evaṁvidyo dharmaḥ pratyekaṁ mānavasamāje sāmānyato dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:752: idānīṁ kāle pratiṣṭhiteṣu samājeṣu rājanīti-śikṣānīti-dhananītyādisammatāḥ vividhā vyavasthā antareṇāpi dharmo samagrasamājavyavasthāyāṁ gurutvavahasaṁsthārūpeṇa svīkṛtaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:753: tathāpi dharmo na praśāsanasadṛśaḥ vyavahāraparyāyo vā |
T02n2952u_001:754: tatra kṣamatāsvatantrīkaraṇaṁ kṣamatāniyantraṇaṁ ca saṁśliṣṭavastutvena nirdiṣṭe |
T02n2952u_001:755: ayaṁ nāpi ārthanītikapratiṣṭhānena tulyaḥ yatra utpādanabhogasambhārākāṅkṣādayaḥ saṁśliṣyante |
T02n2952u_001:756: api cāyaṁ na parivāreṇa samānaḥ saṁbandhaḥ sthāpyate niyamyate ca |
T02n2952u_001:757: paścimadeśīyaiḥ vidvadbhiḥ ‘dharmo kenacit ati’ - ityanena saṁśliṣyate iti lakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:758: ta‘dati’nā saha mānavasya sambandhaṁ racayati dharmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:766: mahattyāḥ sabhyatāyāḥ phalatvena ca viśiṣṭatām adhikaroti |
T02n2952u_001:767: adhunā samayo'yamuttarāya - kiṁ nāma dharmaḥ sādhayati ?
T02n2952u_001:768: mānavajīvane tathā samājajīvane samagrataḥ sa kiṁ lakṣyaṁ paripūrayati ?
T02n2952u_001:769: samagrasamājavyavasthānirmāṇakṣetreṣu dharmaḥ khalu gurutvavahasāmājikeṣu saṁsthāneṣu anyatama iti kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:770: samājo nāma sāmājikānāṁ saṁsthānānāṁ gatiśīlaḥ samatāvidhāyakaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:771: tāni saṁsthānāni vyavahārasammatatvena vādhyatāmūlakatvena ca ādarśabhūtāni kānicit kāryāṇi sthāpayanti |
T02n2952u_001:772: saṁsthānānāmetanmiśraṇaṁ samagrataḥ samājavyavasthāṁ racayati - yatra pratyekaṁ bhāgaḥ anyeṣāmupari nirbharaśīlaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:774: tarhi tat parivartanaṁ samagrasamājavyavasthāyāṁ prabhāvaṁ vitanoti |
T02n2952u_001:776: dharmaḥ saṁsthānatvena pariṇataṁ mānavānāṁ vyavahāramantareṇa na kaścid bhinno viṣayaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:777: samagrasamājavyavasthāyā aṁgarūpeṇa kasyacit sāmājikasaṁsthānasya kānīdvyaktāni tathā suptāni kāryāṇi santi |
T02n2952u_001:778: tataḥ, samagrataḥ samājavyavasthāyāṁ sāmyavidhāyakatvena kasyacid dharmīyasaṁsthānasya kāni kāni spṛṣṭāni suptāni a karyāṇi santi ?
T02n2952u_001:785: dharmo narebhyaḥ tat sāmarthyaṁ dadāti yena narā duradṛṣṭamabhimukhīkartuṁ samādhātuṁ ca śaknuvanti |
T02n2952u_001:786: api ca, dharmo'smākaṁ jñānamatikramya nirdiṣṭatāṁ samarpayati,
T02n2952u_001:788: kintu viśeṣata ucyate yat dharmaḥ karyakṣetre sampradāyena saha vyaktiṁ samīkaroti,
T02n2952u_001:797: doṣarāgavijayopāyapradānena samājasya aikyaṁ sthāyitvaṁ ca vidhātuṁ yatate |
T02n2952u_001:800: samājaviśeṣe'yaṁ dharmaḥ vyavasthārahitātmakaṁ dhvaṁsamūlakaṁ ca prabhāvaṁ vistārayati |
T02n2952u_001:801: vyaktipakṣe samājapakṣe ca dharmasya avadānamitivācakaṁ netivācakaṁ vā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:802: tadavadānaṁ niravacchinnamastitvaṁ rakṣati athavā avāñcchitaviṣayadūrīkaraṇāya bhūmikāṁ gṛhṇāti,
T02n2952u_001:803: tathā hi - yadā dharma indriyanigrahāya uddhatakarmapaddhatisaṁyamanāya ca upāyatvena kāryaṁ karoti,
T02n2952u_001:804: tadā sa dharmaḥ dhvaṁsātmakaṁ karma sādhayatītyucyate |
T02n2952u_001:806: pratyuta, dharmo yadā sāmājikaniyantraṇāṁ sādhayan pratiṣṭhitamūlyalakṣyāṇi paripoṣayan samājasya aikyavidhānāya sthāyitvasthāpanāya ca sahāyatāṁ vidadhāti tadā sa dharmo niravacchinnamastitvaṁ rakṣituṁ satyarthakaṁ karma sampādayati |
T02n2952u_001:808: sa śikṣitaḥ saṁskṛtimān sāmājikapadadhārī ca sannapi prāyeṇa kāmadveṣādibhirabhibhūto bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:809: api ca, tattvataḥ buddhijīvi sannapi manuṣyaḥ prakṛtyānubhavaśīlo jīvaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:810: sacetanamanaso rūpadvayamidaṁ manuṣyasya niyamane aṁśaṁ gṛhṇāti yadaiva duṣṭā pravṛttiḥ niyantraṇam labhate,
T02n2952u_001:811: tadaiva prāyeṇa dṛśyate manuṣya ātmanā bādhito'pi duṣkarmakaraṇāya cālito bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:812: idaṁ tathyaṁ adhaḥ prakṛtau khalīnarūpeṇa kenacid vastunā prayojanaṁ prasūte |
T02n2952u_001:814: yatredaṁ manuṣyamatikramya yāti tatra niyamā viracyante |
T02n2952u_001:816: śikṣā sarvadā sadācārasya dayāluhṛdayasya vā pratyayaṁ na nirdiśati |
T02n2952u_001:818: sa dharmanirapekṣaśikṣayā śikṣitaḥ san aparān janān kauśalena abhibhūtān karoti |
T02n2952u_001:822: dharmasya upadeśānāṁ nirmalaviśvāsena hārdikavyavahāreṇa ca vyaktau tathā samāje sthāyi sukhaṁ sthāyinī ca śāntiḥ sambhavataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:825: asmādeva kāraṇāt yathārthānāmā ko'pi dharmaḥ sarvadā tadanugāmināṁ mūlatvena tathā pūrvakāṁṅkṣitatvena naitikaṁ jīvanaṁ paricālayati |
T02n2952u_001:828: yata idaṁ parimitasusthitadaśāyā jāyate iti dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:833: te niyamā mānavamanaḥprakṛtiṁ gabhīrataraṁ praviśya sarveṣāṁ mānavānām upakārāya dharmamupadiśanti |
T02n2952u_001:835: tathā ca siddhāntaḥ kriyate yat dharmaḥ kevalam aihikaśikṣāyāḥ pariṇāma |
T02n2952u_001:837: yatra rāṣṭrīyavyavahārāropitapuruṣāpekṣayā anyaḥ kaścit puruṣaḥ śraddhāyā mahattarabodhena udbuddhaḥ bhavitumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:839: śikṣāvidaḥ arthanītividaśca tat svapne'pi na paśyanti |
T02n2952u_001:840: asmin vyāpāre dharmaḥ praśāntā śaktiḥ yā āñānuvartanamādiśati,
T02n2952u_001:843: eṣa dharmo mānavacaritrasya etāvat gabhīram praviṣṭo yat na ko'pi manuṣyasṛṣṭavyavahāravidhiḥ tadvatsamunnatiśikharaṁ gantuṁ kāmayate |
T02n2952u_001:844: evaṁ dharmasya sāhāyyenaiva vyavahārasūtraṁ sthāpayituṁ śakyate |
T02n2952u_001:845: api ca, saṁghavaddhajīvarūpeṇa manuṣyaḥ svata evāpi dharmapravaṇo jīvaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:847: bauddhadharmasya mūlabhūtā nītiḥ sambhavata āryasatyacatuṣṭaye lakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:848: etāni satyāni viśvaprakṛteḥ mānavaprakṛtervā kenacinnirdiṣṭena bodhena saha yujyante |
T02n2952u_001:852: iyaṁ paddhatiḥ caturthe āryasatye aṣṭāṁgikamārgeṣu vardhate |
T02n2952u_001:855: ayaṁ kenacana nareṇānusṛtasya naitikasya tathādhyātmikasyānuśīlanasya mārgatvena dharmarūpaṁ bauddhatattvamupasthāpayati |
T02n2952u_001:856: sarve bhāratīyā dharmāḥ prāgbhāratīyakālīnasya bodhaviśeṣasya prabhutvaṁ svīkurvanti |
T02n2952u_001:857: vaidike vā prācīnapārasike vā vāṅmaye vidhyarthakena śabdenāyaṁ prakāśitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:859: sarvāṇi vastūni sattvāni ca teṣāṁ kṛte upadiṣṭaṁ kaṁcana mārgamanusaranti anusareyurvā |
T02n2952u_001:860: ayaṁ mārgaḥ sattāvato viśvasya yathāyathasvabhāvanirmāṇayoḥ upari pratiṣṭhito vartate,
T02n2952u_001:864: samājeṣu vyaktisaṁghasya nirmāṇe vikāśe ca etādṛśasya bodhasya sambhāvyatā atiprācīnakāle avaśyameva samuditā |
T02n2952u_001:865: kasyāścidupajāteḥ sadasyaḥ svasya vā pareṣāṁ vā kṛte hitakarāṇi kāryāṇi nirdiṣṭairupāyaiḥ sādhayet |
T02n2952u_001:867: paravarttivaidikakālāt dharmarūpeṇa prakāśitāmimāṁ dhāraṇāṁ paśyāmaḥ yatra manuṣyakṛtakarmaṇāṁ pratyekaṁ rūpaṁ saṁśliṣṭamāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:869: ayaṁ śāstrokto viṣayaḥ buddhakālasya prāg buddhakālasya vā brāhmaṇayāgīyasāhityeṣu dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:870: yatra atisūkṣmavyāpāro'pi upadiṣṭaḥ yajñavediṣu vyavahṛtānām iṣṭakānāmākṛtiṁ saṁkhyāṁ cāpi aparityājyaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:872: tatra ayaṁ vyāparaḥ sarvāṇi anyakarmāṇi samāvṛtya iva yajñīyānāṁ tathā śāstroktānāmanuṣṭhānānāṁ vidhānaṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:873: ayameva purohitānāṁ dharmaḥ yaiḥ yāgā niyantritā yoddhṛṇāṁ gṛhasthānāṁ śūdrāṇāṁ ca svasvadharmaḥ vyākhyātaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:876: api tu brāhmaṇavarṇena gṛhītasya karttavyaviṣayakasyābhimatasya vipakṣe |
T02n2952u_001:877: tadabhimatavema samājasya apareṣu vibhāgeṣu dharmatvena ghoṣitam brāhmaṇyadharmastadāpi bhāratavarṣasya sampūrṇapūrvaprāntam nopagataḥ,
T02n2952u_001:878: buddhatattvasya svālaye'pi sambhavataḥ nūtana eva virodhasya tathā pratyabhiyogasya sambhukhīno'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:880: yadyapi ca brāhmaṇaiḥ saha saṁlāpesu ācaraṇeṣu ca aśraddhā na dṛśyate,
T02n2952u_001:883: na hi ko'pi sandehāvasaraḥ yat apare ye abrāhāṇāṁ ācāryāḥ sannyāsinaśca pṛthivīṁ parityajya gatāḥ tān adhikṛtya racitāni upākhyānāni yathārthavasthāmupanyasyanti
T02n2952u_001:888: śuddhasukhavādāt vastuvādāt cārabhya ātmanigrahasya caramaṁ rūpamapi tatra vaiśadyena varṇitam |
T02n2952u_001:889: tatkālīne boddhadharme apare dve dhāraṇe āstām - prathamataḥ karmavādaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:891: duḥkhapāpayoḥ cirantanavivāde ete dve eva bhāratīye prativacane |
T02n2952u_001:894: tarhi tat pāpāya sa parajanmani daṇḍaṁ lapsyate |
T02n2952u_001:895: kati tattvāni pāpaṁ doṣaṁ ca iti vācakaṁ satyamiti gṛhṇāti |
T02n2952u_001:896: idaṁ mataṁ bauddhārhatāṁ kathābhiḥ ātmapakṣaṁ samarthayati - ye mṛtajānānāṁ bhāgyāni draṣṭuṁ śaknuvanti |
T02n2952u_001:897: tathā ca, ye janāsteṣāṁ bhāgyaṁ vaktum aparajagataḥ pratyāgatāḥ teṣāṁ bhāgyāni api pratyakṣīkartuṁ samarthāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:898: evamidaṁ jagat tadeva sthānaṁ yatra hitārthaṁ karmamārgānusaraṇaṁ prayojanīyam |
T02n2952u_001:902: kā vā viśvasya yathārthaṁ prakṛtiḥ, iti,
T02n2952u_001:905: pratidvandvisiddhācāryaiḥ prakṛtaḥ panthā āviṣkṛta iti pratyayaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:907: anayaiva ca diśā asya darśanasya sthāpayituḥ mahattvaṁ tathā mūlatvaṁ parilakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:908: idaṁ vivecitaṁ pracalitamatānāṁ parityāgāya saṁśodhanāya vā aitihāsike vikāśe,
T02n2952u_001:912: api tu sādhāraṇānāṁ janānām yo vidhiḥ prātyahikajīvane sarveṣu karttavyeṣu prayujyate |
T02n2952u_001:913: sannyāsikṣetre yo jano vartamāne jīvane nirvāṇarūpaṁ paramaṁ puruṣārthaṁ labdhumicchati tasya pakṣe naitikā niyamāḥ tasya dharmānuśīlanasya avaśyakartavyāṅgaviśeṣāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:917: buddhaśca svayaṁ pūrvatananītimārgacyutān brāhmaṇān nindan varṇitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:918: upadeśadānakāle buddha uvāca - pṛthivyāṁ bahavo brahmarūpā janāstiṣṭhanti ye nūtanopadeśaṁ grahītumunmukhā āsan |
T02n2952u_001:919: teṣāṁ samīpe sapramāṇa aiśonmeṣaḥ sādhitaḥ yasmai teṣāṁ naitikā svabhāvā abhilaṣanti |
T02n2952u_001:920: api ca, cirantaradhammatvena aiśonmeṣo vastusvabhāvapakṣe sahajātaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:921: buddhena tadvastu punarāviṣkṛtaṁ yat prāyeṇa viluptamāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:923: prathamataḥ sādhāraṇānāṁ janānāṁ kṛte vyāvahārikaṁ tathā kāryakaraṁ darśanam |
T02n2952u_001:925: pracalitena viśvāsena vidhinā vā sampāditāni nipuṇāni kāryāṇi ādhyātmikatayā navāṁ mātrāṁ labhante sma |
T02n2952u_001:926: api ca, eṣu kāryeṣu naitikaṁ tātparyaṁ pratiphalitam |
T02n2952u_001:927: kūṭadantena vipreṇālocanāyāṁ buddha uvāca - kaścit prācīnaḥ rājā mahāyajñaṁ karttumiyeṣa |
T02n2952u_001:928: pariśeṣe sa taṁ yajñaṁ kartuṁ tasya gṛhapurohitena utsāhito babhūva - yatra ṣaṇḍa-chāga-kukkuṭa-śūkarādi-prāṇivadho nābhūt,
T02n2952u_001:932: kintu te rodanaṁ tathā daṇḍabhayaṁ na kṛtvā teṣāṁ karmāṇi cakruḥ |
T02n2952u_001:933: kūṭadantaḥ papraccha - ko yāgaḥ asmāt yajñāt prasiddhataraḥ,
T02n2952u_001:935: buddha uvāca - dhārmikāya sannyāsine bhikṣāyā dānaṁ khalu mahān yajñaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:938: tasmādapi mahattaraṁ viduṣāṁ vākyeṣu pratyayaparāyaṇatvam iti |
T02n2952u_001:946: siṅgālakopadeśe buddhastathā varṇito yathā sa digbhāgaṣaṭkapūjanarataṁ kañcit gṛhasthaṁ dadarśa (pradhānā diśaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:948: sa vadati tasya pitā taṁ tatkaraṇāya ādideśa |
T02n2952u_001:950: kintu sa kevalamuvāca - tena prakāreṇa diśaḥ na pūjayitavyā iti |
T02n2952u_001:961: api ca, dhanalābhasya ṣaṭ upāyāsteṣu ca ṣaṭ vipadaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:964: yathārthaśiṣyaḥ pūrvāṁ diśaṁ pitarāviti manyamānaḥ pūjayati |
T02n2952u_001:969: ahaṁ ca gatebhyaḥ ātmabhyaśca haviḥ dāsyāmi’ iti,
T02n2952u_001:970: pitarau ca pañcaprakāraiḥ tasmai pratidāsyataḥ evam anyāsu dikṣu draṣṭavyam |
T02n2952u_001:971: ācāryeṣu kartavyaṁ sādhayitvā sa dakṣiṇāṁ diśaṁ pūjayati |
T02n2952u_001:972: sa patnyāṁ viśvastaḥ san tasyāśca bhavaṇena paścimāṁ diśaṁ pūjayati |
T02n2952u_001:975: ūrdhvadeśaṁ ca sannyāsināṁ viprāṇāṁ ca yatnena |
T02n2952u_001:977: kintu idaṁ sādhāraṇebhyaḥ janebhyo'pi samagrakarttavyād atidūre vartate |
T02n2952u_001:978: nītisammataṁ karma aihike tathā pāralaukike jīvane sukharūpāya puraskārāya kalpate |
T02n2952u_001:985: ayaṁ tatkṣaṇāt sukarmaṇāṁ puraskāre antimasukhānveṣaṇalakṣyādupari tamunnamayati |
T02n2952u_001:988: tathāpi atra kila prācīnopadeśasya punarvargīkaraṇaṁ lakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:990: prathame sthare satāpannaṁ nāmakaṁ pravāhaṁ praviṣṭaḥ naraḥ bandhanatrayaṁ naśyati |
T02n2952u_001:993: evaṁ ca sa duḥkhātmakapunarjanmapātratāto mukto bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1000: , tadavasthāyāṁ ca uparate tasmin sa sakṛt duḥkhasamutsādanāt pūrvam idaṁ jagat pratyāvartate |
T02n2952u_001:1001: tṛtīyataḥ, nimnastarīyabandhanapañcakaṁ vinaśya (viṣayāsattyā droheṇa ca saha prāguktatrayam)
T02n2952u_001:1002: , sa uccatare jagati punarjāyate - yasmāt punarāgamanasya sambhāvyatā nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:1004: eṣu triṣu stareṣu sukarmasañcayasya abhiprāyo na tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1006: yatra nītininditakarmasādhanāya prakṛtā pravaṇatā tirohitā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1007: viśeṣataḥ, jagati kasmaicit sthitiśīlāya rūpāya tṛṣṇā (tanhā)
T02n2952u_001:1008: , tāṁ prati pravaṇatāyā ucchedanam adhikaṁ gurutvapūrṇaṁ lakṣaṇam |
T02n2952u_001:1009: bandhanādikrameṇa vargīkṛtā vibhinnarūpā tṛṣṇā duḥkhodbhavasya duḥkhanirodhasya ca jñānena vinaṣṭiṁ yāti |
T02n2952u_001:1010: tataḥ caturthaḥ staraḥ - arhatāṁ staraḥ - upasthito bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1011: asyāṁ daśāyāṁ daścit jano yadi itomadhye idaṁ jagat na tyajati,
T02n2952u_001:1012: tarhi sa svata eva asāmānyaḥ jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:1013: sa tṛṣṇāyā mukto bhavati - yayā sādhāraṇaḥ naraḥ kamanīyaṁ pārthivaṁ jīvanaṁ vahati |
T02n2952u_001:1014: tataḥ tṛṣṇāmukto janaḥ hṛdayena antarjñānena ca mokṣasya bodhe vasati |
T02n2952u_001:1024: asya viṣayasya itihāsasammate vicāre ayameva svābhāvikaḥ praśnaḥ yat vayam vikāsaprāpte darśane kiṁ paśyāmaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:1025: yāthātathyena buddhopadiṣṭe darśane vā kiṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1027: tathā hi - dīghasya ādyeṣu trayodaśasutteṣu śīlākhyā nītimālā vartate |
T02n2952u_001:1028: iyaṁ niḥsaṁśayaṁ sampādakena saṁyujyate - yena ālocaneṣu gṛhītā |
T02n2952u_001:1033: ati bhāgāḥ santi ye ayatra prāyaśaḥ dṛśyante |
T02n2952u_001:1034: te iva sarve punaruktimūlakā anucchedā saṁyojanakavalitā iti matam |
T02n2952u_001:1035: tāntareṇa prācīnatamā anucchedā mūlaṁ tatvaṁ nirdidhanti - yat śiṣyaiḥ budhyate |
T02n2952u_001:1036: ālocaneṣu saṁvādeṣu vā anyatamasya grahaṇena idaṁ dṛśyate yat nirdiṣṭaparyāye sā śikṣā kīdṛśī āsīt,
T02n2952u_001:1037: tataśca prācīnopadeśasya uddhṛteḥ tathā punarnimiteḥ praceṣṭhā vicāryate |
T02n2952u_001:1038: vastutaḥ saṁyojanamūlakā aṁśā mūlaṁ tattvaṁ saṁśodhayituṁ na yatante |
T02n2952u_001:1041: eṣu saṁvādeṣu sannyāsigrahaṇaphalasutte bauddhadharmopadeśasya pūrṇatamaṁ tātparyaṁ lakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:1042: ayaṁ saṁvādaḥ nṛpasya ajātasattoḥ ākhyāne praveśaṁ labhate - yaḥ virodhisampradāyaṣaṭkasya pradhānānāmanusandhānāt paraṁ buddhasyaṁ samīpamupagata iti kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:1043: tatra buddhasyottaraṁ bauddhasannyāsina unnatiṁ varṇayati - yatra samyag jñānalābhena saha nītibodhasya antardṛṣṭau samādheśa vibhinnāḥ paryāyā varṇitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1044: rājā buddhaṁ pṛcchati - ‘bhavān kimiha jagati sannyāsijīvanasya phalaṁ vyākhyātuṁ śaknoti ?
T02n2952u_001:1045: ’ kaściddāso gṛhastho vā kevalaṁ jagattyāgena jayati iti suphalaṁ nirdiśan buddhaḥ kasyacid buddhasya samudayaṁ vṛttāntaṁ gṛhṇāti |
T02n2952u_001:1046: kaścit janaḥ tattvaṁ śrutvā buddhe viśvāsaṁ labhate |
T02n2952u_001:1047: sa paśyati yat sa gṛhe yathāyathaṁ dhārmikaṁ jīvanaṁ voḍhuṁ na śaknoti |
T02n2952u_001:1051: manasvitāṁ tathā jāgarūkatāṁ labdhvā santuṣṭaḥ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1052: eṣu vibhāgeṣu ādyasya vistṛtā vyākhyā śīlanāmake'śe labdhvā santuṣṭaḥ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1053: eṣu vibhāgeṣu ādyasya vistṛtā vyākhyā śīlanāmake'śe dīyate,
T02n2952u_001:1056: prāthamikanaitikavidhīnāṁ prathame bhāge yatiḥ prāṇināṁ vadhaṁ tyajati yaṣṭiprayogaṁ churikāprayogaṁ vā na karoti,
T02n2952u_001:1057: dayāvaśāt sarvebhyaḥ prāṇibhyo hitāya karuṇaya vasati |
T02n2952u_001:1058: adattavastugrahaṇaṁ parityajya sa kevalaṁ dattaṁ vastu gṛhṇāti icchati ca,
T02n2952u_001:1060: vyabhicāraṁ parihāya sa sampūrṇaśuddhatāyāṁ vasati mithyātvaṁ parityajya sa satyaṁ vadati |
T02n2952u_001:1063: viśvastaḥ san janeṣu vāgbhraṣṭho na bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1064: apavādaṁ vihāya sa tanna vadati yad ekatra tena śrutaṁ kintu anyatra kalahakāraṇam |
T02n2952u_001:1072: anarthakavākyaprayogaṁ na kṛtvā sa yathāyathaṁ vadati,
T02n2952u_001:1074: tasya vākyaṁ smṛtiyogyamudāttaṁ spaṣṭaṁ prasaṅgocitaṁ ca |
T02n2952u_001:1075: tataḥ sa sannyāsijīvanopayoginaḥ paravarttino bahūn niyamān anusarati |
T02n2952u_001:1082: sa svarṇaṁ raupyaṁ ca na gṛhṇāti,
T02n2952u_001:1086: kraye vikraye ca aṁśaṁ na gṛhṇāti,
T02n2952u_001:1087: tatra ca saṁśliṣṭaṁ kimapi duṣṭācāraṁ nāvalambate |
T02n2952u_001:1096: sa grāmyabhāṣaṇe grāmyakathāyāṁ ca praśrayaṁ na darśayati,
T02n2952u_001:1099: athavā na jihvānāṁ vañcanāmayadhāraṇāmayaṁ abhyāsaṁ sādhayati |
T02n2952u_001:1107: vastuṣu vyaktiṣu jīveṣu ca śubhalakṣaṇānāṁ vyākhyā,
T02n2952u_001:1114: bauddhasannyāsinā sarvaprakārendriyasukhaṁ tyaktavyamiti kāraṇāt bauddhanītiśāstraṁ sanyāsadharmīti kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:1116: āsu nītiṣu kevalaṁ sukhaviratau atinyūnaṁ gurutvamarpyate |
T02n2952u_001:1118: atra kilāparādhaḥ syāditi bodhilābhāt prāk buddhasya bhrāntatapasyāyāḥ varṇanāyāṁ dyotitam |
T02n2952u_001:1119: nagnasannyāsināṁ sanyāsācaraṇānāṁ pratyāvarttinī sūcī api asti |
T02n2952u_001:1122: tulanīyam - asmin sutte rāisa ḍebhiḍs kṛtā bhūmikā,
T02n2952u_001:1125: tadevādhyātmikamanuśīlanam tathā mānasikavinayanaṁ yat samyag jñānāya kalpate eṣu anyatamaṁ khalu viṣayaiśeṣe manaḥsaṁyogasyānuśīlanam yenedamekaniṣṭhatayādhikataraṁ samāhitaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1126: tathā ca śārīrikadaśāṁ yāti yadā cetanakṣetraṁ saṁkīrṇaṁ tīvraṁ ca jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:1127: tasmin kṣaṇe ca tat vāhyikaprabhāvebhyo vyākṛttaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1128: anena saha pāścātyagūḍhatattvasya tulanā paścāt vakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:1129: bauddhasannyāsī yatra indriyapañcakādāśaṅkāmanubhavati tatraiva sa saṁyataḥ san ghaniṣṭhaṁ śarīravyāpāraṁ na lakṣayitvā ṣaṣṭhena indriyadvārā manasā indriyavrittidvāraṁ rakṣatiṁ |
T02n2952u_001:1130: evaṁ sa lobhāt āśāhīnatvācca rakṣito bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1141: evaṁ prātyahikajīvanasya pratyekaṁ karmaṇi sa pūrṇacaitanyavān tiṣṭhati,
T02n2952u_001:1142: yathā sa yatnahīnatvāt anucitopāyena karma na karoti |
T02n2952u_001:1143: tadā sa santuṣṭaḥ san tena saha tasya vasanaṁ bhikṣāpātraṁ ca gṛhṇāti yathā pakṣī gṛhṇāti pakṣayugalam |
T02n2952u_001:1151: tataḥ bhojanāt paraṁ vyatyastapādo'tha ca daṇḍavat ekacittatayā upaviśati |
T02n2952u_001:1154: sa tasya cittaṁ lobhāt vidveṣāt ca muñcati,
T02n2952u_001:1155: prāṇināṁ maṅgalāya karuṇayā uṣitvā sa ālasyāt,
T02n2952u_001:1165: te vividheṣu viṣayeṣu dhyānasya paddhativaividhyāt jāyante |
T02n2952u_001:1167: (1) indriyaparāyaṇatā ca mandā cintā cetyābhyāṁ muktaḥ san sannyāsī saharṣasukhasya prathame paryāye vartate |
T02n2952u_001:1172: tasya śarīrasya na ko'pyaṁśaḥ rahasyaharṣasukhābhyāmaspṛṣṭaḥ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1173: (2) punaśca, tarkānusandhānaviratau satyāṁ nirdiṣṭe lakṣye samāhitamanasā āntarikapraśāntadaśāyāṁ sa samādhijaharṣasukhayoḥ dvitīyaṁ paryāyaṁ yāti |
T02n2952u_001:1178: tasya śarīrasya na ko'pyaṁśaḥ anenāspṛṣṭaḥ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1179: (3) punaśca, harṣe dveṣe ca samavṛttitvāt sa manasvī tathā caitanyavān san sukhānubhavaṁ karoti - eṣāvasthā samavṛttitayā manasvitayā sukhena cāvasthitiriti buddhaiḥ kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:1180: asmin kṣaṇe sa harṣahīnasukhena āpluto bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1183: (4) punaśca, sukhaṁ ca duḥkhaṁ ca vihāya harṣaviṣādayoḥ tirobhāvāt prāk sa duḥkhasukhaśūnyaṁ samādheḥ caturtha paryāyaṁ prāpnoti |
T02n2952u_001:1184: tatra ekacittāgatā viśuddhiḥ samavṛttitā ca tiṣṭhataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1188: sannyāsī etadavadhi tasya cittaṁ hṛdayaṁ ca paripunīte |
T02n2952u_001:1189: tathā ca, prakṛtasatyānubhavaṁ prati cālitaḥ san yatnena vinayanaṁ nirvahati |
T02n2952u_001:1191: sa tasya manoyogaṁ jñānaṁ tathā antardṛṣṭiṁ prati samāhitena,
T02n2952u_001:1200: tasya bodho jāyate - idaṁ sākāraṁ me śarīraṁ,
T02n2952u_001:1208: tataḥ sa mānasaṁ śarīraṁ sraṣṭuṁ tasya manoyogaṁ prerayati |
T02n2952u_001:1209: asya śarīrāt sa mānasaṁ śarīraṁ sṛjati yasya ākāro'sti,
T02n2952u_001:1220: sa svahastābhyāṁ śaktimantaṁ candraṁ sūryaṁ ca spṛśati |
T02n2952u_001:1222: śucīkṛtadivyakarṇena sa dūre nikaṭe vā sarvatra divyaṁ mānuṣaṁ ca śabdaṁ śṛṇoti |
T02n2952u_001:1223: sa anyeṣāṁ jīvānāṁ mānasikīṁ daśāṁ boddhu śaknoti |
T02n2952u_001:1229: sa jānāti yat asmin sthāne sa etannāmaka etajjātikaścāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:1230: pratyekaṁ janami tasya etā abhijñatā abhavan,
T02n2952u_001:1231: jīvanakāla etādṛśa āsīditi ca sa jānāti |
T02n2952u_001:1232: (2) sa satvānāṁ mṛtyostathā punarjanmanaḥ jñāne'pi manaḥsaṁyogaṁ sādhayati,
T02n2952u_001:1233: divyayā śucīkṛtayā ca dṛṣṭyā sa narakasthān pāpinaḥ svargasthān dhārmikān ca paśyati,
T02n2952u_001:1234: yathā prāsādasthaḥ janaḥ tān janān paśyati ye nimnasthaṁ gṛhaṁ praviśanti,
T02n2952u_001:1236: (3) tataḥ sa ‘idaṁ duḥkham’ ‘idaṁ duḥkhakāraṇam’ ‘idaṁ duḥkhanirodhaḥ’ ‘idaṁ ca duḥkhanirodhamārgaḥ’ iti |
T02n2952u_001:1238: yadā sa evaṁ jānāti evaṁ ca paśyati,
T02n2952u_001:1245: kartavyaṁ kṛtam atikrāntaṁ viśvātiriktaṁ kiñcit nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:1246: idaṁ sāmānyataḥ svīkriyate yat adhunā yā parikalpanā dṛśyate,
T02n2952u_001:1247: sā vistāraṁ prāpnoti naitikadoṣāṇāṁ tathā vividhasamādhibhedānāṁ sūcyāṁ kila saṁyojanaṁ sādhitam |
T02n2952u_001:1248: tathāpi ya parikalpanādhunā vartate sā prācīneva dṛśyate tatra kati vikāśā na santi,
T02n2952u_001:1249: ye paravartinīṣu kṛtiṣu santi yathā buddhaghoṣasya visuddhamagge |
T02n2952u_001:1254: yataḥ te buddhena antime nirvāṇe'rjitā iti kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:1255: yataḥ vinayanāṅgatvena te prācīnatareṣu vivaraṇeṣu na dṛśyante,
T02n2952u_001:1256: te kila mūlataḥ svādhīnāstathā samādheḥ sadṛśāḥ kecit niyamā āsan |
T02n2952u_001:1258: ebhiḥ saha aṣṭau athavā nava lābhā api puṣṭiṁ yanti |
T02n2952u_001:1262: vicitraṁ pratyakṣaṁ nānubhūya saḥ ‘asīmaṁ caitya’miti pratyakṣīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:1263: tathā ca sa caitanyasyāsīmaṁ paryāyaṁ labdhvā tatra vasati |
T02n2952u_001:1264: (2) sampūrṇataḥ deśasyāsīmaṁ paryāyamatikramya saḥ ‘asīmaṁ caitanya’miti pratyakṣīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:1265: tathā ca sa caitanyasyāsīmaṁ paryāyaṁ labdhvā tatra vasati |
T02n2952u_001:1266: (3) sampūrṇataḥ caitanyasyāsīmaṁ paryāyamatikramya sa ‘sarvaṁ śūnya’miti pratyakṣīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:1267: tathā ca sa śūnyatvasya paryāya labdhvā tatra vasati |
T02n2952u_001:1268: (4) sampūrṇataḥ śūnyatvasya paryāyamatikramya sa na caitanyaṁ labhate na vā labhate'caitanyam |
T02n2952u_001:1270: idameva sāmānyaṁ mataṁ yat samādheranuśīlanaṁ yogadarśanādādīyate |
T02n2952u_001:1273: ākhyāneṣu kathyate yat buddha ālārakālāmaḥ ca rāmaputraḥ uddakaśceti ācāryayugalāt adhīte sa |
T02n2952u_001:1274: kintu asmābhiravagataṁ yat prathama ācāryaḥ samādhilābhāya śūnyatvasya paryāyaṁ yāvat upagataḥ dvitīya ācāryaḥ na caitanyasya na vā'caitanyasya paryāyamupagataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1276: atrānumānāya na kāpi yuktistiṣṭhati yat tat ākhyānaṁ śikṣakayugalaviṣayakaṁ yathārthaṁ tathyam ullikhati |
T02n2952u_001:1277: tau buddhena dharmapracārāt prāk divaṁ gatau |
T02n2952u_001:1281: dvayorudbhavasya prasaṅge kācit sākṣāttulanā na iṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:1282: kintu bauddhasāhityapāṭhāt lakṣyate yat samādheranuśīlanaṁ mūlataḥ na bauddhadarśanagatam |
T02n2952u_001:1284: bauddhānuśīlanasya yogasya madhye sādṛśyasyādhikaro gurutvapūrṇo heturevaṁ yat dvividhe darśane pārśvāpārśvi vikaśite'bhavatām |
T02n2952u_001:1285: na kevalaṁ tulanā cānukṛtiśca kintu kasyāpi sampradāyasya sadasyaḥ anyaṁ sampradāyaṁ gantuṁ tathā tasya paddhatiṁ grahītuṁ samartho'bhavat sambhavataḥ pratipakṣadarśanaprabhāvāt bauddhapaddhatau asāmānyādhyātmikaśaktigrahaṇasya antarbhuktiṁ paśyāmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1288: kintu tāḥ śaktayo vidyanurūpānuśīlanasya svābhāvikyaḥ pariṇatayaḥ eva |
T02n2952u_001:1289: paravartibauddharacanāsu ete viṣayāḥ suspaṣṭā abhavan tatra tat saṁkrāntau dvau suvyaktau upāyau dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:1290: ekataḥ, aviśvāsināṁ dharmāntarīkaraṇāya sākṣyatvena alaukikakarmādipradarśanasya pravaṇatā jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:1291: yathā lakṣyate kassapatrayasya dharmāntarīkaraṇākhyāne tathā kapilāvatyunagare buddhakṛtālaukikakarmamūlakākhyāne |
T02n2952u_001:1292: sa prāyeṇa kasyacit śiṣyasya sāhāyyārthaṁ vāvadhānārthaṁ vātmanaḥ mānasīṁ mūrtiṁ preṣayituṁ varṇayati |
T02n2952u_001:1293: athavā saḥ anyeṣāṁ manogataṁ vacanaṁ paṭhati iti dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:1295: āsāṁ śaktīnāmarjanaṁ na paramapurṣārthamukhi iti anyatrāvamatam |
T02n2952u_001:1296: yadyapi nānāvidhā arhataḥ puruṣāḥ vibhinnamātrākrameṇa alaukikaśaktimarjayanti,
T02n2952u_001:1297: tathāpi buddhaḥ svayaṁ tāsāṁ śatīnāṁ prayogāya tasya śiṣyān niṣiṣedha iti kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:1298: kaścid abauddho'pi tasya pūrvajanmanaḥ jñānaṁ labdhuṁ śaknoti,
T02n2952u_001:1299: kintu upalabdheḥ jāḍyatvāt sa kevalaṁ catvāriṁśaccakrāṇi smartumarhati iti buddhaghoṣeṇoktam |
T02n2952u_001:1300: mahālisaṁvāde buddhaḥ divyarūpadarśanasya divyadhvaniśravaṇasya ca śaktiṁ varṇayāmāsa,
T02n2952u_001:1301: kintu ‘samādhyabhyāsopalabdhaye sannyāsinaḥ mahā saha dhārmikaṁ jīvanaṁ nānusaranti |
T02n2952u_001:1302: ’ dīghanikāye ca majjhimanikāye ca samādhyabhyāsasya pradhānaṁ sthānaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1303: kintu uccatamagūḍhadaśāpakṣatā kevalaṁ paddhatiḥ iti nanumīyate |
T02n2952u_001:1304: sā daśā kenāpi prakāreṇa na lakṣyībhūtā,
T02n2952u_001:1306: asmin jīvane eva hṛdayasya antardṛṣṭeśca muktaye sahāyikāpi |
T02n2952u_001:1307: ‘vipassin’ - buddhasya prathamajīvanasyākhyāne - yatra mukhyā ghaṭanāḥ gotamasya ghaṭanānāṁ samānāḥ - tasya janmani siddhādeśa dvātriṁśaccihnaiḥ tribhiḥ prasādaiḥ,
T02n2952u_001:1309: kintu vipasminaḥ bodhilābhe kutrāpi viśiṣṭā gūḍhā paddhatirnāsti |
T02n2952u_001:1311: tathā ca, pratyekasambandhāvasānajñānena dṛṣṭiśca jñānaṁ ca jāyete sma |
T02n2952u_001:1312: bauddhagūḍhatattvānuśīlane tatprakāreṇa adhikataraṁ sādṛśyaṁ vartate yatra bhagavatā saha milanasya lakṣyaṁ varṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:1313: paravartī prakāraḥ vremaṇḍamahābhāgena vyākhyātaḥ - yatra sampūrṇataḥ kyātholikadṛṣṭibhaṅgījātāni sāmānyāni vaiśiṣṭyāni pratiphalitāni |
T02n2952u_001:1314: sa taṁ vyāpāraṁ svabhāvajabhāvatvena varṇayati yaḥ pratyakṣataḥ pratipūrvam akasmāt cetanamanaso nimne'vasthitena ādhyātmikasāmagrīgrāheṇa nirdiṣṭān prāṇān cālayati tadadhyātmaṁ vastu bahuṣu ekam,
T02n2952u_001:1318: ayaṁ vyāpāraḥ prāyeṇa bauddhagūḍhattvena saha prayojyaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1322: ḍaḥ ema. va-hana mahābhāgenocyate yat ekaśca sarvaśca sākṣāt tatkṣaṇāt ca paramatattvopalabdhaye sarvagrāsinyākāṅkṣayā gṛhyete |
T02n2952u_001:1324: teṣāṁ lakṣyamupagantuṁ te niyataṁ sahajadivyasambhāvanāsamūhaṁ jāgarayanti yadā bahyikasatyāt sampūrṇaviviktatayā yathārthaviśrāmadaśāyāṁ manaḥ niviśyate |
T02n2952u_001:1327: yatra manoyogaḥ kasmiṁścidvastuni āvaddhastiṣṭhati tatra ca āvegīyaparivarttanena saha caitanyasya saṁkīrṇatā atha ca sutīvratā sahagāminī tiṣṭhati
T02n2952u_001:1332: bauddhaḥ na kimapi vāhyikaṁ sāhāyyaṁ svīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:1333: sa īśvara iti yadvastu jānāti tadapekṣayā uccataraṁ sthānaṁ sa upagata iti sa svayaṁ viśvasiti |
T02n2952u_001:1336: tathā ca saḥ arhataḥ daśāṁ prāpnoti |
T02n2952u_001:1337: sannyāsinādhunā yā daśā prāptā saiva aparā taṭī,
T02n2952u_001:1338: mṛtyuvihīnā arthāt sthāyinī dhruvā vā sthitiḥ nirvāṇābhidheyā |
T02n2952u_001:1340: nirvāpaṇaṁ na viśeṣeṇa bauddhaḥ asya prayogaśca tathā dhāraṇayā parivartate yāṁ pratyekaṁ dharmasampradāyaḥ manuṣyasya paramapuruṣārthatvena paripoṣayati |
T02n2952u_001:1345: tṛṣṇāyā ākāṅkṣāyā muktaḥ vānāsaktaḥ san sannyāsī atrādhunā cātardṛṣṭyā mṛtyuvihīnāṁ śāntiṁ yāti - yaiva parivarttanarahitā nirvāṇadaśā |
T02n2952u_001:1346: nirvāṇaṁ vyaktiviluptiriti matasya vicāreṇa prayojanaṁ nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:1347: mūlagrantheṣu asya matasya samarthanaṁ na prāpyate |
T02n2952u_001:1348: tathāpi prakṛtārthasya pracuraṁ sākṣyaṁ vartate - iha jīvane ākāṅkṣānivṛttiḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1352: evaṁ saṁvāde indhanasyopari - tasyākāṅkṣā vardhate ya indhanopayogivastuṣu bhogasyānveṣaṇaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:1365: kaścana naraśca tatra kāle kāle śuṣkāṇi tṛṇāni gomayāni kāṣṭhāni ca nikṣipati,
T02n2952u_001:1366: tathā ca sa vṛhadagnipuñjaḥ dīrghaṁ kālaṁ tadindhanaiḥ jvalayanneva tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1367: yo jana indhanopayogivastuṣu duḥkhaṁ paśyaṁstiṣṭhati tasyākāṅkṣā viramati |
T02n2952u_001:1371: janmanā ca saha jarā ca mṛtyuśca na jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:1382: tathā ca so'gnipuñjaḥ sarvendhanānāṁ dahanāt paraṁ tadabhāvāt punaḥ na jvalati,
T02n2952u_001:1384: evameva yo jana indhanatulyavastuṣu durdaśaṁ cintayannāste tasyākāṅkṣāyā nivṛttirjāyate,
T02n2952u_001:1386: evameva sarveṣāṁ nivṛttau satyāṁ duḥkhasyāpi nivṛttiḥ sādhitā |
T02n2952u_001:1387: atra sūkṣmataraḥ kaścit praśno jāyate iha jīvane nirvāṇalābhāt paraṁ mṛtyau sati kiṁ bhavatīti |
T02n2952u_001:1388: dharmagrantheṣu vacaneṣu ca niścayenāsyottarasya sandhānam asambhavam |
T02n2952u_001:1390: kintu tatra tatpaddhatiṁ paśyāmaḥ yayā rītyā tadīyāḥ śiṣyāḥ tasyopadeśārthaṁ gṛhītavantaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1391: olḍenavārgamahodayena saṁgṛhīteṣu anucchedeṣu ullekhārhaṁ tadeva vaiśiṣṭyam yat dharmagrantheṣu api atigurutvavahāni vacanāni buddhasya svakīyavacanatvena na gṛhyante,
T02n2952u_001:1393: tatra te svīyānumānānāṁ vaśyatāṁ gatā iti dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:1394: sannyāsī māluṅkyaputtaḥ buddhaṁ kati praśnān papraccheti ucyate |
T02n2952u_001:1395: tatra anyatamaḥ praśnaḥ maraṇāt paraṁ kaścit tathātastiṣṭhati na veti |
T02n2952u_001:1396: buddhaḥ taduttaraṁ na svīcakāra arthāt mṛtyoḥ paraṁ sa tiṣṭhati,
T02n2952u_001:1399: so'stitvavān na veti viṣaye sa nīrava āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:1403: yata idaṁ dharmīyajīvanasya suphaleṣu pravaṇatāṁ na darśayati |
T02n2952u_001:1411: bhagavatā idaṁ na vyākhyātamiti dṛṣṭibhaṅgī sarveṣu anucchedeṣu tadviṣayamadhikṛtya vartate |
T02n2952u_001:1413: etādṛgekaḥ saṁvādaḥ sannyāsinīṁ khemāṁ rājānaṁ pasenadimavalambya tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1414: sā tasya sarveṣāṁ praśnānāṁ pratyuttaraṁ dadāti ‘bhagavatā na vyākhyātamiti |
T02n2952u_001:1419: api te ko'pi gaṇakaḥ yo gaṅgāyā sikatāḥ gaṇayitumarhati ?
T02n2952u_001:1424: ’ ‘api te gaṇayitāsti yaḥ samudrasya jalaṁ parimātuṁ samarthaḥ ?
T02n2952u_001:1425: sa iyatparimāṇaṁ samudrajalamityevaṁ kiṁ vā vaktuṁ śaknoti ?
T02n2952u_001:1436: śarīrabhūtopādheḥ muktaḥ tathāgataḥ samudra iva gabhīraḥ aparimeyo'talaśca |
T02n2952u_001:1437: ’ idaṁ vyaktijanasya apareṣu caturṣu upādāneṣu punarāvṛttaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1438: atra tathāgatasya prasaṁge praśno'sau varṇitaḥ kintu paravartī dṛṣṭāntaḥ darśayati yat idaṁ nirvāṇaprāptasya yasya kasyāpi janasya kṣetre prayujyate
T02n2952u_001:1439: ekaḥ śiṣyaḥ yamakaḥ nāstikamakaṁ racayati sma yat sa bhagavadupadiṣṭatattvam upalabdhavān |
T02n2952u_001:1440: tatra sannyāsī taccharīranāśāt param ‘āsavas’-muktaḥ san nāśaṁ gacchati,
T02n2952u_001:1443: sāriputtaḥ taṁ pṛcchati - kiṁ tathāgataḥ śarīram ?
T02n2952u_001:1448: athavā kiṁ sa tebhyaḥ upādānebhyaḥ vahiḥ kaścit viṣayaḥ ?
T02n2952u_001:1450: sāriputtaścāha - iha jīvane kaścit tathāgataḥ satyena tattvena ca na budhyate |
T02n2952u_001:1451: ata eva tasya ko'pyadhikāro nāsti tat vaktuṁ,
T02n2952u_001:1452: yat sannyāsī taccharīranāśena saha āsavasmuktaḥ san ucchidyate,
T02n2952u_001:1455: ucchedavirodhi suspaṣṭaṁ vacanaṁ niścayena udānagranthasya sāmpratikaṁ saṅkalanam |
T02n2952u_001:1480: kintu idaṁ na kaṁcana itivācakaṁ bodhaṁ sūcayati |
T02n2952u_001:1481: vayañca paravarttiṣu milindapraśneṣu netivācakavyākhyānasya prāvaṇyaṁ paśyāmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1482: - khandhānāṁ sampūrṇāyāṁ nivṛttau varttamānasya mūlasya nirvāpaṇena bhagavān nirvāṇaṁ prāpnoti |
T02n2952u_001:1484: tasya ca nirdeśaḥ asambhavaḥ itthambhūtena vacanena |
T02n2952u_001:1487: kintu sa tasya tattvasya śarīre lakṣyate,
T02n2952u_001:1489: atra nirvāṇasya yaḥ prakāro varṇitaḥ sa ṭīkākāraiḥ sṛṣṭasya nirvāṇayugalasya pārthakyaṁ sūcayati,
T02n2952u_001:1490: bodhivṛkṣasyādhaḥ mṛtyāvapi ca buddhaḥ nirvāṇaṁ prāptavānitirtaivyākhyātam |
T02n2952u_001:1491: idaṁ kevalaṁ pūrvatanaṁ vyākhyānaṁ yat prācīnatameṣu grantheṣu nirdeśitaṁ yasmin samaye na kimapi pārthakyaṁ sūcitam |
T02n2952u_001:1493: paṭhāmaḥ - bodhilābhasya mārgeṣu ye teṣāṁ manāṁsi sampūrṇataḥ yathāyathaṁ vinayanena siddhāni kurvanti,
T02n2952u_001:1494: harṣalagnā na santaḥ te kiñcidapi na gṛhṇanti,
T02n2952u_001:1499: arhatvalābhe mālinyacakraparityāge ca kintu upādyavaśeṣeṇa saha varṇitaḥ (arthāt khandhasamūhaḥ-yaḥ vyaktitvena taṁ nirmāti) |
T02n2952u_001:1505: yadi kutrāpi itivācakaṁ vacanaṁ lakṣyate tarhi buddhānāṁ śiṣyāṇāṁ harṣonmattavacaneṣu tadvayamāśaṁsema |
T02n2952u_001:1506: kiṇtu ayaṁ hi sannyāsinīviṣayaka padyānāmatīva samānubhūtiśīlena vyākhyākāreṇa kṛtaḥ siddhāntaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1508: itivācakaṁ vā netivācakaṁ vā kālocitaṁ paramānandaṁ pratīkṣituṁ kadāpi preritā na bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1509: idaṁ bhavitumarhati yat kathaṁ te'mṛtamayaṁ mārgam - amataṁ padaṁ - nivvānaṁ jayanti,
T02n2952u_001:1510: spṛśanti ca iti paramānandaṁ prapañcayantaste kati daśā ullikhanti sma - yā daśā acintanīyā anirvacanīyāśca |
T02n2952u_001:1511: - yadā ekaḥa apare ca jīvanasya prasaṁge dhāraṇāyāṁ ca sīmitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1513: na vā deśavarttī daśāviśeṣo jāyate yo'vaśyameva gauravamayasya paramānandamayasya ca aihikajīvanasya pariṇatiṁ viracayati |
T02n2952u_001:1518: manuṣyāṇāṁ sāmājikamācaraṇaṁ tathā pratiṣṭhānamavaśyakaraṇīyatvena kiñcit prakāśayati yatra buddhakṛtaduḥkhaviśleṣaṇasya kendrīyo bhāvo vidyate
T02n2952u_001:1520: sa tādṛśairbalairjīvati yeṣāṁ paricayastaṁ nikaṣā tamasāvṛtaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1522: vyaktitvena yāvanna sa svādhīnaṁ yatnaśīlo bhavati tāvat sāmājikācaraṇād vahiḥ sa jīvati,
T02n2952u_001:1523: ata eva saṁskṛteḥ sthapatitvena nirmātṛtvena ca sa kevalaṁ svīyanigaḍasambandhisāmājikaprakṣepaṇaṁ parikalpituṁ sraṣṭhuṁ cārhati |
T02n2952u_001:1524: yasmai jīvāya buddhena samyag jñānamupahṛtaṁ tamāvegatāḍitaṁ jīvamadhikṛtyāsmākaṁ bhūmikā viracyate - yāparisīmaṁ gabhīraṁ gatā tathā ca anayā sāmājikyā mātrayā sākaṁ vistṛtiṁ prāptā |
T02n2952u_001:1527: sācetanā tanhānāmadheyā kaṭhorā praṇodanā samājāya tajjīvanaśaīlīṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:1528: sarvatra manuṣyaḥ tasya sāṁskṛtimādarśaṁ sṛjati avadhānahīnatayeva vaṁśānukrameṇa preṣayati ca |
T02n2952u_001:1529: yadutpattau bālāt kṛtā pravarttanā mukhyato vartate yayā naraḥ sacetanamānasasyātinimnadeśe'vasthitebhyaḥ paryāyebhyaḥ uapahārībhūto jāyate
T02n2952u_001:1530: buddhasyopadeśeṣu samājasthamanuṣyasya sampūrṇapraśnabahulacaritrasya viśleṣaṇena saha sāmājikaguṇadoṣavivecanasya viṣayā lakṣyante |
T02n2952u_001:1531: atra vayametaiḥ viṣayaiḥ saha sambandhitā bhavāmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1532: vayaṁ saṁskṛteḥ sraṣṭrā manuṣyeṇa saha sambandhitāḥ so'paraiḥ naraiḥ saha ādarśān sṛjati tathā ca sāmājikādānapradānasūtreṇa vaṁśaparamparayā tān preṣayati |
T02n2952u_001:1533: vayaṁ manuṣyasyāsyaitādṛśyā sthityā saha yuktāḥ manuṣyaḥ preṣitajīvarūpeṇa yugaśakteracetanapreṣaṇabalena vasan avaśyameva samāje tasya praśnātmakaviṣayān gṛhṇāti |
T02n2952u_001:1534: tān viṣayānavalambya prakṛtaśaktīnāṁ mātrāṁ na jñātvaiva vibhinnaṁ karma sādhayati tathā ca tābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ saṁgrāmaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:1535: manuṣyasya saṁskṛteśca madhye vicchinnatādharmitāmadhikṛtya buddhasyopadeśeṣu yattiṣṭhati tadapekṣayā adhikataraniścitadoṣanirṇayo bhūmaṇḍalasya kutrāpi na sādhitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1538: pratyekaṁ jīvaḥ jīvanasya adhikataramaṁśaṁ vyāpya kāryakāraṇanirdeśena bhrāntipūrṇabhāvena cālito bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1539: mānavavyaktitvaṁ samājikasaṁsthāna cetyanayormadhye'svastijanakavirodhasyopaśamāya eteṣūpadeśeṣu kāpi sambhāvanā pratiśrūyate |
T02n2952u_001:1540: vyaktistathā tasya saṁskṛtiriti dvayormadhye svabhāvajaṁ vicchinnatvaṁ buddhakṛtapradhānāviṣkāreṣu anyatamam |
T02n2952u_001:1542: mānavīyācaraṇasya sāmājikamādhyātmikaṁ ca yad vyākhyānaṁ tasya kṣetraṁ sarvatra mahatāṁ viduṣāṁ manāṁsi ākarṣati |
T02n2952u_001:1543: etat teṣu sthāneṣu saphalamākramaṇaṁ varṇayati yatrai-kadā mānavamanorājye'vidyā'dhyāsaḥ kūṭārthakathā ca spardhāśūnyatvena śasanaṁ cakruḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1544: anenaiva vipulaparimāṇaṁ tathyaṁ vijñāpitaṁ yena vayaṁ jānīmaḥ mānavaḥ yat karoti tat kimarthaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:1545: asya pradhāneṣu avadāneṣu anyatamaṁ nāma mānavasaṁskṛteḥ vardhamānaṁ jñānam,
T02n2952u_001:1546: sāmājikapratikriyāṇāṁ gahano vinyāsaḥ yo vaṁśāt vaṁśabhāraṁ preṣito bhavati sāmājikakriyāpratikriyābhireva |
T02n2952u_001:1548: gabhīratamasamudravāsī ko'pi janaḥ yasmin jale nirantaraṁ magnastiṣṭhati,
T02n2952u_001:1550: tathā ca sa tadaiva prathamam ātmano'stitvamāviṣkaroti yadā kathamapi samudratalādutthāya tasya upari vṛhat parimaṇḍalaṁ draṣṭumāgacchati - ityucyate |
T02n2952u_001:1552: pṛthak pṛthak saṁskṛtiṁ parīkṣya sarvāsāṁ saṁskṛtīnāṁ saṁskāraśakteḥ viṣaye pūrṇataḥ nūtanaṁ pariprekṣitamasmābhiḥ labdham |
T02n2952u_001:1554: ata eva mānavajīvavyāpisamājasvīkṛtamādhyamamūlake'smākaṁ jñāne karmakāṇḍasya mātrā asmābhiḥ pravarttitā |
T02n2952u_001:1555: tathāpi, atīva nirbharayogyaṁ jñānamapi taṁ viṣayaṁ pidhātuṁ yatate yo viṣayaḥ tajjñāne na antabhūtaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:1556: viśeṣataḥ vahirbhūto viṣayo yadāsmākamanumānaiḥ saha asaṁvaddhastiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1558: mānavavyaktitvasya sāṁskṛtikavidyāsu yā karmaviṣayakatārjitā sā sāmānyena atiśayoktipūrṇā |
T02n2952u_001:1559: tathā ca, sāmājikādhyātmikavyākhyānakṣetraṁ pūrvānumānaiḥ sahānanvitān praśnān vihāya ādhuniko naraḥ navenāthacāpariṇatena padārthenopeta iti varṇayati yena vicitraparihārapravṛttistathānujike kṣetre vijñānasyāpragatiḥ saṁskṛtiviṣayakakālpanikamatanirmāṇāya prasaṁgatāṁ ganturmahati
T02n2952u_001:1561: atredaṁ dṛśyate yatkena prakāreṇa vyaktivargaḥ samājasya kaniṣṭhān sabhyān sādhayituṁ pratyekasamājadvāraiḥ abhijñatāṁ sañcinoti,
T02n2952u_001:1562: yena te vibhinnajātīyasaṁskṛteḥ prāṇavanmūrttitvena paripakvatām arjayanti |
T02n2952u_001:1563: pṛthivī nāma eṣāṁ vibhinnānāṁ tathā prāyeṇa dvandvavatāṁ sāmājikakarūpāṇāṁ paśupakṣisaṁgrahaśalā |
T02n2952u_001:1566: pālayanti tathā ca jīvanasya ativicitravān pathaḥ kulāt kulāntaraṁ preṣayanti |
T02n2952u_001:1567: pāścātyanṛvidyāvidāṁ mate narāḥ sāmājikīnāmavasthānāṁ vismayakaraparimaṇḍanle santoṣajanakatayā vāsaṁ kartuṁ samarthā iti pratibhāti |
T02n2952u_001:1568: ḍovuyānsaṁskṛtimatāṁ janānāṁ sāmājike caritre śaṁkā pratiśaṁkā ca iti dve pradhāne lakṣaṇe vartete,
T02n2952u_001:1569: yadā niuginideśasya paratāñcale saṁskṛteḥ madhye dayāparāyaṇatāyāstatvaṁ sṛṣṭam |
T02n2952u_001:1570: valideśīyajaneṣu anyamanaskatāyāstathā jīvanāt mṛdupalāyanasya bhāvaḥ sarvatra lakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:1571: ‘manusānāṁ’ madhye sāṁskṛtikādarśena saha saṁgatisampannā janāḥ teṣāṁ prativeśināṁ viruddhe karkaśatamāyāṁ pratiyogitāyāṁ samarthāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ,
T02n2952u_001:1572: yadā vriṭiśakalambiyādeśasya koyākiutlbhāratīyāḥ teṣāṁ sampattiṁ visṛjya padaṁ jayanti |
T02n2952u_001:1573: āsu saṁskṛtiṣu pratyekaṁ parivartanaśīlamātrābhiḥ antarvartinīmuttejanāmāśāśūnyatāṁ ca prakāśayati,
T02n2952u_001:1575: kintu janāḥ prāyeṇa yat karttumucyate tadapekṣayā hatāśayā saha saṁgatiṁ sthāpayitumadhikataraṁ śaknuvanti |
T02n2952u_001:1576: tathā ca pratyekasaṁskṛtau vividhasāmājikabhūmikānārdubodhyaḥ jaṭilaśca vinyāsaḥ asti |
T02n2952u_001:1579: āsu sarvāsu saṁskṛtiṣu mukhyajīvanaśailīṁ paritaḥ dalabaddhā vibhinnatāstathādhāratāstiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1580: evañca, kathaṁprakāreṇa parivarttitadaśāyā ālokena manuṣyavyaktitvaṁ purātanasyādarśasya punardhāraṇāya rūpāntarīkaraṇāya vismayakaram upāyodbhāvanasāmarthyaṁ darśayati |
T02n2952u_001:1581: ebhyo nṛtattasammataviśleṣaṇebhyaḥ ayaṁ prāyeṇa durnivāraḥ siddhānto bhavati yat aparasaṁskṛtisaṁkrāntajñānaṁ sarvatra bādhyatāmūlakāsaṁgasya jayāya narebhyaḥ sāmarthyam arpayati |
T02n2952u_001:1582: ādhunikasamājāgamāt prāk sañcāravyavasthāyā vikiraṇaśīlābhiḥ paṁktibhiḥ saha pratyekaṁ saṁskṛtiḥ sampūrṇatamasambhāvanāprakāśāya āpekṣikatayānākulībhūtā āsīt yāḥ sambhāvanāḥ samāje svakīyajīvanaśailīkṣetre'tīva gurutvapūrṇāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1583: purā jātigataṁ bhāṣāgataṁ sampradāyagataṁ ca ekākitvaṁ tathā vicchinnatvaṁ vibhinnasaṁskṛtimūlakābhiyānārthaṁ mānavajātiṁ samarthāṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:1585: adhunā viśiṣṭalakṣasṇānvitā pṛthakprakārāḥ saṁskṛtayaḥ prāṇavatāṁ vaṁśānāmabhijñatāyāṁ parasparādānapradānarūpaṁ karma kurvanti |
T02n2952u_001:1586: adhunā sā vicchinnatā pūrvapuruṣānukramāt tirohitā bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:1587: yena pratyekaṁ saṁskṛtiḥ anyāsāṁ sarvāsāṁ saṁskṛtīnāmupariṁ parasparanirbharaśīlatāsūtreṇābaddhā tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1588: vayaṁ paśyāmo yat saṁskṛtimān prāṇī naraḥ svīyasaṁskṛtyā sahaiva anyābhiḥ saṁskṛtibhiḥ samamapi nūtanaṁ sambandhaṁ niścayena sthāpayati |
T02n2952u_001:1589: pratyekaṁ saṁskṛtiḥ adhunā avaśyameva bodhasya sahanaśīlatāyāśca mātrāmanubhavati yayā saṁskṛtiḥ adhunā avaśyameva bodhasya sahanaśīlatāyāśca mātrāmanubhavati yayā saṁskṛtiḥ jīvanaśailīmanusarttuṁ samarthā bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:1591: teṣu praśneṣu sahayogitāṁ karoti yaiḥ praśnaiḥ sarveṣāṁ jīvanayātrā vipadgrastā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1592: saṁskṛtiṁ tathā vyaktitvamadhikṛtya pāścātyavidyāsu kalpanāsamṛddhāḥ yā dhāraṇāḥ kriyante tā viśeṣeṇa gārḍanāra mārphiṇā varṇitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1596: yā vyaktiḥ mānavatāyā śūddhodāharaṇatvena asmākamabhyantare eva ādimapratidhvanimukharaṁ kiñcid udbhāvayati |
T02n2952u_001:1599: yasya viṣayamavalambya asmākaṁ yāntrikaṁ yugaṁ kiñcidvaktuṁ dvidhā karoti - manuṣyasyānyonyaprītiparāyaṇatā |
T02n2952u_001:1600: idaṁ ādhunikamānavasya anyatamaṁ priyaṁ kālpanikaṁ jagat |
T02n2952u_001:1601: adhunā tasya dṛṣṭiḥ divyanagaranirmāṇāya vijñānasya dṛṣṭiḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1602: eṣā iuropamahādeśasya aṣṭādaśaśatakīyadārśanikānāṁ dṛṣṭyapekṣayā na mūlataḥ svatantrā |
T02n2952u_001:1603: saṁskṛtimān jīvaḥ manuṣyaḥ pṛthivyāṁ sarvatra tasya praśnānāṁ samādhānāya abhinavasāṁskṛtikādarśamāviṣkartuṁ tasya sṛṣṭiśīlāṁ pratibhāṁ prakāśayati
T02n2952u_001:1604: sa peṣaṇaśīlām ākāṅkṣāṁ pūrṇāṁ kartuṁ tasya karmaṇi navajīvanaśailīmāviṣkaroti sa vartamānāyāṁ śailyāmapi parivartanaṁ sādhayati yadi sā śailī tasya lābhāya sukhāya ca anupayuktā bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:1605: so'dhunā pṛthivyā āśleṣaratāṁ kācidabhinavāṁ saṁskṛtiṁ sraṣṭuṁ tatparaḥ jāyate,
T02n2952u_001:1607: eṣā svapnilāśā sāṁskṛtikī vaicitryagatātivistīrṇānuṣaṅgikaviṣayaiḥ pṛṣṭhapoṣakatāṁ prāpnoti,
T02n2952u_001:1610: asmākaṁ pakṣe prayojanīyāṁ karmaviṣayakatāmanāsaktiṁ ca sraṣṭuṁ asmākaṁ saṁskṛtisaṁkramaṇaṁ pāṇḍityaṁ viśvaviṣayakaṁ jñānaṁ ca sambhavataḥ na paryāptam |
T02n2952u_001:1611: asyāṁ daśāyāṁ samājasaṁkrāntā manastattvasammatā ca gaveṣaṇā anirdeśakaparamarthakauśalaṁ nirdiśati,
T02n2952u_001:1612: yat narān teṣāmabhijñatayā svādhīnasaṁlāpāya samarthān karoti |
T02n2952u_001:1613: pariṇāmo bhavati - sāmājikācaraṇasya vādhyatāyāṁ ca pratyuttarāṇāṁ saṁskṛtigatapravāhe ca te adhikatarasvāsthyavantaḥ bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:1614: adhunā asmākaṁ manaścikitsāsti yā vyaktigatasaṁgatividhānāya sāhāyyaṁ karoti evaṁkaraṇāya sā cikitsā garvabhāvaṁ dūrīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:1615: sāmājikaspṛhāyā nimnaparyāye jīvanaṁ laghu kṛtvā paśyati |
T02n2952u_001:1617: vayaṁ viśvāsāya yuktāḥ paśyāma yat viruddheṣu virodhaḥ ca bādhyabādhakatvasya tīkṣṇatamā dhārā ca atikathanena sahanaśīlatāṁ vrajati,
T02n2952u_001:1618: yena janāḥ sāmuyela vekeṭaracitanāṭakāmanyatame yathā abhinayaṁ kurvanti,
T02n2952u_001:1624: vijñānasya śilpakalāvidyāyāśca ete udyamāḥ saṁskṛteḥ samagraṁ parisaraṁ niyantraṇasya adhīnaṁ kartumatīvakaṭhinapraśnān pariharanti |
T02n2952u_001:1625: te prāyeṇa kimapi tathyaṁ na prasuvate |
T02n2952u_001:1626: tathā hi - kena hetunā janānāṁ pakṣe saṁskṛtisambandhīyādarśaparivartanamatīvāsambhavam ?
T02n2952u_001:1627: yadā prāyeṇa pratyekaṁ janaḥ paśyati yat ayameva durgatiparihārāyādvitīyaḥ panthā iti |
T02n2952u_001:1628: kathaṁ vā saṁskṛtiḥ parivartanāya etādṛśīṁ pratibandhakatāṁ sādhayati ?
T02n2952u_001:1629: kimarthaṁ vā drutasāmājikaparivarttanaṁ kasyāścit saṁskṛteḥ sabhyān nītihīnān karttuṁ prāvaṇyaṁ darśayati ?
T02n2952u_001:1630: kena kāraṇena janānāmantarnihitāsu dhāraṇāsu dṛṣṭibhaṅgiṣu ca parivartanaṁ prāyeṇa parvatataraṇamiva mantharam |
T02n2952u_001:1632: api asmābhiḥ manuṣyasya ca tasya saṁskṛteśca madhye ko'pi sambandhaḥ āviṣkṛtaḥ ?
T02n2952u_001:1633: ‘rījaman’kṛtaviviktajanatāviśleṣaṇaviṣayakapraśnaṁ viracayanto vayaṁ trividhaṁ sāmājikaṁ caritraṁ paśyāmaḥ yat samprati pāścātyadeśeṣu mukhyatvena lakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:1634: tathā hi aitihyānugato janaḥ ya aitihyamanusṛtya sarvathācarati |
T02n2952u_001:1635: antarnirdeśānugāmī janaḥ yaḥ śaiśavāt prabhṛti kati saralāṇi āntarāṇi lakṣyāṇi anusṛtya karma karoti |
T02n2952u_001:1636: aparanirdeśānugāmī janaśca - yo'pare janā yādṛśamācaranti tādṛśamanusṛtya vyavaharati |
T02n2952u_001:1637: idaṁ trividhaṁ caritraṁ ekasya mūlagatasya praśnasya bhinnarūpameva |
T02n2952u_001:1639: sa praśnaḥjanāḥ prathamataḥ kathaṁ samarūpamācaranti yatra sāṁskṛtikāḥ ādarśā lakṣyante ?
T02n2952u_001:1640: kathaṁ janāḥ sarvatra dṛśyante teṣāmācaraṇānāṁ mukhyanirṇāyakatvena teṣāṁ saṁskṛtiṁ gṛhṇānāḥ ?
T02n2952u_001:1641: arthasya tathā paricayasya mukhatvena teṣāṁ samājasya ādarśaṁ grahītuṁ kathaṁ te pravartante ?
T02n2952u_001:1642: ’ kathaṁ vyavahārāṇāmādarśāḥ dalīyasadasyeṣu āvaśyakaparivartanarodhakadṛḍhagrahatvena dalīyakarmasu sāmānyatvaṁ vrajanti |
T02n2952u_001:1644: atra nāyamāśayaḥ yat janā yantravat teṣāṁ samājasya nirdiṣṭamādarśaṁ grahīṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:1646: yadāpare teṣāṁ sāmājikasthānāni tathā driṣṭibhaṁgim anusṛtya adhikatarasahajātopāyaiḥ teṣāmādarśānāṁ parivartanaṁ kṛtvā vartante |
T02n2952u_001:1647: kintu saṁskṛteḥ ādarśāḥ sthūṇā iva rājante yeṣāmupari sārthakasāmājikavyavahāro nirmitaḥ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1650: paścimadeśīyā vidyāḥ taṁ praśnaṁ parihṛtya gacchanti yaḥ praśnaḥ - saṁskṛtiḥ janān yasya karaṇāya śikṣate kathaṁ te janāstat tat ācaranti ?
T02n2952u_001:1652: janāsteṣāṁ saṁskṛtyā nirdiṣṭāyāṁ sīmāyāṁ teṣāṁ vicitrāṇām ākāṅkṣāṇāṁ nivṛttiṁ sādhayanti,
T02n2952u_001:1653: yataḥ tā ākāṅkṣā evātra spaṣṭataḥ sāmājikatayā uddīptāstathā sāmānyīkṛtāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1655: sambhavataḥ erikha phramamahodayaḥ asya mukhyasya praśnasya upari ghaniṣṭham ālokasampātaṁ cakāra yo'nyena kenacit na kṛtaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1656: tasya mate, ādhuniko naro na muktaḥ svayaṁśāsito vyaktiviśeṣaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1657: sa upayogaṁ vivicya kālocitopāyena kāryaṁ karotīti ātmānaṁ tarkayati |
T02n2952u_001:1658: tathā ca sa samājāt yāṁ dhārāṁ vā bhūmikāṁ vā prāpnoti tasyā vyavahāraṁ karoti tatsaṁśliṣṭapuraskāramanusṛtya |
T02n2952u_001:1660: yo naraḥ tasya upakramāya parākramāya ca garvamanubhavati sa sāmājikena niyantraṇena kalpanāpekṣayā adhikaṁ kāryaṁ sādhayati |
T02n2952u_001:1661: sāmājikīṣu avasthāsu ātmānamabhiyujya naraḥ tān svabhāvān ātmīkaroti ye svabhāvāḥ taṁ karaṇīyakāryakaraṇāyānuprerayanti |
T02n2952u_001:1662: kintu pharmamahāśayo'pi asmākaṁ praśnaṁ spṛśanniva gacchati |
T02n2952u_001:1663: tasya viśleṣaṇe ācaraṇaṁ nāma sāmājikādarśasya paṭabhūmikāyāṁ mānavaprakṛteḥ gatiśīlenābhiyojanena mūlataḥ praṇālyā vāhitaṁ rūpam |
T02n2952u_001:1664: kintu tena na praśnaḥ kṛtaḥ - kathamayaṁ sāmājika ādarśaḥ sadṛśyām asyāṁ mānavaprakṛtau parivarttanasya pratibandhakaṁ sthāpayati - yatraikatrālokapātaḥ kṛtaḥ - yo viṣayaḥ svayaṁ samājatatvasya anyatamaspaṣṭalakṣaṇatvena upasthāpyate |
T02n2952u_001:1666: sāmājikīṣu avasthāsu parivartanaṁ sāmājikeṣu caritreṣu parivartanaṁ prasūte |
T02n2952u_001:1667: arthāt nūtaneṣu prayojaneṣu tathā udvegeṣu eko viṣayaḥ spaṣṭataro bhavati yat nedaṁ parivartanaṁ kintu saṁskṛtisammatādarśaniṣṭhavyavahāre āvaśyakalagnatā yā vyākhyānamapekṣate |
T02n2952u_001:1669: tatra sambhavo'yameva hetuḥ pāścātyadeśe mānavavyavahārasambandhivijñānasammatavidyāyāḥ sarve upakramāḥ cetanatayā vā anyathā vā pūrvakalpanāmiva kurvanti yat prakṛtaḥ praśnaḥ sāmājikyā bhūmikayā avasthayā ca saha vyaktīnām unnatatarasaṁgatividhānam,
T02n2952u_001:1672: mānavavyaktitatvasya pāścātyaśikṣārthināṁ nikaṭe sā sambhāvanā samabhavataḥ na samuditā yat ete samājikasaṁgatividhānasya praśnāḥ kevalamantime āśraye samādhānīyā yadi vayam adhikataramūlapraśnaṁ boddhuṁ śaknumaḥ - kathaṁ vyaktayaḥ dalāni ca sāmājike udyoge ācaraṇe ca mūlagataparivartanasyaḥ vipakṣe balavattaraṁ pratibandhakaṁ racayanti |
T02n2952u_001:1673: ayameva maulikaḥ praśnaḥ ubhayoreva - yaḥ pratiṣṭhitasāmājikamādarśaṁ rakṣituṁ vasati,
T02n2952u_001:1675: etāsāmādhunikīnāṁ vidyānāṁ prānteṣu kutrāpi vā sandeho jāyate yat ekaḥ gaṁbhīrataraḥ praśnaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭāpekṣayā vartate eva |
T02n2952u_001:1676: asmin sūtre buddhaḥ saṁskṛtiniyamitamānavadaśāyā upari ālokasampātaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:1678: sa vahudūrabhramaṇakārī mānavavidyāvid bhavatu athavā bhavatu tasya lekhanyā sṛṣṭo jīvaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:1679: pratyakṣīkaroti kathaṁ vicitramidaṁ yat te sāmājikatayā ādiṣṭāyāṁ tathā niyantritāyāṁ pṛthivyāṁ yathā saṁlagnā,
T02n2952u_001:1681: yatra te mānavamukteḥ prakṛtadaśāyāḥ anusandhānāya yatante |
T02n2952u_001:1682: ayameva buddhasyānuyogaḥ yat mānavānāṁ kasyā api saṁskṛteḥ dehatattve svādhīnatā na dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:1683: buddhakṛtau dvau viśiṣṭau abhiyogau mānavajīvanasya sāmājikīṁ mātrāṁ niyantuṁ tathā anusandhātuṁ sahāyatvaṁ vrajataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1684: ko'pi naraḥ, sa sāmājikavikāśasya yasmin kasmin api paryaye tiṣṭhatu,
T02n2952u_001:1688: yo jīvanasya jaivitasāmājikasthitau satataṁ karmarataḥ tiṣṭhati iti prathamo'bhiyogaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1689: samāje tasyācaraṇaṁ tasyaiva jīvasyācaraṇaṁ yastacchaktibhiścālito bhavati yāḥ sāṁsārikaṁ jīvanaṁ grāhyaṁ na kurvanti |
T02n2952u_001:1690: tasya niścetanā preṣaṇā upāyānāṁ dīrghāyāṁ paṁktau aparaṁ na gṛhṇāti,
T02n2952u_001:1691: yairupāyaiḥ sa sāmājikīnāmākāṅkṣāṇāṁ santuṣṭaye karma karoti |
T02n2952u_001:1692: buddhasya dvitīyo'bhiyogo hi evam - kāryakāraṇayoḥ manoyogāt ātmanaḥ muktaye dhyānaṁ vyaktaye kevalaṁ suyogaṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:1693: vyaktitvasya srotaḥ saritaḥ srota iva niyataṁ pravahati tasya mṛtyuṁ yāvat - kevalaṁ madhye madhye jñānapathena vyāhataṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1694: jñānino janā aprakṛtaṁ svabhāvaṁ dhyāyantaḥ paramārthaṁ pratyakṣamanubhavantaścāsaktibandhanāt sampūrṇata ātamano muñcanti |
T02n2952u_001:1696: dhyānābhyāsakāle teṣāṁ cittaṁ sthirasvacchanipānamiva sat upadravādupaplavācca sampūrṇataḥ muktaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1699: sā prakṛtiḥ tṛṣṇājanyāsthiratvāt sāmānyajñānataḥ guptā tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1700: buddhakṛtoktapratyayadvayena viṣayībhūte kṣetre pṛthivyāṁ sarvaṁ duḥkhaṁ sṛjyate sahyate ca |
T02n2952u_001:1701: naraḥ bādhyatāmūlakatvāt ajñātaparicityāṁ niyatyā niyantritaḥ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1702: gaṁbhīratarārthe manuṣyaḥ sāpekṣo jīvaḥ tāvat sambhavato na kalpitaṁ pābhalabhamahodayena |
T02n2952u_001:1703: sa sarvaṁ na jānāti kintu sarvasya jñānena tasya prayojanaṁ vidyate,
T02n2952u_001:1705: ekataḥ sa sāmājikajīvatvena sībhiteṣu kṣetreṣu draṣṭuṁ tathā nirdhārayituṁ śaknoti |
T02n2952u_001:1706: anyataśca, sa saṁskṛtipradatteṣu sāmājikavikalpeṣu tathā karoti |
T02n2952u_001:1707: sarve vyaktijanāḥ prāgvarttina uttaravarttinaścaikakaśaḥ īdṛśāstitvapravāhe viśiṣṭaṁ prakāraṁ samājaṁ racayanti yatra sāmājikā ekaikaśaḥ ekatra ca na upasthitāḥ kintu ekasminnarthe teṣu ghaniṣṭhaṁ bandhanamasti |
T02n2952u_001:1708: kevalaṁ samasamayattā tādṛśaṁ bandhanaṁ na sūcayati |
T02n2952u_001:1709: yadyapi bauddhāḥ caramatattvatvena kasyacijjanasya kasyāścid vyakteścāstitvaṁ na svīkurvanti |
T02n2952u_001:1710: teṣāṁ mate pratyekaṁ vyaktigatāstitvapravāho'parebhyaḥ pravāhebhyaḥ pṛthageva |
T02n2952u_001:1712: kintu ayaṁ pravāhaḥ nirantaramuhūrtadvayaṁ kadāpi samānaḥ na bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1715: tathā ca jīvanaṁ vyāpya bhāvi astitvaṁ prati pravahanneva caliṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:1717: sā dhārā nirantaraṁ yāti āyāti ca |
T02n2952u_001:1718: prāyeṇāyaṁ pradīpaśikhayā saha upamīyate yā śikhā nirantaraṁ kampate parivartate ca |
T02n2952u_001:1724: hoāīṭaheḍamahodaya ekadā hārabhārḍālocanāmandire mantavyaṁ cakāra yat dravyasya dhāraṇāyāmeva sarvādhunikāmaratvasya mukhyaṁ kāraṇaṁ nihitaṁ vartate |
T02n2952u_001:1726: tā vaktayaḥ karmaśakteḥ sādhāraṇāt sañcayāt jīvanti - sā śaktiḥ rūpātmakaśaktirucyate |
T02n2952u_001:1727: vastutaḥ samānakammapravāheṇa niyamitāḥ santaḥ te sarveṣu bandhaneṣu gabhīratarabandhanena baddhāstiṣṭhanti ghaniṣṭhamekatra ca |
T02n2952u_001:1728: kevalaṁ jaivikaḥ sambandhastān tathā na badhnāti |
T02n2952u_001:1729: samānapravāhe athavāhitaḥ pūrvavartti tatra kevalaṁ jaivikaṁ pitṛtatvaṁ na gurutvaṁ labhate |
T02n2952u_001:1730: tathā ca, tasmin kammapravāhe paravartī janaḥ santānasvarūpaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1731: sa sādhāraṇataḥ vaṁśaparamparayā āgatāṁ karuṇāṁ prāptumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:1732: buddhamate pratyekaṁ vyaktiḥ etādṛśānāṁ meṣasadṛśānāṁ balānāṁ pālikā yairbalaiḥ tasyāḥ svīyaṁ jīvanaṁ pūrṇaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1733: mānavastasya satyaṁ sārūpyamāviṣkartuṁ varṣāṇāṁ sahasrāṇi avaśyameva vatsyati |
T02n2952u_001:1734: tāni balāni satataṁ sāmājikasamparkeṣu veṣāntareṇa ācchannāni tathā gūḍhāni tiṣṭhanti |
T02n2952u_001:1739: sā paristhitistasyāgamanāt prāg yathāsīt paramapi tathā tiṣṭhet |
T02n2952u_001:1746: pratyekaṁ sāmājikaṁ dalaṁ praṇālyā aracitānubhavaśaktiṁ cālayati |
T02n2952u_001:1747: tathākaraṇena ca dalaṁ sāmājikaphalavattāyāḥ kasyacidaṁśasya prāptaye vyaktiṁ samarthayati |
T02n2952u_001:1748: śaktyānubhūtyā ca praṇālyāḥ racanā sāmājikadalasya mūlagatādarśaṁ iti cintyate asya sāmājikaṁ bhittimūlam,
T02n2952u_001:1749: asyāsthīni samājāya nirdiṣṭaṁ caritraṁ tathā gatividhiṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:1750: atraiva mūlasthapārthakyabindurvirājate yena aparebhyaḥ sāmājikebhyo dalebhyaḥ pārthakyaṁ sūcyate |
T02n2952u_001:1751: praṇālīracanāpadenedaṁ budhyate - kasyācidākāṅkṣāṇāṁ pragatimūlā saṁkīrṇatā yāvanna yathākālaṁ ko'pi janaḥ nirdiṣṭenopāyena nirdiṣṭapreṣaṇāsantuṣṭaye icchati |
T02n2952u_001:1752: prayeḍamahodayaḥ ayaṁ 'visiṭajuṅ' viniyogaḥ virecaka iti kathayati |
T02n2952u_001:1753: saṁskṛtirasmāsu yat karoti tadeva mukhyāṁ vastupraṇālīṁ racayati athavā mārgaviśeṣaṇaṁ viśodhayati,
T02n2952u_001:1754: yāvanna vayam viśiṣṭaṁ saṁgītaṁ bhojyamanyat kimapi saṁsthāsammataṁ vastu vā icchāmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1755: ayameva praṇālīracanāyāḥ pariṇāmo teṣāṁ janānāṁ mastiṣkeṣu viśiṣṭhajīvanaśailī nīḍaṁ badhnāti,
T02n2952u_001:1757: ayaṁ vyāpāraḥ jīvanasammatabhāveṣu pracchannaṁ nihito vartate |
T02n2952u_001:1758: tathā ca, abhyāseṣu api yaiśca santānāṁ pālitā bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:1759: ayaṁ vyaktivargaṁ parivāreṣu tathā jīvanasya sampradāyagatarūpeṣu sambandhnāti |
T02n2952u_001:1760: ayaṁ naśvaratāvihīnaṁ sāmājikavidhiniyamitaṁ pratyekaṁ sadasyaṁ dṛḍhaṁ sajati,
T02n2952u_001:1761: yathā na ko'pi maulikaṁ sāmājikaṁ saṁsthānaṁ pratiṣṭhāpayitumasaṁlagnamataṁ grahītumarhati,
T02n2952u_001:1762: saṁkṣepataḥ yataḥ sāmājikavidheḥ parivarttanamicchan jano vā gaṇo vā svayamasya jīvitavatīṁ dehavattāṁ gṛhṇan asya maulikīṣu dhāraṇāsu tathācaraṇasyādarśeṣu apratyakṣīkṛtaṁ tātaparyaṁ sthāpayati |
T02n2952u_001:1763: pratiṣṭhitavidhiniyantritāni acetanāśrayasthalaṁ ca dūranikṣiptāni sūtrāṇi ca - yathā kīrkagārḍamahodayena jīvanasya saṁskṛtā śailīti ucyate kayācicchaktyā śāsati |
T02n2952u_001:1765: yat kayācid antārjātīyayā sāmānyayā bhāṣayā vyāhāraḥ bhrātṛvat mānavān karmakāṇḍe ādhikyena prerayati,
T02n2952u_001:1766: athavā saṁgītaṁ vā kalāvidyāyā anyat rūpaṁ vā,
T02n2952u_001:1767: saṁskṛtiṣu udārataraṁ pracāritāsu tathā vinimayena pracalitāsu samagrapṛthivyāḥ janeṣu gabhīrāṁ maitrīṁ pracariṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:1768: jīvanasya mūlapraṇālī saṁṣkṛtigarbhe pratyekaṁ vyaktiṁ racayati |
T02n2952u_001:1769: sā praṇālī kathitaśabdāpekṣayā kalārūpāntarāpekṣayā vā balavattarā jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:1770: tathā ca, iyaṁ buddhīyā antardṛṣṭiḥ tadviṣayabodhāya asmān sāhāyyaṁ karoti,
T02n2952u_001:1771: kathaṁ sādharaṇabhāṣābhāṣiṇaḥ janāḥ punaḥ punaḥ bhrātṛghātiyuddheṣu niyojitāstiṣṭhanti |
T02n2952u_001:1772: kathañca viśvasya saṁgītapriyāḥ janāḥ sarvadā teṣāṁ nimittopanatasaundaryasammelanāt pratyāgatya saṁskṛtigataṁ vibhāgaṁ vidveṣaṁ ca praviśanti
T02n2952u_001:1773: yasmātte mojārṭasya cekoski ityasya vā samujjvalānuṣṭhānena kṣaṇāya āhūtā bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:1775: pratyekaṁ naraśca tathā ubhayabalo jīvaḥ ekataḥ sāṁskṛtikādarśaiḥ niyantritaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:1779: idaṁ spaṣṭaṁ bhavati yat sa sāmājikadaśāṁ prati tasya carmaṇi ca asthisu ca asvastikarīmatha ca sambhāvanāmayīmubhayabalatāṁ vahati |
T02n2952u_001:1780: sāmājamātreṣu asmābhiḥ kiñcidvastu jñāyate - yatra mūlībhūta āśayo hi bhangasaṁkalpatā,
T02n2952u_001:1785: tatra ca nikaṭasthaṁ dūrasthaṁ vā tamasācchannāgādhamṛtyuvilam |
T02n2952u_001:1787: śīghrameva te āviṣkurvanti yat śiśujanā ākāṅkṣāpūraṇāpekṣayā pṛthivyā anyataraṁ lakṣyaṁ varttate |
T02n2952u_001:1788: tataḥ paraṁ sa jñātumarhati yat jīvanaṁ prāyaśaḥ bhagnasaṁkalpatvādapūrṇākāṅkṣātvācca krandanasya sthānam |
T02n2952u_001:1789: śiśuḥ kramaśaḥ tattathyena ātmānaṁ samādhātuṁ śikṣate yat janā mūlataḥ tasyākāṅkṣāpūraṇayantratvena na varttante |
T02n2952u_001:1792: vikhyātāgnyūpadeśe ucyate yat jīvanasya sādhāraṇīṣu daśāsu eva ā janmano mṛtyu yāvat sarvāṇi vastūni tṛṣṇāgnau ca durdamaprayojanāgnau ca vartante
T02n2952u_001:1793: pratyekaṁ vyaktiḥ ghṛṇāgninā mohāgninā ca saha vasati,
T02n2952u_001:1803: sabhyatāyā yasmin kasminnapi paryāye ubhayabalatāyāmavaśyakaraṇīyatāyāṁ bhagnasaṁkalpatāyāṁ ca mūlagatā gācit bhītistiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:1804: sā bhītiḥ mānavajīvanasya hṛdaye satī vyākhyāṁ karoti kathamādita eva mānavakriyāsu śaktiviruddhakāryakaraṇāya tathā śakterapavyavahārāya prāvaṇyaṁ vartate |
T02n2952u_001:1805: manuṣyaḥ tasya sarveṣāmudyamānāṁ pādanyāsaḥ śithila iti sandigdhe |
T02n2952u_001:1811: sa ātmānaṁ tasya karmaṇe krīḍāyai ca sābhiniveśaṁ samarpayati - taṁ dāsīkṛtya yasya parisamāptiḥ jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:1812: sa cintayati yat sa kevalaṁ saphalatvenātmānaṁ prakāśayati,
T02n2952u_001:1813: kintu vastutaḥ taṁ kārāsthaṁ kṛtvaiva tasya sṛṣṭhirjayati |
T02n2952u_001:1815: parantu vastutaḥ tasya cintā jīvananiyamādhīnā jāyante |
T02n2952u_001:1817: taccintanaviṣayā piñjaratvena vrajanti - yadāviṣkṛtaṁ manuṣyeṇa taṁ paritaḥ yāḥ śaktayastiṣṭhanti tāsāṁ paripālāya |
T02n2952u_001:1819: ādimeṣu vaijñānikeṣu vā cintāyā āviṣkāreṣu evāntimaḥ śabdo vartate |
T02n2952u_001:1820: api ca, keciccaturā upāyāḥ santi ye manuṣyaṁ śvāsarodhakaradaśāyā muktaṁ karttumarhanti |
T02n2952u_001:1821: avaśeṣe sarve rabhasāt samatvena pariṇatā bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:1823: atrāyaṁ hetuḥ - manuṣya ātmānametādṛśena vīryeṇābhiniveśena caiṣu praśneṣu niyojayati,
T02n2952u_001:1825: sa jīvanametādṛśyāṁ vismayakaryāmū aṭṭālikāyāṁ vāsayogyaṁ kartuṁ ceṣṭate iva,
T02n2952u_001:1826: yena sa svīyasṛṣṭitaḥ muktiṁ labdhuṁ nārhati |
T02n2952u_001:1827: prāyaśūnyatāpīyadivase himībhūtahimavisarpaṇapādukāyā gatiriva tasya janasya gatirjāyate |
T02n2952u_001:1828: yā svayaṁ ajñasya śiśoḥ jihvāyāṁ dravati - yaḥ śiśuḥ prathamaṁ himasya upari calati,
T02n2952u_001:1829: pratisamayaṁ manuṣyaḥ tadīyasṛṣṭiśīlaśaktiniḥsṛṣṭe nūtane pariprekṣite tathā mukhe svapiti,
T02n2952u_001:1831: viśeṣeṇa yadi sa taṁ svapnaṁ vāstavāyitaṁ karttuṁ śaknoti evaṁ sampūrṇataḥ prakṛtistho janaḥ yastadīyaśaktīḥ prakāśayan vasati,
T02n2952u_001:1836: utpannaṁ vastu ādarśo vā - yadeva bhavatu vā na bhavatu vā,
T02n2952u_001:1837: saḥ asaralaḥ preṣito jīva iti saralo hetuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1838: sa yat karoti tasminnayaṁ balapūrvo guṇo vartate |
T02n2952u_001:1839: sa na kṣamo bhavati - na jñānāya,
T02n2952u_001:1842: evaṁ vidho jīvaḥ san tadīyavicitranaipuṇyaṁ prāyeṇa vyavaharati pratyakṣīkaraṇād viratyarthaṁ yat ayameva mārgo yatra so'sti |
T02n2952u_001:1843: tasya vyavahāraḥ khalu balāt sidhyati iti āviṣkārāya tasyāsti gabhīrācetanānīhā tathā bādhā |
T02n2952u_001:1844: kasyacidviṣayasya śikṣaṇāya janānāṁ bādho viśiṣṭeṣu kṣetreṣu vicitraḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1846: gacchatā kālena punaḥ yat kiñcid ghaṭiṣyate tat kenāpi ākāṅkṣaṇīyaparivartanamiti vyākhyātaṁ bhaviṣyati kintu janasyopari na kiñcit samāpatitamiveti janaḥ karma karoti |
T02n2952u_001:1847: sa kadāpi aniyataṁ tarkayitumarhati yat sa kṣudhāvaśāt ca indriyavṛttivaśāt ca sāmājike saṁsthāne aṁśagrahaṇaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:1848: kintu kṣudhādayaḥ na sapramāṇaṁ tasya gabhīratamāmantardṛṣṭi tathā sṛṣṭiśīlatāmupasthāpayanti,
T02n2952u_001:1849: tathāpi te eva tasya samīpe prāptavyasya sāmājikavinimayasya kevalā ākārāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1853: ata eva sāṁskṛtikaṁ saṁsthānaṁ sāmājikaṁ cādarśaṁ prati tasya pravṛttiḥ na kadāpi sukhagamyā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1854: sa sāmājikaniyantraṇaṁ necchati tathāpi tatraiva sa jīvikānirvāhārthaṁ tat niyantraṇamatyāvaśyakamiti paśyati |
T02n2952u_001:1856: sa uddhāro'bhavat unmattasamājāt asusthāyāḥ saṁskṛteḥ doṣayuktajanajīvanāt ca |
T02n2952u_001:1857: yat jīvanaṁ dalabaddhamatha ca sarvatrajaṭilaṁ vikṛtaṁ vā vyaktitvaṁ prakāśayati,
T02n2952u_001:1859: buddha etādṛśājjanajīvanāntaraṁ muñcati ye pāścātya deśīyāḥ śikṣārthino'nubhavanti yat sāmājikajīvanasya adarśabhūteṣu rūpeṣu yanmūlyaṁ tasya guṇadoṣavivecane'samartha āsīt,
T02n2952u_001:1860: buddhakṛtā sāmājikarūpāṇāṁ viruddhe ākṣepā atīva caramā āsan |
T02n2952u_001:1861: adhunā vayaṁ saṁskṛteḥ vyakteśca madhye sambandhasya prakṛtau yaccintayāmastadapekṣayādhikataraṁ yāvanna jānīmaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:1862: tāvadayaṁ siddhāntaḥ pāścātyopajātīyasaṁskārāpekṣayā nagaṇya iti draṣṭavyam |
T02n2952u_001:1865: tajjāḍyaṁ vyākhyāti kathaṁ saṁskṛtayaḥ parivartanasya pakṣe dhīraṁ calanti ?
T02n2952u_001:1866: kathaṁ vā drutaṁ parivartanaṁ mānavaṁ nīticyutaṁ karoti ?
T02n2952u_001:1867: kutra vā kāṭhinyaṁ jāyate yat samagraṁ sāmājikaṁ rūpaṁ parivartanāya atīva anivārya karoti |
T02n2952u_001:1868: yadā vayaṁ bauddhapunarjanmavādaṁ smarāmaḥ tadedameva smartavyam - kimarthaṁ buddhaḥ purātanasāmājikasṛṣṭibhyaḥ mānavavyaktitvaṁ rakṣituṁ prārthayate sma ?
T02n2952u_001:1870: tadā vayaṁ smarāmo yat itihāsasya asmin yuge ādarśaṁ pradarśayata āvegapravaṇena preṣitasya jīvasya śaktiḥ samarūpapreṣitasahasrajīvānāṁ sañcitaśaktibhiḥ bhuktā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:1872: asmin bauddhe pariprekṣite idameva vismayakaraṁ bhittimulaṁ,
T02n2952u_001:1873: yadi prabhāvagatā gabhīrāviśvāsaḥ anyaiḥ janaiḥ ākāraṁ prāpnoti,
T02n2952u_001:1874: tarhi asmākaṁ jīvanaṁ vyāpakaṁ vibhakteṣu janeṣu gabhīramatha ca vistṛtamupādānaṁ na bhavitumarhati,
T02n2952u_001:1875: vastūnāṁ samakṣaṁ idaṁ spaṣṭamiva pratibhāti yat,
T02n2952u_001:1876: yadi anye jīvāḥ yathā vayaṁ tathā acetanapreṣaṇayā vyavacchidyate,
T02n2952u_001:1877: tathā ca eṣāṁ janānāṁ svābhāvikī sāmājikī sṛṣṭiḥ akalyāṇamayī bhavati yathā asmākaṁ kadāpi vā sandehasūcakaṁ kāraṇamasti,
T02n2952u_001:1878: tarhi anyajīvanagataprabhāvasūcakabauddhasaṁśayaḥ susthe tathā yuktigrāhye bhittimūle sthāpitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:1879: sāmājikāmarṣasya asyāṁ pravaṇatāyāṁ suṣṭhu adhikaṁ gurutvaṁ deyam yādṛśaṁ gurutvaṁ bauddhaśāstreṣu dīyate tadapekṣayāpi |
T02n2952u_001:1880: yataḥ ayaṁ vyāpāraḥ sambhavataḥ sāmājitavyavahārasya sandhānasamyogasūtram kevalamasmākaṁ paricitteṣu samājeṣu |
T02n2952u_001:1881: ata eva, ayameva sampūrṇaḥ svābhāviko vyāpāro yat sāmājikānāṁ pratiṣṭhānānāṁ tathā teṣāṁ prabhāvānāṁ kṛte,
