T02n2952u_001:2140: kṣudratarachoṭikāviṣayikī ṭīkā varṇayati yat agnijvālānuśāsanāt paraṁ buddhaḥ pakṣakālaṁ nibhṛtavāsaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:2141: yadā sa vahirāgataḥ tadā sa svalpasaṁsthakān janānapaśyat |
T02n2952u_001:2143: tadīyo'nujaḥ sahacaraśca ānandaḥ āha yat bahubhiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ sannyāsastyaktaḥ yataste'nubhavanti yat te dharmīyajīvanayāpane'samarthāḥ,
T02n2952u_001:2145: yadi te'nucitamācaranti tarhi viśvastaiḥ dātṛbhiḥ pradattānāṁ dravyānāṁ bhogaḥ anucito bhaviṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:2146: buddho vismitaḥ sannāha tasya nibhṛtavāsakāle na kenāpi bhikṣūṇāṁ samīpe ‘sukhaśvāsakāraṇam’ assāsakāraṇa)
T02n2952u_001:2148: tadabhyāsena bhikṣavo niścayena jñāsyanti yat te dattadravyāṇāṁ vyavahāraṁ yathāyathaṁ kurvanti |
T02n2952u_001:2149: kṣudratarachoṭikākāṭīkāyāṁ buddha ānandamavadat yat samudragāmino yathā bahavoṁ mārgāḥ tiṣṭhanti,
T02n2952u_001:2150: tathā tadīye upadeśe sukhaśvāsakāraṇāni vahūnyeva santi |
T02n2952u_001:2154: tataḥ ekaṁ mukhabandhaṁ dadau - bho bhikṣavaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:2155: premṇaḥ prāthamikaḥ paryāya eva ekaṁ sukhaśvāsakāraṇam (mettaya sabbapubbabhaga) |
T02n2952u_001:2156: atra kevalaṁ jīvahitasādhanāya jīvaiḥ saha sambandhastiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:2159: punaśca ṭīkāyāmuyate yat ālocanābinduvyākhyānāya buddhaḥ aṁgulichoṭikāviṣayakakṣudratarākhyānasya avatāraṇāṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:2161: 70) evaṁ ‘agnijvālā’yāḥ upasaṁhāratvena ‘kṣudratarachoṭikā’saṁvādaḥ taṁ mārgaṁ nirdiśati yatra karuṇāyāḥ prāthamikaḥ paryāyaḥ hi sukhaśvāsakāraṇamiti vyākhyātam |
T02n2952u_001:2162: idamullekhyaṁ yat - yathā ṭīkāyāṁ dṛśyate - buddhaḥ karuṇāmayacittasya paryāyatrayaṁ pratiṣṭhāpayati |
T02n2952u_001:2163: tathā hi - (1)) prāthamikaṁḥ paryāyaḥ - yatra kevalaṁ jīvahitecchā tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:2165: tataśca (3) ekāgratāsthāpanā - yatra samādhiḥ sthānaṁ labhate |
T02n2952u_001:2168: kṣudratarachoṭikākhyāne gotame vyākhyāti yadi koapi bhikṣuḥ aṁgulichoṭikākālamapi karuṇāmayaṁ cittaṁ poṣati tarhi sa yathārthato bhikṣuriti ucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2169: karuṇāmayaṁ cittaṁ sacetanajīvaiḥ saha samparka sthāpayati - yatra maṅgalecchā vartate |
T02n2952u_001:2171: asya sārvalaukikaḥ paridhirasti sarve jīvāḥ sukhino bhavantu - īdṛśī icchāsmin citte jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:2172: kena prakāreṇa bhikṣuḥ īdṛśaṁ cittaṁ poṣati tasya viśleṣaṇaṁ ṭīkāyāmasti |
T02n2952u_001:2175: yadā sa cintayati tadā sa idaṁ poṣati |
T02n2952u_001:2183: yadā sa pratyakṣajñānena jñātayaṁ viṣayaṁ jānāti tadā sa karuṇāmayaṁ cittaṁ dhārayati |
T02n2952u_001:2187: kiñca, cittapoṣaṇavyāpāro'yaṁ kevalaṁ kalyāṇakāmanayā sacetanajīvasamparkitānuraktibhāvena upalabdho bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:2189: evaṁ bhikṣuḥ sarvadā dharmīyakarmaṇi karuṇāmayaṁ manaḥ pālayatimarhati |
T02n2952u_001:2190: sa yadi kevalamaṅgalichoṭikākālamapi premṇastathā karuṇāyāḥ prāthamike paryāye cittaṁ pālayati tarhi sa bhikṣuriti parigaṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:2192: dhyānābhyāsaṁ karoti tathā rājyasya bhojyaṁ bhuṅkte yathāyatham |
T02n2952u_001:2195: kṣudratarachoṭikāyāḥ ṭīkā taṁ pāṭhamupanayati yatredamivocyate yat nedaṁ ‘bhuñjati,
T02n2952u_001:2198: 'kṣudrachoṭikātaḥ asya padasya saṁyojanena dvayoḥ saṁvādayoḥ madhye samparke gurutvamāropitam |
T02n2952u_001:2199: ṭīkāyāmucyate yat aṁgulichoṭikākālamapi karuṇāmayaṁ cittaṁ pālayan bhikṣuḥ kena prakāreṇa rājyasya khādyadravyamapacayaśūnyaṁ bhuṅkte' |
T02n2952u_001:2210: yadā sadācārayukto bhikṣuḥ niścintaṁ ṛṇakṛtaṁ dānaṁ bhuṅkte,
T02n2952u_001:2212: yadā śikṣārthināṁ sapta saṁghāḥ dānaṁ bhuñjate,
T02n2952u_001:2214: yadi bhikṣuḥ hānikaraṁ prabhāvaṁ vinaśya dānaṁ bhuṅkte,
T02n2952u_001:2221: yo bhikṣuḥ kevalaṁ aṁgulichoṭikākālaṁ karuṇāṁ poṣayati,
T02n2952u_001:2225: idameva kāraṇaṁ yat so'pacayaṁ vinā rājyasya khādyaṁ bhuṅkte |
T02n2952u_001:2227: aṁgulichoṭikākālamapi kāruṇikāya bhikṣave dānasya mahatī śaktirasti |
T02n2952u_001:2228: īdṛśāya bhikṣave yo dātā upahāraṁ yacchati sa tasmādupahārāt mahat phalam,
T02n2952u_001:2231: idameva dvitīyaṁ kāraṇaṁ yasmāt bhikṣuḥ apacayaṁ na kṛtvā rājyasya bhojyaṁ bhuṅkte |
T02n2952u_001:2234: yo bhikṣuḥ kṣaṇamapi prāthamikaparyāyabhuktapremakaruṇāyuktaṁ hṛdaya pālayati sa taṁ dharmamarjayati yo dharmastādṛśena bhikṣuṇā arjyate sa
T02n2952u_001:2237: yena vā hānikarāḥ sarve prabhāvā vinaṣṭāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2244: ) premamayacittānuśīlanakāribhikṣusaṁsparśaṁ yaḥ poṣaka āyāti sa tadbhikṣoḥ yānācārādibhiḥ anuprāṇito bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2245: idaṁ hitāvahamanupreraṇaṁ bhaviṣyati ānandadāyakāya puraskārāya mūlam |
T02n2952u_001:2247: idaṁ poṣakeṇa paravartidharmasyācaraṇāya bījatvena sevitumapi alam |
T02n2952u_001:2249: sa eva yathārthaṁ nirapacayaṁ bhikṣāṁ bhuṅkte |
T02n2952u_001:2256: , api ca, tat poṣaṇaṁ bhaviṣyati sakṛdāgāmibhikṣave,
T02n2952u_001:2268: kintu eṣā carcā muktyunmukhāntardṛṣṭicarcāyā nimne eva vartate |
T02n2952u_001:2269: kāruṇikacittamiti samastapadasya vyākhyāyāṁ ṭīkāha - 'hitasādhaneccasametasacetajīvasamparkitaṁ cittameva kāruṇikaṁ cittam |
T02n2952u_001:2270: punaśca, idaṁ yathārthataḥ samādhiyogena antarbhukto bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2272: evamatra kāruṇikacittam samādhiparyāyabhuktaṁ sarvathāpi premakaruṇānvitaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:2273: 'krakacadṛṣṭāntasaṁvāde' gotamaḥ bhikṣuṁ moliyaphaggunamupadiṁśati yat sa kupitacittapoṣaṇaṁ na kṛtvā kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ pālayet |
T02n2952u_001:2275: moliyaphaggunaḥ sannyāsinībhiḥ saha atyantaṁ saṁsaktaḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2281: sa tamāha yat sannyāsinīṣu atyāsaktiḥ sannyāsināṁ pakṣe anucittāṁ |
T02n2952u_001:2282: ata eva yadi ko'pi janaḥ sannyāsinīnāṁ vyavahāreṣu doṣaṁ paśyati,
T02n2952u_001:2283: tadā sa īdṛśaṁ manobhāvaṁ poṣayet - mama cittaṁ viṣayagāmi na bhavatu |
T02n2952u_001:2286: mama cittaṁ kāruṇikaṁ sat sarvadā kopamuktaṁ bhaviṣyati iti |
T02n2952u_001:2288: buddho moliyamupadiśati yat sa samamanobhāvaṁ poṣayet yadi ko'pi tadīyaṁ doṣaṁ paśyati,
T02n2952u_001:2289: athavā ko'pi taṁ vā sannyāsinīḥ vā āhanti |
T02n2952u_001:2291: api tu parasambandhiguṇadoṣavivecanakāle sarvadā kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ lālayet |
T02n2952u_001:2292: saṁvādeṣu buddho gotamo vyākhyāti yat yadi ko'pi aparasya doṣaṁ saṁśodhayitumicchati,
T02n2952u_001:2294: tadā sa kāruṇikena hṛdayena satyaṁ vadet,
T02n2952u_001:2298: kathaṁ vā parasparam saṁlapet iti upadiśya punaśca sa saṁyojayāmāsa yat sarve bhikṣavaḥ sarvadā sarvaiḥ saha śāntaṁ vyavahareyuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2299: madhyamamānavacaneṣu gotama upadiśati yat ko'pi janaḥ jātivicāraṁ na kṛtvā premamayaṁ hṛdayaṁ karṣet |
T02n2952u_001:2301: ayamabhyāso na kevalaṁ sarveṣāṁ karttavyo'pi tu ādhyātmikamārgaparisamāptaye upayogitāṁ vrajati |
T02n2952u_001:2302: 'kassapaṁ prati siṁhagarjanaṁ' - saṁvāde gotamo varṇayati yo bhikṣuḥ kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ pālayati,
T02n2952u_001:2308: tenādarśena vyaktipakṣe prayojanamasti yadi vyaktiḥ parivrājako vā brāhmaṇo vā bhavitumicchati |
T02n2952u_001:2322: te viṣayāḥ kevalam arhadbhiḥ sampūrṇaṁ parityaktāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2324: sā prakṛtiḥ arhatāṁ tṛptiṁ na vidadhāti |
T02n2952u_001:2327: phalataḥ, te na punaḥ pārthivendriyasukhenākṛṣṭā bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:2328: evamanityasukhaṁ vā punarjanmano duḥkhaṁ vā tān prabhāvitān karttuṁ na śaknotiṁ |
T02n2952u_001:2329: īdṛśaiḥ janaiḥ sarvavidhaṁ mānasikaṁ tamastathā bhrāntaṁ mataṁ dūrīkṛtam |
T02n2952u_001:2330: tataḥ arhatpadasya samaparyāyaśabdaḥ khalu 'khinasavaḥ' arthāt 'yena kṣatikaraprabhāvo vinaṣṭa' iti |
T02n2952u_001:2331: punaśca, yadi īdṛśo janaḥ premamayaṁ hṛdayaṁ karṣati,
T02n2952u_001:2332: tarhi sa yathārthataḥ parivrājakaḥ brāhmaṇo vā bhavitumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:2333: kramikavacaneṣu buddha āha bhikṣūn prati sukarmasādhanāt bhītiḥ na karaṇīyā,
T02n2952u_001:2336: sa svakīyaṁ jñānamullikhati yat tena ciraṁ yat sukarma kṛtaṁ tat ānandāya sampadyate |
T02n2952u_001:2337: tasyaphalaṁ caivam - sa prāktane janmani saptaparṣaiḥ kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ pālayāmāsa |
T02n2952u_001:2339: sārvalaukike prakāśe ca vikāśe ca sapta yugāni vyāpya so'syāṁ pṛthivyāṁ na punarjātaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2340: sārvalaukikaprakāśakāle sa divye jagati janmagrahaṇaṁ cakāra (ābhassara)
T02n2952u_001:2346: sa bahuvāraṁ sārvalaukikaḥ samrāṭ san yathādharmaṁ śāsanaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:2347: tadā sa kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ karṣati sma,
T02n2952u_001:2350: anyasmin saṁvāde bodhisattvasya kāruṇikaṁ tathā premamayaṁ cittamullekhārhatāṁ vrajati |
T02n2952u_001:2352: sṛṣṭaṁ saṁkaṭamadhikṛtya vipraḥ jāṇussoṇiḥ gotamaṁ pṛcchati,
T02n2952u_001:2354: buddhaḥ jāṇussoṇiṁ nivedayati yat vanavāsināṁ teṣāṁ parivrājakānāṁ brāhmaṇānāṁ cittaṁ krodhānvitaṁ mālinyayuktaṁ cāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:2357: sa jāṇussoṇiṁ vyākhyāti yat ekadā sa svayaṁ bodhisattva āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:2361: kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ pratyakṣīkṛtya bodhisattvaḥ kadāpi dvidhāgrastaḥ na babhūva,
T02n2952u_001:2362: na vā bhītaḥ na vā ātaṅkitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2363: ṭīkāyāḥ saṁyojanamevam - mama cittaṁ krodhapūrṇaṁ nāsīt asyāyamāśayahḥ 'mamaikaṁ karuṇāmayaṁ hṛdayamāsīt tasmin hṛdaye hitecchā āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:2367: tataḥ paraṁ gotamo'smin saṁvāde tasya samyag jñānaṁ varṇayati,
T02n2952u_001:2368: idamanumānaṁ yuktaṁ bhavet yat araṇye bodhisattvasya jīanamadhikṛttya eṣālocanā gotamakartṛkabodhilābhāt pūrvameva yaḥ kālastaṁ nirdiśati |
T02n2952u_001:2370: athavā te tathā karttumapadiśyante iti dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:2375: ṭīkāyā mate ubhayavidhaṁ cittaṁ premamayakarmasampādanāya samarthaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:2378: bhavacakrāt mahāparimuktimadhikṛtya saṁvāde dṛśyate yat guroḥ gotamād vicchedamāsannam dṛṣṭvā ānandaḥ roditumārebhe |
T02n2952u_001:2380: tadā gotama ānandaṁ smārayati yat tasyaiva upadeśa evam - sarvāṇi sukhakarāṇi vastūni parivartante tirobhavanti ca |
T02n2952u_001:2381: buddhaḥ ānandaṁ sāntvayati tadīyapremamayasevāṁ praśasya - ānanda,
T02n2952u_001:2382: tayā cireṇa sadaikyavataḥ sevā kriyate - premayakāyikakarmabhiḥ,
T02n2952u_001:2392: hitakarāṇi - ityatra tāni karmāṇi ucyante yāni maṁgalavardhanāya kriyante |
T02n2952u_001:2393: sukhāvahāni - ityatrāśayaḥ - karmāṇi sukhena ca harṣeṇa ca kriyante,
T02n2952u_001:2395: advaitāni - ayaṁ bhāvaḥ - kati janāḥ kevalamapareṣāṁ samakṣaṁ,
T02n2952u_001:2401: kintu sa ānanda evaṁ na vibhajya premamayakarmāṇi sampādayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:2402: evañca tat kṛtāni premamayakāyikakāryāṇi advaitāni saṁvṛttāni |
T02n2952u_001:2404: sa vivakṣati - tava premamayakāyikakāryāṇi parimāṇena atyantaṁ pracurāṇi |
T02n2952u_001:2407: kṣudre sāttvike jagati pracurāṇāṁ karmaṇāṁ sthānābhāvatvāt karmāṇi parimāṇaśūnyāni iti kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:2408: premamayavācikakarmāṇi - atra vācikakarmāṇi ityatra mukhaprakṣālanasamayaghoṣaṇādikarmāṇi sūcyante |
T02n2952u_001:2410: kiñca, yadi ko'pi upadeśavāṇīṁ śrutvā vadati,
T02n2952u_001:2413: premamayamānasikakarmāṇi ityatrāśayaḥ - yathāsamayaṁ śarīrasya yatnaṁ kṛtvā sa nibhṛte sthāne upaviśya evaṁ prakāreṇa cintayati - 'mamācāryaḥ rogāt kleśācca mukto bhavatu,
T02n2952u_001:2417: saṁvādeṣu idamapi likhitaṁ yat bhikṣavaḥ teṣāṁ sveṣāṁ madhye premamayakāyikavācikamānasikakarmaṇāmanuśīlanaṁ cakruḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2423: buddhaḥ sannyāsinaḥ pṛcchati - paryāptaṁ bhikṣābhojyaṁ prāpya dugdhajalamiśraṇavadekatra sukhena sthitvā kiṁ te kuśalina iti na vā |
T02n2952u_001:2424: te uttaraṁ dadati yat te nāma kuśalinaḥ teṣāñca paryāptaṁ bhikṣābhojyamasti |
T02n2952u_001:2425: anuruddhasya netṛtve te pṛthak pṛthak buddhaṁ vadanti yat te dugdhajalamiśravaṇavat sukhena vasanti |
T02n2952u_001:2426: teṣāṁ mate īdṛśaiḥ satīrthaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ saha vāsaḥ mahān lābha eva |
T02n2952u_001:2428: teṣāṁ samakṣaṁ ca parokṣam ca anuruddhaḥ anyān janān prati tadīyāṁ bhaktiṁ varṇayati - 'ahaṁ nimnarūpaṁ cintayāmi - mayā kimīdṛśānām mitrāṇāṁ sevārthaṁ mama svīyaṁ cittamutsṛṣṭam ?
T02n2952u_001:2429: kiñca kiṁ me jīvanaṁ teṣāṁ sevārthamiti |
T02n2952u_001:2430: ......mahāśayaḥ, asmākaṁ śarīrāṇi khalu pṛthak pṛthak tiṣṭhanti;
T02n2952u_001:2433: anuruddhasya premamayakāyikavācikamānasikakarmaṇāṁ varṇanaṁ vistareṇa kathayati ṭīkā - premamayakāyikakarmāṇi - ityatra kāyikakarmāṇi kāruṇikacittatvāt
T02n2952u_001:2437: apareṣāṁ samakṣaṁ kāyikavācikakarmāṇi tadaiva sambhavanti yadā ko'pi janaḥ aparaiḥ saha vasati |
T02n2952u_001:2438: vaiparītyaṁ sambhavati yadi janāḥ pṛthak pṛthak vasanti |
T02n2952u_001:2440: tathā hi - anuruddhaḥ paśyati - dau bhikṣū tena saha vasataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2442: sa cintanena viraktiṁ na prakāśayati - 'kenedaṁ vyavahṛtam ? iti |
T02n2952u_001:2443: varam, sa tāni vastūni samuddhṛtya yathāsthānaṁ sthāpayati,
T02n2952u_001:2444: yathā svayaṁ sa tyajati samuddharati ca |
T02n2952u_001:2449: viṣṭaraṁ prayojanīyaṁ dravyaṁ ca vahiḥ tyajati |
T02n2952u_001:2451: tathaiva yadi sa karoti tarhi tasya premamayakāyikakāryāvalī pareṣāṁ parokṣaṁ bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:2453: taddvayena saha madhuraṁ sukhakaraṁ ca ālapati,
T02n2952u_001:2454: tadā tat karma pareṣāṁ samakṣaṁ premamayavācikakarmeti ucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2455: sa yadi taddvayaṁ mitratāsulabhāya saujanyamūlakāya vā ālāpāya niyojayati,
T02n2952u_001:2456: tarhi api premamayaṁ vācikaṁ karma bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:2458: athavā tayoḥ uttaraṁ dadāti - evaṁvidhaṁ karmāpi vācikaṁ karmetyucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2459: kiñca, yadā dvau gurujanau anyatra gacchataḥ tayoḥ anupasthitau sa tayoh guṇān praśaṁsati - 'mama priyau bāndhavau,
T02n2952u_001:2460: vayovṛddhau nandiyaḥ kimbilaśca evaṁ evaṁ prakāreṇa sadācāraiḥ yuktau |
T02n2952u_001:2462: evaṁ vidhaṁ karma pareṣāṁ parokṣaṁ premamayavācikakarmeti ucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2463: premamayamānasikakarma tadaiva sambhavati yadā pareṣāmupasthitau vānupasthitau vā sa cintayati,
T02n2952u_001:2464: - mama priyau bāndhavau vayuvṛddhau nandiyaḥ kimbilacca śatrutāyā jaṭilatāyāśca muktau bhavatām |
T02n2952u_001:2466: mahāśaya, asmākaṁ śarīrāṇi khalu pārthakyaṁ bhajanti |
T02n2952u_001:2467: yataḥ śarīrāṇi godhūmacūrṇavad vā mṛttikāvadvā cūrṇībhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:2469: tathāpi, asmākaṁ cittāni niścayena ekatvaṁ bhajanti |
T02n2952u_001:2473: sarvadā aikamatyaṁ poṣayāmaḥ tadā asmākaṁ cittāni ekatvaṁ bhajanti |
T02n2952u_001:2475: kathaṁ te ātmanāṁ cittāni tyaktvā pareṣāṁ sevāyai niyojayanti ?
T02n2952u_001:2482: kintu anye na vadanti 'mama prakṣālanayogyaṁ vastramasti' iti |
T02n2952u_001:2485: anyeṣu ekatamenāpi prathamaghoṣaṇāyāṁ sadṛśī sahayogitā sambhavati,
T02n2952u_001:2493: 'siṅgālaṁ prati upadeśe' gotamaḥ gṛhasthaṁ siṅgālamupadiśati - premamayaśārīrikavācikamānasikakarmabhiḥ parivrājakān brāhmaṇān ca sevasva,
T02n2952u_001:2496: parivrājakā api sahānubhavānuprāṇitāḥ santaḥ pratyupakāraṁ sādhayiṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:2497: ṭīkāyāmucyate vistareṇa - premamayakāyikakarmabhiḥ - ityatra kāyikakarmasu kṛteṣu vyaktiḥ yadi premamayaṁ hṛdayaṁ sṛjati tarhi tāni karmāṇi premamayānīti |
T02n2952u_001:2498: yadā ko'pi saṁsārī evaṁ cintayan bauddhamandiraṁ gacchati,
T02n2952u_001:2500: ' tatra ca gatā jalapātraṁ nītvā jalaṁ siñcati,
T02n2952u_001:2501: bhikṣūṇāṁ padaṁ vā pṛṣṭaṁ vā saṁvāhayati - ityādīni karmāṇi premamayakāyikakarmāṇītyucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2502: yadā ko'pi saṁsārī paśyati - bhikṣavo bhikṣārthaṁ grāmaṁ praviśantīti,
T02n2952u_001:2503: sa ca vadati śraddhayā tebhyaḥ annaṁ vā dugdhaṁ vā bhojyaṁ vā dehīti,
T02n2952u_001:2505: kiñca, yadā sa śraddhayāntarikatayā ca dharmaṁ śṛṇoti,
T02n2952u_001:2506: vadati ca 'sādhūktaṁ tvayā'- tadā evaṁvidhāni karmāṇi premamayavācikakarmāṇiti kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:2508: 'asmākaṁ saṁsāram āśritya ye gurujanāstiṣṭhanti te śatrutvāt tathā utpātāt muktā bhavantu,
T02n2952u_001:2511: bhavacakrān mahāparinirvāṇasaṁvāde gotamaḥ bhikṣumupadiśati - ṣaṭ avasthāḥ santi - yābhiḥ lābho jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:2513: tathā hi - pareṣāṁ samakṣāṁ vā parokṣaṁ vā satīrthebhyaḥ bhikṣubhyaḥ prītiyukktakāyikavācikamānasikakarmasampādanam,
T02n2952u_001:2514: satīrtheṣu bhikṣuṣu bhikṣālabdhaṁ dravyaṁ vibhajya grahaṇam,
T02n2952u_001:2519: ṭīkāyāṁ vyākhyāyate - prītisnigdhakāyikakarmāṇi tānyeva yāni kāruṇikena hṛdayena kriyante |
T02n2952u_001:2520: evameva karuṇābhayamanaḥsādhyaṁ vācikaṁ karma premamayamiti kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:2522: asmin pāṭhe īdṛśī karmasamaṣṭiḥ sannyāsināṁ kṛte nirdiśyate |
T02n2952u_001:2524: karuṇāmayahṛdayenānupreritāḥ santaḥ sannyāsinaḥ yadā sadācāraṁ sādhayanti tadā tat karma prītisnigdhakāyikakarmetyucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2525: yadā gṛhasthā janāḥ śraddhāpradarśanārthaṁ avaśiṣṭādhāraṁ gacchanti,
T02n2952u_001:2528: bhikṣārthaṁ grāmamāgacchantaṁ bhikṣumālokya taṁ draṣṭuṁ gacchanti,
T02n2952u_001:2533: yadā sannyāsinaḥ kāruṇikacittānupreritāḥ santaḥ sada cāramupadiśanti,
T02n2952u_001:2540: gṛsthānāṁ prītisnigdhāvācikakarmāṇi tadaiva bhavanti yadā vadanti,
T02n2952u_001:2552: ' 'ādhyātmikasampradāyaṁ nimantrayāmaḥ teṣāṁ kṛte ca kaṭhinaṁ bhojyaṁ sādhayāmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2560: yadā bhikṣavaḥ pratyūṣe utthāya dehasādhanānte avaśiṣṭādhārasamīpa prakṣānārthaṁ yānti,
T02n2952u_001:2562: viviktasthāne upaviśya cintayanti - 'bauddhamandirasya sannyāsinaḥ sukhinaḥ bhavantu |
T02n2952u_001:2567: te vairāt upadravācca muktā bhavantu' tadā ityevaṁ teṣāṁ karuṇātmakamānasikakarma |
T02n2952u_001:2568: yadā bhikṣavaḥ paridheyavasanādinirmāṇāya navadīkṣitān sāhāyyaṁ kartuṁ gacchanti,
T02n2952u_001:2569: tadā tat karma pareṣāmupasthitau prītisnigdhaśārīrikakarmeti ucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2570: api ca, gurujanapādaprakṣālanaṁ śraddhayā abhyarthanājñāpanamityādīni karmāṇi pareṣāṁ samakṣaṁ prītisnigdhadaihikakarmāṇi ityucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2571: yadā dīkṣiteṣu navīnā vā prācīnā vā dārumayadravyādīni vahiḥ viśṛṁkhalaṁ parityajya anyatra gacchanti,
T02n2952u_001:2572: tadā kaścidbhikṣuḥ tāni dravyāṇi suśṛṁkhalaṁ sthāpayati viraktiprakāśaṁ na kṛtvaiva |
T02n2952u_001:2573: sa manyate yat uktaṁ karma tasya svasyeva karma |
T02n2952u_001:2576: agraja tissa' ete śraddhāsūcakāḥ śabdāḥ pareṣāṁ samakṣaṁ premamayavācikakarmaṇā dyotakāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2577: bauddhamandire agrajadevasya agrajatissasyānupasthitau ko'pi bhikṣuryadi evaṁ vadati - 'asmākamagrajaḥ devaḥ kutra gataḥ,
T02n2952u_001:2580: ' tadā eṣā uktiḥ pareṣāṁ parokṣaṁ kāruṇikavācikakarmeti ucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2581: vayaṁ yadā prītisnigdhaiḥ locanaiḥ aparān drakṣyāmaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:2583: yadi cintyate 'agrajaḥ devaḥ agrajaḥ tissaḥ ca pīḍāyāḥ ca asvāsthyāt ca muktau bhavatām |
T02n2952u_001:2584: ' tarhi etādṛśaṁ cintanaṁ pareṣāmupasthitau premamayakarmeti ucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2586: iyaṁ ṭīkā varṇayati - 'kāruṇikacittānupreritāḥ santaḥ bhikṣavaḥ yadā yathāyathamācaranti tadā tat karma premamayakāyikakarmetyucyate iti |
T02n2952u_001:2588: theravādīvyākhyānādidamāyāti yat maṅgalamaye manasi vicitraviṣayāṇāmadbhutaṁ miśraṇaṁ jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:2589: hitasādhakaṁ kāruṇikaṁ manaḥ katibhiḥ mānasikaiḥ guṇaiḥ anvitaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:2602: ' yathāyathamācaraṇāyānupreraṇāśaktitvena vivecanā lajjā ca hitasādhakacitteṣu vartete ityucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2603: vivecanā ca lajjā ca snāyavikaṁ doṣaṁ na sūcayataḥ kintu upayuktavyavahārapravarttakaguṇān sūcayataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2604: tatra yathākramaṁ vyavahartuḥ svīyaruciḥ athavā pareṣāṁ ruciḥ kāryaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:2606: snāyavikadoṣakaraṇādvātmavidveṣādvādūre vartamānaḥ śuddhasaujanyabodhaḥ tayoranupasthiteḥ upari nirbharaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:2607: yadā kaścijjana ātmavidveṣaṁ poṣayati athavā pāpavyākulatāmanubhavati,
T02n2952u_001:2608: tadā sa vivekena lajjayā vā śūnyaḥ jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:2610: yataḥ asmin samaye sa svapakṣe parapakṣe vā yathāyathaṁ hitakaraṁ kāryaṁ na karoti |
T02n2952u_001:2611: yataḥ upayuktanītisammatavyavahāraḥ ātmavidveṣādidoṣebhyo muktena saujanyabodhena pravartito bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:2612: tataḥ nītisammataṁ jñānaṁ tathācaraṇaṁ prakṣobhajakleśamantareṇa sambhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2613: mānasikaṁ sāmyaṁ namanīyatvaṁ laghutvamātmavidveṣādiduṣṭabhāvapariharaṇameteṣāṁ prasaṁge āgativinayamavalambya kaścijjanaḥ viśuddhavyavahāraṁ kartuṁ śikṣate |
T02n2952u_001:2614: vyavahāre kasyacinnarasya bhrame lakṣite bhramasvīkaraṇena ca viśuddhīkaraṇecchayā ca pratikāro vidhīyate,
T02n2952u_001:2617: vivekaśca lajjā ca aparahitasādhakamānasikaguṇaiḥ saha virodhaṁ na bhajataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2619: karuṇayā saha sarve ete guṇāḥ viśuddhavyavahāreṇa saha virājante |
T02n2952u_001:2620: kintu tatra bindumātraḥ kopo'pi na tiṣṭhati,
T02n2952u_001:2624: lajjā ca mānasikasukhabodhāya samamanobhāvāya vā sampadyante |
T02n2952u_001:2626: evañca, sadācāraḥ karuṇayā ānandena ca saha virājate |
T02n2952u_001:2627: saṁvādeṣu karuṇāmayakāryāvalī samaṣṭigatabhāvena kevalaṁ dharmācaraṇakāriṇāṁ kṛte ālocyate |
T02n2952u_001:2628: tatra buddhaḥ ānandaḥ anuruddhaḥ kimbilaḥ nandiyaḥ ityādīnāṁ parasparasaṁvādo'sti |
T02n2952u_001:2629: tatra karuṇāsamṛddhakarmasampādanāya sannyāsinaḥ prati buddhasyopadeśo vartate |
T02n2952u_001:2631: kāruṇikakarmabhiḥ parivrājakānāṁ ca viprāṇāṁ ca sevārthaṁ siṁgalaṁ prati tasyopadeśo'sti |
T02n2952u_001:2632: atra hetuḥ - parivrājakāśca viprāśca sahānubhūtiśīlāḥ santaḥ tameva upakariṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:2633: saṁvādeṣu ālocitānāṁ karuṇāsiktakarmaṇāṁ pradhānāḥ kartāraḥ hi bhikṣavaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2634: tathāpi idamapi avaśyameva gamyate yat sādhāraṇā janā api bhikṣūṇāṁ viśuddhaṁ vyavahāraṁ tathā upadeśaṁ gṛhītvā upakṛtā bhaviṣyanti,
T02n2952u_001:2635: bhikṣūn prati kāruṇikakarmopadeśānāṁ kaściddoṣaḥ api dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:2636: tathā hi - te sādhāraṇajanebhyaḥ kāruṇikakarmalābhāya pralubdhā bhavitumarhanti |
T02n2952u_001:2637: atra buddhasya kaṭhoraṁ vidhānamasti yat bhikṣavaḥ yathāyathaṁ bhikṣālabdhaṁ dravyaṁ bhuñjīran |
T02n2952u_001:2640: ata ea hitakarakāruṇikacittena anuprāṇitāḥ santaḥ janāḥ pramamayakāyikavācikamānasikakarmāṇi kartuṁ pravattante |
T02n2952u_001:2641: etāni karmāṇi sampādayantaḥ abyāsakāriṇaḥ tasmin kṣaṇe eva cittānuṣaṅgaṁ sukhamanubhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:2645: tathā hi - 1. nirvāṇopalabdhiḥ sarvavidhasāpekṣavyāpāreṣu sthāpitā bhaviṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:2648: 4. mālinyaṁ tathā punarjanma iti sahajātā pravaṇatā dūraṁ gabhiṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:2652: sarvavidhasāpekṣavyāpāreṣu duḥkhabodhajāgaraṇāt sannyāsī yathā arhatpuruṣo bhaviturmahati tasya lābhāḥ jāyante |
T02n2952u_001:2653: 'karuṇāayakarmaṁ ityasya viśleṣaṇaṁ karoti ṭīkā -- karuṇāmayakarmabhiḥ karuṇānvitasevābhiḥ,
T02n2952u_001:2654: yasmāt saptavidhā śikṣārthinaḥ karuṇāmayakarmabhiḥ sadaikyavantaṁ sevante |
T02n2952u_001:2655: yena bhikṣuṇā hānikarāḥ prabhāvā vinaṣṭāḥ sa sampūrṇakāruṇikakarmabhiḥ ācāryaṁ sevate |
T02n2952u_001:2657: śikṣārthinaḥ vā aparejanā vā mārgābhijñatāṁ labhante |
T02n2952u_001:2658: tathā ca 'srotaḥpraveśinaḥ' 'sakṛdagāminaḥ' 'anāgāminaḥ' 'anāgāminaḥ' arjjanasya mārgasya viṣayamadhikṛtya jñānamarjayanti,
T02n2952u_001:2659: tathāpi te sampūrṇaṁ karuṇāmayakarmabhiḥ guruṁ na sevante |
T02n2952u_001:2660: kintu sampūrṇo muktaḥ puruṣaḥ arhajjanasya sukhāsvādaṁ prāpya guruṁ karuṇāmayakarmabhi sevate |
T02n2952u_001:2662: tadviṣayakasampūrṇabodhāt sa punaḥ punaḥ punarjanmane ākāṅkṣāṁ dūrīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:2664: tasmāt sa punareva kutrāpi āsaktiṁ na darśayati athavā tatra ghṛṇāmapi na prakāśayati |
T02n2952u_001:2666: ete prabhāvāḥ etāvatkālaṁ tasya citte āsan |
T02n2952u_001:2667: kintu teṣāṁ nāśāt sa sampūrṇaṁ nirvāṇasukhamanubhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2670: yā mānasikadūṣaṇāt naraṁ citaṁ muktaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:2671: tathā ca, 'kṣudratarachoṭikā'viṣayikī ṭīkā vadati - yadā sannyāsī pratyakṣajñānagamyaṁ viṣayaṁ pratyakṣaṁ jānāti tadā sa premamayaṁ manaḥ poṣayati
T02n2952u_001:2672: yadyapīdaṁ gabhirāntardṛṣṭidvārā - nirvāṇopalabdhidvārā prema sṛjati tathāpi sāmānyārthayuktā karuṇā asmin prasaṁge na āyāti - dhammapālena tadīyaṭīkāyāṁ viśuddhimārgaṁ vyākhyāsu viśadārthaṁ prakaṭitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2673: premakaruṇādayaḥ ye mānasikaguṇā indriyavadbhiḥ prāṇibhiḥ saha sambandhaṁ sthāpayanti te viṣayatvena na āyānti yadā dhyāninaḥ manaḥ nirvāṇaṁ labhate |
T02n2952u_001:2674: kramikānuśāsanebhyaḥ uddhṛtasya prāguktasyānucchedasya ālocanāyām sāntardṛṣṭikaruṇāyāḥ rūpakāśritaṁ samīkaraṇaṁ sūcayati yat sadṛśabhāvāpannaḥ vyavahāraḥ kṣudratarachoṭikāṭīkāyāmasti |
T02n2952u_001:2675: yā paravarttinīṁ ṭīkāṁ dhammapālasyābhimatena saha saṁgatisampannāṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:2676: ṭīkāṁ anusṛtya kathyate yat premamayī karuṇā paryāyatraye'vatiṣṭhate |
T02n2952u_001:2681: saṁvādeṣūllikhitāḥ sarve karuṇāsamparkitadṛṣṭāntāḥ niḥsaṁśayaṁ vā sasaṁśayaṁ vā samādheḥ praveśaparyāyasya athavā sthāpanāūlakaparyāyasya ca śaktyā saha virājante |
T02n2952u_001:2682: idaṁ karuṇātmakatāyāḥ ca karuṇāyāḥca prayoge pārthakyaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:2683: dvitīyāṁ mānasiīmavasthāṁ sūcayati yā karuṇāśakti dhārayati - prāthamikaparyāyāt sthāpanāparyāyaṁ yāvat |
T02n2952u_001:2684: kramikānuśāsaneṣu gotamaḥ bhikṣūṇupadiśati yat karuṇayā vā mānasamuktyā vā saha tulanīyaṁ na karmāpi viṣayaṁ sa paśyati |
T02n2952u_001:2688: gotamaḥ bhikṣūn āha - yadi te muktipradhānāṁ karuṇāṁ prati sayatnaṁ manoyogaṁ dadati,
T02n2952u_001:2689: tarhi krodho na jāyate athavā jātaḥ krodho'pi dūraṁ gacchati |
T02n2952u_001:2690: ṭīkāyāmucyate prītiḥ kathaṁ manasaḥ muktiḥ bhavitumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:2692: eṣā eva karuṇā maṅgalakāmanayā indriyavadbhiḥ jīvaiḥ sahaḥ sambandhatvāt |
T02n2952u_001:2693: kiñca, yataḥ sakaruṇaṁ manaḥ pratibandhakādiviruddhaguṇebhyaḥ muktaṁ bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:2694: tataḥ ayaṁ vyāpāraḥ manasaḥ muktiriti kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:2696: kruddhajanasyāpi karuṇāyāṁ sañjātāyāṁ manasaḥ muktiḥ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2698: kiyatā parimāṇena iyameva karuṇā tasyāḥ prāthamikaṁ rūpamapi viṣayopayogi |
T02n2952u_001:2700: 'manaso muktiḥ' iti kathanena sa kevalaṁ karuṇāsthāpanāparyāyaṁ sūcayati |
T02n2952u_001:2702: yadi kaścijjanaḥ vipado'pareṣāmuddhārāya karaṇatvaṁ vrajati tarhi sa teṣāṁ 'muktiḥ' ityucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2704: evañca, yadā karuṇā yathārīti dhyānamagnatāyai kṛṣyate,
T02n2952u_001:2706: yataḥ krodhānmanaso muktaye karuṇāyā viśiṣṭā paṭutāsti,
T02n2952u_001:2717: gabhīraḥ samādhiḥ atyantamānandaḥ ceti anayoḥ miśraṇena mānasikī daśā asvābhāvikī iti dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:2720: tadā etāvanniṣpeṣaṇaṁ tiṣṭhati yat paramasukhaṁ na sambhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2721: prāthamikanimagnatālābhāya vinayanavyāpāre sā śikṣā kriyate yatra praceṣṭāyāḥ śaktiḥ ca samādheḥ sthiratā ca ityanayoḥ madhye samatā sthāpyate
T02n2952u_001:2722: phalataḥ, tīvrasya atha ca udvegamuktasya manasaḥ samādhiḥ sambhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2725: tatprakṛtiviśleṣaṇāya viśuddhimārge buddhaghoṣaḥ ekaṁ sundaraṁ dṛṣṭāntaṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:2726: bhāratīyāḥ śalyavidaḥ jale bhāsamāneṣu padmapatreṣu śalyakriyākaraṇāya śikṣāṁ dadati |
T02n2952u_001:2728: atyutsāhī śikṣārthī tatpatraṁ nimagnaṁ karoti athavā tatpatraṁ sampūrṇaṁ dvidhā kṛntati |
T02n2952u_001:2729: bhītipravaṇastu padmapatre balasya prayogāya samartho na bhūtvā tatpatrakarttanāya vyartho bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2731: sa padmapatraṁ nimagnaṁ na kṛtvāpi tatpatraṁ sampūrṇaṁ karttitumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:2737: ata eva paramasukhena saha muktapremāsvādaḥ durlabhaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2739: samabhāvenaiva dhyānagatavastuṣu manasaḥ ca ānuṣaṁgikamānasikaviṣayāṇāṁ ca sthāpanaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:2740: samādheḥ asmin paryāye idameva eṣāṁ mānasikānāṁ viṣayāṇāmapūrvaṁ vaiśiṣṭyam |
T02n2952u_001:2743: kiñca, āsaktiḥ sarvadā vyākulatayā saha vartate yatra vihvalatāyāḥ prāvaṇyaṁ dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:2745: yata āsaktyāḥ sadāvarttamānā sahacarī vyākulatā sābhiprāyamilanasādhakalakṣyasya upalabdhaye pratibandhakatāṁ sṛjati |
T02n2952u_001:2751: tathāpi, manasaḥ ca mānasaviṣayāṇāṁ a dhyānamagnatāśaktirasti tataḥ,
T02n2952u_001:2752: manasā saha te sarve viṣayāḥ sthāpanābhidhānena viśiṣyante |
T02n2952u_001:2756: manomuktisādhanāya karuṇāyai vā dhyāninā puruṣeṇa avalambanīyāḥ paryāyā visuddhimagge vistareṇālocitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2758: samāsataḥ, poṣaṁ gatāyāḥ karuṇāyāḥ sāmānyīkaraṇārthaṁ tathā niviḍatāpādanārthaṁ paddhatistatra varṇitā |
T02n2952u_001:2762: tataḥ, sa yathā sukhī bhaviṣyatīti kāmayate,
T02n2952u_001:2763: tathā anye'pi kāmayante iti avabudhya sa svabhāvataḥ apareṣāṁ maṅgalaṁ kāmayate |
T02n2952u_001:2764: tataḥ, sa priyadharmaguruṣu anyatamāya karuṇāṁ poṣayitum ārabhate |
T02n2952u_001:2765: idamucyate yat abhyāsakārī tadīyagurudevasya utsāhavardhakaṁ priyaṁ vākyaṁ smṛtvā,
T02n2952u_001:2767: upayuktaśikṣaṇaṁ prāpya ca anāyāsenaiva tasmai karuṇārpaṇāya samartho bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2768: tataḥ abhyāsakārī paryāyakrameṇa priyamitrāya karuṇārpaṇāya ceṣṭate |
T02n2952u_001:2770: tathā ca ceṣṭate nirapekṣajanāya ca śatrumanobhāvāpannajanāya cāpi |
T02n2952u_001:2771: ayamāśayaḥ - sa sarveṣu janeṣu karuṇāyā vistārāya tadīyacittaṁ sampūrṇaṁ namanīyaṁ dakṣaṁ ca sādhayati |
T02n2952u_001:2772: atredaṁ sambhavati yat abhyāsakārī śatrubhāvāpannaṁ janamanusmṛtya ātmani śatrutāṁ poṣaiṣyati,
T02n2952u_001:2774: jātavairasya anyatra sthāpanāya tathā tat sambhāvanāhrāsāya buddhaghoṣaḥ katividhān vimarśān kathayati |
T02n2952u_001:2779: abhyāsakārī yadi vairaṁ poṣayati tarhi sa paryavekṣate yat sa tatkṣaṇāt vidveṣamiśritaṁ mānasikaṁ duḥkhaṁ prāpnoti |
T02n2952u_001:2782: tasmāt, maraṇāt paraṁ duḥkhamaya-punarjanma yathā bhavati tathā ca vyāhatā bhavati ādhyātmikasamṛddhiḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2784: tarhi sa svayaṁ vidveṣamiśritaānasikakaṣṭāt mukto bhaviṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:2785: kiñca, sa bhaviṣyati svalpavairasṛṣṭaye hetūn sṛjati |
T02n2952u_001:2788: api ca, yadyapi kaścid vairī uparyuktaiḥ sarvaiḥ upāyaiḥ abhyāsakāriṇamapakarttuṁ yāti,
T02n2952u_001:2789: tathāpi vairijanaṁ prati pratihiṁsā na karttavyā |
T02n2952u_001:2790: yataḥ kaścit janaḥ aparasya yatparimāṇamapakāramicchati tadapekṣayādhikataraṁ duḥkhaṁ sa prāpnoti,
T02n2952u_001:2793: naitādṛśaḥ ko'pi janaḥ yaḥ kasmiṁsicit samaye kasyāpi na mātā pitā bhaginī bhrātā vā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2795: yasmāt punarjanma asmākaṁ paścāt anirdiṣṭakālaṁ vitatya tiṣṭhati,
T02n2952u_001:2796: tasmāt adya pṛthivyāṁ na ko'pi janaḥ asti yo'smākaṁ niviḍaṁ sambandhaṁ nāgataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2797: asmākaṁ mātṛrūpeṇa yā vyaktiḥ ekadā asmān tasyāḥ aṅke sthāpayitvā,
T02n2952u_001:2800: atha ca tāṁ prati adhunā vayaṁ śatrutāṁ poṣayāmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2801: pitṛrūpeṇāyaṁ janaḥ asmākaṁ pālanāya dīrdhaṁ kālaṁ kaṭhoraṁ śramaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:2802: asmākaṁ bhaginīrūpeṇa vā bhrātṛrūpeṇa vāyaṁ jano vividhaiḥ upāyaiḥ asmākaṁ sahāyatāṁ jagāma |
T02n2952u_001:2803: evam, etādṛśaṁ janaṁ prati vairaṁ na karttavyam,
T02n2952u_001:2804: yataḥ atīte kāle sa janaḥ asmākaṁ kṛte upakāraṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:2805: evaṁvidhābhiścintābhiḥ manaḥsaṁyogāt abhyāsakārī śatrujanaṁ prati karuṇāpoṣaṇakāle jātakrodhasyānyatra sthāpanāya paṭutaraḥ jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:2806: śatrutāyā vināśaṁ kṛtvā tathā kāṁścit mānasikīṁ samatā prāpya abhyāsakārī taṁ prati karuṇāṁ pālayitum agrasaro bhavitumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:2809: nirapekṣajanāya cānubhavati sā karuṇaiva asmai janāya karttavyā abhyāsakāriṇā janena |
T02n2952u_001:2810: evaṁ so'bhyāsakārī eteṣāṁ viṣayamadhikṛtya karuṇāsaṁkrāntāṁ tīvrāmabhijñatāmavaśyameva racayet |
T02n2952u_001:2811: tataśca, sa śatrujanaṁ prati karuṇāṁ nayati |
T02n2952u_001:2812: anena abhyāsena dhyānī puruṣasḥ svabhāvata eva sarvajīvahitecchayā karmāṇi ācarituṁ yatate |
T02n2952u_001:2817: tarhi tena ātmaparabhedabādhaḥ bhagnaḥ jātaḥ iti ucyate |
T02n2952u_001:2821: tena karuṇā gabhīrā ca ekaniṣṭhā ca bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2823: tataḥ abhyāsakārī tathārīti karuṇāyāḥ parisaramāgatānāṁ jīvānāṁ saṁkhyāṁ vardhayati |
T02n2952u_001:2824: tathā ca sa uttarottaraṁ sārvalaukikaṁ paryāyaṁ yāvat karuṇāṁ netuṁ yatate |
T02n2952u_001:2825: sagotrīyavacaneṣu ātmā manibhaddaḥ gotamaṁ prati ślokaṁ vadati - manasvī janaḥ sarvadā bhāgyavān |
T02n2952u_001:2830: gotamaḥ prativadati - manasvī janaḥ sarvadā bhāgyavān |
T02n2952u_001:2834: sa hānihīnatāyāṁ nandati samagraṁ divasaṁ samagrāṁ rajanīṁ ca sa sarveṣu jīveṣu snihyati |
T02n2952u_001:2837: gotamasya ślokā nirdiśanti yat yo jano manasvitāyāḥ anuśīlanaṁ karoti sa vairāt na mukto bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2838: kintu yo janaḥ hānihīnatāyāṁ nandati sarvadā,
T02n2952u_001:2839: sarveṣu jīveṣu ca snihyati sa vairānmukto jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:2842: sa vairāt na mukto bhaviṣyati iti ṭīkā svīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:2844: ṭīkā viśliṣyati yat buddhenoccārite dvitīye padye uddiṣṭo janaḥ arhatpuruṣaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2845: sa prema ca karuṇāṁ ca manasi pālayati |
T02n2952u_001:2848: viśuddhimārgamanusṛtya kathyate yat manasvitā sāvadhānatā vā hitakaro mānasikaḥ viṣayaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2851: yat hitakaramānasikaviṣayāḥ ahitakaramānasikaviṣayaiḥ saha sthātuṁ na śaknuvanti |
T02n2952u_001:2852: yadā manasvitā vā sāvadhānatā vā ityākhyaḥ hitakaro mānasiko viṣayaḥ asthāyibhāvena upasthitastiṣṭhati tadā ko'pi ahitakaro mānasiko viṣayo na tatra sthātum arhati |
T02n2952u_001:2854: tarhi tasya manaḥ varttamāne muhūrtte svabhāvata eva krodhānmuktaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2855: sa hitakaramanoyuktaḥ yadā bhavati tadā sa trayodaśamānasikaguṇaiḥ anvitastiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:2871: tathā hi mānasikaṁ sukhaṁ samavṛttitā ca |
T02n2952u_001:2875: sa bhaviṣyati kāle sadṛśīṁ hitakarīṁ pravaṇatāṁ sṛjati,
T02n2952u_001:2878: manasvitayā śatrutāyāḥ anyatra sthapanaṁ na paryāptam,
T02n2952u_001:2879: manasvī sāvadhānī vā janaḥ śatrutāyā muktaḥ na bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2881: atra hetuḥ - dhyānamagnatāparyāye mānasamuktau satyāṁ sā muktiḥ alpakālaṁ manaḥ krodhamuktaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:2883: yo'bhyāsakārī dhyānamagnatāparyāyaṁ vyāpya dakṣatayā karuṇāṁ poṣayati,
T02n2952u_001:2885: tathā ca, dhyānamagnatayā saha paramasukhaṁ bhuñkte |
T02n2952u_001:2886: api ṭīkākārāḥ gotamoktaślokasya nimnarūpāṁ vyākhyāṁ kurvanti tathā hi - vairibhāvāt yathāyathaṁ mānasamuktisādhanāya karuṇā dhyānamagnatayā poṣayitavyā |
T02n2952u_001:2888: yataḥ, manasvitā anyatra sthāpanena manaḥ kevalaṁ svalpakālaṁ vairāt muktaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:2889: eṣā manasvitā na vairāt santoṣāvahā muktiḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2890: evameva karuṇā avadamanena svalpakāmaṁ mānasamuktiṁ sādhayati |
T02n2952u_001:2891: eṣāpi vairāt santoṣāvahā muktiḥ bhavituṁ nārhati |
T02n2952u_001:2893: ṭīkā vyākhyāti yat prathame śloke uddiṣṭaḥ janaḥ adhunāpi 'ahaṁ manasvī vā sāvadhānī vā' iti cintayā manasvitānuśīlanaṁ karoti (saṁyuttanikāya,
T02n2952u_001:2898: sa nopalabdhiṁ karoti yat kevalamanityā mānasikāḥ śārīrikāśca padārthā vartante |
T02n2952u_001:2899: tatra kasmiṁścidapi padārthe na cirasthāyī ātmā dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:2902: sa āśābhagnaḥ sañjātavairāt na mukto bhavitumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:2906: so'nubhavati yat paramārthataḥ nityaḥ sārabhūtaḥ ca 'aham' nāsti,
T02n2952u_001:2907: yo'haṁ daihikabhūteṣu manasi vā sarvatra dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:2908: saḥ 'ahamasmi' ahamasmi mamansvī' - evaṁvidhayā cintayā na punaḥ baddhaḥ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:2910: arhatpuruṣaḥ vaireṇa saha sarvavidhamānasikadūṣaṇebhyaḥ ātmānaṁ citaṁ moktumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:2912: sa sarvadā prema ca karuṇāṁ ca pālayitumalam |
T02n2952u_001:2914: krakacadṛṣṭāntasaṁvāde gotamaḥ vividhāsu avasthāsu kāruṇikacittalālanena prayojanamupadiśati |
T02n2952u_001:2916: buddhaḥ bhikṣūnāha yat teṣāṁ sambodhanaṁ pañcadhā bhaviṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:2922: gotamaḥ bhikṣūn jñāpayati yat yenopāyenaiva teṣāṁ sambodhanaṁ bhavatu vā na vā,
T02n2952u_001:2924: sa teṣāṁ vinayanaṁ viśliṣyati - asmākaṁ cittāni unmārgagāmīni na bhavantu |
T02n2952u_001:2929: cittagatakaruṇayā vayam āhvāyakena janena saha sambandhasya chedaṁ na kariṣyāmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2931: tena jagatā saha asmākaṁ sambandhaḥ dṛḍhaḥ bhavatu |
T02n2952u_001:2938: yādṛśī karuṇā bhikṣūṇāṁ tiṣṭhatu tāmeva bhiksavaḥ janāya poṣayet |
T02n2952u_001:2952: yadā cittaṁ dhyānamagnatāparyāyaṁ yāvat kṛṣṭaṁ bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:2953: tadā tat cittaṁ jagatparivartanaṁ karotīti kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:2954: idaṁ rūpamayaṁ sūkṣmajagat praviśati yadi dhyānamagnātāyāḥ prathamaparyāya - catuṣṭayaṁ vyāpya kṛṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:2955: athavā idaṁ rūpahīnaṁ sūkṣmataraṁ jagat praviśati yadi ādhikyena kṛṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:2956: anena jagatā saha anvitasya manasaḥ avasthā vistṛtāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2957: yataḥ svalpakālamapi dūṣaṇaparihārāya mahat sāmarthyamasti; api ca,
T02n2952u_001:2964: yaḥ samādhiḥ sādhu kṛṣyate tathā dhyānamagnatāyāḥ prathame paryāye tiṣṭhati,
T02n2952u_001:2969: yataḥ asmin samaye samādhiḥ indriyatṛṣṇādimayajagataḥ sarvavidhasīmāvaddhatābhyaḥ muktaḥ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2970: (ṭīkā, 2.58-89) yā iyam ākhyā dhyānamagnatāparyāyagatasamādhiṁ nirdiśati sā tatraiva paryāye karuṇānvitacittaṁ sūcayati |
T02n2952u_001:2971: evamasmin saṁvāde gotamo bhikṣūnupadiśati yat te dhyānamagnatāparyāyaṁ yāvat karuṇāṁ poṣayeyuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:2972: yadi te dhyānena kiyatā parimāṇena - karuṇākarṣaṇe saphalāḥ bhavanti tarhi teṣāṁ cittāni karuṇayā yujyante,
T02n2952u_001:2974: dhyānaparavarttisamaye te hitakaracittena saha bhārasāmyaṁ sthāpayanti tathā ca mānasikaṁ sukhaṁ vā samavṛttitvaṁ vā anubhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:2976: krakacadṛṣṭānte gotamaḥ kāruṇikacittasya balasya ca sthāyitvasya ca dṛṣṭāntaṁ kathayati |
T02n2952u_001:2977: sa bhikṣūn pṛcchati - ko janaḥ yuṣmāsu khananena vā mūtratyāgena vā pṛthivyā vināśaṁ kartuṁ samarthaḥ bhaviṣyatīti |
T02n2952u_001:2980: tataḥ gotamaḥ pṛthivyāḥ abhedyatā kāruṇikacittasya śaktiḥ ityanayoḥ madhye tulanāṁ pradarśayati |
T02n2952u_001:2981: sa bhikṣūnāha - api ko'pi bhikṣuḥ pañcasu upāyeṣu anyatamamavalambya apareṇa saha ālapet ?
T02n2952u_001:2983: athavā api te karuṇārdrahṛdayena aparajanena saha sambandhaṁ sthāpayet ?
T02n2952u_001:2984: bhikṣubhiḥ nimnoktopāyena vinayanaṁ kartavyaṁ - sarvaiḥ jīvaiḥ saha yat jagat tat sarvameva kāruṇikacittasya lakṣyasthalaṁ vidhāya vayaṁ cittena samagreṇa jagatā saha sambandhaṁ sthāpayitumalam |
T02n2952u_001:2985: jagadivedaṁ cittamakṣobhaṁ vairānmuktaṁ viśālaṁ vistṛtaṁ parimāṇaśūnyaṁ ca |
T02n2952u_001:2987: yathā ko'pi janaḥ khanitreṇa ca pātreṇa ca viśālapṛthivīvināśāya na samarthaḥ bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:2988: tathā pañcavidhāni vacanāni pratikūlatayā karuṇārdracittavantaṁ janaṁ abhibhavituṁ na śaknuvanti |
T02n2952u_001:2990: pṛthivī yathā ākramaṇaṁ nirākaroti gabhīratvāt aparimeyatvāt ca,
T02n2952u_001:2992: tadvat, gotamaḥ bhikṣūnapadiśati yat te karuṇāṁ pālayiṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:2995: ūrṇāmayakhaṇḍena gharṣaṇāt susyūtaḥ viḍalacarmapuṭaḥ karkaśaḥ na bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:2999: sagotrīyavacaneṣu gotama upadiśati yat yasmin gṛhe bahavaḥ strīlokāḥ kintu atyalpāḥ puruṣāstiṣṭhanti,
T02n2952u_001:3001: tadvat, yo bhikṣuḥ karuṇārūpamanomuktiṁ na sādhayati sa niścitamamānuṣībhiḥ śaktibhiḥ upadrutaḥ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3003: anyataśca, yasmin gṛhe bahavo narāḥ kintu atyalpā nāryyaḥ tiṣṭhanti,
T02n2952u_001:3004: tadgṛhaṁ sahasā dasyubhiḥ ākrāntaṁ na bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:3005: tathā yo bhikṣuḥ karuṇārupamanomuktiṁ sādhayati saḥ amānuṣībhiḥ śaktibhiḥ abhibhūtaḥ na bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3007: saṁvādānāṁ pañcamasaṁgrahe 'karuṇāsaṁvāde' gotamaḥ bhikṣūnupadiśati kathaṁ dhyātavyamiti,
T02n2952u_001:3010: - lābhajanakeṣu abhyāseṣu dakṣaḥ janaḥ kiṁ kuryāt yadā sa śāntipūrṇāṁ daśāṁ jānāti ?
T02n2952u_001:3020: jñānī karmaṇi vivicya saṁsāriṇaścānukṛtya sa kadāpi na nīcācaraṇamācaret |
T02n2952u_001:3027: dīrgho'thavā viśālaḥ madhyamo hrasvaḥ sūkṣmo'sūkṣmo vā dṛśyo vā adṛśyo vā,
T02n2952u_001:3028: dūravarttī vā nikaṭavartī vā jīvo yo vā janiṣyate te sarve hṛdayena sukhino bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:3029: ko'pi janaḥ aparaṁ janaṁ na pratārayet |
T02n2952u_001:3030: ko'pi janaḥ kasyāpi samīpe kutrāpi ca sammānāt garvito na bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:3032: krodhād vā vidveṣād vā sarvān jīvān prati asīmaṁ cittaṁ pālayet |
T02n2952u_001:3033: yathā mātā svīyajīvanavyayenāpi ekamātraṁ putraṁ rakṣati |
T02n2952u_001:3034: asīmaṁ premamayaṁ cittaṁ poṣayet bādhaṁ krodhaṁ virodhaṁ vāntareṇa samagraṁ jagat prati upari,
T02n2952u_001:3039: upaveśane śayane vā sa manasvitāmavalambya dṛḍhasaṁkalpo bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:3041: mithyāmataṁ parihāya satyamācaraṇaṁ tathā satyadṛṣṭimavalambya kāmyavastuṣu āsaktiṁ dūrikṛtya sa nūnaṁ na navagarbhaṁ gamiṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:3043: ṭīkāyā mate yadā bhikṣāvaḥ uktasaṁvādagataviṣayamavagatya tasya upadeśān anusaranti tathā karuṇāṁ poṣayanti tadā vighnakāriṇaḥ devāḥ kamapi vighnaṁ na sṛṣṭvā santuṣṭāḥ sukhinaḥ sahayoginaḥ sahāyakāśca bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:3045: evaṁ daivaśaktīnāmabhibhavāya karuṇāyāḥ sāmarthyamasti viśākhānāmadheyasya bhikṣoḥ upākhyānenāsya matasya samarthanaṁ kriyate,
T02n2952u_001:3046: yasya karuṇāśīlanāt amānuṣyaḥ śaktayaḥ tasya sannidhau parasparaṁ śāntipūrṇabhāvena vasanti |
T02n2952u_001:3048: tāḥ śaktayo yadi karuṇānuśīlanakāribhiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ saha sahayogitāṁ na kurvanti,
T02n2952u_001:3050: saṁgotrīyavacaneṣu gotamo vadati - yadi amānuṣyaḥ śaktayaḥ karuṇārūpamanomuktisādhanakāriṇāṁ bhikṣūṇām upadravaṁ kurvanti,
T02n2952u_001:3053: tathāpi, abhyāsakārī bhayādvā dāsyād vā amānuṣībhiḥ śaktibhiḥ sṛṣṭādupadravādrakṣaṇaṁ na kāmayate |
T02n2952u_001:3054: varaṁ bhayāsaktigarvādīn doṣān parityajya manomuktirūpakaruṇāṁ karṣati - udāttabhāvam |
T02n2952u_001:3057: tataḥ tasya cittaṁ sthiraṁ sāmyāpannaṁ tathā paramasukhamayaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3059: tathā ca tat cittaṁ sarvavidhamānasikavipattipratirodhakāri bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3062: tathā hi - sāmānyā nārī sapavatī gotamasya pradhānā śiṣyā āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:3063: karuṇānuśīlanaṁ kurvatī sā karuṇayā svīyahānipratirodhāya samarthā āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:3065: tasyā ānugatye aviśvāsī san tasyāḥ svāmī vāṇena tāṁ antumudyato'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:3066: kintu sasakhī samavatī premṇā karuṇayā ca svāminaṁ mugdhamakarot |
T02n2952u_001:3067: ataḥ sa īpsitaṁ vadhaṁ samāptuṁ na śaśāka |
T02n2952u_001:3070: sā karuṇānuśīlane nipuṇā satyapi avaśeṣe tatkṛtahānikarakāryaphalāt agnidāhena amriyata |
T02n2952u_001:3071: abhyāsakāriṇaḥ karuṇā aparajanamanobhāvaṁ kalyāṇābhimukhaṁ kartuṁ samarthā iti spaṣṭo dṛṣṭāntaḥ saṁvādeṣu yadyapi nāsti,
T02n2952u_001:3072: tathāpi karuṇāyā īdṛśī śaktirasti iti viśuddhimārge kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:3073: samādhaye catvāriṁśadvastuṣu anyatamasya upari yathāyathaṁ dhyātumārabhate abhyāsakārī |
T02n2952u_001:3075: tasmāt prak sa nimnoktopāyena karuṇāṁ pālayedityupadiśyate |
T02n2952u_001:3076: dhyānaviṣayaṁ gṛhītā bhikṣuḥ prathamataḥ upāsanālayasaṁśliṣṭānāṁ bhikṣūṇāṁ sampradāyasya sīmāṁ nirdeśet |
T02n2952u_001:3077: tataḥ sa teṣāṁ kṛte evaṁvidhayā cintayā karuṇāṁ pālayet - 'te sukhino bhavantu,
T02n2952u_001:3079: tataḥ sa grāmasthānāṁ devatānāṁ kṛte karuṇāṁ pālayet |
T02n2952u_001:3080: tataḥ sa netṛsthānīyānāṁ janānāmupuri karuṇāṁ poṣayet ye janāḥ tasmai khādyādiṁ dadati |
T02n2952u_001:3081: tataśca sarveṣāṁ manuṣyāṇāṁ tathā jīvānāṁ kṛte karuṇānuśīlanaṁ kuryāt |
T02n2952u_001:3082: upāsanālayasaṁśliṣṭabhikṣūṇāṁ kṛte pālitayā karuṇayā sa tasya sahacareṣu komalahṛdayatāṁ janayati |
T02n2952u_001:3083: te ca ekatra tena saha sukhena vasanti |
T02n2952u_001:3084: upāsanālayasaṁśliṣṭānāṁ devatānāṁ kṛte pālitayā karuṇayā tā devatāḥ komalahṛdayāḥ satyaḥ yathāyathaṁ rakṣaṇena taṁ sampūrṇaṁ rakṣanti |
T02n2952u_001:3085: netṛsthānīyānāṁ grāmavāsināṁ kṛte pālitayā karuṇayā te komalahṛdayāḥ santaḥ yathāyathaṁ sayatnaṁ tasmai āvaśyakadravyadānena sevante |
T02n2952u_001:3086: mānavatāṁ kṛte pālitayā karuṇayā te mānavāḥ svacchahṛdayā bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:3087: tataḥ, sa yadā parivrajati tadā te na avajñāṁ pradarśayiṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:3088: sarveṣu jīveṣu karuṇāyāṁ pālitāyāṁ bhikṣuḥ sarvatra nirbādhaṁ gantuṁ samartho bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:3095: dhyānaviṣayatvena aparaviṣayasya grahaṇāt prāk anayā rītyā abhyāsakārī karuṇāṁ khalu pālayiṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:3098: premakaruṇānirbharaṁ dhyānaṁ bhūmirvā mṛttikā vā yatra samādhikarṣaṇaṁ vā antardṛṣṭikarṣaṇaṁ vā kriyate |
T02n2952u_001:3099: samyag jñānalābhāt paramapi evaṁvidhaṁ karṣaṇam avyāhataṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3101: viśuddhimārgāt uparyuktyanucchedaḥ saṁvādeṣu vā ṭīkāsu vā kevalaṁ dṛṣṭāntaḥ yatra spaṣṭam ucyate yat karuṇāyāḥ dhyānātmakamanuśīlanaṁ sapadi sukhena aparajanamanobhāvaṁ prabhāvitaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:3102: iyaṁ śikṣā dhyānamagnatāyāṁ kṛṣṭāṁ karuṇāṁ prati asāmānyāṁ mātrāṁ prakāśayati |
T02n2952u_001:3110: kramikavacaneṣu gotamo vyākhyāti yat kaścid bhikṣuḥ sarpeṇa dāruṇaṁ daṣṭo'bhavat,
T02n2952u_001:3111: yataḥ sa karuṇārdracittena sarpāṇāṁ kulacatuṣṭhayena saha sambandhaṁ na sthāpayāmāsa |
T02n2952u_001:3113: 72-73) gotama āha - bhikṣuṇā karuṇārdracittena sarpāṇāṁ kulacatuṣṭayena saha samparke sthāpite sati sa na daṣṭo'bhaviṣyat |
T02n2952u_001:3114: evaṁ sarpadaṁśanāt ātmanāṁ rakṣaṇāya abhyāsakāriṇaḥ sarpāṇāṁ kulacatuṣṭayena saha karuṇāmayacittena samparkaṁ sthāpayet evameva cintayitvā - karuṇā me'sti virupakkānāṁ kṛte karuṇā me ca erāpatānāṁ kṛte karuṇā me'sti chavyaputtānāṁ tathā kaṇhāgotamakānāṁ kṛte |
T02n2952u_001:3124: sare prāṇavantaḥ jīvāḥ sare ekatra pavitrāṇi dṛśyāni paśyantu |
T02n2952u_001:3131: ūrṇanābhāḥ kṛkalāsā mūṣikāśca sarve parimeyā ea |
T02n2952u_001:3138: yadā gotama āha buddhādayaḥ aparimeyāḥ iti,
T02n2952u_001:3145: gotamo bhikṣūṇ pradarśayati yat karuṇāpālanaṁ dharmīyasatyavyākhyānaṁ ceti hitakarakarmadvayena te ātmānaḥ rakṣituṁ śaknuvanti |
T02n2952u_001:3146: hānihīnatāṁ ca parihṛtya hānikarajīvebhyo dūraṁ gatvā tiṣṭhanti |
T02n2952u_001:3147: kiñca, sagotrīyavacaneṣu gotamo bhikṣūn upadiśati yat te karuṇayātmanaḥ rakṣituṁ śaknuvanti |
T02n2952u_001:3148: atra mallavīrasya ca tasya śikṣārthinaḥ ca dṛṣṭānto'sti |
T02n2952u_001:3150: mallavīra āha ahaṁ tvāṁ lakṣyayāmi, tvaṁ ca mām |
T02n2952u_001:3153: anyataśca, śikṣārthī āha - ahamātmānaṁ lakṣayāmi bhavānapi ātmānaṁ lakṣayatu iti |
T02n2952u_001:3154: gotamo vyākhyāti yat kartā śikṣārthinaḥ paddhatiṁ saphalamanusaret |
T02n2952u_001:3155: tathā ca upasaṁharati yat sa kartā manasvitāsthāpanena sadṛśīṁ rītimanukuryāt |
T02n2952u_001:3157: bhikṣavaḥ sveṣāṁ manasvitāyāḥ unnataye parasparasahayogitāṁ kuryuḥ, yā,
T02n2952u_001:3160: bhikṣavaḥ teṣāṁ praśāntaiḥ manoyogaiḥ ca vyahavāraiḥ dharmīyajīvanasamparkitapuraskārāṇāmudāharaṇāni pradarśayiṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:3163: ya ātmānaṁ rakṣati sa parānapi rakṣati |
T02n2952u_001:3164: yo vā parān rakṣati sa ātmānamapi rakṣati |
T02n2952u_001:3175: yadi abhyāsakārī ātmānamadhikṛtya athavā parānadhikṛtya svīyacittasya yatnaṁ gṛṇhāti,
T02n2952u_001:3180: yo bhikṣuḥ pārthivaviṣayagatamānandaṁ parihāya pradhānadhyānavastu aharniśaṁ pālayati karṣati ca so'rhatpuruṣasya daśāṁ labhate |
T02n2952u_001:3185: evaṁ 'ya ātmānaṁ rakṣati sa parānapi rakṣatīti |
T02n2952u_001:3189: 'sasnehayatnāvasthayā' ityāsyārthaḥ prāthamikaparyāyagatasahānubhūtānandena saha snehānvitasevayā sahānubhūtasukhena ceti |
T02n2952u_001:3190: yaḥ parān rakṣati sa ātmānamapi rakṣati |
T02n2952u_001:3195: tathā karaṇena sāpekṣavastuvaiśiṣṭyaṁ jñātvā arhatpurusasyāvasthāṁ labhate |
T02n2952u_001:3196: evaṁ 'yaḥ parān rakṣati sa ātmānamapi rakṣatīti' |
T02n2952u_001:3201: tasmin samaye hitakarahṛdayavān janaḥ bhaviṣyati kāle arhatpuruṣatvārjanāya kāraṇāni sṛjati |
T02n2952u_001:3202: asya viśvastasya hitakarasya ca cittasya kārānāt sa janaḥ kartṛrūpaḥ maraṇāt paraṁ nyūnatamataḥ svarge janiṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:3203: evaṁ yo'bhyāsakārī svīyānuśīlanena ātmānaṁ rakṣati so'rhatpuruṣaḥ san parānapi rakṣati |
T02n2952u_001:3206: sahānubhūtānandaḥ ca - iti udāttabhāvatrayānuśīlanena abhyāsakārī aparān hitāvahaṁ ca pratyakṣaṁ ca prabhāvitān karoti,
T02n2952u_001:3208: varaṁ, yo jana etān bhāvān karṣati,
T02n2952u_001:3210: niṣṭhuratvāt paradoṣādoṣāt ca rakṣati iti viṣayeṣu saṁvādā gurutvamāropayanti |
T02n2952u_001:3211: prāgukte saṁvāde gotamaḥ varṇayati yat abhyāsakārī aparān prati tasya manobhāvamadhikṛtya dhīrataya,
T02n2952u_001:3215: karuṇā, prema sahānubhūtānandaḥ iti udāttabhāvatrayabodhāya antimabhāvatrayaṁ vyākhyāyate |
T02n2952u_001:3216: ayamāśayaḥ - dhyānamagnatāparyāye sārvalaukikapremāditvena te bhāvā gamyante |
T02n2952u_001:3221: ete udāttā bhāvāḥ krodhādyanaitikavācakabhāvāt abhyāsakāriṇaṁ rakṣanti |
T02n2952u_001:3223: yathā antardṛṣṭyā abhyāsakārī sarvavidhamānasikadūṣaṇaṁ ciraṁ parityaktumagrasaro bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3224: sa tathākaraṇena sarvavidhānuṣaṅgikaduḥkhaiḥ saha punarjanamana ātmānaṁ muñcati |
T02n2952u_001:3226: evaṁ parān prati svīyabhāvamavalambya so'bhyāsakārī svīyacittaṁ rakṣati,
T02n2952u_001:3228: ayaṁ saṁvādaḥ abhyāsakāriṇāṁ dṛṣṭāntamūlakakarmasu tathā dharmīyasamṛddhisamparkitatātparye'dhikaṁ gurutvamāropayati |
T02n2952u_001:3229: yadyapi atra sāmājikakarmopadeśānāṁ spaṣṭa ullekho nāsti,
T02n2952u_001:3230: tathāpīdaṁ gamyate yat sahānubhūtisamparkitopadeśānāṁ vistṛte pariprekṣite pareṣāṁ kṛte'bhyāsakāriṇāṁ hṛdayānubhūta udvego mukhyataḥ śikṣayā karmaniṣṭhaṁ prakāśitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3231: sāmājikodvegasya ca tadānuṣaṅgikakarmaṇo madhye'nivāryaḥ sambandho'sti - iti vayamanubhavāmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3236: viśeṣeṇa sahānubhūtimūlakopadeśeṣu sāmājikodvegena saha sāmājikakarmaṇaḥ samparkaṁ paśyati |
T02n2952u_001:3237: sa vyaktigatakṣetre tathā sahāyakabhrātrīyakarmaṇi - yatra aparaiḥ saha abhyāsakāriṇo yogo'sti,
T02n2952u_001:3239: sa premakaruṇāsamparkitadhyānātmakopadeśaiḥ saha paravartiparārthamūlakakarmaṇāṁ sambandhaṁ sthāpayituṁ prayojanaṁ nānvabhavat |
T02n2952u_001:3241: kintu atredaṁ gamyate it īdṛśadhyānānusaraṇāya īdṛśaparārthaparakarmaṇāṁ svābhāvikī pravaṇatā tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3243: ye guṇāḥ 'sahānubhūtiḥ saralākaruṇāḥ premamayakarmāṇi' - iti eṣāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ prasaṁge prāyeṇa nālocitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3247: kramikavacaneṣu gotama upadiśati yat aṣṭau lābhāḥ santi |
T02n2952u_001:3262: tasyopalabdhiryadi mahattarā na bhavati tarhi 'sa brāhmajagat ārohati |
T02n2952u_001:3264: ṭīkayā viśleṣaṇamevam - sa bhayaṅkarān svapnān na paśyati |
T02n2952u_001:3266: tathāpi te svapnāḥ kevalaṁ śubhāḥ svapnā eva |
T02n2952u_001:3275: sarpaiḥ tāḍitā athavā vivaramadhye patitā iva |
T02n2952u_001:3278: kaścit gauḥ daṇḍāyamānaḥ san vatsāya dugdhaṁ dadāti sma |
T02n2952u_001:3279: kaścit vyādhaḥ hastena kuntaṁ dhṛtvā acintayat,
T02n2952u_001:3281: tena kunte nikṣipte sati sa kuntaḥ goḥ śarīram āhatya punareva tālapatramiva pratyāgataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3283: na vā sthāpanaparyāyagatā karuṇā; api tu,
T02n2952u_001:3288: kintu ete lābhāḥ svabhāvataḥ sarvāsu avasthāsu ghaṭante iti kadāpi na saṁvādeṣu vā ṭīkāsu vā uktam |
T02n2952u_001:3289: gotamo'pi karuṇāyāḥ sahānubhūteśca mahatīṁ śaktiṁ dhṛtvāpi śatruśūnyo nāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:3290: īrṣyāparāyaṇo bhrātā devadatta eva tasya pramāṇam |
T02n2952u_001:3291: vividhāsu daśāsu manaso śaktiḥ ca parārthaṁ tacchakteḥ kāryakāritā cetyanayoḥ madhye samānupātaḥ lakṣaṇīyaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3292: sahānubhūtiḥ manasaḥ kayācit śaktyā saha viśeṣeṇa nānvitā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3296: eṣu sarveṣu kṣetreṣu sahānubhūtiḥ paricālikā śaktirityabhidhīyate |
T02n2952u_001:3299: yadyapi karuṇārūpā manomuktiḥ parebhyaḥ kīdṛśaṁ hitaṁ sādhayati sa viṣayo nālocitaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:3300: tathāpi idaṁ niḥsaṁśayaṁ gamyate yat karuṇākarṣaṇaṁ kasyāpi sahānubhūtiṁ niviḍāṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:3304: taddoṣapratikārā yadā ekatra niḥsaṁśayaṁ prakāśyante tadā teṣu madhye pratyakṣayogo dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:3307: tāṛśaḥ sahānubhavaḥ vartamānena vā bhāvinā puraskārena na kadāpi samarthyate |
T02n2952u_001:3311: tathāpi, karuṇārūpamanomuktisañjālalābhāstathā taddoṣapratikārā atīva vicitrāḥ pracurāḥ ca,
T02n2952u_001:3312: yata uccaparyāyagatamanaḥsañjātāsāmānyalābhāya eva ātyantiko manoyogo dīyate |
T02n2952u_001:3313: idaṁ niḥsaṁśayamucyate yat etādṛśaṁ manobalamapi svalpasamāhitabhāvasañjātalābhān janayati |
T02n2952u_001:3314: uparyukte saṁvāde karuṇājātalābhān ālocya gotamaḥ karuṇāvikāśaṁ praśasyāha aparimeyakaruṇākarṣaṇaśīlasya manasvino purusya nigaḍāḥ kṣayaṁ gacchanti
T02n2952u_001:3315: sa saṁsāracakrasya bhittimūlaṁ nāśaṁ yātīti paśyati |
T02n2952u_001:3316: yo janaḥ kevalaṁ prāṇiviśeṣāya karuṇāṁ poṣayati sa tathākanraṇena hitasampādako jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:3317: yo mahān puruṣaḥ sarveṣāṁ prāṇināṁ kṛte sahānubhūtiśīlo bhavati sa pracuraṁ puṇyaṁ saṁgṛhṇāti |
T02n2952u_001:3324: kaścijjanaḥ karuṇāmayacittasya samyakpoṣaṇena yat puṇyamarjayati tasya puṇye yaḥ ṣoḍaśo bhāgastasyāpi ekaṣoḍaśabhāgaṁ puṇyaṁ te na saccinvanti
T02n2952u_001:3326: yo na hanti, na vā ghātayati aparaiḥ,
T02n2952u_001:3329: sarveṣāṁ bhūtānāṁ kṛte yasyāsti karuṇā sa kamapi janaṁ prati vairaṁ na poṣati |
T02n2952u_001:3332: sa saṁsāracakrasya bhittimūlaṁ nāśaṁ yātīti pasyati |
T02n2952u_001:3333: ayamāśayaḥ - yo jano'rhatpuruṣasyāvasthāṁ gataḥ sa daśa nigaḍān parityajati |
T02n2952u_001:3336: asyā asti karuṇā yā ayavahitahetutvaṁ vajati |
T02n2952u_001:3338: asyārthaḥ - vidveṣaḥ tathā a vidveṣasamparkitanigaḍā vināśaṁ yānti |
T02n2952u_001:3340: yataḥ sa karuṇayānvitaḥ san dūṣāṇasvarūpasaṁsāracakrabhittimūlasya tathākathitaṁ nāśaṁpaśyati |
T02n2952u_001:3343: te nigaḍāḥ saṁsāracakreṇa saha janaṁ badhnanti |
T02n2952u_001:3356: vividhāsu ṭīkāsu ālocitānāṁ dūṣaṇānāṁ parityāgāya spaṣṭopāyadvayamullikhati ṭīkā |
T02n2952u_001:3357: tathā hi - antardṛṣṭidvārā dūṣaṇānām unmūlanena sthāyiparityāgasyopāyaḥ (samucchedappahāna)
T02n2952u_001:3359: prathamaṁ bhāṣyamarhatpuruṣaṁ nirdiśati avyavahitakāraṇatvena aparimeyakaruṇayā saha antardṛṣṭiṁ pālayati |
T02n2952u_001:3361: sa karuṇāyā upari dhyānena dhyānamagnatāparyāyaṁ yāvat samādhiṁ pālayitvā sthāsyati |
T02n2952u_001:3362: tataśca dhyānamagnadaśyāyā utthāya sa cittasya ca śarīrasya ca viśiṣṭān tathā sāmānyān guṇān praveṣṭuṁ guṇān praveṣṭuṁ tadīyaṁ sutīkṣṇaṁ cittaṁ niyojayati |
T02n2952u_001:3363: pariṇāme cittasya ca śarīrasya ca pratyekaṁ viṣayamasthāyinaṁ parivartanaśīlaṁ tathā anirbharayogyaṁ paryavekṣya tasya cittaṁ svabhāvataḥ tasya nirvāṇasyānusandhānaṁ karoti yat sarvavidhaṁ pārthivaṁ parivarttanaṁ tathā asthāyitvamatikramya vartate |
T02n2952u_001:3364: parivartanaśīlaṁ jagat tathā parivartanahīnaṁ nirvāṇamadhikṛtya gabhīrāyāmantardṛṣṭau sañjātāyāmindriyākāṅkṣādimānasikanigaḍaiḥ bandhanasya prāvaṇyaṁ dūrībhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3365: yāḥ sarvāḥ pratikriyāḥ ciraṁ parityaktavyāḥ tāsāṁ na samarthanaṁ karotyayaṁ navāviṣkṛtaḥ bodhaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3366: dvitīyā vyākhyā saṁvāde ullikhitaṁ kamapi janaṁ viśliṣyati yasya kevalamaparimeyaṁ premāsti |
T02n2952u_001:3367: īdṛśo janaḥ sampūrṇaṁ kintu alpakālaṁ vidveṣamūlakasarvaviṣayebhyo muktastiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3373: ' tadā sa samāhitapremṇā dūṣaṇānāmasthāyi avadamanaṁ nirdiśati |
T02n2952u_001:3374: abhyāsakāriṇo dūṣaṇāni dhyānamagnadaśāyāḥ paramapi dṛṣṭigocaratāṁ gantumarhanti |
T02n2952u_001:3375: tathāpi premadhyānakāle dhyānamagnapuruṣaḥ tadīyadūṣaṇānāṁ samīkṛtāvadamanena saha tṛptikaraṁ paramaṁ sukhamanubhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3376: aparimeyapremapoṣaṇāt so'ntardṛṣṭimaktaye bhittimūlatvena īdṛśamānasikāvasthādvārā athavā īdṛśamānasikāvasthāsañjātaparamasukhabhogadvārā upakṛto bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3377: kramikavacaneṣu ekādaśalābhaviṣayake'dhyāye gotamaḥ ekādaśasaṁkhyakānāṁ lābhānāmekāṁ sūcīṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:3378: yo janaḥ premarūpamanomuktiṁ sādhayati sa janaḥ tān lābhānarjayati |
T02n2952u_001:3379: prāguktāṣṭalābhaiḥ saha saṁyojanametat - 'sa śīghraṁ tasyaṁ cittaṁ samāhitaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:3383: niḥsandehena etat sarvalābhakāraṇāt gotamaḥ punarapi upadiśati yat cāndrāyaṇavrateṣu (uposatha)
T02n2952u_001:3384: mahatāmācāryāṇāṁ śiṣyāḥ sareṣāṁ bhūtānāṁ kṛte premakaruṇānvitāparimeyahṛdayavikāśāya abhyastā āsan |
T02n2952u_001:3388: tasmāt jīvaddaśāyāṁ prāguktabhāvānāṁ karṣaṇameva brahmasāyujyārjaāya rītiviśeṣaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3390: kaścit bhikṣuḥ karuṇāsahānubhūtānandasamavṛttitānvitacittena satatamekasyāṁ diśi sattāvadbhiḥ bhūtaiḥ saha sambandhitaḥ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3391: tathā ca, dvitīyasyāṁ tṛtīyasyāṁ caturthyāṁ ca diśi,
T02n2952u_001:3394: sa sarvatra viśvabhūtaiḥ saha sambandhaṁ sthāpayati samabhāvena - premamayacetasā,
T02n2952u_001:3398: vāseṭṭha, ekaḥ śaktiśāliśaṅkhavādakaḥ svalpaceṣṭayā catasṛṣu dikṣu pratidhvani sraṣṭuṁ śaknoti sma |
T02n2952u_001:3399: tatra parimeyaṁ karma na parimeyaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3403: punaśca, eko bhikṣuḥ ekasyāṁ diśi (yathā uttarasyām)
T02n2952u_001:3404: sattāvadbhiḥ bhūtaiḥ saha satataṁ samparkaṁ sthāpayati premamayacetasā |
T02n2952u_001:3405: tadvat, dvitīyasyāṁ tṛtīyasyāṁ caturthyāṁ ca diśi,
T02n2952u_001:3409: sa samabhāena sarvatraviśvabhūtaiḥ saha sambandhitastiṣṭhati - premamayacetasā - yatra cetaḥ nirākulaṁ,
T02n2952u_001:3413: vāseṭṭha, ekaḥ śaktiśālī śaṅkhavādakaḥ kevalaṁ svalpaceṣṭayā catasṛṣu dikṣu pratidhvani sraṣṭuṁ śaknoti sma |
T02n2952u_001:3414: tatra parimeyaṁ karma na parimeyaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3417: yadā prāguktopadeśānusārataḥ premādayaḥ kṛṣyante tadā te eva udāttā bhāvā ucyante |
T02n2952u_001:3419: saṁvādeṣu ādyasaṁkalanacatuṣṭāye karuṇāpremasahānubhūtānandasamavṛttitānāṁ lakṣaṇāni na kṛtāni |
T02n2952u_001:3420: tathāpi, ṭīkābhiḥ viśuddhimārgeṇa ca teṣāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ lakṣaṇāni tathā vyākhyānāni kṛtāni |
T02n2952u_001:3421: pratyekodāttabhāvasya spaṣṭavaiśiṣṭyāstīti kāraṇāt ekasmin bhāve upasthite apareṣāṁ bhāvānāmanupasthitirgamyate |
T02n2952u_001:3426: karuṇāyāḥ dhyānātmakaṁ karṣaṇaṁ hiṁsāpratirodhāya viśeṣeṇa phalapradam |
T02n2952u_001:3432: sahānubhūtānandasya dhyānātmakaṁ karṣaṇaṁ hi asantoṣapratirodhāya viśeṣataḥ phalapradam |
T02n2952u_001:3438: samavṛttitāyāḥ dhyānātmakaṁ karṣaṇaṁ nāma rāgapratirodhāya viśeṣataḥ phalapradam |
T02n2952u_001:3443: yā sacetanamanasaḥ vividhāsu daśāsu sahacaro jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:3445: eteṣāṁ caturṇāṁ bhāvānāṁ karma khalu janapreṣaṇamūlakam |
T02n2952u_001:3446: paramaṁ jyotiḥ sāraṁ dadāti - 'sarve jīvā etebhyo duḥkhādibhyo muktā bhavantu' evaṁvidhayā cintayā paraduḥkhakaṣṭadūrīkaraṇāya ākāṅkṣādaśā hi karuṇā |
T02n2952u_001:3447: 'sarve jīvāḥ sukhino bhavantu' evaṁvidhayā cintayā sukhahitasādhanāya ākāṅkṣādaśā hi prema |
T02n2952u_001:3450: idamatīva sādhu' - iti cintayā satataṁ parasukhahitasādhanecchādaśā eva sahānubhūtānandaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3451: 'atītakarmaphalakāraṇādeva janasya sukhāni ca duḥkhāni ca bhavanti' iti cintayā parasukhaduḥkhaviṣayikī abhijñatā eva samavṛttitā |
T02n2952u_001:3452: caritracitraṇeṣu ca sārasaṁgraheṣu ca virodhābhāso dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:3453: tathā hi - prema paramaṅgalasādhanāya bhaktitvena lakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:3456: tathāpi, 'sarve sukhino bhavantu' itīcchāyāṁ premṇaḥ sārarūpaṁ vartate - yatra karmapratiśrutibhāvanayā prayojanaṁ nyūnameva dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:3458: yathā - saṁvādeṣu ullikhitāḥ premakaruṇāviṣayakopadeśāḥ kevalaṁ dhyānayogena eteṣāṁ bhāvānāmanuśīlanaṁ nirdiśanti |
T02n2952u_001:3459: ata eva, upadeśāḥ kevalaṁ 'sarve sukhino bhavantu' 'sarve duḥkhānmuktā bhavantu' evaṁvidhecchānuśīlanamāvahati |
T02n2952u_001:3460: premakaruṇādhyānaṁ ca pareṣāṁ kṛte ānuṣaṅgikaṁ karma cāntarā ko'pi sambandhaḥ gotamena kadāpi noccāritaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3461: tathāpi idaṁ gamyate yat eteṣāṁ bhāvānāṁ karṣaṇena dhyānino janasya bhrātrīyakarmaṇāṁ prakṛtau tathā paridhau parivarttanaṁ sūcyate |
T02n2952u_001:3463: so'vaśyameva janahitasādhanāya gabhīraṁ vicalito bhaviṣyatītyatra na ko'pi vyaktikramaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3464: premamayakarmaṇāṁ ca saralāyāḥ karuṇāśca sahānubhūteścopari ye upadeśāḥ santi,
T02n2952u_001:3468: eṣu upadeśeṣu gotamaḥ sāmājikakarmapreṣaṇāmupadiśati iti gamyate |
T02n2952u_001:3469: tatra premakaruṇāsaṁvādeṣu dharmīyajīvanasya adhikacintāmūlakabhāvasya gurutvaṁ na laghu āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:3470: tathāpi gautamena tannollikhitam - yadi duḥkhaṁ jāyate tarhi karuṇā mithyā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3474: 'sarve duḥkhānmuktā bhavantu' kevalamevaṁvidhā icchā karuṇāyā tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3475: paraduḥkhenābhibhūtāḥ santaḥ vayaṁ parān sāhāyyaṁ na kurmmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3476: ekataḥ hṛdayahīnatā anyataśca paraduḥkhena vihvalatā anayormadhye duḥkhamantareṇa yatnasya vikalpo vartate |
T02n2952u_001:3477: karuṇākarṣaṇakāle jātaduḥkhadūrīkaraṇāya abhyāsakārī satataṁ sacetanaḥ syāt |
T02n2952u_001:3478: sa prathamataḥ atiduḥkhārtajanamadhikṛtya icchati 'sa duḥkhamukto bhavatu' iti |
T02n2952u_001:3481: yadi śatrujanaviṣayamadhikṛtya praśno jāyate tarhi prāyuktaṁ pratiṣedhakaṁ prayujyate |
T02n2952u_001:3482: karuṇā yathā udāttabhāvarūpā bhavati tathā karaṇāya abhyāsakārī karuṇāṁ samīkuryāt,
T02n2952u_001:3484: idamullekhārhaṁ tat pālisaṁvādeṣu ṭīkāsu ca premaśabdo yamarthaṁ sūcayati,
T02n2952u_001:3487: kasmiṁścit gurutvapūrṇe saṁvāde gotamaḥ yathāyathaṁ dāmpatyasamparkaṁ vyākhyāti yat svāmī tadīyāṁ striyaṁ seveta,
T02n2952u_001:3488: strī api tataḥ paraṁ taṁ prati sahānubhūtiśīlā bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:3489: udāttabhāvarūpapremakarṣaṇāya viparītaṁ liṅgaṁ prati premṇaḥ prakāśo na karttavya ityupadeśaḥ navadīkṣitebhyo dīyate,
T02n2952u_001:3490: yataḥ tathā kṛte prema sukhena tṛṣṇātvena pariṇataṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3492: abhyāsakārī sarvadā āsaktiparihārāya avahitaḥ syāt anyathā premavikāśo yathāyathaṁ na bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3495: dhyātā prathamataḥ ātmānaṁ prati kramaśaḥ premakarṣaṇena premaparidhiṁ vistṛtaṁ karoti,
T02n2952u_001:3498: nirapekṣajanaṁ prati pariśeṣe ca śatrujanaṁ prati |
T02n2952u_001:3502: tatra sārvalaukikaṁ prema ātmaparabhedaṁ na karoti |
T02n2952u_001:3506: ko'pi vā yadā parasāphalyena ātmavismṛto bhavati tadā sahābubhūtānando bhithyā jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:3512: sahānubhūtānandakarṣaṇāya priyamitrasya gatamāgatamanāgataṁ vā sāphalyamadhikṛtya ānandakarṣaṇamārabhate |
T02n2952u_001:3514: tataḥ sa yathākramaṁ nirapekṣajanasya ca śatrujanasya ca sāphalyamadhikṛtya sahānubhūtānandaṁ karṣati |
T02n2952u_001:3515: evaṁ premakaruṇākṣetre yat kriyate tadapi ānuṣaṅgikaparyāyeṣu sa karoti |
T02n2952u_001:3517: kevalaṁ dhyānamagnatāyāḥ caturthe paryāye samavṛttitāyāḥ karṣaṇaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3520: yataḥ te ādyodāttabhāvatraye kiñcinmandaṁ phalaṁ paśyanti |
T02n2952u_001:3521: teṣu udātteṣu bhāveṣu pratyekabhāvaḥ dhyānamagnatāyā ādyeṣu triṣu paryāyeṣu anyatame paryāye kṛṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:3523: 'sarve janāḥ sukhino bhavantu' evaṁvidhecchāpoṣaṇena sacetanajīvakṛtāmodeṣu udvegastiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3527: kiñca, ādyodāttabhāvatraye anumodanasya vā vidveṣasya vā vyāpārastiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3529: premṇaḥ rakṣāvaśyameva karaṇīyā anyathā prema āsaktyā vipariṇamyate |
T02n2952u_001:3530: karuṇāpi yathāyathaṁ rakṣitavyā anyathā karuṇā pareṣāmavasthāsu vidveṣeṇa vā duḥkhabhāvena vā vipariṇamyate |
T02n2952u_001:3532: samavṛttitayā saha tulanāyāṁ kṛtāyāṁ mandaphalatvena uktavipattayo dṛśante,
T02n2952u_001:3533: tathāpi samavṛttitāyāḥ evaṁvidhena upāyena rakṣayā prayojanaṁ nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:3537: te sarve punaśca duḥkhena api yuktāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3539: dhyānamagnatāyāścaturthe paryāye samavṛttitārūpodāttabhāvena saha yaḥ samavṛttitānubhavastena saha tulanāyāṁ kṛtāyāṁ dhyānamagnatāyāḥ ādyaparyāyatrayasañjātaṁ paramaṁ sukhaṁ sthūlameva dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:3540: samavṛttitā mithyā bhavati yadi tatra kevalaṁ jñānahīnatā vartete |
T02n2952u_001:3542: samavṛttitāyāṁ yathāyathaṁ kṛṣṭāyāṁ satyāṁ iyamupalabdhirjāyate yat anye janāsteṣāṁ karmaṇāṁ kartāraḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3543: evañca, teṣāmuttarakālīnā avasthā varttamānakarmaṇāṁ nītigatāṁ dṛṣṭibhaṅgīṁ prativimbiyiṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:3545: yadā dharmaḥ suphalāya kalpateḥ tathaiva adharmaḥ viparītaphalāya sampadyate |
T02n2952u_001:3547: apare janāḥ pariṇāme sveṣāṁ bhāgyāya bhāraṁ niścitameva grahīṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:3548: evaṁ ca abhyāsakārī tasya bhāgyāya bhāraṁ grahīṣyati,
T02n2952u_001:3549: etadviṣayamadhikṛtyāvahitaḥ san dhyātā puruṣaḥ amaṅgalajanakamano- bhāvāt tathā paravyavahāragatavidveṣāt tadīyaṁ manaḥ muktaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:3550: tathā ca, sa dhyānamagnatāyāḥ caturthe paryāye hitakāriṇīṁ paksapātahīnatāṁ poṣayati |
T02n2952u_001:3551: samavṛttitārūpodāttabhāvakarṣaṇāt prāgeva abhyāsakārī dhyānamagnatāyāḥ tṛtīyaṁ paryāyaṁ yāvat aparodāttabhāvānāmekatamaṁ poṣayet |
T02n2952u_001:3553: sa samāhitadaśāyā utthāya svābhāvikanirapekṣajanaṁ ca mitraṁ ca śatruṁ ca adhikṛtya samavṛttitāṁ pālayati |
T02n2952u_001:3555: yadā so'nena bhāvena dhyānamagnatāyai sāgrahaṁ ceṣṭaye tadā avaśyameva caturthaṁ paryāyaṁ gacchati |
T02n2952u_001:3558: tāṁ prakṛtimavabudhya vayaṁ śaṅkhavādakasya prāguktāmupamāṁ pratigantuṁ śaknumaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3561: evañca kaścit durbalaḥ śaṅkhavādakaḥ śaṅkhavādanakāle catasṛṣu dikṣu pratidhvani sraṣṭuṁ samartho na bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3563: anyataśca, śaktiśālī śaṅkhavādakaḥ sarvatra dhvani vitanituṁ śaknoti kṛṣṭamanomuktidvārā (asmin prasaṁge yā karuṇā) |
T02n2952u_001:3565: tadā praveśaparyāyagatā karuṇā athavā sthāpanāparyāyagatā karuṇā viṣayopayoginī bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3567: tadā kevalaṁ sthāpanaparyāyagatā karuṇā viṣayopayoginī bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3568: yat karma ākāṅkṣāviṣaye vartate tat parimitaṁ karmetyucyate |
T02n2952u_001:3569: yat karma rūpayuktaviṣayakaṁ rūpahīnaviṣayakaṁ ca bhavati tat karma aparimeyaṁ karmetyucyate |
T02n2952u_001:3570: parimeyakarmātikramaṇatvāt idaṁ karma aparimeyaṁ karmetyucyate viśeṣeṇa sāmānyena ca catasṛṣu dikṣu sambandhavitānatvāt idaṁ karma aparimeyaṁ karmetyucyate |
T02n2952u_001:3573: ākāṅkṣāviṣayakamadaḥ karma rūpamaye vā rūpahīne vā karmaṇi ciraṁ na tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3576: ākāṅkṣāviṣayakakarma rūpamaye vā rūpahīne vā karmaṇi āśrayaṁ na paśyati |
T02n2952u_001:3578: kevalaṁ rūpamayaṁ vā rūpahīnameva vā karma ākāṅkṣāviṣayakakarma vyāpnoti cātiśete ca |
T02n2952u_001:3581: mahāsamudraḥ kṣudraṁ jalāśayaṁ parābhūya ātmanaḥ avasaraṁ prāpya pratiṣṭhito bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3582: idaṁ rūpamidaṁ vā rūpahīnaṁ karma ākāṅkṣāviṣayakakarmaphalaṁ pārśve pakṣipati |
T02n2952u_001:3585: ṭīkā varṇayati yat karuṇā praveśaparyāyagatāmathavāsthāpanaparyāyagatāṁ karuṇāṁ sūcayati |
T02n2952u_001:3586: karuṇā samādhiparyāye dhyānamagnatāyā nimne eva athavā dhyānamagnatāparyāye |
T02n2952u_001:3587: yadyapi iyaṁ karuṇā saṁvādeṣu vivṛtāyāḥ karuṇāyāḥ prakṛtena prayogeṇa saha saṁgacchate,
T02n2952u_001:3589: tādṛśaṁ viśeṣaṇameva premṇā ca sahānubhūtānandena ca saha prayojyam |
T02n2952u_001:3592: yathā kaścit śaktiśālī śaṅkhavādakaḥ svalpaceṣṭayā catasṛṣu dikṣu pratidhvani sraṣṭumarhati tathaiva kaścidabhyāsakārī manomuktikarṣaṇena catasṛṣu dikṣu vartamānaiḥ jīvaiḥ saha sambandhenānvito bhavitumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:3593: yadā śaktiśālī śaṅkhavādakaḥ catasṛṣu dikṣu pratidhvaniṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3595: na kimapi sthānamasti yatra śabdaḥ na śrūyate |
T02n2952u_001:3599: mānasikīmavasthāmadhikṛtya idaṁ sagurutvaṁ smartavyaṁ yat 'ekṭibhiṭi' iti padaṁ (pāliḥ kammala,
T02n2952u_001:3603: 'karma' ityasya sthale 'cetanā' ityasya sthāpanena ṭīkāyāḥ sthānaṁ pariṣkṛtaṁ jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:3604: durbalena śaṅkhavādakena sṛṣṭaṁ parimeyaṁ śabdaplāvanamiva ākāṅkṣāviṣayikī cetanā parimeyā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3606: tadā manaḥ dhyānamagnatāyāḥ ādyaiḥ caturbhiḥ paryāyaiḥ yukte rūpamaye jagati tiṣṭhati,
T02n2952u_001:3607: athavā samādhigatamahattārāvasthayā saha yukte sūkṣmatare rūpahīne jagati vartate |
T02n2952u_001:3608: yata udāttabhāvaiḥ saha yuktā mānasikī avasthā dhyānamagnatāyā ādyeṣu caturṣu paryāyeṣu tiṣṭhati,
T02n2952u_001:3610: rūpamayaviṣayikī yā mānasikī avasthā tayā sahānvitā cetanā rāgādibhāvebhyaḥ sarvathā muktā bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:3611: ye rāgādibhāvā manaḥ badhnanti sṛjanti ca parieyatā sīmāṁ vā |
T02n2952u_001:3613: kiñca, udāttabhāvakarṣaṇarato'bhyāsakārī vṛddhiviśeṣeṇāthavā kramaśaḥ pratyekaṁ diśi sattāvad bhūteṣu tān vitanoti,
T02n2952u_001:3614: athavā sāmānyena yugapat sarvatra tān vitanoti |
T02n2952u_001:3616: evaṁ caitanyāgataviṣayāṇāṁ pariprekṣite abhyāsakāriṇaḥ cetanāṁ aparimeyā jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:3618: tadā parimeyā ākāṅkṣāviṣayikī cetanā na tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3619: samudrasya ca puṣkariṇyāśca rūpakalpam ullikhya ṭīkā 'yadeva parimeyaṁ karma tat tatra prasaṁge na tiṣṭhati' iti vacanasya aparamarthaṁ nirdiśati
T02n2952u_001:3620: yadi kaścit janaḥ tasya jīvanasya kasmiṁscit samaye udāttabhāvānāmanyatamaṁ karṣati,
T02n2952u_001:3621: tarhi tasya mṛtyau etadbhāvānvitacetanā sārthakatāmāyāti tathā brāhmaloke tadīyapunarjanmane kalpate |
T02n2952u_001:3622: tasmin samaye kimapi parimeyamākāṅkṣāviṣayagataṁ karma sārthakaṁ na bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3623: evaṁ brāhmaṇyaloke punarjanmane udāttabhāvānāṁ prabhāvaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3624: iyaṁ vyākhyā dhyānamagnatāyāḥ paryāye karuṇādimanomuktikarṣaṇaphalānāmantarbhāvāya śaktiśāliśaṅkhavādakasya upamāyā vāstavamavasaraṁ vitanoti
T02n2952u_001:3625: saṁvādasyopasaṁhāre gotama āha yat yo naraḥ prāguktopāyena udāttabhāvacatuṣṭayaṁ karṣati,
T02n2952u_001:3628: brāhmaguṇasampanno'yaṁ janaḥ maraṇāt paraṁ brahmalokaṁ gacchati yadā prema,
T02n2952u_001:3631: samavṛttitā ca caturvidhānāmupadeśānāṁ rītimanusṛtya kṛṣyante tadā te guṇā udāttā bhāvā iti kathyate |
T02n2952u_001:3637: , athavā te bhāvāḥ jīvanayātrāyā utkṛṣṭā upāyāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3640: evaṁ sarve catvāro bhāvā abhyāsakāriṇe hitāya bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:3641: yadyapi nirdiṣṭe samaye kaścit dhyātā ekaṁ bhāvamupakārakaṁ matvā tatra gurutvamāropayitum arhati gotamaḥ karuṇābhūtakṛṣṭabhāvasya sārvikeṣu lābheṣu gurutvamāropayati,
T02n2952u_001:3642: yataḥ karuṇāsamṛddhakarmāṇi tathā sahānubhūtimadhikṛtya tasya sarve upadeśāḥ karuṇayā saha samparkitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3643: karuṇāyāṁ kācid vṛddhiḥ paravarttidvayaṁ sajīvīkaroti arthāt samagradharmīyajīvanasya preṣaṇāṁ ca prakāśanāṁ ca samṛdhyā bhūṣayati |
T02n2952u_001:3644: catvāra udattā bhāvā vā brahmavihārā vā samavṛttitāyā manastattvasammatalābhān pratibimbayanti,
T02n2952u_001:3647: ekasyāṁ ṭīkāyāṁ teṣāṁ vikāśasya kramaḥ pradarśitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3648: pitarau tayoḥ santānānāṁ kṛte yān bhāvān anubhavataḥ taiḥ bhāvaiḥ saha udāttabhāvānāṁ tulanā kriyate |
T02n2952u_001:3650: tadā karuṇāmayacetasā pitarau 'kadā vā sarvāvayavānvitaṁ svāsthyavantaṁ putraṁ drakṣyāvaḥ' iti,
T02n2952u_001:3651: tataḥ yadāyaṁ komalaḥ śiśuḥ pṛṣṭhadeśe śete,
T02n2952u_001:3652: yūkamakṣikādibhiḥ daṁśanāt athavā nidrāvyāghātakāraṇāt roditi vilapati vā,
T02n2952u_001:3653: tadā tat śrutvā pitarau sādharaṇīṁ karuṇāmanubhavataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3654: kiñca, atīva ākāṅkṣaṇīyavarṣeṣu yadā krīḍākāle śiśuḥ dhāvati athavā viśrāmaṁ labhate tadā tadālokya pitroḥ manaḥ śataṁ utkṛṣṭaviśuddhanavanītasiktatūlanirmitakomalakandukā iva komalaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3655: pitroḥ cittaṁ paritṛptaṁ cānanditaṁ ca bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3657: tataḥ, yadā putraḥ tasya bhāryāyai bhūṣaṇāni dātuṁ śaknoti tathā ca svakīye gṛhe vasati,
T02n2952u_001:3658: tadā pitarau samavṛttisampannau santau arthāt samacittatāmavalamba cintayataḥ 'adhunā āvayoḥ putraḥ svādhinaḥ san sthātumarhati' iti |
T02n2952u_001:3669: , tadā sa paraduḥkhaūrīkaraṇāya anurāgarūpaṁ prema karṣati |
T02n2952u_001:3673: teṣāṁ duḥkhaṁ dūrībhavatu iti aicchat teṣāṁ jīvānāṁ samṛddhiṁ yadābhyāsakārī paśyati (disvā)
T02n2952u_001:3676: atra 'paśyati' ityasyārthaḥ - dhyātā vartamāne parasamṛdhiṁ samīkṣate athavā atītasamṛddhiṁ bhāvisamṛddhiṁ vā cintayati |
T02n2952u_001:3678: tasya cintā kevalaṁ vastugataviṣayeṇa sīmitā tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3679: evaṁ sahānubhūtānandakarṣaṇena abhyāsakārī pareṣāṁ kṛte saṁśliṣṭānāṁ bhāvānāṁ nirmāṇa saṁpūrayati |
T02n2952u_001:3683: sa nirapekṣadarśakaḥ san sarvān jīvān paryavekṣate |
T02n2952u_001:3685: abhyāsakārī vyaktigatalābhāya tathā manastatvasammatalābhāya udāttabhāvānāmekatamaṁ pālayitumanu preṣito bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3686: sa krodhādiviṣaghnāgadatvena prāguktabhāvacatuṣṭayaṁ palayituṁ pravṛtto bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3688: imamādarśaṁ punaḥ punaḥ anusṛtya abhyāsakārī pareṣāṁ kṛte ghaniṣṭhaṁ cintayituṁ pravartate tasya sāmarthyamapi samānamānasikatayā yuktaṁ jāyate
T02n2952u_001:3689: idaṁ niḥsaṁśayenocyate yat dhyānena udāttabhāvānāṁ karṣaṇaṁ hitakaraṁ,
T02n2952u_001:3690: pareṣāṁ prakṛtāsu avasthāsu kṛtāṁ pratikriyāṁ prabhāvitāṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:3694: gotamaḥ kadāpi na pratipādayati yat udāttabhāvaviṣayakāḥ caturvidhā upadeśā ekāntata tasyaiva |
T02n2952u_001:3695: yo janaḥ kevalam udāttabhāvānāmanuśīlanaṁ karoti sa sādhu na karoti |
T02n2952u_001:3696: gotamaḥ spaṣṭataḥ muktaye aṣṭāṅgikamārgīyopadesaiḥ saha udāttabhāvānāṁ kevalamanuśīlanasya vaiparītyaṁ pradarśayati - - caturvidhopadeśānusāreṇa karuṇādīnāṁ kevalamanuśīlanaṁ parāṅmukhīkaraṇāya,
T02n2952u_001:3710: na tat citaṁ dūṣaṇamuktiṁ vā punarjanmamuktiṁ kārayitumalam |
T02n2952u_001:3713: kevalaṁ buddhopadiṣṭamārgānusaraṇadvārā nirvāṇalābhāt ko'pi janaḥ pariṇāme nirvāṇaśāntau punarjanma parivartanaduḥkhādibhyo muktimarjayitumalam
T02n2952u_001:3715: tathāpi sarve janāḥ kaṣṭanivāraṇāya gotamasya upadeśān grahītumasamarthāḥ santaḥ tebhyaḥ palāyante |
T02n2952u_001:3717: tatra tu mahattamaṁ lakṣyaṁ na sādhyate |
T02n2952u_001:3718: ekadā, brahmaloke punarjanmagrahaṇāya udāttabhāvānuśīlanaṁ kartavyamityupadeśaḥ sāriputtena dhānañjānināmakāya viprāya pradattaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3720: tatkṣaṇādeva tathā kṛtvā maraṇāt paraṁ sa punaḥ brahmaloke'jāyata |
T02n2952u_001:3722: apyekadā tvayā utthāya nikṛṣṭabrahmaloke pratiṣṭhito vipro dhānañjāniḥ parityaktaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:3725: sāriputto vyākhyāti yat tena sa brāhmaṇo brahmaloke pratiṣṭhāpito yato brahmaloko brāhmaṇebhya eva |
T02n2952u_001:3726: buddhasya praśno nirdiśati yat dharmācāryaḥ śiṣyasya kalyāṇārthaṁ kadāpi paritṛpto bhavituṁ nārhati |
T02n2952u_001:3727: ācāryo'pi nirdiṣṭe samaye yathāsādhyaṁ śiṣyaṁ pramodayet |
T02n2952u_001:3733: yataḥ te tataḥ yathāyathaṁ viṣaye kṛṣyante |
T02n2952u_001:3734: gotamo varṇayati yat sādhāraṇajanakartṛkodāttabhāvakarṣaṇaṁ ca mahata ācāryasya jñāninā śiṣyeṇodāttabhāvānāṁ karṣaṇaṁ cāntarā spaṣṭaṁ pārthakyamasti
T02n2952u_001:3737: tadā sa maraṇāt paraṁ brahmaloke punareva jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:3741: 2.129 sarvavidhapunarjanmano muktamarhat-puruṣamantareṇa mahata ācāryasya udāttabhāvakarṣaṇarataḥ jñānī śiṣyaḥ maraṇāt paraṁ brahmaloke punaḥ janiṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:3742: kintu nirantarodāttabhāvānuśīlanāt sa tatra arhatpuruṣaḥ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3743: tasmin jīvane samāptiṁ gate saḥ ataḥ paraṁ punaḥ na jāyate,
T02n2952u_001:3748: samyagjñānalābhāt paramapi gautamaḥ caturvidhānāmupadeśānāṁ paddhatimanusṛtyanirantaraṁ sarvavidhodāttabhāvacatuṣṭayasya karṣaṇaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:3750: sarvabhāvacatuṣṭayakarṣaṇe buddha āsīt dakṣa iti sarveṣāṁ nikaṭe spaṣṭamāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:3751: kasmiścit saṁvāde gṛhastho jīvakakomārabhacca āha - 'bhadra ! mayā śrutam brahmā karuṇayā vasatīti |
T02n2952u_001:3757: yata idaṁ mataṁ tiṣṭhati yat brahmaparyāyā devāḥ karuṇāṁ,
T02n2952u_001:3761: yataḥ sa paśyati yat gotamaḥ karuṇayā vasati |
T02n2952u_001:3768: te bhaviṣyati kāle udetuṁ na samarthā bhaviṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:3774: gotamo jīvakaṁ jñāpayati yat lālasāghṛṇābhramadoṣaiḥ yadeva bhavatu vā na bhavatu hiṁsā,
T02n2952u_001:3779: evaṁ buddhaḥ sagauravaṁ jīvakaṁ kathayati yat tasya karuṇādisamudayaḥ lālasāghṛṇābhramatyāgamapekṣya sañjātaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3781: gotamaḥ krodhahiṁsā'santoṣavidveṣadoṣān premādīnāṁ viparitā iti sthāpayati |
T02n2952u_001:3783: etaṁ viṣayamadhikṛtya yat tvayā ucyate tat yadi bhavati - jīvaka,
T02n2952u_001:3787: etaṁ viṣayamadhikṛtya yat tvayā ucyate tat yadi bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3788: tasyārthaḥ 'yadi idaṁ prāguktiva bhavati tarhi ahaṁ te uktiṁ gṛhṇāmi' |
T02n2952u_001:3790: tataḥ bhāgyavān buddhaḥ avaśiṣṭodāttabhāvānadhikṛtya tasmai prāguktāṁ śikṣā vistareṇa dadau |
T02n2952u_001:3793: samyagjñānalābhasamaye tu gotamena sarve mānasikā doṣā unmūlitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:3794: evaṁ karuṇādīnāṁ karṣaṇasya samaye doṣāvadamanena prayojanaṁ nāsāditi kāraṇāt taddamanaceṣṭā tena na kṛtā |
T02n2952u_001:3796: antardriṣṭivikāśāya kaścit janaḥ prathamataḥ viśuddhaṁ vyavaharati,
T02n2952u_001:3801: viśuddho vyavahāraḥ vartamāne kāle hitakaramānasikatvaṁ poṣayati,
T02n2952u_001:3804: hitakaratvasamparkitasādhāraṇasaṁsthānasya madhye eva avasthitaḥ san ko'pi janaḥ samāhitacittasya susaṁskṛtā avasthāḥ sthāpayitumāśānvito bhavitumarhati
T02n2952u_001:3806: , dhyānī jana ācāryopadeśamanusṛtya ekaṁ vā ekādhikaṁ vā icchati |
T02n2952u_001:3808: tataḥ dhyānī puruṣaḥ manaḥdravyayoḥ sūkṣmaprakṛtiṁ praveṣṭhuṁ yantratvena samādhiśāṇitaṁ manaḥ vyavaharati |
T02n2952u_001:3810: antardṛṣṭimān abhyāsakārī yadi udāttabhāvānāṁ samāhitāvasthāḥ karṣati,
T02n2952u_001:3811: tarhi saḥ abhyāsasya spaṣṭaviṣayatvena ubhayasmin viṣaye dakṣo bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3812: tathāpi ubhayaṁ viṣayamekatrīkṛtya saṁyuktābhyāsarūpeṇa sa kraṣṭuṁ śaknoti |
T02n2952u_001:3813: 'atthakanagarīsaṁvāde' saṁsārī dasamaḥ ānandaṁ pṛcchati buddhopadiṣṭaḥ ekamātraḥ abhyāso'sti na veti yo'bhyāsaḥ manomuktiṁ sādhayati,
T02n2952u_001:3817: ānandaḥ ekādaśābhyāsān lakṣyasādhakān ullikhya uttaraṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:3818: tatra ekatamaṁ hyevam - - kaścit bhikṣuḥ satataṁ premamayacittena ekasyāṁ diśi avasthitaiḥ bhūtaiḥ saha samparkaṁ sthāpayati,
T02n2952u_001:3825: pārśvāpārśvi avasthitaiḥ janaiḥ saha sa samparkaṁ sthāpayati |
T02n2952u_001:3826: sa samagraviśvasya bhūtaiḥ saha satataṁ sarvatra samabhāvena samparkaṁ sthāpayati - karuṇāmayena cetasā,
T02n2952u_001:3831: tataḥ sa evaṁ cintayati 'karuṇārūpamanomuktiriyamapi sañjāyate iṣyate ca |
T02n2952u_001:3835: tatra pratiṣṭhitaḥ san sa hānikara prabhāvavināśaṁ sādhayati |
T02n2952u_001:3838: tataḥ svargaloke tasya svataḥ sañjātaṁ punarjanma bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:3839: - prāguktāṁ rītimanusṛtya antardṛṣṭi kraṣṭuṁ dhyānī purusaḥ prathamataḥ svābhāvikenopāyena udāttabhāvānāmanyatamaṁ karṣati |
T02n2952u_001:3841: kintu dhyānamagnatāyāṁ manasaḥ viśuddhatā prakṛtadhyānamagnadaśāyāṁ paraṁ kañcit kālaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3844: tadā sa vastutattve tathā mānasatatte yādṛśī prakṛtirasti,
T02n2952u_001:3845: tasyā anusandhānāya sapadi tīkṣṇaṁ manaḥ niyojayati |
T02n2952u_001:3847: tathā ca dehanirmāṇāya vastugatāni upādānāni santi,
T02n2952u_001:3851: tathā hi - karuṇāyāḥ ko'pi bhāvaḥ bhūteṣu manaḥ sthāpanāya tathā manaḥpoṣaṇāya yuktastiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:3852: tasmin bhāve siddhe ānandamaya utsāho jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:3854: sthāpanaṁ poṣaṇaṁ tathā ānandamayotsāhabhāvaḥ - etāni trīṇi sahavartīni mānasikāni kāryāṇi manasaḥ avibhājyāḥ apṛgbhūtā daśā iva anubhūyante
T02n2952u_001:3858: evaṁ vidhamanusandhānaṁ bahuṣu prasaṁgeṣu vividhamānasikakāryeṣu ca punaḥ punaḥ kṛtam |
T02n2952u_001:3860: tadvat, akhaṇḍavastunicayah vividhaiḥ upādānaiḥ nirmita iti abhijñatayā pratyakṣīkriyate |
T02n2952u_001:3862: śiraḥ ityādidhāraṇānāṁ sthaleṣu kevalaṁ bhautikīmabhijñatāṁ dhyānī janaḥ arjayati |
T02n2952u_001:3865: pūrvamakhaṇḍavastunicayatvena yat pratītaṁ tadadhunā asaṁvaddhabhautikābhijñatayā nirmitamiti dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:3866: vyaktisattā katibhiḥ vāstavaistathā mānasikaiḥ ghaṭakaiḥ dravyaiḥ nirmīyate |
T02n2952u_001:3867: teṣu dravyeṣu spaṣṭeṣu satsu teṣāṁ sādhāraṇāni lakṣaṇāni prakāśante |
T02n2952u_001:3869: tadā pṛthak pṛthak mānasikaṁ tathā vāstavaṁ ghaṭakaṁ pratyakṣīkriyante |
T02n2952u_001:3872: tatra kṣaṇāt kṣaṇāntaraṁ dravyagatā calamānatā nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:3874: dhyānī janaḥ pratyahaṁ pratyakṣīkaraṇīyān viṣayān sākṣāt abhijñātuṁ pravartate |
T02n2952u_001:3876: tata idaṁ spaṣṭaṁ yat cetanāyāḥ kasmiścit kṣaṇe sampūrṇaṁ vilīne sati aparacetanākṣaṇo jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:3878: vyaktisattāyāṁ tathā pariveśe parivartanaśīleṣu asāreṣu dravyeṣu śaraṇasvarūpaṁ sthāyinamātmānaṁ nāvalokya dhyānī janaḥ sarvavidhagocaravastu 'asthāyitvena duḥkhatvena,
T02n2952u_001:3889: evaṁ vastutattvasya navabhāvena pratyakṣīkaraṇāt yogī svabhāvata eva muktiṁ kāmayate |
T02n2952u_001:3890: sa imāṁ muktiṁ nirvāṇasya upalabdhau pratyakṣīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:3891: tadā sa sarvavidhamasthāyitvaṁ ca parivartanaṁ cātikramya vartamānāyāḥ kasyāścidavasthāyāḥ saṁkṣiptaḥ jñānaṁ labhate |
T02n2952u_001:3893: samāhitacetasā anubhūtāyāḥ asamyaktāyāḥ sutīkṣṇapratyakṣīkaraṇena tasya susthitajagaddṛṣṭiḥ kiyatā parimāṇena viparyastā āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:3894: tataḥ nirvāṇasya upalabdhyā kā eva prakṛtā śāntiḥ iti viṣayamavagacchati |
T02n2952u_001:3895: paramāṁ śaktimanubhūya sa tathaiva atilobhanīyapārthivākarṣaṇaiḥ na punaḥ pralubdhaḥ bhaviṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:3896: ekataḥ, sarvastūnāmanirbharayogyatā tathā anityatā yathā spaṣṭā,
T02n2952u_001:3899: dhyānī janaḥ satataṁ samādhinā tasya cittamavaśyameva śāṇitaṁ kuryāt |
T02n2952u_001:3900: gabhīropalabdhisamṛddhaparyāyatrayamatikramya srotaḥpraveśī sannapi dhyānī satatameva antardṛṣṭiṁ pālayet |
T02n2952u_001:3901: evaṁ gocaravastūnāmasantoṣajanakaḥ svabhāvaḥ kramaśaḥ spaṣṭāt spaṣṭataraṁ jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:3902: tadvat, nirvāṇasya sāmagrikī viśuddhā prakṛtiḥ satatamadhikatamaspaṣṭatāṁ vrajati |
T02n2952u_001:3904: punarjanmanaḥ muktaḥ san maraṇāt paraṁ sa nirvāṇasya mṛtyuhīnāmavasthāṁ labhate |

T02n2952u_001:4147: iyaṁ pañcalakṣaṇasya purāṇasya pratisargeṇa saha sādṛśyamāvahati |
T02n2952u_001:4148: tathāpi viṣṇupurāṇe pratisargasya sthale samārthakaḥ pratisaṁhāraḥ śabdaḥ gṛhītaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4149: iyaṁ saṁsthā jagataḥ sampūrṇāṁ vinaṣṭhi sūcayati |
T02n2952u_001:4153: siddhāntaśiromaṇeḥ viśiṣṭagaṇanayā jñāyate yat akhilo viśvaḥ 2347050947 varṣebhyaḥ paraṁ sampūrṇataḥ vināśaṁ gamiṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:4155: ayaṁ hetuḥ sarvadā sṛṣṭihetūn jīvitān jīvān nirdiśati |
T02n2952u_001:4156: te jīvā ajñatayā bhrāntyā vā kati karyāṇi sādhayanti |
T02n2952u_001:4157: ayaṁ ca pariṇāme anyāṁ sṛṣṭiṁ nayati |
T02n2952u_001:4158: vastutaḥ, viśvasya sṛṣṭeḥ vinaṣṭeśca mūlabhūto hetūḥ eṣāṁ jīvānāṁ bhāgyam |
T02n2952u_001:4159: ata eva te eva hetutvena tathā mūlakāraṇatvena svīkṛtāḥ |
