T02n2952u_001:4161: yat tattvaṁ samagratvaṁ vā vyakti sṛṣṭiṁ vinaṣṭiṁ vā nayati tadeva apāśrayabodhakam |
T02n2952u_001:4162: ayameva brahmā paramātmā vā ayamevaikaḥ kevalaṁ dhyātavyaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4163: sarvāṇi nava vaiśiṣṭyāni daśamasya puṣṭaye kalpante |
T02n2952u_001:4164: bhāgavatapurāṇamanusṛtya daśamasya lakṣaṇasya saṁskārāya nava vaiśiṣṭyāni savistaramālocyante |
T02n2952u_001:4179: tathaiva, vaṁśo'thavā vaṁśanucaritam īśānukathayā saha tulyārthakatvaṁ nayati |
T02n2952u_001:4180: apāśrayasya āśrayasya ca madhye kimapi pārthakyaṁ nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:4186: āsu catasuṣu ātyantikī saṁsthā dvitīyasūcīsthāṁ mukti nirdaśati,
T02n2952u_001:4188: sthānaṁ samagrasya viśvasya bhaugolikaṁ vivaraṇaṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:4191: evaṁ purāṇānuśīlane bhogoliko viṣayo'pi yugapat anena lakṣaṇena saha vartate |
T02n2952u_001:4192: poṣaṇaṁ nāma īśvarāllabdhā karuṇā athavā tallabdhaḥ prasādaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4196: vināśe ca tasya īśvarasya asīmāṁ śaktiṁ boddhuṁ yatante |
T02n2952u_001:4198: sa duḥkhamuktaye tebhyaḥ asīmāṁ karuṇāṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:4202: kintu so'pi īśvarasya cirantanānandād vañcito na babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:4205: utkṛṣṭasya vā akṛṣṭasya vā kṛtakarmaṇaḥ phalādeṣā icchā jāyate,
T02n2952u_001:4206: evamūrtiḥ īśvarasya akṛtrimāyā karuṇāyā viruddhe pratyakṣameva daṇḍāyate |
T02n2952u_001:4207: ūtaye narāḥ īśvareṇa saha milanasyākāṅkṣāṁ darśayituṁ vyarthā bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:4208: idaṁ pūrvaṁ darśitaṁ yat brahmāṇḍapurāṇamapi purāṇasya daśa lakṣaṇāni adhikṛtya ekāṁ sūcīṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:4223: evamidaṁ pratīyate yat bhāgavatapurāṇaṁ purāṇagataviṣayāṇāṁ spaṣṭāṁ dhāraṇāṁ poṣayati,
T02n2952u_001:4224: asya sūcī vartamānānāṁ purāṇānāṁ prāyeṇa sarvāṇi lakṣaṇāni parigṛhṇāti |
T02n2952u_001:4225: kintu arthaśāstrasya praṇetāraḥ purāṇasambandhini asmin viṣaye vistareṇa bhinnamataṁ poṣayanti |
T02n2952u_001:4226: kauṭilīyārthaśāstrasya jayamaṅgalaṭīkāyāṁ nimnoktaḥ śloko dṛśyate - sṛṣṭipravṛtisaṁhāradharmamokṣaprayojanam |
T02n2952u_001:4228: atra purāṇānāṁ gurutvapūrṇalakṣaṇatvena dharmaḥ atīva tātparyyaṁ vahati |
T02n2952u_001:4229: niścayenātra yathārthamukhabandhāt paraṁ dharmīyā ālocanā gṛhītāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4230: mantrataravarṇānāt paraṁ bhāgavatapurāṇaṁ dharmāya yathāyathaṁ manoyogaṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:4232: yaḥ spaṣṭataḥ dharmasya upayogitāṁ gurutvaṁ ca svīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:4233: ata eva ayaṁ siddhāntaḥ na ucitaḥ yat pūrvaṁ dharmaḥ purāṇānāṁ cintāyāṁ nāntarbhūta āsīt,
T02n2952u_001:4234: tathā ca asya dhāraṇā kevalaṁ paravarttiyuge āgatā |
T02n2952u_001:4235: evaṁ bahuṣu prācīneṣu grantheṣu na kevalaṁ purāṇasya lakṣaṇaṁ karttuṁ praceṣṭā kṛtā,
T02n2952u_001:4236: api tu purāṇavaiśiṣṭyaṁ vyākyātuṁ prayatnaḥ kṛtaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4238: na vā tiṣṭhantu athavā daśavaiśiṣṭyāni tiṣṭhantu vā na tiṣṭhantu - iti na praśnaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4239: pañcasu vā daśasu vā lakṣaṇeṣu vistṛtā varṇanā darśayati yat tāni lakṣaṇāni kāṁścit nirdiṣṭān pāthān nirdiśanti |
T02n2952u_001:4241: api tu idaṁ kañcit purātanaṁ pāṭhamapi sūcayati - iti asvīkāre'nyāyo bhaviṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:4242: api ca, purāṇasaṁhitāyāḥ prayoga imaṁ viṣayaṁ draḍhayati |
T02n2952u_001:4243: yataḥ saṁhitā īdṛśaṁ tātparyaṁ na vahati |
T02n2952u_001:4244: eṣā sarvadā kartānāṁ pustakānāṁ vā saṁgrahāṇāṁ vā nirdiṣṭaṁ prasaṅgaṁ racayati |
T02n2952u_001:4245: nedṛśī kāciddhāraṇā athavā nedṛśaṁ kiñcillakṣaṇam itihāsasyopari prāpyate |
T02n2952u_001:4246: vibhinneṣu prācīneṣu śāstreṣu itastataḥ idaṁ padaṁ vyavahriyate |
T02n2952u_001:4247: kintu anayā rītyāsya lakṣaṇaṁ na lakṣitamatha vā vaiśiṣṭyakathanena vivṛtam,
T02n2952u_001:4248: purāṇaiḥ sahāsyāvicchedyo'nuṣaṅgaḥ evātra kāraṇaṁ bhavitum arhati |
T02n2952u_001:4249: tayoḥ atīva ghaniṣṭhaḥ saṁyogaḥ hi sambhāvyo hetuḥ athavā itihāsasya upari bhinnasya spaṣṭasya ca lakṣaṇasyābhāvaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4252: darśanasya purāṇasya ca madhye saṁgatiḥ atīva ghaniṣṭhāntaraṁgā ca |
T02n2952u_001:4253: kintu pratyekaṁ pṛthak spaṣṭaṁ ca paricayaṁ vahati |
T02n2952u_001:4254: kintu purāṇetihāsayoḥ viṣaye etādṛśaṁ sādṛśaṁ na aṅkhyate |
T02n2952u_001:4255: kati paṇḍitā manyante yat purāṇamitihāsaḥ ca bhinnau viṣayau |
T02n2952u_001:4258: tasmin samaye kati vidvāṁsaḥ punaḥ tayorekatvamanubhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:4261: vitarkaṁ parihāya vayaṁ kevalaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat purāṇeṣu kalpanāyāḥ nirdiṣṭo'vasaro'sti,
T02n2952u_001:4263: purāṇeṣu prācīnatāyāḥ prasaṅge asmāhiḥ itomadhye kati svīkṛtāḥ prācīnā granthāḥ ullikhitāḥ tatra purāṇaṁ paricchannagranthatvena svīkṛtam |
T02n2952u_001:4264: eṣu prācīneṣu śāstreṣu atharvavedasaṁhitā atīva gurutvapūrṇā |
T02n2952u_001:4265: atraiko mantro'sti yasyāśayaḥ - ucchiṣṭājjāyate purāṇaṁ ṛgvedena,
T02n2952u_001:4270: sa vadati sarveṣāṁ bhūtabhautikānāmavasāne śiṣṭa urvaritaḥ paramātmā iti |
T02n2952u_001:4271: arthāt yadā sarvaṁ vināśaṁ yāti tadā kevalaṁ paramātmā tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:4274: etāni na kasyāpi mānavasya sṛṣṭikarmāṇi athavā saṁkalanāni |
T02n2952u_001:4275: anyatrārthavedo varṇayati - vartamānasya jagataḥ pariprekṣite satyadraṣṭāramantareṇa na ko'pi janaḥ pūrvatanakalpasyāstitvaṁ jñātuṁ śaknoti
T02n2952u_001:4276: yo janaḥ pūrvatanakalpasya nirdiṣṭaṁ yathāyathaṁ cākāraṁ vistareṇa jānāti,
T02n2952u_001:4278: sa suṣṭhu purāṇānāṁ prācīnāḥ kathāḥ ākhyāyikāḥ ca jānāti |
T02n2952u_001:4279: evaṁ spaṣṭaṁ pratibhāti yat atharvavedasya kāle purāṇāni tathā paurāṇikāḥ aparicayasya tamasi nātiṣṭhan,
T02n2952u_001:4281: atharvavedasaṁhitā punaśca varṇayati - 'vrātyastomasya prasaṁge itihāsaḥ purāṇaṁ gāthā,
T02n2952u_001:4283: yo'nena saha vistareṇa paricitaḥ sa eva itihāsasya,
T02n2952u_001:4287: asmin prasaṁge idaṁ smaraṇīyaṁ yat ayaṁ viśiṣṭo mantraḥ vātyastomotsavasya antarbhuktaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4291: idaṁ niścayena svīkriyate yat viśvasya sūcanāyāṁ vrātyaḥ sarveṣāmagre āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4292: ayaṁ vastutaḥ paramātmatatvena saha ekatvaṁ tulyatāṁ ca vrajati |
T02n2952u_001:4293: rudrādhyāyeṣu api vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ 'namo vrātyāya' iti |
T02n2952u_001:4294: vrātyaśca rudraśca abhinnau iti api sūcyate,
T02n2952u_001:4295: evaṁ yāthāyathyenocyate yat itihāsaḥ purāṇaṁ ca ṛgvedaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:4300: ādyeṣu triṣu sthāneṣu itihāsaḥ purāṇaṁ ca pṛthaktvena na prakāśete |
T02n2952u_001:4302: kintu avaśiṣṭe dṛṣṭānte ṛṣiḥ padayugalasya madhye pṛthaktvaṁ pratiṣṭhāpayituṁ yatate |
T02n2952u_001:4304: asmādasmābhiḥ jñāyate yat pariplavānuṣṭhānasya aṣṭamyāṁ rajanyāmitihāsasyāvṛttirbhavati |
T02n2952u_001:4306: evaṁ brāhmaṇānāṁ yuge'pi itihāsaḥ purāṇaṁ ceti paṁdadvayasya sattā pṛthaktvena tathā yuktatvena yugapat tiṣṭhati sma |
T02n2952u_001:4308: vividhānāṁ vedānāṁ pāṭhaḥ vividhaṁ phalaṁ janayati,
T02n2952u_001:4313: gāthā ca nārāśaṁsī ca paṭhyante kenacijjanena madhuyāgasya phalaṁ labhyate |
T02n2952u_001:4314: paravarttini dṛṣṭānte idamullikhyate yat kaścid vidvān pratyahaṁ vedaṁ paṭhet anuśāsanena,
T02n2952u_001:4321: sa yadi pratidinamidaṁ karoti tarhi sa samagrāya samājāya tathā īśvarāya paripūrṇaṁ santoṣaṁ dadāti tasmin brāhmaṇe anyatrocyate yat ṛgvedaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:4330: vyākhyānamanuvyākhyānaṁ ca sarvāṇi vedaiḥ saha anvitāni |
T02n2952u_001:4331: ko'pi janaḥ anena sārvabhaumatvaṁ paramaśaktimatvaṁ cārjayati |
T02n2952u_001:4333: evañca, gopathabrāhmaṇe svīkriyete purāṇānāṁ gurutvaṁ ca mahatvaṁ ca |
T02n2952u_001:4334: atrocyate - 'evaṁ sarve ite vedāḥ kalparahasyabrāhmaṇopaniṣaditihāsapurāṇaiḥ saha viracitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4335: anyasmin mantre idaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ pañcavedaracanetihāsaṁ vivṛṇoti - te pañca vedā hi sarpavedaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:4344: asmin prasaṁge bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svaḥ janaḥ mahaḥ iti pañca mahāvyāhṛtaya ullikhyante |
T02n2952u_001:4349: evamatra purāṇebhyaḥ vedebhya iva sadṛśī maryādā tathā padasthitiḥ dīyate |
T02n2952u_001:4350: purāṇāni itihāsāśca prācīnatvaṁ pavitratvaṁ ca bhajangti iti vivicyate |
T02n2952u_001:4351: jaiminīyopaniṣadi ca tadbrāhmaṇe cāpi nyūnatamataḥ pañcasu sthaleṣu (3/4/1-2, 7/1/2, 7/1/4, 7/1/1, 7/7/1)
T02n2952u_001:4356: taittirīyāraṇyake purāṇaśabdaḥ brahmayajñaprasaṁgena punaḥ punaḥ vyavahṛtaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4357: yadi vayaṁ chāndogyopaniṣadi bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadi ca vyavahṛtasya purāṇapadasya purāṇapadasya prayogaṁ tātparyaṁ ca vicārayāmaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:4358: tadā paśyāmo yat purāṇāni vedāḥ iva namasyatāṁ yānti |
T02n2952u_001:4359: purāṇānāṁ vedānāṁ ca sadṛśaṁ mūlyaṁ tathā gurutvaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:4360: yataḥ ruddhaśvāsasya muktaye sāṁdhātikyā praceṣṭayā prayojanaṁ nāsti,
T02n2952u_001:4361: tataḥ prakṛtyaivocyate yat vedānāṁ tathā purāṇānāṁ yoniḥ svayaṁkriyaḥ svataḥ sphūrtaśca |
T02n2952u_001:4362: bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadekena sundareṇa dṛṣṭāntena viṣayamimaṁ saralaṁ karttuṁ yatate |
T02n2952u_001:4363: tathā hi - 'sa yathā ārdrendhanāgneḥ avyāhitāt pṛthag dhūmā viniścaranti,
T02n2952u_001:4364: evaṁ vā are'sya mahatto bhūtasya niḥśvasitam etad yad ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmavedo'tharvāṅgirasa itihāsapurāṇam |
T02n2952u_001:4365: 'iti idaṁ vākyaṁ katibhiḥ uddhṛtibhiḥ chāndogyopaniṣadā samarthitam |
T02n2952u_001:4369: ' 'ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmaveda ātharvaṇaścaturtha itihāsapurāṇaḥ pañcamo vedānāṁ vedaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4370: vastuto'nyatrāpi asyāmupaniṣadi dṛśyate yat itihāsapurāṇaṁ pañcamavedatvenānumoditam,
T02n2952u_001:4371: tasmai ca pavitratvasya paramaṁ padaṁ pradīyate |
T02n2952u_001:4372: evamidaṁ parisphuṭaṁ yat īdṛśasya purātanasya yugasya sṛṣṭikarmāṇi khalu purāṇāni |
T02n2952u_001:4373: etāni ca kati nītīḥ na kevalaṁ vyākurvanti,
T02n2952u_001:4374: api tu etāni nirdiṣṭam ākāraṁ parigṛhya janebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ praśaṁsāmākarṣanti sma |
T02n2952u_001:4375: sūtrasāhityasya pṛṣṭāsu purāṇāṁ gurutvaṁ tathā prācīnatvaṁ paunaḥpunyena sūcyate |
T02n2952u_001:4377: tathā ca āraṇyakāya upaniṣade ca yad gurutvaṁ tadeva pradīyate purāṇāya |
T02n2952u_001:4379: katiṣu kṣetreṣu vedādhyayanena saha itihāsasya purāṇasya ca adhyayanaṁ vihitamāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4381: yaiḥ paṇḍitaiḥ itihāsasya tathā purāṇānāmiva śāstrāṇāṁ svādaḥ anubhūtaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:4382: te devaiśca pitṛbhiśca saha amṛtasāgare magnā bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:4383: tasmin sūtre anyatra vahniśikhāprajvalanasya prasaṁge idaṁ varṇyate yat,
T02n2952u_001:4384: yadaivāmarāṇāṁ janānāṁ pavitreṣu karmasu itihāsasya purāṇasya ca prayogaḥ syāt sa samayaḥ śubhalakṣaṇānvita iti |
T02n2952u_001:4385: kintu idamavaśyameva svīkartavyaṁ yat śrautasūtreṣu purāṇaviṣayakaṁ yadvivaraṇaṁ prāpyate tanna kimapi purāṇaṁ vā purāṇasya ślokasaṁgrahaṁ vā viśeṣeṇa ullikhati |
T02n2952u_001:4386: asmin viṣaye āpastambadharmasūtram apūrvaṁ sthānaṁ tathā padamadhikaroti |
T02n2952u_001:4387: tatkāle vartamānataḥ purāṇātaḥ spaṣṭāu dvau ślokau tasya lekhakena uddhṛtau |
T02n2952u_001:4395: bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadaḥ upari racitāyāṁ ṭīkāyāṁ śaṅkarācāryaḥ uparyuktaślokadvayasya uddhṛti dadau |
T02n2952u_001:4397: viṣṇupurāṇe tathā padmapurāṇe uktau ślokau dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:4404: padmapurāṇena sarvaiḥ purāṇaiḥ saha tasya paricaya āsīnnaveti praśna avāstavaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4405: āpastambaḥ kintu purāṇebhya ātmana ṛṇaṁ svīcakāra - yāni tasya sammukhe prādhānyaṁ labhante sma - sa viṣaya upasaṁhāre vakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:4406: api ca, tasminnāpastambadharmasūtre'nyatra vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ svargatānāṁ pitṛṇāṁ prasaṁge,
T02n2952u_001:4407: yat te svarga jigyuḥ tathā ca viśvasya vināśaṁ yāvat tatroṣuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4408: punaśca, sṛṣṭikarmaṇoḥ apariṇate prārambhe te svargasya mūlatvaṁ hetutvaṁ ca bhejire |
T02n2952u_001:4411: tena kālena bhaviṣyapurānasyāstitvaṁ svīkṛtaṁ tathā anumoditam |
T02n2952u_001:4413: yadyapi idaṁ tathyaṁ yat ayaṁ ślokaḥ vartamāne bhaviṣyapurāṇe na dṛśyate,
T02n2952u_001:4414: tathāpi asya prāmāṇye spardhā na jñātavyā |
T02n2952u_001:4415: etannāmollekhena vibhinnaśāstreṣu ye bahavaḥ ślokā uddhṛtā babhūvuḥ,
T02n2952u_001:4417: kimidaṁ sūcayati yat sarve śāstrakārāḥ eva bhrānti gatāḥ ?
T02n2952u_001:4418: evaṁ ca gautamadharmasūtre'pi vayaṁ paśyāmo yat itihāsapurāṇapadaṁ purāṇapadaṁ vā sampūrṇanibandhatvena kṣetradvaye ullikhitam |
T02n2952u_001:4419: prathame kṣetre gautamaḥ 'vahuśruta' - śabdasyārthaṁ vyākhyātuṁ ciceṣṭe |
T02n2952u_001:4420: asya śabdasya vyutpatigato'rthaḥ hi sa janaḥ yena bahu śrutaṁ tathā jñātam |
T02n2952u_001:4421: gautamasya mate sa eva bahuśruta iti vividyate |
T02n2952u_001:4422: sa janānāṁ rītiṁ prathāṁ ca samyak jānāti |
T02n2952u_001:4425: evaṁ bahuśrutasya yogyatāyai itihāse purāṇe ca dakṣatayā prayojanamasti |
T02n2952u_001:4426: anyatra gautamo manyate yat prajāsu rājñāṁ vyavahāraḥ,
T02n2952u_001:4432: atrāpi vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat purāṇebhyaḥ yathāyathaṁ sammānaṁ pradattam |
T02n2952u_001:4433: gautamaḥ spaṣṭaṁ vadati yat eṣu sarveṣu śāstreṣu ajñaḥ rājā anupayogī |
T02n2952u_001:4435: evamidaṁ dṛśyate yat dharmaśāstrairapi purāṇānāṁ prabhāvaḥ svīkṛtaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4436: anye sarve prācīnā granthā iva arthaśāstrasyopari likhitā granthā api purāṇebhyaḥ yathāyathaṁ svīkṛti dadati |
T02n2952u_001:4439: yataḥ, asmābhiḥ dṛśyate yat viśeṣīkṛtapadatvena purāṇapadaṁ tena arthaśāstrasya bahuṣu sthaleṣu prayuktam |
T02n2952u_001:4440: yadā kaścit nṛpatiḥ prakṛtakarmamārgaṁ parihāya duṣṭamārgamavalambate,
T02n2952u_001:4441: tadā śubhākāṅkṣiṇaḥ mantriṇaśca itihāsasya ca purāṇasya ca dṛṣṭāntaṁ darśayitvā taṁ rājānaṁ pāpamārgāt nivārayeyuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4446: ata eva kauṭilyakālīnāni kati purāṇāni ca sadācārarītiprathāviṣayakāni teṣāṁ viṣayaṁ vastūni ca sādhāraṇānāṁ yathā prayojanaṁ sādhayanti tathā rājñāṁ samīpe'pi tāni hitakarāṇi eva pratibhānti |
T02n2952u_001:4447: anyatra dṛśyate yat purāṇānāṁ pāṭhaḥ prātyahikakarmasūcyārambhaviśeṣa iti |
T02n2952u_001:4448: kauṭilyo jñāpayati yat divasasya prathamārddhe nṛpaḥ gajāśvarathaśāstraviṣayakaṁ paurāṇikaṁ pāṭhaṁ paṭhet,
T02n2952u_001:4449: parārddhe ca sa itihāsapāṭhe ātmānaṁ niyojayet - yatra viṣāyāḥ khalu purāṇam,
T02n2952u_001:4455: rājānaḥ sundareṇa vetanena purāṇeṣu nipuṇān janān rājakāryeṣu niyojayeyuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4456: te paurāṇikāḥ upayukteṣu kāryeṣu niyuktā bhaviṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:4458: idamatīva sthūlakāyaṁ vetanaṁ yat paurāṇikebhyaḥ dīyate,
T02n2952u_001:4459: tat tathā gurutvabhājāṁ madhye teṣāṁ padaṁ teṣāṁ gurutvaṁ dāyitvaṁ ca sūcayati |
T02n2952u_001:4460: anyatra trayītipadasya tātparyaṁ vyākhyātuṁ kauṭilyo vadati - sāmaveda ṛgvedo yajurvedaśceti vedatrayaṁ trayītyucyate |
T02n2952u_001:4462: evaṁ kauṭilyasya kāle itihāsasya ca purāṇasya ca vedānāmiva sammānaṁ babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:4463: tau viṣayau atimūlyavat pāṭhatvena svīkṛti lebhāte |
T02n2952u_001:4464: bahudharmasaṁhitāsu api vedapāragapadasya tātparyaṁ sūcayituṁ prayatnāḥ kṛtāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4466: tathā kartuṁ pravṛttāḥ etāḥ dharmasaṁhitāḥ sarvā eva eteṣāṁ purāṇānāṁ mahatvaṁ svīkurvanti |
T02n2952u_001:4467: vyāsasaṁhitāyāṁ vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat vedārthaṁ boddhumicchuko jana ānuṣaṅgikavijñānaiḥ saha vedatrayasya adhyayanaṁ vināpi purāṇānāṁ sayatnamadhyayanaṁ kuryāt |
T02n2952u_001:4468: vyāso manyate - mīmāṁsate ca yo vedān ṣaḍbhiraṅgaiḥ savistaraiḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4472: atra prasaṁge idaṁ lakṣyate yat brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāśceti varṇatraya dvijātitvena paricīyate |
T02n2952u_001:4473: kevalaṁ prāguktavarṇatrayagatānāṁ janānāṁ śrutismṛtipurāṇoktadharmavyāpāreṣu aṁśagrahaṇasya adhikāro'sti |
T02n2952u_001:4474: atra vaidikāya tathā paruāṇikāya dharmāya sadṛśaṁ gauravamarpitam |
T02n2952u_001:4475: kenacicchiṣyeṇa vidyāyā arjanasya viṣaye uśanāsaṁhitāyāṁ dṛśyate yat ajñātakulaśīlebhyaḥ janebhyaḥ vedadharmaśāstrapurāṇasaṁkrāntā śikṣā na deyā |
T02n2952u_001:4476: tatrocyate - vedaṁ dharmaṁ purāṇaṁ ca tathā tattvāni nityaśaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4480: tatrocyate - svādhyāyaṁ śrāvayet pitrye dharmaśāstrāṇi caiva hi |
T02n2952u_001:4483: vastutaḥ, vedagānena yat phalaṁ jāyate purāṇagānenāpi tat phalaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:4484: dharmīyānuṣṭhāneṣu sarvatra vedapāṭhena saha purāṇapāṭho'pi sadṛśaṁ gauravaṁ bhajate |
T02n2952u_001:4486: vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānāṁ dharmasya ca caturdaśa ||
T02n2952u_001:4495: atra prasaṁge yājñavalkyasaṁhitāyāmucyate - vākovākyaṁ purāṇaṁ ca nārāśaṁsīśca gāthikāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4498: karoti tṛptiṁ ca tathā pitṛṇāṁ madhusarpiṣā ||
T02n2952u_001:4500: punaśca lakṣyate tatra - vedātharvapurāṇāni setihāsāni śaktitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4503: vastutaḥ, te munayo jagadvyāpi yaśaḥ arjayanti,
T02n2952u_001:4504: yebhyaḥ sarve vedāḥ purāṇādayaśca utpatanti tathā visarpanti |
T02n2952u_001:4507: kumārilabhaṭṭaḥ punaḥ punaḥ purāṇebhyaḥ teṣāṁ yathāyathaṁ prāpyāṁśaṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:4508: teṣāṁ prāmāṇyaṁ tathā prācīnatvaṁ niḥsaṁśayena svīkṛtam |
T02n2952u_001:4510: sa sambhavataḥ 200 tamāt khṛṣṭābdāt 300 khṛṣṭābdaṁ yāvat samaye samajāyata |
T02n2952u_001:4511: sa tadīyamīmāṁsāsūtraṭīkāyāṁ vibhinnayāgasambandhināṁ devānāṁ prakṛtaṁ svarūpaṁ nirdhārayituṁ yatate |
T02n2952u_001:4512: kasmiṁścit prasaṁge sa āha yat asmin bindau itihāsaḥ purāṇaṁ caikamatyaṁ poṣayataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4513: tasya mate agniprabhṛtayaḥ svargavāsinaḥ khalu devāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4514: jaiminisūtrāṇāmupari likhitasya parsiddhiasya tantravārttikamiti granthasya praṇetā hi kumārilabhaṭṭaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4515: sa tatra yonitvena pramāṇatvena ca hi purāṇamullikhati |
T02n2952u_001:4516: tasya mate purāṇeṣu itihāseṣu ca dṛṣṭānāṁ vibhinnānāṁ vṛttāntānāṁ sākṣyaṁ niścayenaiva grahītavyam |
T02n2952u_001:4521: pavitre sthāne sampāditaṁ karmaṁ dharmaṁ nayati,
T02n2952u_001:4522: kintu apavitre sthāne sampāditaṁ karma duḥkhaṁ janayati |
T02n2952u_001:4523: evaṁ puṇyasya ca pāpasya ca nirdhāraṇāya jagataḥ pavitrasthānānāṁ prakṛtena jñānena sampūrṇataḥ prayojanamasti |
T02n2952u_001:4524: brāhmaṇavarṇīyā athavā kṣatriyavarṇīyā mahānto janā kevalamanupreraṇāyāḥ api tu yathāyathaṁ pramāṇyasya hetubhūtāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4525: ekasmin sthale kumārila āha yat buddhādayaḥ kecit kaliyuge āvirbhaviṣyanti iti purāṇeṣūcyate |
T02n2952u_001:4527: kintu bhāgyavaśāt tadipadeśaśravaṇasya janā nagaṇyā eva bhaviṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:4531: idaṁ darśayati yat kumārilasyāvirbhāvādanatipūrvameva purāṇāni bauddhadarśanasya spardhāṁ gṛhītvaiva vartante sma |
T02n2952u_001:4532: paurāṇikavicārānusāreṇa meruparvatasya pṛṣṭhe uttarasyāṁ diśi svargastiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:4533: svargapadārdhaṁ viśadīkurvan kumārilaḥ ādau tasya sthānam avadhārayituṁ ceṣṭate sma |
T02n2952u_001:4535: api na nakṣatrāṇāṁ grahāṇāṁ vā āśrayaḥ ?
T02n2952u_001:4537: api sa devalokaḥ cirantanasukhasya ādhāra iti sarve praśnāḥ kumārilenālocitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4538: idaṁ darśayati yat so'smin prasaṁge purāṇānāṁ dhāraṇābhiḥ saha niḥsandehena paricita āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4539: asmākaṁ vaktavyaṁ samarthayituṁ vayaṁ tadīyayantravārttikād uddhṛtiṁ yacchāmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4540: sa āha - ' tathā svargaśabdenāpi nakṣatradeśo vā vaidikapravādapaurāṇikayājñikadarśanena ucyate ..... yadi vetihāsapurāṇopapannaṁ merupṛṣṭhamathavā anvayavyatirekābhyāṁ vibhaktaṁ kevalameva sukham |
T02n2952u_001:4541: anena prakāreṇaiva śaṅkarācāryo'pi tasya śārīrakabhāṣyasya bahuṣu sthaleṣu na kevalaṁ purāṇaśabdam ullikhati sma api tu purāṇānāṁ bahubhiḥ pāṭhaiḥ saha paricitaḥ āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4542: yadyapi sa nāmnā na kimapi purāṇamullikhati tathāpi tasya vaktavyaṁ samarthayituṁ sa purāṇebhyaḥ ślokānām uddhṛtiṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:4543: te ślokā adyāpi vartamāneṣu purāṇeṣu prāpyante |
T02n2952u_001:4545: ekadā śaṅkarācāryastarkayati yat devānāṁ kiñcit sāmarthyamasti |
T02n2952u_001:4546: te śārīrikarūpāṇi dadhati iti mantrārthavādetihāsapurāṇebhyaḥ jñāyate'smābhiḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4548: sarvāṇi purāṇāni viśeṣeṇa vadanti yat devānāṁ nirdiṣṭa ākāraḥ,
T02n2952u_001:4551: śaṅkarācārya ekadā mantavyaṁ cakāra yat brahmā ca jagacca svabhāvena pthaktvaṁ vrajataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4552: sa tadīyasanatsujātīyabhāṣye muneḥ parāśarāt dvayoḥ ślokayoḥ uddhṛtiṁ dadau |
T02n2952u_001:4554: tathā ca idaṁ sphuṭaṁ yat śaṅkarācāryaḥ viṣṇupurāṇāt yathāśabdaṁ ślokau jagrāha,
T02n2952u_001:4555: yena purāṇena saha śaṅkarācāryaḥ sampūrṇataḥ paricita āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4557: kiñca, tadīyabrahmasūtrabhāṣye śaṅkarācāryaḥ purāṇebhyaḥ katīnāṁ tātparyapūrṇānāṁ tathā gurutvapūṇānāṁ ślokānāmullekhaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:4559: asyollekhena utsāho jāyate yatkiñcit parivartanaṁ parigṛhyāyaṁ śloko vāyupurāṇe'pi dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:4560: brahmasūtrabhāṣyasya sa śloko'dha uddhriyate - ataśca saṁkṣepamimaṁ śṛṇudhvaṁ nārāyaṇaḥ sarvamidaṁ purāṇam |
T02n2952u_001:4561: sa sargakāle ca karoti sarvaṁ saṁhārakāle ca tadatti bhūyaḥ ||
T02n2952u_001:4563: sa ca ghoṣayati yat duṣṭakarmaprakṛtyanusārataḥ janā vividhān narakān nīyante |
T02n2952u_001:4564: eteṣāṁ saptavidhānāṁ narakāṇāṁ vistṛtaṁ vivaraṇaṁ tathā citravadupasthāpanaṁ purāṇeṣu prāpyate |
T02n2952u_001:4565: api ca, śaṅkarācāryeṇa ālocitā viṣayā nimnarūpāḥ - tathā hi atītānāṁ bhāvināṁ ca kalpanāṁ parimāṇam brahmaṇā sṛṣṭeḥ prāk cirantanānāṁ sarvavyāpināṁ ca vedānāṁ samāgamaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:4567: sattvānāṁ nāmnāṁ karmaṇāṁ ca prakāśaḥ ityādayaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4568: tathā kartuṁ sa vividhaiḥ purāṇaiḥ prabhāvito'bhavat,
T02n2952u_001:4570: śaṅkarācāryaḥ kāle kāle purāṇebhyaḥ kati vedān uddadhāra |
T02n2952u_001:4571: vastutaḥ sa vivṛṇoti sa viśvasṛṣṭeḥ prāk svīyakramānusārataḥ sthāvarāṇāmasthāvarāṇāṁ ca,
T02n2952u_001:4583: eva nāsti sandehāvasaraḥ yat etāni purāṇāni śaṅkarācāryeṇa vistareṇa paṭhitāni tathā prayuktāni |
T02n2952u_001:4584: atra prasaṁge purāṇānāṁ yāthārtyasya nirṇaye vātsyāyanasya vaktavyamatīva gurutvapūrṇam |
T02n2952u_001:4585: tasya mate ye nāma mantrabrāhmaṇarūpāṇāṁ vedānāṁ draṣṭāraḥ,
T02n2952u_001:4587: evaṁ vedānāmitihāsapurāṇānāṁ ca madhye samatā vartate |
T02n2952u_001:4588: yāvat teṣāṁ lekhakāḥ sṛṣṭikarmāṇi ca saṁśliṣyante |
T02n2952u_001:4589: avaśyameva teṣāṁ viṣayā vastūni vā vicitratāṁ vrajanti |
T02n2952u_001:4593: vātsyāyana āha ya eva mantrabrāhmaṇasya draṣṭāraḥ pravaktāraśca te khalu itihāsapurāṇasya dharmaśāstrasya ceti viṣayavyavasthāpanācca yathāviṣayaṁ prāmāṇyam |
T02n2952u_001:4594: yajño mantrabrāhmaṇasya lokavṛttamitihāsapurāṇasya lokavyavahāravyavastāpanaṁ dharmaśāstrasya viṣayaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4595: nyāyasūtrabhāṣye'nyatra anusandhīyate katīnāṁ svīkṛtānāṁ granthānāṁ bhittau,
T02n2952u_001:4596: yat itihāsaḥ purāṇāni ca atīva prācīnatvaṁ bhajanti |
T02n2952u_001:4597: teṣāṁ yāthārthye na ko'pi praśnaḥ samudeti |
T02n2952u_001:4598: ādikāvyaṁ rāmāyaṇaṁ ekādhikaiḥ purāṇaiḥ saha tasya paricayaṁ prakaṭayati |
T02n2952u_001:4599: tasya kaviḥ vālmīkiḥ ekatrāha yat yoginastam purāṇaiḥ,
T02n2952u_001:4601: pañcarātraiḥ pratyahaṁ dhyāyanti tathā ca kratubhiḥ tam pūjayanti |
T02n2952u_001:4602: katiṣu sthaleṣu sumantraḥ tādṛśajanatvena varṇitaḥ yo janaḥ purāṇāni adhīte sma |
T02n2952u_001:4604: ata eva idameva svābhāvikaṁ yat purāṇeṣu so'bhijña āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4606: tatra sa putrahīnatvāt daśarathasya mānasikī daśāṁ jānāti sma |
T02n2952u_001:4607: mānasikīṁ vedanāṁ dūrikartuṁ nṛpeṇa kiṁ kiṁ kṛtaṁ tadapi sumantreṇādhigatamāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4608: ata eva īdṛśyāmavasthāyāṁ samāgatāyāṁ sa etā atītā ghaṭanā varṇayati |
T02n2952u_001:4609: kadāpi purāṇārthe kadāpi vā purātanasyārthe rāmāyaṇamiva mahābhārataṁ na punaḥ punaḥ viśeṣyatvena purāṇapadaṁ vyavaharati |
T02n2952u_001:4610: kintu keṣucit kṣetreṣu nirdiṣṭasāhityakarmatvena padamidaṁ prayuktam |
T02n2952u_001:4611: purāṇena saha mahābhāratasya paricitirāsīt tasya parokṣaṁ sākṣyaṁ mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇanāmāṁkite ślokadvaye'sti |
T02n2952u_001:4613: tathā kathāṁ śubhāṁ śrutvā mārkaṇḍeyasya dhīmataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4615: mahābhārataṁ spaṣṭataḥ vāyupurāṇasya ca matsyapurāṇasya ca viṣayaiḥ caritraiśca saha paricayaṁ darśayati evam - etat te sarvamākhyātamatītānāgataṁ mayā |
T02n2952u_001:4617: api ca, tapasā mahatā yuktaḥ so'tha sraṣṭuṁ pracakrame ||
T02n2952u_001:4618: sarvāḥ prajāḥ manuḥ sākṣād yathāvat bharatarṣabha |
T02n2952u_001:4620: yadyapi eteṣāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ svalpāṁśa eva varttamāne vāyupurāṇe matsyapurāṇe ca dṛśyate,
T02n2952u_001:4621: tathāpi idamanasvīkāryaṁ yat mahābhāratīyasaṁśliṣṭhāṁśaracanāsamaye ukte dve purāṇe prācīnarūpaṁ gṛhītvaiva bahulaṁ pracalite āstām |
T02n2952u_001:4622: kenāpi prakāreṇa mahābhārataṁ purāṇānāṁ pracalitāṁ saṁkhyāṁ ajñāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4623: tataḥ tat mahābhārataṁ viśeṣaṇa varṇayati purāṇāni aṣṭādaśa iti |
T02n2952u_001:4625: tatra auḍramāgadhīpravṛttiprayogaṁ varṇayan bharataḥ pūrvabhāratasya vahūnāṁ bhāgānāṁ nāmāni karoti |
T02n2952u_001:4626: tathā ca sa vadati yat ete cānye bhāgāśca purāṇeṣu kīrttitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4634: prāgāḥ prāvṛtayaścaiva yuñjanti ddhyoḍramāgadhīm anye'pi deśā ebhyo ye purāṇe samprakīrttitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4640: anena sūcyate yat purāṇāni tadā spaṣṭapurāṇajātīyasāhityakarmatvena svīkṛtāni āsan |
T02n2952u_001:4641: purāṇasāhityasya prācīnatvaṁ bahubhiḥ bauddhaiḥ tathā jainaiḥ granthaiḥ pratipāditam |
T02n2952u_001:4642: tathā hi anyatame mudrite saṁskaraṇe mahāpurāṇatvena kathitaḥ 'lalitavistaraḥ' iti granthaḥ kathayati yat bodhisattvaḥ nigamapurāṇetihāsavedavyākaraṇaprabhṛtiṣu vidyāsu atīva nipuṇa āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4644: milindapañhaḥ - yatra grīkarājamināndārasya ca bauddhamunināgasenasya ca madhye saṁlāpo vidhṛta iti pratyayaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:4645: sa granthaḥ nṛpasya mināndārasya śikṣāgatāṁ yogyatāṁ varṇayati |
T02n2952u_001:4646: yathā - sa vahūni kalāśāstrāṇi vijñānāni ca jajñau - pavitramaitihyam,
T02n2952u_001:4652: ' anyatrāyaṁ kathayati brāhamaṇaviṣayamadhikṛtya yat brāhmaṇānāṁ ca brāhmaṇāpatyānāṁ ca vṛttiḥ ṛgvedena,
T02n2952u_001:4659: idaṁ vaktavyaṁ yat dvayoḥ sthalayoḥ madhye'nyatarasmin kṣetre purāṇaśabdo bahuvacanena yuktaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4660: atrāyamāśayaḥ - sa śabdaḥ vidyāyāḥ śākhāṁ nirdiśati |
T02n2952u_001:4663: jaināḥ saṁskṛtapurāṇānām anukaraṇena tathā ādarśena bahūni sāhityāni vyaracayan,
T02n2952u_001:4664: eṣu lekhakeṣu prācīnatamaḥ khalu vimalasūrināmadheyaḥ kaścit-jaino muniḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4666: sa ekādhikeṣu prasaṁgeṣu idaṁ purāṇamiti uvāca |
T02n2952u_001:4667: ravisenanāmadheyo'paro jaino lekhakaḥ 678 tame khṛṣṭābde saṁskṛtabhāṣayā padmapurānaṁ lilekha |
T02n2952u_001:4669: eṣāṁ granthānāṁ nāmataḥ tathā granthanibaddhaviṣayāṇāṁ prakṛtitaḥ idaṁ sphuṭaṁ pañcalakṣaṇānāṁ saṁskṛtapurāṇānāṁ viṣaye khṛṣṭābdasūcanākalpakālāt eva jainānāmavagatirāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4670: evaṁ purāṇasāhityasya prakṛti ca prācīnatāṁ cādhikṛtya vedādisāhityebhyaḥ yāni tathyāni asmābhiḥ saṁgṛhyante,
T02n2952u_001:4672: etāni prabhavasthānāni parīkṣya dṛśyate yat khṛṣṭajanmanaḥ katipayavarṣebhyaḥ prāk eva purāṇasāhityaṁ samajāyata,
T02n2952u_001:4673: tathā ca tasmin purātane kāle eva ekādhikānāṁ purāṇānāmastitvamāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4674: vastutaḥ, purāṇānāṁ janapriyatvaṁ tathā gurutvaṁ nāsīdadivasavyāpī,
T02n2952u_001:4677: api tu bahuvarṣavyāpī viṣayaḥ yena purāṇaiḥ janamānaseṣu cirasthāyī prabhāvaḥ sthāptaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4684: api ca dharmadarśanādayaḥ - ete sarve viṣayāḥ purāṇānāṁ pṛṣṭheṣu upasthāpitāḥ santaḥ janānāṁ hṛdayaṁ jahruḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4685: ata eva sādhvidamucyate yat purāṇasāhityaṁ khalu svayaṁ prakāśakaṁ purātanamapi nūtanamamūlyaṁ prācīnabhāratīyaṁ nidhānam |
T02n2952u_001:4686: ------------ ṣaṣṭho'dhyāyaḥ purāṇeṣu karuṇā anubhavajanyajñānaviṣayo hi dharmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4688: yadyapi na kevalaṁ hindudharmasya api tu sarveṣāṁ dharmāṇāṁ kaścidānuṣṭhāniko viṣayo'sti,
T02n2952u_001:4689: tathāpi prakṛtārthena prayukto dharmo vastutaḥ mūlyajagatā saha pratyakṣaṁ sāvadhānatā |
T02n2952u_001:4691: te maulikamūlyamahattvapramāṇārthaṁ parokṣamārgāḥ kasyaciddeśasya saṁskṛtistaddeśīye dharme pratiphalitā bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:4694: tathā hi - prācīno grīsaḥ kalāyāmanurāgī āsīt,
T02n2952u_001:4696: uktasabhyatādvayena saha bhāratīyasabhyatāyāstulanāyāṁ kṛtāyāmidaṁ dṛśyate yat dharmanirapekṣatāyā upari pratiṣṭhitā sabhyatā vismṛtiṁ yāti,
T02n2952u_001:4697: kintu bhāratīyā sabhyatā dharmarājanītyādijhañjhāsaṁkule virodhini pariveśe'pi bhayaśūnyaiva daṇḍāyamānā tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:4698: atra hetuḥ - tasyā bhittibhūmiḥ na mithyādharmanirapekṣatāyā śithile saikate sthāpitā,
T02n2952u_001:4701: tatra yathākramaṁ kāle kāle bahava ādhyātmikā netāra āgatāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4702: te hi saṁskṛteryathārthaṁ vāhakāḥ - yatra saṁskṛtau mādhuryasya tathā satyasya samanvayaḥ sādhito bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:4704: satyaṁ ca jñānālokaṁ prajvalayati - sa āloko nāmādhyātmikaḥ, prabodhaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4705: tatkartṛhvānaṁ na kevalaṁ jātiviśeṣāya sampradāyaviśeṣāya vā kriyate'pi tu samagramānavebhya eva |
T02n2952u_001:4706: teṣāṁ vāṇī tathā śikṣā na kevalaṁ samayaviśeṣe sthānaviśeṣe vā prayujyate,
T02n2952u_001:4707: api tu samagre viśve tathā samagre kāle |
T02n2952u_001:4709: evaṁ vinimayaprathāviśeṣamabhyasyati - yatra vaidikāḥ purohitā yajñe kañciddevaṁ kāṁściddevān vā āhūya pūjayanti,
T02n2952u_001:4710: tasmācca athavā tebhyaśca vinimayena pracuraṁ vittamicchanti |
T02n2952u_001:4711: tathāpi idaṁ svīkarttavyaṁ yat teṣu vyāvahārikeṣu svārthapareṣu ca kāryeṣu kācinmahatī nītirbabhūva |
T02n2952u_001:4712: sā khalu satyasyāthavā ṛtasya nītiḥ yat satyamācaraṇānāṁ sādhāraṇeṣu niyameṣu svayaṁ prakaṭitam |
T02n2952u_001:4713: ayaṁ naitiko vyāpāraḥ yaḥ prācīne dharme dṛśate - paravarttini kāle ākāraviśeṣaṁ dadhāra |
T02n2952u_001:4714: sa ca māhākāvyikaṁ paurāṇikaṁ ca yugamātya nirdiṣṭasāmājikādarśatvena pariṇato babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:4724: samājaḥ pārasparikakarmasu niyuktān sarvavidhān lokān gṛhītvā racitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4725: sa na sajātīyānāṁ savṛttīyānāṁ samamanobhāvānāṁ janānāṁ samavāyaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4726: ata eva sarveṣāṁ sampradāyānāṁ savṛttīyānāṁ samamanobhāvānāṁ janānāṁ samavāyaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4727: ata eva sarveṣāṁ sampradāyānāṁ sarvāsāṁ vā jātīnāṁ kṛte kati niyamā avaśyameva sthāsyanti |
T02n2952u_001:4728: te niyamāḥ khalu sāmājikavāhanasya samṛddhyā prayojanaṁ sādhayanti,
T02n2952u_001:4729: teṣu kati sarvātiśāyino vyāpārāḥ santi ye sarvebhyaḥ kañcit vyavahāraṁ kāmayante |
T02n2952u_001:4733: pitṛśca āhutidānam - ityādīni kāryāṇi sarvairavaśyaṁ karaṇīyāni āsan |
T02n2952u_001:4738: gurujanebhyaḥ sammānamityādīni karttavyāni sāmājikāstitvasya pakṣe maulikāni kāraṇāni |
T02n2952u_001:4739: ata eva evaṁkaraṇaṁ hi sārvalaukikaṁ karttavyam |
T02n2952u_001:4742: vivāhavidhipālanamete viṣayāḥ vyaktisukhāya tathā sāmājikaikyavidhānāya ca upayogino vivicyante |
T02n2952u_001:4745: vācā cintayā karmaṇā ca śucitāyā abhyāsaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4750: ete viṣayāḥ vaidikayugāt svīkṛtāḥ sacetanatayā na cet,
T02n2952u_001:4753: anyadharmaḥ iti vaktuṁ bauddhadharmaḥ jainadharmaśceti sūcyate |
T02n2952u_001:4754: tayoḥ dharmayoḥ madhye yā mānavatā sā brāhmaṇadharme tātparyamayaṁ vaiśiṣṭyaṁ sthāpitavatī |
T02n2952u_001:4755: karmaṇi eṣā nītiḥ nirdayeṣu anuṣṭhāneṣu sūkṣmaṁ parivartanamānināya |
T02n2952u_001:4756: asmāt kāraṇāt paurāṇike yuge hindudharmaḥ prāyeṇa parivarttitaḥ iti parilakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:4757: jātīyadharmasya koṣādhyakṣā brahmaṇā prādhānyena buddhijīviśreṇībhuktā āsan |
T02n2952u_001:4758: te nīravaṁ parājayaṁ na svīkurvanti sma |
T02n2952u_001:4759: te bauddhadharmāttathā jainadharmāt śaktimūlaṁ saṁgṛhya hindudharmaṁ balavattamaṁ cakruḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4760: evaṁ ca ātmotsargadānamahatvādipūrṇāni ākhyānāni ālokasaṅketā iva yugaṁ yugaṁ vyāpya hindudharmīyācaraṇamārge ālokasampātaṁ kurvanti sma |
T02n2952u_001:4761: gṛhasthajīvanasya vidhīn varṇayan varṇāśramadharmo vividhānāṁ karttavyakarmaṇāmupari gurutvaṁ dadau |
T02n2952u_001:4775: ukte viśleṣaṇe tattathasya pramāṇāya ceṣṭā kriyate yat hindudharmaḥ mūlataḥ karuṇātmako dharmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4777: ata eva yadi vayaṁ purāṇeṣu kāruṇikaṁ bhāvaṁ draṣṭuṁ ceṣṭāmahe,
T02n2952u_001:4778: tarhi paśyāmo yat sa bhāvaḥ prācīnatamaparyāyebhyaḥ eva sammukhaṁ krameṇāgataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4780: anyathā karuṇāvirahito dharmo na kadāpi yugaparīkṣātaḥ jīvituṁ śaknoti |
T02n2952u_001:4781: karuṇāyā ālokaḥ viśṛṁkhaleṣu upākhyāneṣu purāvṛtteṣu ca aspaṣṭatāṁ dūrīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:4782: sā karuṇā paryavekṣakasya dṛṣṭau svayaṁ prakāśate,
T02n2952u_001:4784: tathā ca pramāṇaṁ karoti yat śāśvato hindudharmaḥ pradhānataḥ mahān tathā udāraḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4785: purāṇānāṁ sthānam purāṇasāhityaṁ dharmīyakalpaviṣayatvenābhidhīyate tatra dharmanirapekṣaviṣayāḥ santi |
T02n2952u_001:4786: kintu tasya prasthānaṁ vedāpekṣayā na nyūnatāṁ vrajati |
T02n2952u_001:4788: tarhi purāṇāni sādhāraṇānāṁ janānā dhanāni nikaṭātmīyarūpāṇi |
T02n2952u_001:4791: yat sāhityaṁ yugaṁ yugaṁ vyāpya gāthāsu kathāsu ca rakṣitamāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4792: etāḥ gāthāḥ kathā ākhyāyikāśca vistṛte sāhitye sthānamadhikurvanti sma |
T02n2952u_001:4794: idamullekhyaṁ yat purāṇasaṁkalanasya kālo ya eva vā bhavatu vā na bhavatu,
T02n2952u_001:4795: purāṇagataṁ pṛthak pṛthak ākhyānaṁ sambhavataḥ vaidikayugasya pratyūṣe eva samajāyata |
T02n2952u_001:4796: dharmīyaṁ sāmājikaṁ rājanītikaṁ matamadhikṛtya sañjātamākhyānamantareṇāpi naitikaviṣayam avalmbya yadākhyānaṁ tam tātkālikaṁ naitikaṁ niyamaṁ dyotayati |
T02n2952u_001:4800: sa viṣayaḥ kevalaṁ dharmīyaṁ vyāpāraṁ gocarībhūtaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:4801: prācīnagranthapāṭhāt idaṁ parisphuṭaṁ yat prācīne bhārate pradhānato dve mukhye aitihye pracalite āstām |
T02n2952u_001:4802: tathā hi - brāhmaṇyaitihyaṁ ca kṣātraitihyaṁ ca |
T02n2952u_001:4806: vaidikasāhityamathavā brāhmaṇyaitihāṁ prācīnayugasya dharmīyacintākarmabhiḥ upakāraṁ na karoti,
T02n2952u_001:4807: kintu purāṇeṣu itihāseṣu ca prativimbitaṁ kṣatraitihyaṁ dharmanirapekṣapariveśaviṣayaka bhāvaracanāyai asmān sahāyatāṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:4808: tathāpi, ubhayoḥ aitihyayoḥ viśleṣaṇaṁ pārśvāparśvi saṁśliṣṭe citre samagratāmānayati |
T02n2952u_001:4809: ubhayoraikyaṁ vānaikyaṁ vā na kimapi vastu |
T02n2952u_001:4814: adṛśyaṁ sūtramiva etat prāvaṇyaṁ dharmīyamadharmīyaṁ ca samagraṁ bhāratīyaṁ cintanaṁ ca viśvasanaṁ ca praviśati |
T02n2952u_001:4815: api ca, tīrthayātrābheṣajavidyāprāyaścittādīnāṁ sampūrṇataḥ bhinnānāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ prabhāvo'sti karuṇātmakaviśvajanaprītivyāpāre |
T02n2952u_001:4820: yataḥ mānavajāteḥ maṅgalaṁ vyaktīnāṁ sāmagrikaṁ maṅgalam vinā na kiñcidvastu |
T02n2952u_001:4822: yadyapi kati kathā yathārtha eva atīvaprācīnāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4823: tāni purāṇāni sādhāraṇaiḥ janaiḥ saha antaraṅgaṁ vastunīva asminnapi kāle kāle parivartanaṁ sañjātam |
T02n2952u_001:4826: parivartanaśīlakālasya ākāṅkṣāṇāṁ jñānāya tathā grahaṇāya asyodāratāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4827: jīvanabalasya pramāṇāya kasyacit prāṇavataḥ samājasya avaśyameva pravāhasya tathā parivartanasya śaktiḥ sthāsyati |
T02n2952u_001:4828: dharmapravāhaḥ sarvadā vibhinnayugadhārānusaraṇena tasya gatimārge parivarttanaṁ sādhayati |
T02n2952u_001:4830: evañca, purāṇāni spaṣṭhataḥ vividhānāṁ yugānāmānukūlyaṁ parigṛhya vibhinnānāṁ devānāṁ janapriyatvaṁ darśayanti |
T02n2952u_001:4831: brāhmaṇyaitihyamanusṛtya atharvavede ca bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadi ca yathā likhitaṁ tathā dṛśyate yat vedānāmiva purāṇānāmapi pavitramūlatvamasti
T02n2952u_001:4832: atharvaveda āha yat yajubhiḥ saha yajñaśeṣāt ṛcaḥ sāmāni chandāṁsi purāṇāni ca jāyante sma |
T02n2952u_001:4833: anyataśca, bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣad vedetihāsapurāṇādīnāṁ prabhavaṁ mahābhūtasya śvāsatvena varṇayati |
T02n2952u_001:4835: tathāpi purāṇānāṁ pavitratve dve mate eva aikamatyaṁ dhārayataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4837: purāṇeṣu pañca lakṣaṇani santi iti vidhīyate |
T02n2952u_001:4838: tathā hi - sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṁśo manvantarāṇi ca |
T02n2952u_001:4854: kalpakathāsu ca yā yāgānāṁ madhyataḥ āgacchati - ākhyānaiścopākhyānairgāthābhiḥ kalpahoktibhiḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4882: tathāpi uktāni aṣṭādaśapurāṇi atīva gurutvapūrṇāni iti vivecanā |
T02n2952u_001:4883: kadācidvā vā etāni purāṇāni tridhā vibhājyantetathā hi - sāttvikam,
T02n2952u_001:4888: īdṛśaṁ vargīkaraṇaṁ svasampradāyāya gurutvaṁ dātuṁ sampradāyaviśeṣeṇa kṛtam |
T02n2952u_001:4891: kenacana svatantreṇa upāyena hindudharmasya varṇanaṁ khalu purāṇānāmabhiprāyaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4892: vedeṣu upaniṣatsu ca yat kārkaśyena varṇitaṁ purāṇeṣu tat ākhyānādibhiḥ kathyate - yena prakāreṇa saralatamaṁ manaḥ purāṇānāṁ viśuddhāḥ vāṇīṁ grahītumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:4893: atra śāstroktakriyā api saralīkṛtayā rītyā varṇitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4896: api ca, anekadevavādī dharmaḥ iva vaidiko dharmaḥ prakṛttyā sahiṣṇureva |
T02n2952u_001:4897: asmāt kāraṇāt vividheṣu devaviṣayeṣu pariṇāmataḥ samīkaraṇaṁ jātam |
T02n2952u_001:4899: sa paryāyaḥ sampūrṇataḥ śāstroktakriyāsu magna āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4900: janapriyatārjanāya kasyaciddharmasya pakṣe saralena tathā samena tattvena,
T02n2952u_001:4904: asmin kṣetre brāhmaṇānāṁ tathā upaniṣadāṁ vyarthatā avaidikacintādhārāsu parokṣamutsāhaṁ sañcāritamakarot |
T02n2952u_001:4905: yāścintādhārāḥ krameṇa kintu niścayena mukhyatvamarjayanti sma |
T02n2952u_001:4906: itomadhye upaniṣadbhiḥ sṛṣtānāmanukūlāvasthānāṁ suyogaṁ prāpya bauddhāḥ jaināścetyādayo'vaidikā dharmā vedānāṁ prāmāṇyaṁ na svīkṛtya drutaṁ vistāraṁ labhante sma |
T02n2952u_001:4910: tasminneva samaye te durvalāṇi vstūni paryaharan |
T02n2952u_001:4911: eteṣāmavaidikānāṁ dharmīyāṇāṁ vyāpārāṇāmastitvaṁ yadyapi citaṁ na rakṣitam,
T02n2952u_001:4912: tathāpi te samagrahindudharmasya sāmānyabhāvadhārāyāṁ pracuraṁ prabhāvamasthāpayan |
T02n2952u_001:4915: tathā hi - pūrvavartī dharmaḥ kaṭhorastathā manāṅniṣṭhuro'pi āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4916: kintu paravarttī dharmaḥ namanīyataraḥ sañjātaḥ - yatra bhinnamatānāṁ vivecanāyā avasara āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:4917: ayaṁ daṇḍaṁ yathā dadāti tathaiva daṇḍanivāraṇasyopāyam api vadati |
T02n2952u_001:4919: eṣā hi karuṇā vyarthatāṁ durvalatāṁ ca svīkṛtyāpi sanmārgaṁ na parityajati |
T02n2952u_001:4922: ye vyāpārāḥ vaidikadharmāpekṣayā mahattarā udāratarā eva |
T02n2952u_001:4926: ayaṁ dharmaḥ purāṇānāṁ jñānasāgarādutthāya yadyapi āpātadṛṣṭyā prācīnaṁ dharmamanukaroti tathāpi sa dharmaḥ praśānta udāraśca |
T02n2952u_001:4928: kintu teṣu kācidādarśagatā dig vartate yā satyaṁ mithyā vā darśayati,
T02n2952u_001:4934: jīvanapraśnaḥ samādhīyate - ākhyānairupākhyanaiśca purāṇameteṣāṁ saralatamaṁ mārgaṁ darśayati |
T02n2952u_001:4935: idaṁ vismayena upplikhyate yat purāṇāni anena mārgeṇa vividhatattveṣu,
T02n2952u_001:4937: jīvanācaraṇaviṣāyakeṣu vaidikeṣu avaidikeṣu mateṣu milanaṁ racayanti |
T02n2952u_001:4940: jñānakarmabhaktitatveṣu ca jīvanavyavahāraviṣayakeṣu vaidikeṣu avaidikeṣu ca mateṣu purāṇasādhitasamanvayaḥ hindusamājasya sarveṣu stareṣu prabhāvaṁ pranoti sma |
T02n2952u_001:4941: tasya pariṇāmataḥ eva vartamānakāle prāyeṇa sarveṣāṁ hindūnāṁ jīvanaṁ suvinyastaṁ sañjātaṁ yatra bhinnakālīyānāṁ bhinnadharmīyāṇāṁ bhinnānāṁ bhāvānāmabhyāsānāṁ ca asamāntarālasamatayā parasparasaṁgranthanaṁ kṛtam |
T02n2952u_001:4942: vidyāsthānebhyo dūre vasati īdṛśo'śikṣito hindurapi purāṇakathitadārśanikasatye sampūrṇataḥ ajñatāṁ na poṣayati |
T02n2952u_001:4946: itthaṁbhūtavyāpārasya hetutvena idameva kathyate yat mahākāvyāni purāṇāni ca hindūnāṁ jīvane'tīva gurutvapūrṇabhūmikayābhinayanti dvisahasravarṣādhikaṁ samayaṁ vyāpya |
T02n2952u_001:4947: tāni kamapi kalahaṁ na kṛtvaiva sādhāraṇebhyo janebhyaḥ maharṣiṇāṁ jñānamaparyanti sma |
T02n2952u_001:4948: eteṣāṁ sāhityānāṁ lekhakāḥ pratyekaṁ janaṁ vivicya tasya sāmājike tathā dharmīye jīvane kalyāṇakaramupadeśaṁ dattavantaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4949: etaiḥ sāhityaiḥ unnato mūlyabodhastathā naitiko niyamaḥ vyāvahārikeṇa jñānena yuktastiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:4950: ayaṁ mānavacaritrasya katicit truṭīḥ yathā gṛṇāti tathaiva tāsāmatikramāyāpi upāyaṁ darśayati,
T02n2952u_001:4951: samagrato mānavajātīnāmevaṁvidhe grahaṇe eva pavitragrantheṣu prativimbitasya mānavikasya vyāpārasya mūlaṁ pramāṇamasti |
T02n2952u_001:4962: kṣamāyāśca vismṛteśca pravṛttiḥ kasyacijjanasya tadīyasahacarāṇāṁ ca jīvanaṁ yathopayuktaṁ sādhayati |
T02n2952u_001:4963: eṣā vāṇī dhruvakavat eteṣu janapriyeṣu sāhityeṣu bahubhirākhyānairupākhyānaiśca punaḥ punaḥ samarpyate |
T02n2952u_001:4964: bhrama eva mānavadharmasatathāpi bhramasaṁśodhanāya yaḥ prayatnaḥ sa eva mānavaṁ mahāmānavaparyāyaṁ nayati |
T02n2952u_001:4965: sa samayaḥ samāgato yadā purāṇeṣu itihāsegru ca racitānāṁ devākhyānānāṁ ca purāvṛttānāṁ ca punarvyākhyānairna prayojanamasti |
T02n2952u_001:4967: atra paurāṇikasāhitye vivṛtasya hindudharmasya kāruṇikadharmatvena viśleṣaṇāya kācit praceṣṭā kriyate |
T02n2952u_001:4968: yatra prathāstathā ācārā na pradhānāḥ kintu mahattā tathā karuṇā prakṛtātmatvena pratiṣṭhitā |
T02n2952u_001:4971: yatra sāmpradāyikānāṁ cintanānāṁ tathā viśvāsānāṁ vibhinnā dhārā militāḥ sañjātāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:4973: tathāpi tatra ekā dārśanikī bhūmikā antarnihitā satī sarvāṇi maulikāni satyāni prakṛte pariprekṣite samarthayate sma |
T02n2952u_001:4982: śiṣyaṁ prati ācāryasya pravṛttirathavā ācāryaṁ prati śiṣyasya karttavyatā,
T02n2952u_001:4991: vahvyaḥ kathā āpātadṛṣṭyā saralā dhamīyavarṇahīnā iva pratibhānti,
T02n2952u_001:4992: kintu sūkṣmaṁ paryavekṣeṇa pramāṇīkaroti yat etāsu kathāsu kācit karuṇātmikā cintā virājate |
T02n2952u_001:4993: idaṁ satyaṁ yat purāṇeṣu dharmīyo bhāvo vartate |
T02n2952u_001:4994: asmāt kāraṇāt ākhyānabhāgeṣu guṇasya mahatī bhūmikāsti |
T02n2952u_001:4997: bhaktirnāmāpara āvego yo bahuṣu vyāpareṣu lakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:5008: bahūni upākhyānāni imaṁ bhaktijamāvegaṁ goraveṇa anvitaṁ kurvanti |
T02n2952u_001:5011: kintu bhakto yadā kasmaicidātmānaṁ samarpayati tadā kiñcit pratyuttaramavaśyameva sthāsyati |
T02n2952u_001:5013: kevalaṁ jyeṣṭhānāṁ gurujanānāṁ cānandaḥ paryāpta iti gaṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:5014: ya ānanda ihaloke paraloke ca saubhāgyopabhogāya kalpate |
T02n2952u_001:5016: prakṛti yajñaḥ kadāpi na vṛthā yāti - etādṛśī śikṣā eva purāvṛttebhyo jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:5017: atra bhaktisambandhinaḥ kati utkṛṣṭā dṛṣṭāntāḥ santi |
T02n2952u_001:5021: svāminaṁ prati janmāntaravyāpini svārthahīne vyavahāre gurutvamāropayanti |
T02n2952u_001:5024: tasya patnī śaivyātīva puṇyavatī dharmaparāyaṇā ca āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5026: ekadā yadā tau prātyahikagaṅgāsnānāt pratyāgacchataḥ sma tadā pathi ekaṁ pāpinaṁ janamapaśyatām |
T02n2952u_001:5027: vratakāle tena rājñā pāpinā saha vārtālāpaḥ kṛtaḥ iti hetoḥ parajanmani tasya kukkuratvena janma abhūt |
T02n2952u_001:5030: tayā kukkuraviśeṣamanusandhāya pūrvajanmasu tasya jīvanāni smaryyante sma |
T02n2952u_001:5031: evaṁ katiṣu janmasu gateṣu sa rājño janakasya putratvena janmagrahaṇaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5032: tadā rājakanyayā saha tasya vivāho babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:5034: vibhinnanimnajanmagrahaṇaṁ kurvate svāmine rājakanyāyā adhyavasāyastathā janmānukrameṇa svābhidarśanodyamaḥ vismayakaraḥ vyāpāraḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5039: tasya saubhāgyamevedaṁ yat tasya patnī mahatī satī tasya jīvanāya cintayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5043: pathivipreṇāpamānitaḥ kaścinmunistaṁ vipramaśapat sūryodayena sahaiva tasya mṛtyurbhaviṣyatīti |
T02n2952u_001:5044: satītvasyaitādṛśīśaktiryat sā patnī sūryodayena saha svāmino mṛtyuṁ ruṇaddhi mma yataḥ sā ca kadāpi svāmino mṛtyuṁ na kāmayate |
T02n2952u_001:5045: yatastasya svāmī kāyena manasā ca asusthastataḥ svāmino'nyāye ca duṣṭe ca vyavahāre tasyāḥ ko'pi abhiyogo nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:5046: ākhyānasyāsya pariṇāme sa vipraḥ anasūyāyā hastakṣepāt devānāmānukūlyaṁ labdhvā rogamuktaḥ sañjātaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5048: pratiṣṭhāpurasya nṛpateḥ surasenasya putratvenaikaḥ sarpa āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5049: rājñā tathā rājapatnyā viṣayo'yaṁ gupta āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5050: upayukte vayasi sa sarpo vivāhaṁ kartumicchati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5051: guptaviṣayaṁ nonmucya pūrvadeśīyarājakanyayā bhogavatyā saha tasya vivāho vyavasthito'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5052: vivāhāt paraṁ bhogavatī tasyāḥ svāminaḥ prakṛtaṁ paricayaṁ jñātumarhati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5054: parantu sā taṁ sevate sma yathā ekā strī kuryāt |
T02n2952u_001:5055: anena mahattvena sā ekāṁ śaktiṁ prāptavatī yayā tau svāmī ca strī ca pūrvajanmavṛttāntaṁ smartuṁ śekatuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5056: sarpeṇa smṛtaṁ pūrvajanmani sa kaścicchivānucara āsīditi |
T02n2952u_001:5059: pavitraṁ sthānaṁ gatvā śivasyārādhanāyai sa bhogavatyānuruddho babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:5060: śivasya vareṇa sa svābhāvikaṁ jīvanaṁ pratiprāpnoti sma |
T02n2952u_001:5061: vayaṁ sadā tarkayāmo yat prācīnavyavahāravidhiḥ strījanebhya etādṛśīṁ svārthaśūnyatāmaicchat |
T02n2952u_001:5063: tathāpi bahuṣu upākhyāneṣu dṛśyate yat svāminaḥ yathārthataḥ teṣāṁ bhaktihīnābhyaḥ guṇahīnābhyaḥ patnībhyaḥ hitāya ceṣṭāmakurvan |
T02n2952u_001:5064: tebhyaḥ upākhyānebhya idamāyāti yat sadṛḍhapremabandhanena snehena gabhīrabāyitvajñānena ca atīva prayojanamasti dāmpatyajīvane |
T02n2952u_001:5066: tasmin premaṇi prakṛtā tayāvatiṣṭhate - yā karuṇāyāḥ paridhau vartate |
T02n2952u_001:5067: sūryasya tahtā tadīyapatnyāḥ saṁjñāyā upākhyāne asyopākhyānasyojjvalo dṛṣṭānto dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:5071: sūryasya dāruṇaṁ tejaḥ soḍhumakṣamā satī chāyānāmnīṁ ātmanaḥ pratikṛtiṁ sṛṣṭvānyatrāgacchat |
T02n2952u_001:5072: sā vikalparūpā saṁjñāyāḥ putrān prati viṣamaṁ vyavaharat |
T02n2952u_001:5073: tadā sūryaḥ aśvasya chadyaveṣaṁ dhṛtvā saṁjñānusandhānāyottarakurudeśaṁ jagāma,
T02n2952u_001:5074: yataḥ tasmin samaye saṁjñā aśvāyā veṣaṁ dadhāra |
T02n2952u_001:5075: mūlataḥ sa tasya patnyai ātmanaḥ tejaḥ parityaktuṁ sammata āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5076: eṣā daśā yadyapi yantrāṇā- dāyikā tathāpi sa saṁjñāyai soḍhuṁ kṛtasaṁkalpa āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5080: kintu tathā na kṛtvā sa patnyā saha sukhena vāsāya duḥkhajanakasaṁgati sthāpayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5083: idaṁ pratīyate yat te dve mahile atīva avaśyatāṁ jāte |
T02n2952u_001:5086: yathā te dve mahile atīva avaśyatāṁ jāte |
T02n2952u_001:5091: kintu kaśyapasya pratyāgamane āsanne sati te kukārye lipte'bhavatām |
T02n2952u_001:5096: pratyāgataḥ kaśyapaḥ sarvaṁ śrutvā patnīpakṣasamarthanāya śivaṁ stavaiḥ santuṣya svīyapatnīyugalaṁ hāni vinaiva pratyāpnoti sma |
T02n2952u_001:5097: tathāpi aśodhyatvāt kadruḥ punarapi brāhmaṇān prati upahasya anyat pāpaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5100: etadupākhyānaṁ pramāṇaṁ karoti yat kena prakāreṇa kaśyapena patnīdoṣo na dṛṣṭaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5102: yadyapi te dve pāpakarmaṇi lipte āstām |
T02n2952u_001:5105: tatra sa muniḥ tadīyakutsitāṁ strīṁ tapobalena sundarīṁ kṛtavān |
T02n2952u_001:5108: kintu rājani bahulāyāḥ kimapi prema nāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5110: tathāpi rājā kimapi na manyate sma |
T02n2952u_001:5111: ekadā bahulā samagraṁ śiṣṭatvamatikrabhya paripūrṇāyāṁ rājasabhāyāṁ rājānamapamānitaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5112: tadā rājā kruddhaḥ san patnīṁ bahulāṁ vanaṁ prerayāmāsa |
T02n2952u_001:5113: itomadhye kaścid vipra āgatya bahulāyā apaharaṇasya sandeśaṁ nivedayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5116: yathākramaṁ so'vagato'bhavat yat bahulā sarparājyaṁ nītā'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5118: rājā tadīyapatnīvirāgāt mukto bhavituṁ prāguktasya viprasya sahāyatayā bahulāṁ gṛhamāṇītavān |
T02n2952u_001:5120: rājñī bahulā tanmūkatvamuktaye sarparājakanyāṁ sahāyatāṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5121: vipro yajñabalena rājakanyāyā vākśakteḥ punaruddhāraṁ kṛtavān |
T02n2952u_001:5122: idamupākhyānam ucchṛṅkhalāyāṁ patnyāṁ svāminaḥ yat prema tasyodāharaṇatvenopanyastam |
T02n2952u_001:5123: bahuṣu purāṇeṣu pitṛbhakterdṛṣṭāntatvena yayāteḥ purośca upākhyānaṁ prasiddham |
T02n2952u_001:5124: idaṁ pratīyate yat asyopākhyānasya cittākarṣakatvāt prācīne kāle eva bahulaṁ pracāraṁ labhamānaṁ prāyeṇa sarveṣu purāṇeṣu svīyasthānamadhicakāra
T02n2952u_001:5125: vṛddho'pi yayātiḥ sukhabhogaiḥ na santuṣṭa āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5126: ata eva sa jarārpaṇena putreṣu anyatamasya yauvanaṁ prāptumaicchat |
T02n2952u_001:5127: ekaikaśaḥ sarve putrā tat dātuṁ sammatā na babhūvuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5128: kintu kaniṣṭhaḥ putraḥ puruḥ jarāgrahaṇena pitre ātmanaḥ yauvanaṁ samarpitavān |
T02n2952u_001:5129: tataḥ tṛptaḥ san yayātiḥ purave tadīyayauvanaṁ samarpya,
T02n2952u_001:5133: tatra pramatiputraḥ sumatiḥ gandharvakṛtabandhanadaśātaḥ tasya pitaramamuñcat |
T02n2952u_001:5134: mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇe ekasminnupākhyāne gurave śiṣyasya udvego varṇitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5137: ekadā sa śāntināmakāya śiṣyāya agnestattvāvadhānabhāraṁ pradāya anyatra gataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5139: anena guruḥ kruddho bhaviṣyati iti cintayitvā śāntiratīva bhīto'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5140: sa jānāti sma yat gurostathākathitakopāt kāpi muktirnāsti |
T02n2952u_001:5143: śāntiḥ prathamaṁ varaṁ prārthayate sma - yajñīyo'gniḥ prajvalito bhavatu iti |
T02n2952u_001:5144: tataḥ gurave ekaṁ putraṁ sa icchati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5146: munau pratyāgate sa ātmanaḥ svabhāve kiñcit parivartanamupalabdhavān |
T02n2952u_001:5147: tataḥ asya kāraṇam anusandhāya sarvaṁ jñātumaśaknot |
T02n2952u_001:5148: idam upākhyānaṁ na kevalaṁ śiṣyasya svārthaśūnyatāṁ darśayati3,
T02n2952u_001:5149: api tu gurau tasya sāmagrikīṁ bhaktiṁ pramāṇīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:5150: yayā bhaktyā sa guroḥ doṣān agaṇayitvā guruḥ yathā ākāṅkṣitaṁ vastu prāpnoti tathā karoti ||
T02n2952u_001:5151: prācīnā granthā mānavasya devasya madhye niviḍa naikaṭyaṁ paryavekṣante |
T02n2952u_001:5152: idaṁ satyaṁ yat devā lābhapradeṣu padeṣu pratiṣṭhitā āsan |
T02n2952u_001:5154: deveṣu martyeṣu ca avicchinno yoga āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5155: sarvatra vayaṁ 'paśyāmaḥ yat sadaiva narakamapi devam ekaniṣṭhayāhnayati,
T02n2952u_001:5160: sa dadāti - ātmanaḥ kleśe satyapi sa dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:5161: devāḥ kadāpi dayācintanād viratā na bhavanti,
T02n2952u_001:5162: kadāpi guṇasya ca doṣasya samatāṁ na cintayanti,
T02n2952u_001:5163: kadāpi vā na lābhasya hānervā gaṇanāṁ kurvanti |
T02n2952u_001:5164: ata eva ca kadāpi vā dātā labdhakṣayo bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5166: tasya bhūmiṁ vā svargaṁ vā hārayati |
T02n2952u_001:5167: api ca, tasya araṇyādaraṇāntare bhramaṇasya kāraṇaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5168: tathāpi devā adhikavaradānād viratā na bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:5169: te martyebhyo hitāya praśnātītaṁ kalyāṇaṁ sādhayanti |
T02n2952u_001:5170: anena varadānena gabhīrā prītiḥ karuṇā nimnatarajīvebhya eva iti sūcyate |
T02n2952u_001:5171: kadāpi vāvaśyameva īdṛśī svārthaśūnyā prītiḥ yugapat anurāgeṇa vā bhaktyā vā puraskṛtā bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:5174: sarvāṇi trīṇi ākhyānāni vividheṣu purāṇeṣu dṛśyante yatra paramadevatvena bhagavān nārāyaṇo varṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:5176: kintu sa prathamādārabhya nārāyaṇasya bhakta āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5177: tasya pitā hiraṇyakaśipuḥ tadīyaṁ daityasulabhaṁ vyavahāraṁ vijñāya prahlādaṁ tannivāraṇāya sarvathāceṣṭhata |
T02n2952u_001:5180: tathā ca sa tasya ārādhyadevasya kṛpayā sarvatra vipadaḥ mukto'bavat |
T02n2952u_001:5181: avaśeṣe nārāyaṇaḥ tasya atyācārāt sṛṣṭiṁ rakṣituṁ hiraṇyakaśipuṁ jaghān |
T02n2952u_001:5182: prahlāda-jīvanavivaraṇaṁ bhakte viṣṇoḥ niyataṁ tathā dṛśyam avadhānaṁ darśayati |
T02n2952u_001:5184: tatra viṣṇuḥ pramāṇaṁ karoti yat sampūrṇā nirbharatā kadāpi niṣphalatāṁ vrajati |
T02n2952u_001:5186: sa vimātrā āhataḥ san viṣṇusamīpaṁ gataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5187: etāvadeva tasya apamānamāsīt yat svīyamūlyapramāṇāya sa durlabhaṁ kiñcit labdhuṁ dṛḍhapratijño'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5188: tataḥ sa gṛhasya sukhaṁ parityajya tasya ajñātasya anusandhānaṁ kartumārebhe |
T02n2952u_001:5190: te ādita eva samyak panthānaṁ darśayanti sma |
T02n2952u_001:5191: dhruva ekaniṣṭhatayā saralatayā ca sarvāsāṁ vipadāṁ madhyataḥ paribhramati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5192: sa sarvavidavipada uttīrṇaḥ san sūkṣmābhiniveśena paramaṁ lakṣyamupagataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5193: viṣṇurāvirbhūtaḥ san tasmai apūrvamalaukikaṁ varaṁ dadau,
T02n2952u_001:5195: yatra parityaktaḥ śiśuḥ sarvaśaktimataḥ viṣṇoḥ pakṣacchāyāmāśrayam alabhata |
T02n2952u_001:5196: arthāt ajñaḥ śiśurapi tena parameṇa devena nāvahelito bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5197: sa āśvāsadānena taṁ rakṣati īpsitena vastunā ca upaharati |
T02n2952u_001:5198: valerupākhyānamapi sarvaiḥ jñāyate tathā vividheṣu purāṇeṣu dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:5199: daityaḥ sannapi valiratīva dhārmikaḥ ca viṣṇoḥ paramo bhaktaśca āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5201: devāsteṣāṁ priyāṁ bhūmiṁ pratyāptuṁ viṣṇusamīpaṁ gatāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5202: viṣṇuḥ aditeḥ putratvena vāmanaḥ san avatīrṇo bhabhūva |
T02n2952u_001:5203: valiḥ sarvebhyaḥ prārthibhyaḥ vastūni dadāti sma |
T02n2952u_001:5208: tathāpi valiḥ svargasya tathā svīyajīvanasya vinimayenāpi svasaṁkalpena baddha āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5211: tṛtīye pāde nābhimūlād vahiḥ prakāśite sati sa taṁ pādaṁ sthāpayitumaicchat |
T02n2952u_001:5217: bhaktaḥ sarvaṁ jñātvāpi paścātpado na bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5218: vividhānāṁ devānāṁ mahattāṁ mahānubhavatāṁ cādhikṛtya pracurāṇi ākhyānāni santi |
T02n2952u_001:5222: idaṁ varṇayati yat - yamaḥ kayościdvṛddhayoḥ pitroḥ mṛtaṁ putramānetuṁ gataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5223: kintu tayoḥ duḥkhaparimāṇaṁ dṛṣṭvā sa tatputraṁ netuṁ na śaśāka |
T02n2952u_001:5224: tataḥ sa mānavajāteḥ duḥkhaṁ dūrīkartuṁ tapasyārthaṁ vahirgataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5228: kintu idamāyāti yat sa na tṛptaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:5232: sa mahādevasya bhaktamānetuṁ gataḥ kintu sa ānetuṁ na śaśāka |
T02n2952u_001:5233: mahādevaḥ tasya bhaktaṁ na kevalaṁ rakṣitavān api tu yamopadravasya samāptiṁ sādhayituṁ yamaṁ jaghāna |
T02n2952u_001:5235: kintu yamaḥ mahādevasya bhaktān mṛtyubhayaṁ na darśayiṣyati iti kṛtvā svīkṛtiṁ gṛhītavān |
T02n2952u_001:5237: tathāpi śivo vaktumicchati yat sa yena kena prakāreṇa tasya prakṛtaṁ bhaktaṁ rakṣiṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:5238: idaṁ pramāṇaṁ karoti yat bhagavān tadīyabhaktānāṁ doṣaṁ draṣṭuṁ sarvadāndhastiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:5239: viṣṇupurāṇe ca bhāgavatapurāṇe ca bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇasya vividhāni kāryāṇi vistareṇa varṇyante |
T02n2952u_001:5240: sādhāraṇānāṁ janānāṁ madhye sa bahūni mahattvapūrṇāni kāryāṇyakarot |
T02n2952u_001:5243: kintu tatrāpi sa karuṇāṁ darśayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5245: ṭa yathā nirāpadaṁ samudraṁ gantuṁ śaknuvanti kṛṣṇaḥ tādṛśīṁ vyavasthā cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5246: kṣamāyāstathā dayāyā īdṛśī pravaṇatā deveṣu atīva sādhāraṇī |
T02n2952u_001:5247: yo visamaḥ śatruḥ trāṇaṁ prārthayate athavā anuśocanayā nato bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:5249: asmin prasaṁge mahādevabhya cāndhakārasurasya ca madhye saṁgrāmasya ākhyānamavaśyamevollekhanīyam |
T02n2952u_001:5250: ayamasuro na kevalaṁ duvṛttaḥ api tu pārvatī prati āsaktipurṇāṁ dṛṣṭiṁ dadau |
T02n2952u_001:5251: pārvatī kenāpi prakāreṇa tasya duṣṭahastagrāhāt rakṣāṁ prāpnoti |
T02n2952u_001:5252: kinti andhakena saha śivasya dāruṇaṁ yuddhamabhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5253: avaśeṣe avaśyambhāvinaṁ parājayaṁ dṛṣṭvā andhakaḥ śivāt trāṇamaicchat |
T02n2952u_001:5255: kintu śivassya śūlena viddhaḥ sannandhaka sarvapāpebhyo mukto'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5256: evaṁ pavitrīkṛta ātmā san sa paramaṁ sukhaṁ prāptavān |
T02n2952u_001:5257: śivaḥ sarvadā dayārdracitto deva ityasmākaṁ dhāraṇā |
T02n2952u_001:5259: tathā ca bhaktāya tadākāṅkṣitaṁ sarvaṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:5263: avaśeṣe bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ kauśalena devā durdaśāyā muktā abhavan |
T02n2952u_001:5265: śivaḥ krodhavaśāt tasya jaṭāsu gaṅgāmābaddhāṁ kṛtavān |
T02n2952u_001:5268: śivaḥ tasyopari dayāṁ pradarśya gaṅgāṁ muktāṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5270: brahmapurāṇasya 169 tame'dhyāye anyadujjvalamākhyānamasti yatra bhaktāya mahādevasya trāṇasya pravṛttiḥ varṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:5271: nimnavaṁśīyo vyādho bhillaḥ atīva rītirahitenopāyena mahādevaṁ pūjayati |
T02n2952u_001:5272: mahādevasya yaṁ vigrahaṁ sa pūjayati sa vigrahaḥ vedābhidhānasya viprasya |
T02n2952u_001:5273: vedasyānupasthitau bhillastatrāgatyāpakvaiḥ māṁsaiśca anyairvastubhiśca priyaṁ devaṁ mahādevam arcayati |
T02n2952u_001:5275: ekadā lukkāyitaḥ san vedaḥ bhillaṁ tathā kurvantamapaśyat |
T02n2952u_001:5280: idaṁ darśayati yat pṛṣṭhapoṣakasya devasya trāṇātmikā prakṛtiḥ kiyatparyantaṁ gantumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:5281: idaṁ varṇayati yat kati pretā atīva gṛṇārhaṁ pāpaṁ cakruḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5284: kintu viṣṇubhakto'sau vipraḥ priyasya devasya nāma kartumārebhe |
T02n2952u_001:5287: yataḥ sarve te bhagavantaṁ pratyakṣīkartuṁ śekuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5288: idaṁ pramāṇīkaroti yat satsaṁsargaḥ sarveṣāmupakārāya bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5290: ātmaviṣayālocanāyāmasyollekho nāprāsaṁgiko bhavati yat purāṇeṣu atṛptebhya ātmabhyaḥ dayā atīva sādhāraṇo vyāpāraḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5293: anyatama upāya ucyate - uccasthānaviśeṣe pradīpāḥ sthāpyante yathā bhramaṇaratāṁ pretātmānaḥ tān anāyāsena draṣṭuṁ śaknuvanti |
T02n2952u_001:5294: dayā dayā hi aparo mahānāvegaḥ yena dātuḥ gauravaṁ vardhate |
T02n2952u_001:5295: ayaṁ mahānāvegaḥ purāṇeṣu sarvatra pratiphalito bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5299: sarvamidaṁ pramāṇīkaroti yat dayāsrotasvinī sarvadā vahati |
T02n2952u_001:5300: kāle kāle dānamayogyāya dīyate'thavā varasyāpaprayogo bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5305: mokṣa eva teṣāṁ paramaḥ puruṣārthaḥ kintu te janahitāya kāryaṁ kurvanti |
T02n2952u_001:5308: idaṁ pramāṇīkaroti yat tapasyayā teṣāmātmānaḥ pavitrībhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:5310: svārthaśūnyatā athavā kasyacidātmanaḥ samagre viśve prakṣepaḥ tapasyāyā mukhyo viṣayaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:5311: sa eva tasya mārgasya śeṣamupagacchati so'pareṣāṁ sukhaṁ tathā duḥkham ātmana eveti anubhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5315: ucyate yat ekadā muniḥ kaṇvaḥ gaṅgāyāśca kṣudhāyāśca santoṣaṁ vidadhāti sma |
T02n2952u_001:5317: dve eva tasmai munaye varaṁ dātumaicchatām |
T02n2952u_001:5318: sa ātmanaḥ kṛte na kimapi kāmayate sma |
T02n2952u_001:5319: kintu svīyasantānāya varaṁ prārthayate yat tadīyajātyantargatā sarve janāḥ kṣudhārttā na bhaveyuriti |
T02n2952u_001:5321: sa ātmanaḥ saubhāgyaṁ samagrāya jagate unmīlitaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5322: sa prārthayate - yadi ko'pi kṣudhāmarcayati so'vaśyameva kṣudhāyā mukto bhavediti |
T02n2952u_001:5325: atrocyate yat hariścandro varuṇasya vareṇa tasya putraṁ prāptavān |
T02n2952u_001:5326: sa varuṇasamīpe saṁkalpaṁ kṛtavān yat sa navajātena putreṇa saha yañaṁ sampādayiṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:5327: kintu samaye tasminnāgate sa punaḥ punaḥ kālaṁ hartumārebhe |
T02n2952u_001:5328: avaśeṣeḥ devaḥ kruddhaḥ san rājñe hitāya caraābhisandhi jñāpayāmāsa |
T02n2952u_001:5329: rājā tadā kaitavamāśrityāvadat kiṁ kartavyamiti tena na jñāyate |
T02n2952u_001:5330: yadā kaścit tamupadideśa yat kasyacijjanasya putraṁ krītvā svīyaputrasya vinimayena tena putreṇa yajñaṁ kuryāt,
T02n2952u_001:5333: api ca tasya aparau dvau putrau āstām |
T02n2952u_001:5334: kintu vastutaḥ śunaḥśepho yajñe utsargīkṛto nābhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5335: idaṁ sūcayati yat niṣṭhurayajñavyavasthā dhṛṇārhācāreṇa yatheṣṭaṁ pratyākhyātā'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5339: kevalaṁ gabhīrā karuṇā daridrāya nirdṣāya ca bālakāyānubhūyate |
T02n2952u_001:5341: etayā karuṇayā devaḥ tasya rakṣāyai anuprerito'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5343: yataḥ, tasya pitā pāralaukikavipadaḥ rakṣārthaṁ jyeṣṭhaputramaicchat |
T02n2952u_001:5344: tasya mātā priyatamatvāt kaniṣṭhaputraṁ na tyajati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5345: asmin samaye yaṁ rājā rakṣet tameva kāmayate sma |
T02n2952u_001:5346: ata eva bālakasyāsyāśrayatvena na ko'pi āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5350: atra dṛśyate yat na kevalaṁ devānāṁ sādhūnāmunnatajanmanāṁ narāṇāṁ vā karuṇātmakaṁ caritramasti,
T02n2952u_001:5355: tatra ekaḥ pecaka ekaśca kapotaḥ santānādibhiḥ śa prativasataḥ sma |
T02n2952u_001:5358: dvayoḥ vihagayoḥ dve bhārye yuddhaṁ naicchatām |
T02n2952u_001:5359: te agniṁ ca yamaṁ ca āhvayataḥ sma,
T02n2952u_001:5360: yataḥ tau devau parivārayugalasya adhiṣṭhātārau devau |
T02n2952u_001:5362: kintu parivāradvayasya vihagāḥ śatrutvāvasānamantareṇā na kimapi vastu kāmayante sma |
T02n2952u_001:5364: mahākāvyeṣu purāṇeṣu ca vaśiṣṭhaḥ viśvāmitraśceti munidvayamatīva vikhyātam |
T02n2952u_001:5366: muniḥ viśvāmitra janmanā kṣatriyaḥ kintu tapasyayā brāmhaṇo'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5367: idaṁ tasya ekaniṣṭhaṁ śaktimayaṁ ca caritra pramāṇīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:5369: dvau munī jagataḥ upakārāya prabhūtaṁ cakratuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5374: ekadā rājñā daivāt sūryakanyā tapatī dṛṣṭā |
T02n2952u_001:5376: sa kanyāyāḥ paricayaṁ na vijñāyaiva durdaśāgrasto babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:5377: vaśiṣṭhaḥ tasya avasthāṁ samupalabhyāgraṇīḥ san sauradeśaṁ guṇaṁ praśyati |
T02n2952u_001:5378: kintu atra śiṣyasya doṣaṁ jñātvāpi guruḥ tathā ceṣṭate yathā śiṣya īpsitaṁ vastu prāpnoti |
T02n2952u_001:5384: anyathā sa tasyā duḥkhasya hetuḥ bhaviṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:5385: ananyopāyā sarasvatī vaśiṣṭhasamīpaṁ gatvā sarvaṁ nivedayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5387: sa sarasvatyai anumatiṁ dadau viśvāmitrasamīpaṁ māṁ nayeti |
T02n2952u_001:5389: kintu sa muniḥ taṁ hantumupayuktasyāstrasya sandhānaṁ kartumārebhe |
T02n2952u_001:5390: srasvatī vaśiṣṭhaṁ niṣṭhurasya muneḥ hastagrahāt muktaye anyatra nayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5392: bahukālaṁ vyāpya udvegāt paraṁ sarasvatī asyā daśyāyāḥ muktā abhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5393: muneḥ vaśiṣṭasya pakṣe viśvāmitrasya duṣṭecchāparipūraṇena kimapi prayojanaṁ nāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5396: kintu sa sarasvatyā upari dayāṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5397: tasyai hitāya sa yajñaṁ kartumudyataḥ babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:5398: anyataśca sarasvatī vaśiṣṭhaṁ rakṣituṁ munikopamupekṣya yathāśakti ceṣṭase sma |
T02n2952u_001:5401: ekadā kururājaḥ kiñcit karttumaicchat yena saḥ akṣayayaśaso'dhikārī bhaviṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:5402: ataḥ sa śaivaṣaṇḍasya yamamahiṣasya ca sāhāyyena svarṇamayena halena bhūmikarṣaṇaṁ kartumārebhe |
T02n2952u_001:5403: kautuhalī san indraḥ sandeśaṁ jñātuṁ tatra gataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5404: rājā indramuvāca yat sa dharmasatyadānakṣamāpavitratādīnāṁ bījāni vaptumicchati |
T02n2952u_001:5405: pṛṣṭaḥ san so'vadat yat tasya dehe tāni bījāni santi |
T02n2952u_001:5406: viṣṇustaṁ parīkṣituṁ tatra gatvā bījāni ayācata |
T02n2952u_001:5411: tataḥ bhagavān santuṣṭaḥ san āśīrvādaṁ dadau |
T02n2952u_001:5412: nṛpatiḥ nijāya na kimapi yācate sma,
T02n2952u_001:5414: sa kevalamicchati - adaḥ sthānaṁ pavitraṁ bhavatu,
T02n2952u_001:5415: yo janaḥ tatra yajñaṁ kariṣyati sa mokṣaṁ prānotu iti |
T02n2952u_001:5417: idaṁ pramāṇīkaroti yat manuṣyacaritraṁ samunnataṁ bhavitumarhati yatra svārthaparatā sāmpūrṇyena tirohitā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5418: mānavānāṁ maṅgalāya ātmana eṣa utkarṣaḥ satyameva ullekhārhaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5419: īdṛśāni bahūni upākhyānāni santi yatra hetuśūnyā dayā varṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:5421: kathayati yat ṛṣiḥ aurvaḥ bāhurājasya yaḥ putro'jāta āsīt tasya jīvanaṁ rakṣati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5422: yadā rājñī garbhavarī āsīt tadā kācīt sapatnī īrṣyāparāyaṇā satī viṣaṁ dadau |
T02n2952u_001:5424: evaṁ saptasu varṣeṣu atikrānteṣu yadā nṛpatiḥ mṛtyulokaṁ gataḥ rājñī ca ātmahananāya udyatā'bhavat,
T02n2952u_001:5425: tadā muniḥ aurvaḥ ajātasya putrasya kṛte duḥkhamanubhabhūva,
T02n2952u_001:5426: yaḥ putraḥ mānavānāṁ maṅgalāya saugbhāgyamānetuṁ śakṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:5427: ata eva muniḥ agraṇīḥ san ātma hananāt rājñī nivārayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5434: tatrocyate yat pavamānaḥ kañcid dvimukhaṁ vihagaṁ tanmokṣāya gadādharatīrthasya pavitra sthānamānināya |
T02n2952u_001:5437: sa kevalaṁ hitāyaiva hitaṁ sādhayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5443: tasmin kāle tasya śvaśrū api aparaṁ putraṁ prāptumaicchat |
T02n2952u_001:5444: tataḥ muniḥ caruṁ kṛtvā pṛthak pṛthak aṁśaṁ satyavatyai tathā śvaśrūmātre dadau |
T02n2952u_001:5445: durbhāgyāt satyavatī śvaśrūbhāgamakhādat śvaśrūśca satyavatyāḥ tat vijñāya muniḥ satyavatīṁ jñāpayati yat sā etādṛśaṁ durvṛttaṁ putraṁ prāpsyati yo mātaramapi hantumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:5446: tat śrutvā satyavatī atīva duḥkhitā jātā |
T02n2952u_001:5447: sā svāminaṁ tathā na śāsanāya anururodha |
T02n2952u_001:5448: atabhāgyāyāṁ bālikāyāṁ dayayā abhiśāpasya parimārjanaṁ kṛtavān |
T02n2952u_001:5449: na putro'pi tu pautra īdṛśo bhaviṣyati iti |
T02n2952u_001:5450: patnyāḥ mahāyaśūnyāṁ durdaśāṁ vilokya muniḥ vyathitaḥ san svaśaktimanyatra prayuyoja |
T02n2952u_001:5453: ayaṁ hi so'nubhavo yatra naraḥ tasya karttavyaṁ niṣṭhayā sādhayati,
T02n2952u_001:5456: idaṁ nirdiśati prakṛtigatamaudāryyaṁ mahattvaṁ mahānubhavatvaṁ vā |
T02n2952u_001:5457: anekānyākhyānāni purāṇeṣu santi yāni pramāṇīkurvanti yat evaṁvidha āvegaḥ paurāṇike kāle'pi uccasthānamalaṁcakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5458: ayaṁ khalu prakṛtasya mānavasya atigurutvapūrṇaguṇatvena vivecitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5459: atrāpi śuddhamūlyabodhaḥ pratiphalito bhavati yo bodhaḥ sarvathā sarvadā praśaṁsitaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:5463: tayā udbuddhaḥ san abhiśaptānāṁ pūrvapuruṣānāṁ muktaye kaṭhorāṁ tapasyāṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5464: sa yathārthataḥ gaṅgānayanāya svargaṁ tathā marttaṁ vicalitamakarot |
T02n2952u_001:5465: tena sarvadhāni duḥkhāni kaṣṭāni ca anubhūtāni |
T02n2952u_001:5466: kadāpi vimūḍhaḥ kadāpi vā nirāśaḥ sa jātaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5468: atra sutīvro'bhiniveśo dṛśyate manobalamapi yena sa sārthakatayā bhūṣitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5471: ekadā kapotī kenacinniṣṭhureṇa vyādhyena dhṛtā abhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5472: sa vyādhaḥ samagrāṁ rajanīṁ vyāpya tasmin tarau āsīt yatra vihagāḥ kulāyaṁ nirmāya vasanti |
T02n2952u_001:5473: naktaṁ sahacarīṁ kapotīṁ na prāpya karuṇaṁ roditumārebhe |
T02n2952u_001:5474: tat śrutvā kapotī ātmano'stitvaṁ taṁ jñāpayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5475: tadā kapotaḥ tasyā muktaye kṛtodyamo babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:5477: api sa, sā vyādhasya karma samarthayāñcakre |
T02n2952u_001:5479: tadarthaṁ sa doṣī iti na parigaṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:5480: punaśca sā kapotam āha vyādho'yamatithitvena pūjayitavyaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5482: carame paryāye kapotaḥ vyādhasya bhojanāya ātmānutiṁ dadau |
T02n2952u_001:5483: samagraṁ vyāpāraṁ vilokya vyādhaḥ nirvāk tathā vimūḍhaḥ jātaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5484: tataḥ vyādhaḥ svīyaṁ caritraṁ dhigiti manyamānaḥ anuśocitumārebhe |
T02n2952u_001:5487: yataḥ, tasmin vayasi api tādṛśo vyavahāraḥ na svābhāvikaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5489: pariṇāme prakṛtaḥ putraḥ śunaḥśephaḥ manasā pitaraṁ na tatyāja |
T02n2952u_001:5491: kintu putraḥ tadavagatya pitre duḥkhamanubhūya dharmīyaṁ vrataṁ jagrāha yena tasya pitā svargaṁ gantuṁ śaknoti |
T02n2952u_001:5492: etadapekṣayā api ko'pi mahattaro dṛṣṭāntaḥ kartavyabodhasya sāmānyakaruṇābodhasya cāsti kim ?
T02n2952u_001:5493: snehaḥ asmābhiḥ pūrvamālocitaṁ yat karuṇāśabdaḥ vahvarthadyotakaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5505: ata eva īdṛśasya vargīkaraṇasya artho nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:5507: tripārśvakāce sūryaraśmiḥ saptadhā prativimbito yathā bhavati tathaiva karuṇāśabdasya viśleṣaṇaṁ bahudhā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5508: ata eva prāguktaṁ vargīkaraṇaṁ na prakṛtamapitu ālocanāsukaratvāt kriyate |
T02n2952u_001:5509: bhavatu, snehaviṣayakāni kati ākhyānānāni athaḥ varṇyante |
T02n2952u_001:5510: saubharimuneḥ kathā apakṣapātaśca snehaśceti āvegadvayaṁ varṇayati |
T02n2952u_001:5511: sa muniḥ kasyacit matsyasya tṛptaṁ jīvanaṁ vilokya gārhasthyajīvanamupalabdhumiyeṣa |
T02n2952u_001:5512: tataḥ sa māndhātuḥ rājñaḥ samīpamāgatya tasya pañcāśatkanyakāsu anyatamayā saha vivāhaṁ kartumicchāṁ prakāśayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5513: kintu rājā tādṛśāya vṛddhāya janāya kanyāṁ pradātuṁ naicchat |
T02n2952u_001:5515: yataḥ sa kopaḥ tasmai tathā tasya parivārāya hāniṁ nirdiśati |
T02n2952u_001:5516: ubhayasaṁkaṭanivāraṇāya muniḥ eṣiṣyati sā kanyā muninā abhyarthitā bhaviṣyati |
T02n2952u_001:5517: atra muniḥ mānavacaritrasya gabhīrāmantardṛṣṭiṁ darśayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5518: sa ātmānamatīva yuvānaṁ tathā sundaraṁ cakāra yaṁ vilokya sarvāḥ kanyāḥ taṁ muni patitvena prāptuṁ sakāmāḥ babhūvuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5519: pariṇayāt paraṁ munirasau apūrvapakṣapātaśūnyatayā tāḥ sarvāḥ draṣṭumārebhe |
T02n2952u_001:5520: tathā ca muniḥ tā atīva sukhīniḥ akarot |
T02n2952u_001:5521: yadā tāsāṁ pitā jñātumaicchat tadā sarvāḥ kanyā avadan yat tāsāṁ patiḥ tābhiḥ saha karvadā kālaṁ yāpayati |
T02n2952u_001:5522: samagre sāhitye īdṛśasya samavyavahārasya tulanā nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:5525: tārakāsurasya vadhāt paraṁ kārttikeyaḥ surāṅganābhiḥ saha anandamanubhavan kālaṁ yāpayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5526: tat śrutvā pārvatī vastutaḥ vicalitā abhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5527: putrasya prāptavayaskatvāt jananyāḥ karau baddhau āstām |
T02n2952u_001:5528: sā putraṁ tiraskṛtuṁ mārayituṁ vā na śaknoti |
T02n2952u_001:5529: kintu nindanīyaṁ tādṛśaṁ karma sarvathā nivāraṇīyam |
T02n2952u_001:5530: tataḥ pārvatīṁ svīyavyaktitvaṁ dvidhā vibhājya ekamaṁśaṁ surāṅgāsu sthāpayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:5531: tataḥ paraṁ kārttikeyo yadā yayāciddevāṅganayā saha krīḍituṁ gataḥ,
T02n2952u_001:5532: tadā saḥ tasmāmaṅganāyāṁ mātuḥ chāyāṁ dṛṣṭvā krīḍituṁ na śaśāṁkia |
T02n2952u_001:5533: ekā mātā na kadāpi duṣṭakarmarate putre snigyati,
T02n2952u_001:5536: gauravāt putrasya patanamidaṁ mātaraṁ pārvatī sutarāṁ vyathitāṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:5537: tataḥ sā vicakṣaṇatayā ca saphalavyāpāratayā ca svīyakāryasiddhi cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5538: etādṛśī śikṣāpraṇālī gurośca śiṣyasya ca madhye,
T02n2952u_001:5539: athavā bhagavataśca bhaktasya ca madhye na durlabhā |
T02n2952u_001:5542: tadumākhyānaṁ bhagavantaṁ viṣṇuṁ ca tadīyaṁ bhaktaṁ garuḍaṁ cādhikṛtya vartate |
T02n2952u_001:5544: sa ādiṣṭaḥ sannapi ekaṁ sarpaṁ na mumoca |
T02n2952u_001:5545: tadā viṣṇuḥ tadīyapadanamanena garuḍāya śikṣāṁ dadau |
T02n2952u_001:5546: īdṛśāni karmāṇi na saṁśodhanāya api tu kasyacit ātmāna unnataye eva |
T02n2952u_001:5553: api ca pṛkprāṇasya janasya duḥkhāni kasyāpi nijaduḥkhānīva pratibhānti |
T02n2952u_001:5554: ekena upāyenāyaṁ vibhinnajaneṣu sthitaṁ vāhyikaṁ pratibandhakaṁ dūrīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:5555: samagre paurāṇike sāhitye sahānubhavasambandhino bahavo dṛṣṭāntāḥ santi |
T02n2952u_001:5556: mahattvasya sampūrṇā dhāraṇā katipayeṣu viṣayeṣu vartate |
T02n2952u_001:5557: anyatamo viṣayaḥ khalu aparebhyaḥ janebhyaḥ anubhūtaḥ sahānubhavaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5558: brahmapurāṇasya 35 tame'dhyāye ekā asādhāraṇī kathā vartate |
T02n2952u_001:5559: sā paritvena mahādevasya prāptaye umāyāḥ tapasyāmadhikṛtya janapriyā kathā |
T02n2952u_001:5560: tapasaḥ samāpteḥ paraṁ sā īpsitaṁ vastu prāptavatī |
T02n2952u_001:5562: kintu prasthānasamaye sa umāyā yogyatāṁ parīkṣitumiyeṣa,
T02n2952u_001:5563: yata umā viśvajananyāḥ padam adhikartuṁ gacchati |
T02n2952u_001:5565: sa bālako yadā hrade snāti sma tadā sa kenacit kumbhīreṇa ākrānto bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5567: sā bālakasya muktaye kumbhīraṁ prārthayate sma |
T02n2952u_001:5568: kintu kumbhīraḥ umākṛtatapaḥphalasya vinimayena bālakaṁ muktuṁ śaknoti |
T02n2952u_001:5570: ayamatīva kaṭhoraḥ siddhāntaḥ tathāpi umā bālakasya muktaye svīyatapaḥphalaṁ dātuṁ saṁkalpaṁ kṛtavatī |
T02n2952u_001:5571: tathākaraṇena sā pramāṇīkaroti na kevalaṁ mahādeve tasyā ānugatyaṁ api tu sarvakālīyeṣu sarveṣu janeṣu |
T02n2952u_001:5572: mātuḥ yayā yogyatayā prayojanaṁ sā yogyatā pārvattyā asti |
T02n2952u_001:5574: tadā tasyāḥ svīyaṁ sukha kadāpi na vivecanātvaṁ vrajati |
T02n2952u_001:5576: tādṛśyā mātuḥ sahānubhāvaḥ snehaḥ trāṇātmikā prakṛtiḥ ca kāle kāle parikṣyante |
T02n2952u_001:5577: bahunā mūlyena yat sukhaṁ tayārjitaṁ sampūrṇājñātabālakāyāpi sā tat sukhaṁ tatyāja |
T02n2952u_001:5578: uktapurāṇasya catuḥsaptatitame'dhyāye gaṅgāvataraṇavṛttānte kiñcit vyāvartitaṁ rupamasti |
T02n2952u_001:5579: atra mahāghaṭanāyāḥ mukhakartṛtvena bhagīratho na varṇitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5580: kintu gautamo muniḥ avagantuṁ śaśāka yat pārvatī sapatnyā gaṅgāyāḥ kṛte mānasikīṁ yantraṇāmanubhavati,
T02n2952u_001:5581: vastutaḥ sā eva mahādevasya priyatamā patnī tadarthaṁ sā tīvramīrṣyāparāyaṇā jātā |
T02n2952u_001:5582: pārvatyā yā mānasikī yantrāṇā tasyāḥ kaṣṭaṁ laghayituṁ gautamo'graṇīḥ babhūva,
T02n2952u_001:5583: gaṅgā mahādevasya pārvatyāśca ghaniṣṭhasamparkāt vicyutā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5584: tataḥ tena gaṅgāyā martte avataraṇāya prayatnaḥ kṛtaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5587: ekadā dhārmiko nṛpatiḥ bharataḥ śāvakaprasavasamaye mṛtyugatāṁ hariṇīṁ dadarśa |
T02n2952u_001:5588: tadā rājā mātṛhīnāya śāvakāya tīvraṁ sahānubhavamanubhūya taṁ śāvakaṁ pālayāmāsa |
T02n2952u_001:5589: tataḥ tasmin mṛge atīva snehāt tapasyāyai tasya ko'pi manoyogo nāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5590: mṛtyukāle'pi tasya manasi kevalaṁ hariṇagatā cintā āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5591: asmāt kāraṇāt parajanmani mṛgarūpeṇa tasya janma abhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5592: pariṇāme sa vikhyāto jaḍo bharataḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5593: asyākhyānasya prakṛtavastubinduḥ hi nṛpatiḥ sahānubhavasya kāraṇāt tadīyamamūlyaṁ dharmaṁ parityaktumapi itastataḥ na cakāra iti |
T02n2952u_001:5594: kṣamā kṣamā sahanaśīlatā ca dharmasyātmatvena pratiṣṭhite |
T02n2952u_001:5597: mukhyeṣu gaṇeṣu saṁgatisthāpanasya ca grahaṇasya ca nītiḥ pradhānatamābhavet |
T02n2952u_001:5598: niḥsaṁśayaṁ vayaṁ vaktuṁ śaknumo yat kṣamā hi hindudharmasya kendrīyā viśiṣṭhatā |
T02n2952u_001:5599: sapariṇāmā abhiśāpāḥ kāryataḥ pramāṇīkurvanti yat daurbalyādayo doṣāḥ sarvadā tuchāḥ,
T02n2952u_001:5600: kintu teṣāṁ jayo'vahelane grahaṇe ca dharmasya mahattamaṁ rūpaṁ nihitaṁ vartate |
T02n2952u_001:5605: ātmotkarṣasya ceṣṭā ca atīva gurutvaṁ vahanti |
T02n2952u_001:5607: vayañca punaḥ punaḥ paśyāmaḥ yat abhiśaptā vismarati,
T02n2952u_001:5610: idaṁ kadāpi samagraṁ phalaṁ na naśyati |
T02n2952u_001:5611: yataḥ niyamānuvarttitayā kimapi karma vyarthaṁ na bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:5612: kintu āghātaṁ hrasayituṁ ko'pi upāyaḥ sarvadā lakṣyate |
T02n2952u_001:5613: yasminnākhyāne'bhiśāpo'sti pratyekaṁ tadākhyānaṁ īdṛśabhāvasya udāharaṇaṁ bhavitumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:5616: prāyeṇa sarveṣu purāṇeṣu idamākhyānamasti yatra lajjākaryāṁ paristhitau indrasya caritramaṅkitam |
T02n2952u_001:5618: prakṛtaṁ kathāyogamalpaśaḥ parityaja kathayati yat abhiśāpādhānāt paramupalebhe yat tasya pakṣe jagataḥ sammukhībhavanaṁ na sambhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5620: gautamastat kṣaṇād devarājakṛtamahāpāpaṁ vismṛtya abhiśāpahrāsāya upāyamupadideśa |
T02n2952u_001:5622: tadyathā pāṭhakasya cittaṁ dūramapasārayati tathā taccittaṁ dravīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:5625: gṛhe'sthiratayā sā svīyaputraṁ gālavasya muneḥ prayatne sthāpayitvā pṛthivīṁ draṣṭuṁ vahirgatā |
T02n2952u_001:5627: katiṣu varṣeṣu gacchatsu asau putraḥ prāptavayaskaḥ san pṛthivīṁ draṣṭuṁ vahirgataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5628: daivacakreṇa mātuśca putrasya ca parasparasammilanaṁ jātam |
T02n2952u_001:5634: mātā ca putraśca parasparaparicayaṁ jñātuṁ śekatuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5635: tato yat ghaṭitaṁ tat atīva sāṁdhātikaṁ marmasparśi ca |
T02n2952u_001:5637: kintu muniḥ gālavaḥ tayoḥ daśāṁ dṛṣṭvā sahānubhavena vyathitaḥ san mātaraṁ putraṁ ca kāraṇaṁ darśayitvā mūrkhajanocitakarmakaraṇāt nivāyarayan tayoḥ kṛte mānasikīṁ śāntiṁ vidadhāti sma |
T02n2952u_001:5638: brahmapurāṇasya 170 tame'dhyāye maṇikuṇḍalaṁ tasya mitra gautamaṁ cādhikṛtyāparamākhyānamasti yatra kṣamāsaṁkrānta durlabhabhāvo vartate |
T02n2952u_001:5640: kintu tasya bandhuḥ maṇikuṇḍalaḥ dhārmika āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5647: vibhīṣaṇastaṁ dṛṣṭvā gandhamādanaparvatāt hanumatā ānītasya oṣadhaiḥ prayogeṇa taṁ rogamuktaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5648: tasya kṛpayā maṇikuṇḍalaḥ pūrvavat samṛdhamān jātaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5649: asmin paryāye maṇikuṇḍalaḥ prathame mitraṁ gautamaṁ sasmāra |
T02n2952u_001:5650: dīrghānusandhānāt paraṁ sa durdaśāgrastaṁ gautamaṁ dadarśa |
T02n2952u_001:5651: maṇikuṇḍalaḥ taṁ gṛhamānīya svīyaṁ saubhāgyabhāgaṁ tasmai dadau,
T02n2952u_001:5653: udāratā udāratā hi aparo mahān āvegaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5654: eṣā balavattareṇa janena durbalāya janāya poṣito'nubhūtiḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5655: iyamullekhārhā yataḥ balavattaro jano durbalasya durdaśāmupekṣituṁ śaknoti,
T02n2952u_001:5656: kintu antarnihitayā karuṇayā sa durbalasya viṣayaṁ gṛhṇāti,
T02n2952u_001:5657: tadarthaṁ ca saṁgrāmaṁ karoti athavā nyūnatamataḥ tasya duḥkhaṁ sāmānyenānubhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5661: te mṛtamekaṁ kukkuramantareṇa na kimapi āninyuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5662: viśvāmitraḥ prāptena māṁsena yāgaṁ sampādayituṁ kṛtasaṁkalpo babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:5664: tatkṣaṇāt imaṁ viṣayamavagatya indraḥ aprītikaraṁ tadyāgaṁ roddhuṁ tanmāṁsamapahṛtya tasya sthale madhubhāṇḍamekaṁ pratisthāpayāmāsa |
T02n2952u_001:5667: sa śiṣyebhyaḥ adravaṁ vastu iyeṣa kintu bhāṇḍaparimitamadhu na khādyam |
T02n2952u_001:5668: indraḥ viśvāmitarsya pravṛttimavalokyātīva bhītaḥ san tasya santoṣaṁ vidhātuṁ tatkṣaṇāt jalīyameghān preṣayāmāsa |
T02n2952u_001:5670: dadhīceḥ muneḥ mahāntaṁ yāgamadhikṛtya purākālādevātīva vikhyātā kathā pracalitāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5671: sa svīyapatnīṁ yajñe utsasarja yena vajranāmakamatīva śaktiśāli astraṁ tadasthibhiḥ nirmitaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5675: atra vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat daityānāṁ viruddhe saphalasamarodyogāt paramastrāṇi niṣprayojanānīti matvā devāḥ sarvāṇi astrāṇi nyāsatvena dadhīcisakāśe sthāpayāmāsuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5676: tasya patnī lopāmudrā idaṁ na samarthayāmāsa |
T02n2952u_001:5679: pariśeṣe, dadhīciḥ divyāstrāṇāṁ samanvitaprabhāvaśeṣaṁ svīyaśarīre aṅgīkaruṁ saṁkalpaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5680: kintu yasmin muhūrtte sa idaṁ cakāra tasminneva kāle devāstatra astrāṇi netumāvirbabhūvuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5681: ananyopāyo dadhīciḥ svīyaṁ śarīraṁ dātumudyato'bhavat yena nūtanāni astrāṇi nirmitāni bhaviṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:5684: vindhyaparvatasya ca muneragastyasya ca madhye saṁghāto'tīva suparicitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5685: kintu vāmanapurāṇasya aṣṭādaśādhyāye varṇitasyākhyānasya kaścid bhedo'sti |
T02n2952u_001:5687: atra vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat vindhyaparvatasyāṁśaviśeṣaḥ sauragatipathe yathāmyathamavatiṣṭhate |
T02n2952u_001:5689: sa vṛddho janaḥ san vindhyaṁ jagāma |
T02n2952u_001:5696: yataḥ sa gurutvahīnāya vṛddhāya janāya dṛḍhapadasthiti tatyāja |
T02n2952u_001:5698: nṛpatiḥ śaryātiḥ madhucchandasa ṛṣeḥ patnyāḥ premṇaḥ gabhīratāṁ parīkṣitumiyeṣa |
T02n2952u_001:5699: ata eva sa janaśrutiṁ vyatanot yat nṛpaśca ṛṣiścobhau paralokaṁ gataviti |
T02n2952u_001:5700: tadaiva mahiṣī janaśruteḥ satyatāṁ parīkṣituṁ vyavasthāṁ jagrāha |
T02n2952u_001:5701: kintu ṛṣeḥ patnī hṛdayavidārakaṁ sandeśaṁ śrutvā śokena mṛtyulokaṁ gatā |
T02n2952u_001:5702: evaṁ kapaṭaparisthityāṁ samutpannāyāṁ rājā ṛṣeḥ patnīṁ pratyānetumagniṁ praviveśa |
T02n2952u_001:5703: tataḥ madhucchandāḥ sarvamavagatya nṛpateḥ ātmotsargaṁ smṛtvā śuśoca |
T02n2952u_001:5704: sa sūryaṁ pūjayitvā rājānaṁ divyena mahimnā saha punarjīvitaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:5705: asyākhyānasya svārghaśūnyā mānasikī udāratā asmānākarṣati yayānupretaḥ san janaḥ parasmai ātmotsargaṁ kartumapi dvidhā na karoti |
T02n2952u_001:5706: purākāle prajābhyo hitāya nṛpatinā jīvanamutsargīkriyate iti dhāraṇā pracalitāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5708: kintu sāmānyena rājānaḥ sarveṣāmupari prajākāmanāpūraṇāya sarvadā udārāḥ bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:5711: tadā sa muneḥ medhasa āśrame kañcit kālamuvāsa |
T02n2952u_001:5712: kintu tasya manaḥ sarvadā prāktyaktānāṁ samitrāṇāṁ prajānāṁ kṛte udvignatāṁ bavrāja |
T02n2952u_001:5714: vaiśyenoktaṁ yat sa tasya duṣṭaparivāreṇa vitāḍita eveti |
T02n2952u_001:5718: prāguktālocanā viśālasaṁkhyakeṣu ākhyāneṣu ca purāvṛtteṣu ca kevalaṁ svalpasaṁkhyāni ākhyānāni purāvṛttāni ca sammukhabhāgavānayati |
T02n2952u_001:5720: kintu idaṁ niḥsandehena pradarśayituṁ tathā pratiṣṭhāpayitumalaṁ yat purāṇānāṁ yuge hindudharmaḥ karuṇātmako dharma āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:5722: kintu idamapi smaraṇīyaṁ yat kasmīścid dharme eṣā mahattākasmānnotthāyāyāti |
T02n2952u_001:5723: idaṁ satyaṁ yat hindudharmastasmāddhāraṇāyugādeva bahusahasravarṣsavyāpi- vividhaparyāyāṇāṁ madhyena āgamyātropasthitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5724: tena vāhyikānāṁ prabhāvāṇāṁ bahavo guṇā ātmanyaṅgīkṛtāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5726: prācīnavaidika dharmasya ātmagato bhāvo yadyapi āpātadṛṣṭyā ādimastathāpi tatra mūlasūtratvena mahānubhavatā cintāyā udāratā cāstām |
T02n2952u_001:5727: tathā ca yathāyatahaṁ paścādbhūmyā saha paravartī hindudharmaḥ prakṛtkaruṇātkamadharmatvena prakāśito'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:5728: yadyapi karuṇātkamabhāvapramāṇāyātra ākhyānāni upākhyānāni ca prayujyante,
T02n2952u_001:5729: tathāpi purāṇeṣu dānadharmādayaḥ prāsaṁgikaviṣayāḥ parasparaṁ bhāvaṁ vahanti |
T02n2952u_001:5730: dānasyārtho na kevalaṁ brāhmaṇebhyo dānamapitu dānaṁparitaḥ vikṣiptā mahānubhavatā vividharūpatvena sarvatra vartate |
T02n2952u_001:5735: idamullekhārhaṁ yat sarvadā īdṛśāni dānamūlāni karmāṇi aparicitadaridrebhya ātmabhyaḥ kriyante ye ātmānaḥ teṣāṁ pāpāya duḥkhāyante |
T02n2952u_001:5736: anyataśca prāyaścitakriyā idaṁ tathyaṁ kathayati yat anuśocanayā sarvāṇi pāpāni kṣamārhatāṁ yānti |
T02n2952u_001:5739: ata eva vayamanāyāsena siddhāntaṁ kartumalam yat prakṛtamahato dharmasya karuṇāvahanītiṣu pratiṣṭhito hindusamājaḥ cirantanamūlyādarśasya pratiphalanaṁ sādhayati |
T02n2952u_001:5740: paurāṇikanītibodhasyopari daṇḍāyamāno hindudharmaḥ jagatastathā vyaktigatasamājasya sukhāya samṛddhaye ca upayoginaḥ sarvān viṣayānāliṅgya svādhiṇaḥ sanneva vartate |
T02n2952u_001:5741: eṣu viṣayeṣu dharmo yathā tiṣṭhati tathā tasya prayogo'pi vidyate |
T02n2952u_001:5744: purāṇamālā vyaktigataucityena saha sādhāraṇadharmasya ekatrīkaraṇasya saphalāṁ praceṣṭāṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:5745: ādye vartante kati śiṣṭācārasamparkitā guṇāstathā gadguṇabhūṣitāni karmāṇi,
T02n2952u_001:5747: aparasya kṣetre vyaktigatasīmāṁ nātikramya ādyasya vyāvahārikī dig vartate |
T02n2952u_001:5748: tatra vyaktiḥ jātigataṁ spaṣṭaṁ vaiśiṣtya nirdiśati |
T02n2952u_001:5750: vedasamparkite sāhitye api tat mūlaṁ dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:5751: tat sāhityaṁ kālānukrameṇa purāṇānāṁ madhyataḥ janapriyarūpatvena viśeṣitaṁ saṁvṛttam |
T02n2952u_001:5754: vaidike sāhitye tasya sasammānaḥ tathā sagaurava ullekho'sti |
T02n2952u_001:5755: purāṇānāṁ tathā bauddhaśāstrāṇāṁ varttamāne prāptaḥ pāṭho hi miśraṇaviśeṣaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:5757: ekaḥ pāṭhaḥ aparasya pāṭhasyopari prabhāvaṁ vitanoti |
T02n2952u_001:5758: purāṇānāṁ viṣayaḥ prāyeṇa bauddhaśāstrīyavidhīnāṁ samarthanaṁ kurvanti |
T02n2952u_001:5759: purāṇeṣu ca bauddhaśāstreṣu ca sannyāsinā tathā gārhastyajanena karaṇīyāni yāni karmāṇi nirvahaṇīyāḥ ca ye bhārāḥ ucyante teṣāṁ sarveṣāṁ madhye bhāvagataṁ sādṛśyaṁ prāyeṇa dṛśyate,
