T02n2952u_001:5761: āvegaiḥ viśuddhīkṛtā yāḥ svābhāvikyastathā komalāḥ pravṛttayaḥ mānuṣeṣu santi tāsāmupari karttavyāni vidhīyante |
T02n2952u_001:5762: kintu sādhāraṇānāṁ janānāṁ kṛte tāni karttavyāni namanīyatarāṇi,
T02n2952u_001:5763: na tādṛśāni sannyāsināṁ vā yogināṁ vā kṛte |
T02n2952u_001:5764: manuṣye ātmīyatābodho duḥkhagrastamaparaṁ janaṁ prati dayāyai kalpate |
T02n2952u_001:5765: eṣā dayā manuṣyaṁ sāhāyyakāriṇaṁ ca dayārdraṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:5767: sampādanīyatvena vihitānāṁ karttavyānāṁ mūlameva eṣā karuṇā |
T02n2952u_001:5773: paurāṇikadarśanasya abhiprāyo hi dayā tathā karuṇā |
T02n2952u_001:5775: bauddhadarśanasya viśleṣaṇāya darśanasaṁśliṣṭāni kati maulāni tathyāni sayatnaviśleṣaṇīyatāṁ vrajanti |
T02n2952u_001:5776: tathā hi - bauddhadarśanasya dve bhittibhūmī - mahāprajñā mahākaruṇā ca |
T02n2952u_001:5778: yataḥ buddhito jāyate tṛṣṇā tathā adhyāsasampannaṁ vastutatvam |
T02n2952u_001:5779: kevalaṁ karuṇāmūlā śuddhā cintā jñānāya kalpate |
T02n2952u_001:5787: kevalaṁ vidyā samyak jñānaṁ vā tasya upari prabhutvaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:5791: aniścitā ca eṣā vidyā indriyaiḥ pratyakṣībhūtāyāmahaṁsattāyāṁ vasati yatra ātmanaḥ ca aparavastūnāṁ ca madhye parthakyaṁ pratiphalitaṁ bhavati
T02n2952u_001:5792: yadi pārthakyabhūmikā nāpasaret tarhi utthānaṁ ca jāgaraṇaṁ ca na sambhavataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5794: ata eva bauddhadarśane eṣa bodhirhi sandhānaśabdaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5795: eṣa bodhiḥ khalu ekatvasya bodho jāgaraṇaṁ vā |
T02n2952u_001:5797: prajñayā athavā paramajñānena saha karmamūlakaḥ sambandho'sti karuṇāyāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5798: yataḥ ātmatyāgaḥ prakṛtāṁ karuṇāṁ prakāśayati yatra svārthahīnasevāyāḥ bhāvo vidyate |
T02n2952u_001:5799: praṇālīviśeṣeṇa jīvane paricālite sati idaṁ jñānaṁ labhyate |
T02n2952u_001:5800: tat jñānaṁ tathākathitaiḥ yajñakriyādyanuṣṭhānaiḥ na prāpyate,
T02n2952u_001:5801: api tu prāpyate duḥsthamānavasevayā sacetano bhavituṁ naraḥ prātyahikajīvanasya abhijñatāṁ labheta |
T02n2952u_001:5805: yadāparasya kaṣṭaṁ nijakaṣṭamivānubhūyate tadā ekatvabodhena pareṣāṁ bodho dūraṁ gacchati |
T02n2952u_001:5811: sa sānandaghaṭanāpravāhena vāhitaḥ san sāmyabodhenānuprerito bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5812: muktaye vā karuṇātmakaprajñālābhāya vā bauddhānāṁ lakṣyaṁ bhavati vyaktigatamanuśīlanam |
T02n2952u_001:5817: atra dravyapadena prāṇavanto jīvā api sūcyante |
T02n2952u_001:5818: ātmanā kaścidalakṣaṇo'dvitīyaḥ svatantro'vināśī aparivarttanīyaḥ padārthaḥ budhyate |
T02n2952u_001:5820: sa svīkaroti yat naraḥ sammukhaṁ gacchet,
T02n2952u_001:5822: asya pravṛttiḥ bauddhikī pravṛttiḥ yā sākṣyapramāṇaiḥ āptapuruṣaiḥ ca pratiṣṭhitā |
T02n2952u_001:5823: sa evāptapuruṣo yo vastutaḥ tena pathā gatavān tathā ca abhijñatāmarjitavān |
T02n2952u_001:5824: kevalam eṣā mahatī abhijñatā - naro yathā mahān bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:5829: abhijñatā manuṣyaṁ sāvadhānaṁ sacetanaṁ sampūrṇaṁ ca karoti |
T02n2952u_001:5837: bauddhadarśane sampūrṇatāṁ prati pravṛttiḥ mādhyamena śūnyā |
T02n2952u_001:5838: asyārthaḥ niyamavarttino mumukṣujanasyātra karma viṣayakamādhyamena prayojanaṁ nāsti |
T02n2952u_001:5839: athavā anupreraṇādāyinā kenāpi āvegenāpi nāsti prayojanam |
T02n2952u_001:5847: abhidhammapiṭakam iti yeṣāmāpātadṛṣṭyartho bhavati manaḥ samīkṣāṇamiti |
T02n2952u_001:5849: sa āha yat sa tasyādarśasya upalabdhaye tadīyatattvamupadiśati |
T02n2952u_001:5865: jīvanayāpanāya bauddhavyavahāravidhiḥ pañcalakṣaṇātmakaḥ - 1. paśuvadhāt ca jīvātyācārāt ca viratiḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5870: yata idaṁ kasmaiciddevāya vā paramadevāya vā brahmaṇe vā bhāgyasya samarpaṇaṁ na svīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:5871: idaṁ darśanaṁ na dharmīyam kintu prāyeṇa sāmājikam |
T02n2952u_001:5872: bauddhasaṁskṛtiviśleṣaṇāya samājaṁ prati buddhasya yā dhāraṇāsīt tasyā viśleṣaṇam asmābhirvidheyam |
T02n2952u_001:5873: samāje vyaktijanasya pratibandhakatā buddhena viśeṣeṇa jñāyate |
T02n2952u_001:5874: yataḥ sāmājiko janaḥ svādhīnatayā na ālapati,
T02n2952u_001:5877: kintu naraḥ sāmājikabandhanarūpaṁ idaṁ balaṁ sampūrṇaṁ vismarati |
T02n2952u_001:5878: aparadeśīyajanaiḥ saha kasyaciddeśasya janānām anyonyamiśraṇena saṁskṛtigate ādarśe vibhinnatā jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:5880: kintu amiśrā śuddhā saṁskṛtiḥ buddhāya rocate |
T02n2952u_001:5888: sā kāmanā paritṛptaye naraṁ sastupāśaiḥ badhnāti |
T02n2952u_001:5890: karuṇāmayo buddhaḥ mānavajātimuccaiḥ āhūya kathayati etatpralophanaviṣaye sacetanā bhavateti bauddhaṁ darśanamekākinaṁ janaṁ prati gurutvamāropayati
T02n2952u_001:5892: yaḥ svayaṁ nirvāṇāya yatate - yo bauddhaśikṣāyai upayuktaḥ tamapi sagurutvam avalokayati bauddhadarśanam |
T02n2952u_001:5895: purāṇānāṁ vaiśiṣṭyaṁ tathā vaidikasāhityena sākaṁ teṣāṁ sādharmyaṁ vivicya uktamatadvayaṁ pratiṣṭhāpyate |
T02n2952u_001:5896: vaidikasaṁhitāyāṁ yeṣāṁ mūlamasti teṣāṁ purāṇānāṁ bhāratīyasamājadharmasamparkitasaṁskṛtyādarśanirmāṇakṣetre mahān prabhāvo'sti |
T02n2952u_001:5897: ṛcāmiva purāṇānāmapi sadṛśaṁ mūlamasti iti atharvavede,
T02n2952u_001:5904: vaidikasāhitye itihāsapurāṇāni ekatra ca pṛthak ca ullikhyante |
T02n2952u_001:5905: api ca anyeṣu prācīneṣu ca pavitreṣu ca saṁskṛtasāhityeṣu purāṇāni svīkriyante tathā gṛhyante |
T02n2952u_001:5906: uparita idamāyāti yat purāṇaṁ cetihāsaśca sambhavataḥ samārthaṁ na vahataḥ,
T02n2952u_001:5907: tathāpi katiṣu saṁskṛtagrantheṣu taryoḥ ghaniṣṭhasamparkatvāt ekasmādanyasya pṛthaktā na anāyāsena nirmīyate |
T02n2952u_001:5911: kauṭilyasya mate sāṁsārikagandhaśūnyāni upākhyānāni nāma purāṇāni kintu dharmaśāstraṁ tathārthaśāstramitihāsaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5912: śatapathabrāhmaṇe kathākāreṇa jagadabhivyaktiprakāraḥ prakāśitaḥ kintu tatra itihāsāśritā pravaṇatā dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:5916: saṁhitākāravaṁśakramasūcī ca pramāṇīkurvanti yat purāṇeṣu itihāsasya lakṣaṇamasti |
T02n2952u_001:5917: api ca, bhāgavatapurāṇe sargapratisargādīnāṁ jīvatattvagataṁ viśleṣaṇaṁ tathā poṣaṇaṁ vistṛtatarabhāvena ullikhyate |
T02n2952u_001:5920: koṣakāraiśca ṭīkākāraiḥ ca lakṣitā bahavo viṣayāḥ purāṇeṣu itihāsatvasya nirṇayāya paryāptaṁ pramāṇaṁ darśayanti |
T02n2952u_001:5921: bhāgavatapurāṇe likhiteṣu daśalakṣaṇeṣu poṣaṇaṁ cotiśca saviśeṣaṁ lakṣaṇīyatāṁ vrajataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5922: poṣaṇaṁ nāma sarvaśaktigataḥ prāpto'nugrahaḥ athavā prāptā karuṇā |
T02n2952u_001:5923: prāṇinaḥ boddhuṁ śaknuvanti yat īśvarasya apārā karuṇāsti yā prāṇināṁ duḥkhāt muktiṁ sādhayati |
T02n2952u_001:5924: naraḥ sambhavataḥ kramaśaḥ guṇamimaṁ manasā gṛhṇāti |
T02n2952u_001:5929: purāṇāni upadiśanti yat gṛhasthānāṁ manasi 'dayā' syāt 'kṣāntiḥ' syāt |
T02n2952u_001:5930: purāṇeṣu śāstroktakriyāṇāṁ tathā purāvṛttānāṁ madhye yat bahiraṅgaṁ rūpaṁ tatra ānuṣṭhānikatā vā aviśvāsyatā vā prāyeṇa dṛśyate;
T02n2952u_001:5931: vāstavatā laukikatā vā tatra nyūnatayā vartate |
T02n2952u_001:5933: te upadeśā nāma sādhāraṇajanajīvanayāpanāya vyavahāravidhaya eva,
T02n2952u_001:5941: kintu tasya antarnihitā nītirhi tat satyaṁ pravṛttīnāmutkarṣaṁ vidadhāti,
T02n2952u_001:5942: mānavacaritrasyonnatiṁ karoti - yena kṣaṇasthāyī mānavasyāvegaḥ duḥkhārtānāṁ kṛte gabhīrakaruṇānubhavena bhūṣito bhavitumarhati |
T02n2952u_001:5943: bauddhaśāstreṣu api aṁśaviśeṣo gṛhasthajanān prati mahataḥ sannyāsino gautamabuddhasyopadeśavacanaiḥ paripūrṇaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5944: 'siṅgalopadeśasaṁvāde' gautamo gṛhasthaṁ siṅgalamupadiśati - parivrājakebhyo brāhmaṇebhyaśca dvārodghāṭanena snigdhaiḥ kāyikaiḥ vācikaiḥ mānasikaiśca karmabhiḥ sevasveti |
T02n2952u_001:5947: jīvanacakrānmahāmukteḥ prasaṁge gotamaḥ sannyāsina upadiśati 'nirvāṇamupagantuṁ paryāyaṣaṭkamastīti |
T02n2952u_001:5949: prītiḥ muktabhāvena guptabhāvena vā satīrthopāsakānām kṛte kāyikavācikamānasikakarmāṇi,
T02n2952u_001:5952: ete viṣayā duḥkhaṁ dūrīkariṣyanti ityatra viśvāsaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5953: atra karuṇādiḥ kendrabhūtā yāṁ parita ete sarve viṣayāḥ paribhramanti |
T02n2952u_001:5954: gṛhasthā api asmāt niyamād vahirna tiṣṭhanti |
T02n2952u_001:5955: yadā kaścit sannyāsī karuṇātmakacittacālitaḥ san yathāyathāmācarati,
T02n2952u_001:5957: yathāyathaṁ vyavahārāya sannyāsinaḥ manasi karuṇāyāstathā niṣṭhāyā yugapadupasthitiḥ tasya susthaṁ cittaṁ nirdhaśati |
T02n2952u_001:5958: tasya mana eva susthaṁ yaḥ vicitrahetusattvādapi aparamāvṛṇoti athavā aparasyopari prabhāvaṁ vitanoti |
T02n2952u_001:5962: purāṇeṣu anyatamaṁ gurutvapūrṇaṁ vaiśiṣṭyaṁ khalu dharmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5964: kauṭilyasyārthaśāstrasya ṭīkāyāṁ jayamaṅgalaṁ idaṁ satyaṁ vicārayati |
T02n2952u_001:5965: bauddhaśāstre'pi upadiśyate yat prema āsaktivihīnaṁ bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:5971: premakaruṇāsahānubhavajānandādīnāmāsaktovihīnāmutkṛṣṭaguṇānām anuśīlanaṁ dhyānodyamasya na kevalaṁ lakṣyaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:5974: atharvavedaḥ - prācīnatamo dharmagranthaḥ - purāṇānāṁ prācīnatvasya vidagdhaṁ sākṣyaṁ vahati |
T02n2952u_001:5975: atharvavedīyādekasmāt mantrāt idamanumānaṁ bhavati yat purāṇāni ṛcā sāmna yajusāṁ copāṅttvena vivicyante |
T02n2952u_001:5977: brāhmaṇeṣu vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ purāṇetihāsayoḥ sahāvasthānasya prasaṁgam |
T02n2952u_001:5981: (taittirīye āraṇyake chāndogyopaniṣadi bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadi ca purāṇapadasyollekho dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:5984: samakālīne purāṇe dṛṣṭau dvau ślokau prāguktasūtre uddhṛtau |
T02n2952u_001:5988: viṣṇupurāṇena cāpi ślokayugalamuddhṛtaṁ yatra yogikṛtasannyāsatvasya praśaṁsā kriyate |
T02n2952u_001:5989: prakṛto yogī kīdṛśo bhavediti vistareṇa bauddhaśāstreṣu api varṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:5990: tatrocyate yat yo dhyānaniṣṭho janaḥ yathārthato yogī bhaviṣyati,
T02n2952u_001:5995: pātañjaladarśane kriyāyoge ṣaṭ vā sapta vā paryāyā ullikhitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:5998: prema-sahānubhūta-harṣa-karuṇā-samacittatotkṛṣṭabhāvānāmanuśīlanaṁ brāhmaviśve maraṇāt paraṁ punarjanmane bhavanti iti bauddhadarśanasya matam
T02n2952u_001:5999: kintu tatra jīvanakālāvasānātparam īdṛśānuśīlanakārī kṣudhārtapretatvena kṣudhārtajīvatvena punareva janma labhate |
T02n2952u_001:6000: kintu ye dhyānaniṣṭhā janāḥ kartsnyena punarjanmanaḥ muktāḥ,
T02n2952u_001:6002: te'pi brāhme jagati maraṇāt paraṁ punarjanma labhante |
T02n2952u_001:6003: ye tu jīvanasya samāpti yāvat anuśīlanaratāstiṣṭhanti,
T02n2952u_001:6005: yadā īdṛśā dhyāninaḥ puruṣā upalabdhistrotasā vahanti,
T02n2952u_001:6007: te sāṁsārikaṁ viṣayaṁ sthāyinaṁ na manyante |
T02n2952u_001:6012: arthāt pārthive prasaṁge te kārtsnyena nirapekṣā bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:6013: bṛhadāraṇyake cānyāsu upaniṣatsu ca karmaphalasyollekhaḥ asti |
T02n2952u_001:6015: pāpināṁ kṛte kati narakāḥ santi yatra dvau kākau pāpinaḥ pīḍayanti |
T02n2952u_001:6016: vividhā daṇḍāśca vividhānāṁ pāpināṁ kṛte varṇitāstiṣṭhanti |
T02n2952u_001:6017: mākraṇḍeyapurāṇe naciketasa ākhyāne vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat naciketasā asthāyitvāt svargavāsaḥ parityaktaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6018: sadṛśo vṛttāntaḥ prāpyate āpastambadharmasūtrāt ca bhaviṣyapurāṇācca |
T02n2952u_001:6019: tathā hi - svargatāḥ sannyāsinaḥ viśvavināśaṁ yāvat svarge vasanti |
T02n2952u_001:6021: evaṁ cedamanumātuṁ śakyate yat bhaviṣyapurāṇaṁ sambhavataḥ āpastambasya samaye varttamānamāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:6024: vyāsasaṁhitāyā mate vedānāṁ ca purāṇānāṁ ca madhye'nyonyasambandho'sti |
T02n2952u_001:6025: antyeṣṭikriyānuṣṭhāne nimantritebhyaḥ viprebhyaḥ vedapāṭhena saha purāṇapāṭhaṁ nirdiśati manuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6026: jaiminisūtrāṇāmupari tantravārtikanāmadheyo yo granthaḥ kumārilabhaṭṭena racitaḥ sa granthaḥ purāṇaprāmāṇyaṁ svīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:6027: kumārilabhaṭṭasya mate buddhaścānye ca kaliyuge janma gṛhītvā dharmasya nāśaṁ kariṣyanti iti purāṇeṣu varṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:6028: evañcedamanumīyate yat bhārate varṣe bauddhadharmeṇa dṛḍhapadasthiteḥ grahaṇāt pūrvameva purāṇāni rājante sma |
T02n2952u_001:6029: devā dehadhāriṇa iti sarveṣu purāṇeṣu viśeṣeṇa dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:6030: yoginaḥ purāṇopadiṣṭamārgeṇa bhagavantaṁ dhyāyanti iti rāmāyaṇasya mahākaviḥ vālmīkiḥ paśyati |
T02n2952u_001:6031: idamanumīyate yat mahābhāratasya sthāne sthāne abhinnarūpaiḥ purāṇānāmullekho'sti |
T02n2952u_001:6032: sambhavataḥ tatra purāṇapadaṁ mithyāprayuktam athavā purāṇaśabdena kila purātanaṁ kiñciddharmaśāstramullikhyate |
T02n2952u_001:6033: buddhajñānaśikṣāvarṇanaratāḥ kati bauddhā jaināśca granthāḥ purāṇanāma ullikhanti |
T02n2952u_001:6034: buddho vividheṣu śāstreṣu vidyāsu vā nipuṇa āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:6035: evañca purāṇeṣu api tasya vidagdhatā āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:6036: jainalekhakā api paurāṇikīṁ śaīilīmanusṛtya kāvyādīni racitavantaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6037: jainaḥ vimalasūriḥ paricitaḥ prācīnatamaḥ lekhakaḥ 'pauma-cariya' nāmakaṁ granthaṁ khṛṣṭīyaprathamaśatake racitavān,
T02n2952u_001:6039: ata eva siddhāntaḥ kriyate yat purāṇasya rūpaṁ yadeva bhavatu,
T02n2952u_001:6043: bauddhadharmaḥ paurāṇikadarśanena saha pārśvāpārśvi vahamāna āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:6046: tatra hetuḥ - bauddhatatve ca paurāṇikatatve ca bahuvidhaṁ samāñjasamasti,
T02n2952u_001:6052: yadi kṣaṇamapi karuṇānubhūyate tarhi tadapi tasya yogyatāyā paricayaṁ vahati |
T02n2952u_001:6053: bauddho bhikṣuḥ nārīsaṅgaṁ tathā nārīpradattaṁ bhojyaṁ parityajediti buddhasyopadeśaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6054: asya niyamasya vyatikrame sati narake punarjanma eva pratiphalaṁ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:6056: na kāyikasukhāya api tu saphalaṁ dharmīyajīvanayāpanārthaṁ tathā jīvanadhāraṇārtham |
T02n2952u_001:6057: etadapi bhikṣuṇā cintanīyaṁ tādṛśo bhogo yathā dātuḥ lābhāya bhavediti |
T02n2952u_001:6058: buddha āha yat anāyāsaśvasanaṁ tadaiva sambhavati yadā bhikṣuḥ tadīyahṛdaye premabhūmi karṣati |
T02n2952u_001:6063: anubhave siddhāntagrahaṇe sajñānavastugrahaṇe ca karuṇāṁ poṣayitumarhanti |
T02n2952u_001:6064: evaṁ dharmīyaniyamādipālanasamaye bhikṣuḥ karuṇāmayahṛdayadhāraṇāya samartho bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:6065: punaśca, buddha āha yat karuṇāmayabhikṣave ya upahāraṁ dadāti sa tasmāt lābhaṁ nikṛṣya nayati |
T02n2952u_001:6066: na kevalaṁ paurāṇike jagati api tu bauddhasaṁsāre api sarvatra dānaparāyaṇatāyāḥ mahānubhavatāyāśca bhāvavāyuḥ vahati |
T02n2952u_001:6070: tairekaṁ mṛtaṁ kukkuramantareṇa na kimapi ānītam |
T02n2952u_001:6071: viśvāmitraḥ prāptamāṁsena yāgaṁ kartuṁ kṛtasaṁkalpo babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:6073: śīghraṁ devarājaḥ tat śrutvā tannindanīyakarma yena na bhavati tadarthaṁ mṛtakukkurasya māṁsamapahṛtya tasya sthale ekaṁ madhubhāṇḍaṁ sthāpayāmāsa
T02n2952u_001:6074: asmin vyāpāre viśvamitraḥ kruddhaḥ san indramabhiśaptuṁ udyato babhūva |
T02n2952u_001:6075: tatkhādyaparimāṇaṁ viśvāmitrasya śiṣyāṇāṁ kṛte paryāptaṁ nāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:6076: tataḥ indro bhītaḥ san viśvāmitrasya tṛptaye tatkṣaṇāt varṣukameghān preṣayāmāsa |
T02n2952u_001:6080: vayaṁ brahmapurāṇasya 138 tame'dhyāye nṛpateḥ śaryāterākhyānaṁ paṭhamaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6081: sa nṛpaḥ śaryātiḥ ṛṣermadhucchandasaḥ bhāryāyāḥ premno gabhīratāṁ parīkṣitumaicchat |
T02n2952u_001:6082: tadarthaṁ rājā ṛṣiścobhau paralokaṁ gatau iti janaśrutiḥ tena pracāritā |
T02n2952u_001:6083: tatkṣaṇāt rājamahiṣī janaśrutiṁ parīkṣituṁ vyavasthāṁ jagrāha |
T02n2952u_001:6084: kintu munipatnī patimṛtyusaṁdeśenātīvaśokārtā satī ātmavisarjanaṁ cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:6086: sa munipatnyāḥ jīvanaṁ pratyānetuṁ vahniṁ viveśa |
T02n2952u_001:6089: kintu dānadharmo'pi purāṇavihitācaraṇavidhiṣu eko gurutvapūrṇo viṣayaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6090: dānasya kṣetraṁ na saṁkīrṇam - na kevalaṁ viprebhyo dānamapi tu sarvavidhasāmājikakarmāṇi atra antarbhūtāni |
T02n2952u_001:6094: prāyaścittakaraṇena sarvapāpamuktirbhavati iti paurāṇikavidhiḥ purāṇasyodāratāṁ sūcayati |
T02n2952u_001:6095: yato dharmo janajīvanasya sarvān vibhāgān śāsti,
T02n2952u_001:6096: tato dharmārjanasya bodhaḥ manuṣyahṛdayaṁ praviśya manuṣyamudāraṁ karuṇāmayaṁ ca kartumanuprerayati |
T02n2952u_001:6098: purāṇata eva 'vasudhaiva kuṭumbakam' itivat udāratā jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:6099: bauddhaśāstrasya mate yo mumukṣuḥ karuṇātmakaṁ manaḥ puṣṇāti sa yathārthaśuddhadharmīyajīvanaṁ yāpayati iti ucyate |
T02n2952u_001:6101: gotamaḥ mohyaphaggunaṁ sannyāsinamupadiśati yat sa kruddhacittasya sthale kāruṇikaṁ cittaṁ poṣayet |
T02n2952u_001:6102: nijasyāthavā parasya guṇadoṣayoḥ vivecane sarve bhikṣavaḥ kāruṇikāḥ syuḥ iti buddhasya upadeśaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6104: 'kassapaṁ prati siṁhasya garjanam' ityatra parivrājakebhyaḥ karuṇāyāḥ hānikaraprabhāvāt muktasyopari gurutvaṁ sthāpayati |
T02n2952u_001:6105: buddha āha prakṛtaḥ kāruṇiko jano'raṇye vanyajantubhiḥ ākramaṇasya bhayāt muktastiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:6106: vāci, cintāyāṁ karmaṇi ca yo janaḥ karuṇāṁ poṣayati sa janaḥ gotamaṁ prati anuruddhasya vāci vigrahaṁ labhate |
T02n2952u_001:6107: anuruddha āha bhaktiyuktaṁ tathā utsargīkṛtaṁ jīvanaṁ kīdṛśaṁ bhavet iti |
T02n2952u_001:6108: sādhāraṇagārhasthyajīvane gotamo dampatyoḥ aikyaṁ tathā sāmañjasyamupadiśati |
T02n2952u_001:6111: tathā ca bhāryāpi patye sahānubhūtiśīlā bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:6112: premaparidhivistārāya dhyānina upadiśyante yat te prathamataḥ ātmasu,
T02n2952u_001:6117: paurāṇikadṛṣṭiprasūtā cintātra nimnarūpā - bhaktipadasya bahuvidhā diśaḥ santi,
T02n2952u_001:6121: purāṇeṣu bahuvidhāni nītyākhyānāni bhaktidayākartavyatākaruṇādīnāṁ bhāvānāmupari ālokapātaṁ kurvanti |
T02n2952u_001:6125: viṣṇupurāṇe śatadhanuṣaḥ svāminaḥ kṛte bhāryāyāḥ śaivyāyāḥ dhīratāyāstathā bhakteḥ dṛṣṭāntaṁ vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6130: brahmāṇḍapurāṇasyānyākhyāne vinatākadrusvāminaḥ kaśyapasya caritre apūrvā prītistathā dayā dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:6131: mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇe ekamākhyānamasti yatra pitre yayāteye putrasya puroḥ ādarśabhaktiḥ varṇyate |
T02n2952u_001:6132: mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇe'pi ekasminnākhyāne ādarśaśiṣyasya paricayo labhyate yatra śānteḥ karttavyaparāyaṇatā tathā lobhahīnatā aṅkitā |
T02n2952u_001:6133: tena svasmai varasya prārthanā na kṛtā |
T02n2952u_001:6134: kartavyabodhāt sa varaṁ na prārthayate sma |
T02n2952u_001:6135: ayaṁ hi gurau bhakteḥ ādarśaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6138: īśvare nārāyaṇe bhaktyā vā dṛḍhaviśvāsena vā asya pratirodhaḥ sambhavapara āsīt |
T02n2952u_001:6140: balirājasyākhyānevayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat baleḥ dṛḍhabhaktyā vāmanarūpasya viṣṇoḥ api dīptiḥ mahattā ca mlānatāṁ gacchataḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6141: kṣamāyāstathādayāyārīdṛśaṁ prāvaṇyaṁ deveṣu punaḥ punaḥ dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:6143: athavā anuśocanāṁ karoti tatkṣaṇāt sa kṣamāṁ prāpnoti |
T02n2952u_001:6144: mahādevasyāndhakāsurasya cākhyānamatra smaraṇīyaṁ yatra andhakāsuraḥ mahādevasyānugrahaṁ lebhe |
T02n2952u_001:6145: vāyupurāṇagatabhillavyādhākhyāne bhaktestathā niṣṭhāyā bhāvaḥ nimnajanmanaḥ dāsavṛtteśca bādhāṁ jayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:6146: purāṇakārāḥ svargatānāmatṛptānāṁ pretātmanāṁ kṛte'pi dayāṁ prakāśayanti |
T02n2952u_001:6147: narake duḥkhabhogināmuddhārāya vibhinnā upāyāḥ purāṇakāraiḥ vyavasthāpitāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6148: yadyapi te narakavāsinaḥ pṛthivyāṁ vāsasya samaye bahuvidhapāpakarmāṇi akurvan |
T02n2952u_001:6149: bauddhaśāstre idamucyate yat karuṇātmake viśuddhe citte viśvāsaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:6160: arthāt yo naraḥ tasya manasi prema ca karuṇāṁ ca puṣṇāti sa nirvāṇaṁ labhate |
T02n2952u_001:6161: atra premapadasya karuṇāpadasya vā svatantro'rtho'sti - atra karuṇā na āvegasambhūtaḥ bhāvaḥ,
T02n2952u_001:6169: yadā cittaṁ gabhīrasamādhau magnaṁ tiṣṭhati tadā taccitaṁ svabhāvataḥ eva ākāṅkṣāmuktaṁ nirāsaktaṁ ca jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:6171: yadi ko'pyādhyātmiko mumukṣuḥ kaṁcijjanaṁ prati śatrutāṁ poṣayati tarhi evaṁvidhā daśā duḥsahā |
T02n2952u_001:6173: tādṛśaṁ cittaṁ sujaneṣu anyeṣu janeṣu prabhāvaṁ vistārayati |
T02n2952u_001:6174: tathākaraṇena tasya ādhyātmikī unnatiḥ vyāhatā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:6177: jātīyo dharmaḥ vastutaḥ samājadhārakaḥ jīvanavāhakasya viṣayaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6178: sahakāriśaktitvena dharmaḥ samājaṁ tathā jīvanaṁ panthānaṁ darśayati,
T02n2952u_001:6180: bauddheṣu paurāṇikeṣu ca śāstreṣu niyamaniṣṭhajīvanayāpanāya upadeśā lipibaddhāḥ santi |
T02n2952u_001:6182: viśeṣataḥ dharmasya yājñiko'thavānuṣṭhāniko'śaḥ kasyāpi samājasya sampradāyasya ca paricayaṁ vahati |
T02n2952u_001:6184: sa dharmaḥ kasyāpi pradeśasya deśasya vā jāti ca saṁskṛtiṁ ca racayati |
T02n2952u_001:6187: vedānāṁ saṁhitābhāgeṣu vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ yat prākṛtikaśaktiṣu devatvasya āropitaḥ tvāt vaidiko dharmaḥ tadā prāthamike paryāye evāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:6197: upaniṣatsu ca ityādiṣu vaidikasāhityeṣu nītibodhaḥ pratiphalitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6201: evañca samyagātmīyatābodhaḥ dayāṁ ca prātiveśisulabhamanobhāvaṁ ca sṛjati |
T02n2952u_001:6202: eṣā dayā tathā karttavyā adhamaprāṇināṁ kṛte'pyanubhūyate |
T02n2952u_001:6211: apareṣāṁ yathā hānirna bhavati tādṛśīcchā ca |
T02n2952u_001:6212: jīvanasya ca dharmasya ca kṣetre sadācārā upakaraṇaviśeṣāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6214: jainadharme bauddhadharme ca ahiṁsāmūlo yo dharmaḥ sa vivecanīyamātrayā hindudharmaṁ prabhāvitaṁ karoti |
T02n2952u_001:6217: kintu sā cintā janapriyopāyena ākhyānādimādhyamena pracāritā bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:6220: purāṇairvidhṛtā vibhinnā devatāḥ sādhāraṇajīvanopayogivividhāśākāṅkṣāvidhāyinyaḥ iti kāraṇāt tā priyā devātāḥ sañjātāḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6222: sukhabodhyabhāṣayā likhitvāt paurāṇikī vāṇī sudūrasthānīyajanagaṇakarṇasamūhamapi praviśati |
T02n2952u_001:6223: karuṇātmako mahān guṇaḥ api tatra viśiṣṭaṁ gurutvaṁ prāpnoti |
T02n2952u_001:6224: ayaṁ viṣayaḥ kathopakathādibhiḥ tiryak prativimbito bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:6232: prāguktabhāveṣu anyatamenānuprāṇitāḥ santa upāsakāsteṣāmīpsitānāṁ devatānāṁ prasādalābhārthamāhvānaṁ kurvanti |
T02n2952u_001:6235: idaṁ japtā devatāḥprati yujyate yā devatāḥ karuṇārūpamūrtisatyaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6236: bauddhadarśanasya mate sannyāsinaḥ kṣetre karuṇāyāḥ paridhiḥ avaśyameva vistṛto bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:6237: yadi tasya ko'pi śatrurbhavati tarhi taṁ pratyapi sannyāsī karuṇāparāyaṇo bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:6238: īdṛśaḥ sannyāsī nirvāṇamārgeṇa gacchan sarvavidhapratibandhakebhyaḥ mukto bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:6240: idaṁ kevalaṁ hānihīnatāyāmānandānubhavaḥ tathā sarvasmai prītiriti hitāya śatrutāṁ dūrīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:6242: manasaḥ evaṁvidhāyāṁ daśāyāṁ na kāpi virodhinī śaktiḥ tamapakartuṁ śaknoti |
T02n2952u_001:6243: ata eva īdṛśyāṁ daśāyāṁ sannyāsinaḥ pakṣe,
T02n2952u_001:6244: unnatirodhipāpacintādamanāya mānasikyā śaktyā prayojanaṁ na bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:6245: viśuddhadaśāmupagatasya viśuddhacittasya sannyāsinaḥ unmārgagamanasambhāvanā sampūrṇatayā dūraṁ gacchati |
T02n2952u_001:6246: tadā sannyāsī dhyānamagnastiṣṭhatu vā svābhāvikadaśāgatastiṣṭhatu vā iti na ko'pi viṣayaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6247: etādṛśaḥ sannyāsī sarvadā karuṇāmayaśca premamayaśca tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:6248: sahanaśīlaṁ karuṇātmakaṁ cittaṁ pratikūladaśāyāṁ pratikriyāṁ na karoti |
T02n2952u_001:6249: vibhnaśūnyadhyānāya jitendriyāḥ sannyāsinaḥ nyūnatamanamanīyavastubhiḥ santuṣṭā bhaveyuḥ iti gotamasyopadeśaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6250: aparisīmapremamayacittānuśīlanaṁ teṣaṁ karttavyam sādhvidaṁ jñātaṁ yat paurāṇikā ṛṣayaḥ jīvikāvyāpāre vā jīvanayāpanavyāpāre vā atīva namanīyā āsan |
T02n2952u_001:6251: te āśramajīvanopayoginyūnatamavastubhiḥ kālaṁ yāpayituṁ śaknuvanti sma |
T02n2952u_001:6252: teṣāṁ citteṣu dayānubhūtiḥ karuṇānubhūtiḥ vā prācuryeṇāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:6253: ayaṁ mahān āvegaḥ purāṇānāṁ sarvatra prativimbitaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6256: vipadaśca tān muñcanti - iti tathyaṁ pramāṇīkaroti yat dayādhārā dānadhārā vā teṣu sarvadā sakriyāsīt |
T02n2952u_001:6257: etadapi ghaṭate yat kadāpi vā vararūpaḥ karuṇānubhavaḥ ayogyeṣu api vastuṣu vistāraṁ yāti |
T02n2952u_001:6262: idaṁ pramāṇīkaroti yat tapasyā teṣāṁ cittaṁ viśuddhīkaroti |
T02n2952u_001:6263: tathākaraṇena ca te kārtsnyena svārthaparatāmuktā jāyante |
T02n2952u_001:6265: ya eva etallakṣyamupagacchati sa ātmaupamyena apareṣāṁ duḥkhaṁ vā sukhaṁ vā anubhavati |
T02n2952u_001:6266: purāṇāni khalu etaddhāvānuprāṇitaiḥ purāvṛttaiḥ bāhulyena paripūrṇāni |
T02n2952u_001:6268: sa sarveṣāṁ kṣunnivṛttaye varāya prārthanā cakāra |
T02n2952u_001:6271: yajñīyabalirūpasya bālakasya sahāyahīnā daśā varuṇasya manasi sahānubhūti tathā karuṇāṁ jāgarayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:6274: varāhapurāṇasya 125 tame'dhyāye kasmiṁścidupākhyāne kapotasya pecakasya ca bhāryāyugalaṁ sādhāraṇakalyāṇāya iṣṭān devān āhvayati sma |
T02n2952u_001:6276: evañca purāṇeṣu bahavo dṛṣṭāntāḥ santi yatra tyāgamahānubhavatākaruṇāsahānubhavādīnāṁ tejomayo bhāvo vidyate |
T02n2952u_001:6277: bauddhaśāstre yathā likhitaṁ tathā dṛśyate yat gautamo navadīkṣitān sannyāsina upadiśati yat sannyāsina utthānavicaraṇopaveśanādisamaye samādhyanuśīlanāya dṛḍhasaṁkalpā bhaveyuḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6278: tathā ca te yadi upadeśānanusṛtya karma kurvanti,
T02n2952u_001:6282: tena abhyāsakārī yasmāt kasmādapi ākramaṇāt avamānād vā rakṣaṇāya śaktimarjayati |
T02n2952u_001:6283: kiñca, upāsanālaye sannyāsinaḥ ekatra śāntaṁ śātuṁ śaknuvanti |
T02n2952u_001:6284: yataḥ, hṛdayeṣu karuṇānuśīlanatvāt teṣāṁ hṛdayāni komalāni bhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:6285: tathā ca ekaḥ aparasya uttamaḥ sahacaraḥ bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:6287: tathāpi nirvāṇalābhāt paramapi bhūmikāvasthānatvādeva pramaparimalaḥ pareṣāṁ hitāya avaśiṣṭo vartate |
T02n2952u_001:6290: yaḥ sannyāsī pārthiva sukhaṁ jahāti sa eva prakṛtaḥ sannyāsī |
T02n2952u_001:6292: gautamasya mate abhyāsakārī hṛdayena dhīratāhiṁsākaruṇākomalatābhāvānuśīlanena ātmani hṛdaye sahanaśīlatāṁ poṣayati |
T02n2952u_001:6294: abhyāsakārī yadā sampūrṇaṁ gūḍhadhyānamagnastiṣṭhati tadā guṇatrayamatīva śaktipūrṇaṁ tathā phalapradam |
T02n2952u_001:6295: asmin paryāye abhyāsakārī sarvavidhaduṣṭakarmacintābhyo mukto bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:6297: yathārthataḥ asmin paryāye abhyāsakāriṇo manaḥ muktaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:6301: uktaprasaṁge parārthaparatā gautamasya upadeśeṣu na sūcyate,
T02n2952u_001:6302: tathāpi idaṁ niścitaṁ yat gūḍhadhyānamīdṛśaguṇāya sampadyate |
T02n2952u_001:6306: purāṇeṣu ayaṁ guṇaḥ na kevalaṁ sādhūnāṁ citteṣu api tu nimnaprāṇināṁ hṛdayeṣu vartate |
T02n2952u_001:6307: karttavyabodhena saha ātithyādisevā sarveṣāṁ hindūnāṁ sādhāraṇaguṇatvena vivicyate |
T02n2952u_001:6312: pūrvapuruṣāṇāṁ muktaye bhagīrathasya sahanaśīlatā tathā dhīratā svārthaśūnyasevāyāḥ karttavyabodhasya ca ādarśaṁ sthāpayati |
T02n2952u_001:6313: atra sādhusulabhe dayā ca karuṇā ca vartete |
T02n2952u_001:6315: avarajīvānāṁ hṛdayeṣu api kartavyabodhaḥ karuṇābhāvaśca śanaiḥ śanaiḥ praveśaṁ labhete |
T02n2952u_001:6316: sā ghaṭanā atīva vismayāvahā ca marmasparśinī ca yadā vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ - yo vyādhaḥ vihagamithunaṁ pāśabaddhamakarot tasyaiva kṣudhāyai puruṣo vihagaḥ ātmāhūtiṁ dātumudyato'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:6317: samagravyāpāramavalokya sa niṣādo nirvāk tathā āścaryānvito'bhavat |
T02n2952u_001:6318: asmin paryāye sādhāraṇānāmapi janānāmīdṛśaḥ svabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇa eva |
T02n2952u_001:6320: yo bhikṣuḥ sādhuḥ arthāt yasya cittaṁ sampūrṇaṁ muktaṁ sa kati guṇānarjayati |
T02n2952u_001:6324: na ko'pi naraḥ vā paśuḥ vā tamapakartuṁ śaknoti,
T02n2952u_001:6327: sa paramopalabdhiṁ vinaiva maraṇāt paraṁ brahmapadaṁ labhate |
T02n2952u_001:6328: sarvopari, sahānubhūtiḥ karuṇā ceti guṇadvayaṁ dūḍhadhyānena saha samparkitam,
T02n2952u_001:6330: yasyātmopalabdhiḥ sañjātā sa bhavacakrāt punarjanmmo vā muktaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6331: asya paryāyasya lābhāya karuṇā hi avyavahito hetuḥ,
T02n2952u_001:6335: kintu abhyāsakārī yadā tapasyāyāṁ kramaśaḥ unnatiṁ sādhayati tadā tasya hṛdaye karuṇābhāvo jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:6336: antime paryāye'rthāt nirvāṇasya paryāye sannyāsī sāmpūrṇyena niṣkāmo bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:6337: jāgatikasya vastusamūhasya kṣaṇikatāyāṁ tathā asāratāyāṁ sa sacetano jāyate |
T02n2952u_001:6338: asmin samaye abhyāsakārī pratikūladṛśyaghaṭanācaritrādiṣu pratikriyāṁ na karoti |
T02n2952u_001:6339: yo janmasūtreṇa asīmaṁ prema labhate'thavā yasya premamayaṁ hṛdayamasti sa svalpakālena duṣṭamanobhāvaṁ niyantuṁ śaknoti |
T02n2952u_001:6342: cāndrāyaṇavratadineṣu mahātmanaḥ guroḥ śiṣyā manasi sarveṣāṁ jīvānāṁ kṛte premakaruṇāmayaṁ hṛdayaṁ poṣayanti |
T02n2952u_001:6344: manasa īdṛgdaśāyāṁ manaḥ kartsnyena mālinyamuktaṁ tiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:6350: karuṇāyā dhyātmakaṁ karṣaṇaṁ kṣatikarapariveśe pratikriyākaraṇāya viśeṣeṇa phalapradam |
T02n2952u_001:6351: premṇo dhyānātmakaṁ karṣaṇaṁ krodhaṁ pratihataṁ kartuṁ viśeṣata upayogi |
T02n2952u_001:6352: samavṛttitāyāḥ dhyātmakaṁ karṣaṇaṁ tṛṣṇāyā viruddhe pratikriyākaraṇāya viśeṣeṇa prayojanatvaṁ vrajati |
T02n2952u_001:6357: atra karuṇā duḥkhārtatāyāḥ kṛpāyāśca vicchinnā bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:6358: arthāt dhyātā puruṣaḥ kadāpi na paraduḥkheṣu kṛpānubhavenānupreritaḥ bhavet,
T02n2952u_001:6359: yena sa paraduḥkhaṁ vā parakaṣṭaṁ dūrīkartumagrasaro bhavati |
T02n2952u_001:6360: dhyātuḥ pakṣe karuṇāyā ayaṁ bhāvaḥ satataṁ svābhāviko bhavet yainānupreritaḥ san sannyāsī apareṣāṁ duḥkhaṁ dūrīkartumāgacchati |
T02n2952u_001:6361: dhyātuḥ svābhāvikī pravṛttiḥ prāyeṇa rakṣayituḥ pravṛttiriva bhavet |
T02n2952u_001:6363: te kadāpi kutrāpi vā svābhāvikapravṛttiviruddhaṁ karma nākurvan |
T02n2952u_001:6365: tayā te'dbhutaṁ karma kartuṁ samarthā āsan |
T02n2952u_001:6366: tathāpi te tacchakteḥ apaprayogaṁ na cakruḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6369: snehaḥ eva tebhyo janasevāyai preraṇāṁ dadāti |
T02n2952u_001:6370: svecchā tiṣṭhatu vā na tiṣṭhatu vā te karuṇātmakapravṛttivaśāt janahitakaraṁ kāryaṁ sādhayanti |
T02n2952u_001:6371: muneḥ saubhareḥ ākhyāne snehabhāvaṁ sahānubhūtiśca nirdiśyete |
T02n2952u_001:6372: taddvayaprabhāvāt sa svayaṁ sundarataruṇarūpaṁ dhṛtvā pakṣapātahīnavyavahāreṇa sarvāsāṁ bhāryāṇāṁ tṛptiṁ vidhadhāti sma |
T02n2952u_001:6373: skandapurāṇasya kasmiṁścidākhyāne putrāya kārttikeyāya pārvatyāḥ apūrvamātṛsneho'smābhiḥ dṛśyate |
T02n2952u_001:6374: viṣṇupurāṇe vayaṁ paśyāmo yat kena prakāreṇa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ snehāt garuḍasyācaraṇaṁ svābhāvikamakarot |
T02n2952u_001:6377: karuṇā ca tadaiva nirdoṣatvaṁ vrajanti yadā dhyātā nirvāṇamārgasya caturthaṁ paryāyamaupagacchati |
T02n2952u_001:6378: asmin paryāye samavṛttitā dhyātuḥ pakṣe atīva vāstaviko vyāpāraḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6384: bauddhaśāstre upadeśo dīyate yat ācāryasyopadeśaiḥ dhyātāraḥ teṣāmindriyāṇāṁ śaktiṁ vardhayiṣyanti |
T02n2952u_001:6387: kintu yadā dhyātā dhyānayogena antardṛṣṭeḥ upari sthāpyate tadā krodhatṛṣṇādivirodhibhāvā svata eva dūraṁ gacchanti |
T02n2952u_001:6389: yadyapi bauddhaśāstreṣu navadīkṣitānāṁ kṛte tanmayī praceṣṭā upadiśyate,
T02n2952u_001:6390: tathāpi teṣāṁ pakṣe manmayī upalabdhiḥ api upayogitvaṁ vrajati |
T02n2952u_001:6391: ayaṁ vyāpāraḥ sampūrṇaṁ navadīkṣitasya mānasikīṁ sthitiṁ tathā jīvanaṁ prati tasya manobhāvamapekṣate |
T02n2952u_001:6393: sattāsu manaḥsthāpane tathā manaḥpoṣaṇe karuṇābhāvasya antarbhuktistiṣṭhati |
T02n2952u_001:6394: asya bhāvasya siddhau ānandamayaḥ rasa āvirbhāvati |
T02n2952u_001:6395: antardṛṣṭiṁ vinā sthāpanaṁ poṣaṇaṁ tathā ānandānubhavanamiti sahāvasthitamānasikakarmatrayaṁ manasi apṛthaktvena avibhājanīyatvenānubhūyate
T02n2952u_001:6396: antardṛṣṭau satyāṁ mānasikavyāpāratrayamadaḥ pṛthak pṛthak prakāśate,
T02n2952u_001:6399: yadā etattrayaṁ dhyānayogena samanvitabhāvena prativimbitaṁ bhavati tadā sthirapariveśasya kṣaṇikatā,
T02n2952u_001:6402: sarve viṣayāstadā duḥkhamayāḥ kaṣṭamayāḥ svatantrāḥ śūnyamayā iva yoginaḥ nikaṭe pratibhānti |
T02n2952u_001:6403: asmin paryāye svārthaśūnyaḥ san yogī sampūrṇāṁ muktimicchati |
T02n2952u_001:6412: kintu ṛṣīṇāṁ kṣetreṣu svata eva tādṛśī'pekṣikatā phalavatī na bhavati,
T02n2952u_001:6415: tathā ca te teṣāṁ pṛthagastitvaṁ vismaranti |
T02n2952u_001:6416: phalaśrutau te sarvābhiḥ sattābhiḥ saha ātmamatāṁ svīkṛtya aparānubhūtaṁ duḥkhaṁ nijavadanubhavanti |
T02n2952u_001:6418: tatra kumbhīrākrāntabālakaṁ prati śivabhāryāyā umāyāḥ sahānubhūtiḥ karuṇā ca prativimbite |
T02n2952u_001:6419: rājarṣīṇā bharatenāpi avarajīvān prati karuṇā kṛtā |
T02n2952u_001:6421: abhiyojanasya bhāvāt kṣamānubhavo jāyate - yā kṣamā aparādhinaṁ janamuddiśya kriyate |
T02n2952u_001:6422: purāṇeṣu ṛṣibhiḥ aparādhinaṁ prati dayāyāstathā kṣamāyāḥ pradarśanamadhikṛtya vṛttāntā bāhulyena dṛśyante |
T02n2952u_001:6423: purāṇānāmākhyāne vayaṁ paśyāmo yat kaścidṛṣiḥ karuṇāvaśāt uccāritamabhiśāpamapanayati |
T02n2952u_001:6424: kūrmapurāṇe kasmiṁścidākhyāne vayaṁ paśyāmo yat muninā gautamena uccāritaśāpasambhūtadaṇḍasya hrāsaḥ kṛtaḥ |
T02n2952u_001:6425: evaṁ vayaṁ paśyāmaḥ - vaidikasya tathā paurāṇikasya darśanasya mataiḥ saha bauddhadarśanasya matānāṁ niviḍaṁ sānnidhyaṁ vartate |
T02n2952u_001:6427: ubhayordarśanayormadhye asmin cāritrike sambandhe sati hindubhiḥ daśāvatāreṣu anyatamāvatāratvena buddhadevaḥ svīkṛtaḥ iti | ----------
